110004.name: Enchantress.
110004.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1.
110004.flavor: [The Myo Clan has decided to stop cooperating with the Flinas! Everything you say is wrong!]

110005.name: Trickster.
110005.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1.
110005.flavor: [What's wrong? If you feel something is off about this room, you're already too late.]

110006.name: Myo Observer
110006.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1.
110006.flavor: [There, focus, look more closely at the details. The truth can't be seen with just a glance.]

110007.name: Bunny Lady X
110007.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers get STA +1.

110001.name: Bunny Lady
110001.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets STA +1.

110002.name: Wind Shear
110002.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets STA +1.
110002.flavor: [Feel the wind. Concentrate on the petals fluttering in the gentle breeze.]

110003.name: Winged Seeker
110003.ability: At the start of the turn, enemy Followers whose Slot number and SIZE are either both odd or both even get ATK -1/STA -1.
110003.flavor: [How strange. This place contracts all previous theories and thinkers.]

110008.name: Wind Shear X
110008.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers get STA +1.
110008.flavor: [Feel the wind. Concentrate on the petals fluttering in the gentle breeze.]

110009.name: Wind Breaker
110009.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA -2.

100168.name: Soma
100168.ability: At the start of the turn, allied Followers whose Slot numbers are even get ATK +1/STA +1. If the number of cards in your Hand is odd, all Followers in your Hand get ATK +1/STA +1.
100168.flavor: [What do you wish for? Tell me your deepest desires.]

100169.name: Dress Asmis
100169.ability: At the start of the turn, the first card in the enemy Deck gets SIZE +1. If that card is a Follower, a random Follower in the enemy Hand gets ATK -1/STA -1. If it is a Spell, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
100169.flavor: [These clothes make me nervous because they're different from what I usually wear. Is it okay?]

100166.name: Tea Time Cinia
100166.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. Another power is added in dungeons. (Bonus effect: A random Follower in the enemy Hand gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1. If there are no Followers in the enemy Hand, the first Follower in the enemy Deck gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1.)
100166.flavor: [A cup of coffee after waking up feels great.]

100167.name: Cooking Iri
100167.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the tens digit of your Character's LIFE (by a maximum of 3).
100167.flavor: [They said this is what cooks wear, but it's a bit weird.]

100164.name: Flores Altheim
100164.ability: At the start of the turn, the first 3 cards in your Deck that belong to the same faction as your Character are sent to the top of your Deck. Any sent Followers get STA +2. A random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
100164.flavor: [Flores Altheim. Clarice's mother. She was summoned as a key witness for Luthica Preventer's jailbreak. Crux questioned Clarice's mother, but the two had not been in touch for a long time. She has no value as a witness.]

100165.name: First Blood
100165.ability: At the start of the turn, the first 3 cards in your Deck that belong to the same faction as your Character are sent to the top of your Deck. Any sent Followers get STA +2. A random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
100165.flavor: [The pure-blooded vampire. In order to control her own power, she imprisoned herself and has slept for most of her life.]

100162.name: Master Vilosa
100162.ability: At the start of the turn, the first 3 cards in your Deck that belong to the same faction as your Character are sent to the top of your Deck. Any sent Followers get STA +2. A random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
100162.flavor: [Sita's master, whose whereabouts are currently unknown. She is known as Master Vilosa.]

100163.name: Empress Pacifica
100163.ability: At the start of the turn, the first 3 cards in your Deck that belong to the same faction as your Character are sent to the top of your Deck. Any sent Followers get STA +2. A random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
100163.flavor: [Your mother is looking forward to the color of your future. A violet future awaits you all.]

100160.name: Fanatic Layna
100160.ability: At the start of the Turn, if the ones digit of the Turn Number is 1, all Vita Followers in your Deck get STA +4.
100160.flavor: [Love is important. Without it, these girls would lose their light.]

100161.name: Amrita
100161.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck if it does not belong to the same faction as the enemy Character. Otherwise, it is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
100161.flavor: [It's been a while, hasn't it? So, where's Soma? I need to find Soma.]

300443.name: 황색의 왕 카넬
300443.ability: Before defending, this Follower's STA is swapped with the STA of the allied Follower with the lowest STA.
300443.flavor: [Hm... So? Can you sense my dignity? Yellow is the symbol of prestige and dignity, after all.]

300252.name: Rainbow Lady
300252.ability: Before defending, the attacker's DEF is reduced by the difference between this Follower's ATK and the attacker's ATK (by a maximum of 5), then this skill is removed.
300252.flavor: [It's a rainbow~ Eek! The water got all over me!]

300253.name: Perfect Lady
300253.ability: Before defending, if this Follower is still active, it gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300253.flavor: [What's this? Redo it. Clean it again.]

300250.name: Council Exec. Maron
300250.ability: Before defending, if this Follower and the attacker belong to different factions, the attacker gets ATK -1/STA -1 and this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300250.flavor: [Hm~ It's been a long time since this equipment has seen light, so the condition is as expected... Cough! Whew, the dust!]

300251.name: Doubt Lady
300251.flavor: [Why are you like that? Aren't you lying to me? Alright then, go ahead and try to lie to me.]

300256.name: Beach Volleyball Lady
300256.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets STA decreased by its DEF.
300256.flavor: [Yes? Am I at a disadvantage? Don't think that I have a disadvantage in physical condition. I can win!]

300257.name: Guitar Maid
300257.ability: Before attacking, if the defender is deactivated, it gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1.
300257.flavor: [Don't listen too much to my sound. Listen closely to the sound of your heart. Use the 6 strings of the guitar to convey a message of humanity.]

300254.name: 2S Sink Queen 571
300254.ability: Before defending, this card and neighboring cards are deactivated. If at least one card is deactivated, the attacker is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck, then this skill is removed.
300254.flavor: [Leave everything in the sea to me! There's no ship that can withstand my mines. It's the art of explosions!]

300255.name: Mist Lady
300255.ability: Before attacking, the defender's ATK/DEF/STA are changed to their original values, then this skill is removed.
300255.flavor: [She has the ability to turn her body into mist. When she absorbs her sword of mist into her body, nobody will be able to track her.]

300258.name: Ice Lady
300258.ability: Before defending, if this Follower and the attacker belong to different factions, the attacker gets ATK -1/STA -1 and this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300258.flavor: [At some point, girls with special abilities began to show up at the Royle Academy. Since then, there are still girls who have kept their special abilities a secret all this time.]

300259.name: Supplier Knight
300259.flavor: [I have to leave this tasty stuff and go report now. I can't be late!!]

300494.name: Year 1 Onesound
300494.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, a card called "Thank You" is created at the top of the enemy Deck.

300495.name: Year 1 Onesound
300495.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, a card called "Thank You" is created at the top of the enemy Deck.

300496.name: Year 1 Sita
300496.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, a card called "Thank You" is created at the top of the enemy Deck.

300497.name: Year 1 Cinia
300497.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, a card called "Thank You" is created at the top of the enemy Deck.

300490.name: Year 1 Rang Ddo
300490.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, a card called "Thank You" is created at the top of the enemy Deck.

300491.name: Year 1 Masatokki
300491.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, a card called "Thank You" is created at the top of the enemy Deck.

300492.name: Year 1 Jung Pil Won
300492.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, a card called "Thank You" is created at the top of the enemy Deck.
300492.flavor: [Jung Pil Won is celebrating Sword Girl's 1st anniversary.]

300493.name: Year 1 Hwansang Gobuk
300493.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, a card called "Thank You" is created at the top of the enemy Deck.
300493.flavor: [Hwansang Gobuk is celebrating Sword Girl's 1st anniversary.]

300498.name: Year 1 Luthica
300498.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, a card called "Thank You" is created at the top of the enemy Deck.

300499.name: Year 1 Iri
300499.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, a card called "Thank You" is created at the top of the enemy Deck.

300296.name: Scardel Unit Antares
300296.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1.
300296.flavor: [Scardel's fighter. She doesn't have any victims yet, but from the last battle against Crux, she showed her worth by engulfing the entire area in flames.]

300297.name: Crescent Unit Gungnir
300297.ability: Before defending, a random enemy Follower other than the attacker gets ATK -1/STA -1.
300297.flavor: [Crescent's anti-personnel fighter. Once she chooses her target, she eliminates it without retreating.]

300294.name: Crux Knight Swimie
300294.ability: Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the SIZE of the first card in the enemy Hand. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300294.flavor: [S, scary! The water is like outer space, I can't breathe in it.] [2-A corporal Swimie. You have the power to manipulate water, but with that kind of attitude, it's going to be very difficult...]

100016.name: Chess Cinia
100016.ability: At the start of the turn, the first enemy Follower with the highest SIZE gets ATK/STA decreased by half (rounding up) of the combined SIZE of the first allied Follower and a Follower in Slot 4 in your Field.
100016.flavor: [Checkmate, that's the end. Ah~ it was boring because you were too weak. Is there any opponent that can give me exciting games like my sister did?]

100017.name: Sports Luthica
100017.ability: At the start of the turn, if Slot 5 in your Field is empty, a Follower in Slot 1 in your Field is moved to Slot 5 and gets STA +5. If Slot 1 in your Field is empty, a Follower in Slot 5 in your Field is moved to Slot 1 and gets STA +5.
100017.flavor: [Run as much as you want! We have this opportunity, so spend this time to your heart's content!]

100014.name: Dress Vernika
100014.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field with a SIZE of at least 2 gets SIZE decreased by the difference in SIZE between the first two cards in your Hand.
100014.flavor: [It's been a long time since I've worn this. I think it's the first time since my brother's wedding? Hehe... Sita, hang on a sec.]

100015.name: Kendo Sita
100015.ability: At the start of the turn, if Slot 3 in the enemy Field is empty, a random enemy Follower is moved there. A Follower in Slot 3 in the enemy Field gets STA -3.
100015.flavor: [It's fine, there won't be a problem.] [But didn't you say you've never done this before?] [I'm confident because it involves a sword.]

100012.name: Dress Luthica
100012.ability: At the start of the turn, if the difference in SIZE between the cards in Slot 1 and Slot 2 of your Hand is odd, all allied Followers get STA +2. If the difference is even, allied Followers get ATK +2.
100012.flavor: [It's been a while since I've worn eye-catching clothes like this. Is it because of Jaina? Heh...]

100013.name: Dress Iri
100013.ability: At the start of the turn, if this Character's LIFE and the SIZE of the first card in your Hand are both odd or both even, this Character gets LIFE +3.
100013.flavor: [It's... it's not like I picked out this dress just because I wanted to come to this party. It couldn't be helped! Wearing this...]

100010.name: Dress Sita
100010.ability: At the start of the turn, if there are at least two cards in the enemy Field, the enemy Follower with the highest SIZE gets ATK -2/DEF -1/STA -2. If there is one enemy card, it gets STA -2

100011.name: Dress Cinia
100011.ability: At the start of the turn, the first enemy Follower with a SIZE that is less than or equal to half (rounding up) of the total SIZE of the first two cards in your Hand gets ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2.
100011.flavor: [I don't usually wear dresses like this, but since I was attending your party, it couldn't be helped!]

200233.name: Summoning Ritual
200233.ability: The first card in the enemy Grave is removed from the game. If the removed card's SIZE was 3 or less, a Follower called "Zombie" with the skill "At the start of the turn, this card is sent to the Grave." is created in the first empty Slot of your Field. If the removed card's SIZE was 4 or more, a Follower called "Devil Lady" is created in the first empty Slot of your Field.
200233.flavor: [You called? You can summon us as you wish, but it isn't easy to get rid of us~]

200232.name: Fellowship
200232.ability: If your Field contains at least one Follower, all non-Crux Followers on both players' Fields get STA -3.
200232.flavor: [I could never leave my injured comrade! I will never leave this place alone!]

200231.name: String of Emotion
200231.ability: The first allied Follower with the lowest SIZE gets SIZE +2/ATK +2/DEF +2/STA +2.
200231.flavor: [The string of emotion. An artifact whose two ends are given to two different people. Each person feels the emotion they want the most. As the users reflect on their emotion, the enemy is influenced as well.]

200230.name: Summer Day Memory
200230.ability: Three random allied Followers get ATK/STA increased by the difference between 4 and their own SIZE.
200230.flavor: [The girl with an eyepatch approached Jaina.] [Do you want... some ice cream?]

200237.name: True Vampire God
200237.ability: Your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of Neutral cards in your Hand/Field minus 1, and all Followers on your Field gain an equal amount of STA.
200237.flavor: [Erase it from your memory. You cannot see me like this. Turn away. I want to stay like this a little longer...]

200236.name: Born in Nature
200236.ability: A number of cards equal to the total number of cards on both players' Fields are sent from both players' Hands to the bottom of the owner's Deck. If this happens, a random allied Follower gets STA increased by the total number of cards sent.
200236.flavor: [Born in nature. Cannelle. Found in nature. Cannelle.] [I'm not a shorty!!!]

100018.name: Cheerleader Iri
100018.ability: At the start of the turn, a random card in your Hand with a SIZE of at least 2 gets SIZE -1.
100018.flavor: [Hm? The athletic meet is during the day? That's too bad... I thought I might be able to have some fun for a change...]

100019.name: Team Manager Vernika
100019.ability: At the start of the turn, if there are three or fewer cards in your Hand, all cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by half of the number of sent cards (rounding up).
100019.flavor: [Everyone's working hard, I really enjoy cheering for you all!]

200145.name: Minds in Conflict
200145.ability: The first allied Follower with a skill and the first enemy Follower with a skill have their SIZE, ATK/DEF/STA, and skills swapped.
200145.flavor: [Nanai!!] [You don't belong in the position of president, Celine. That position will be mine.]

200144.name: Infighting
200144.ability: If there are any allied Followers, allied Followers that belong to the first allied Follower's faction are sent to the Grave. If this happens, enemy Followers that belong to the first enemy Follower's faction, except for the first enemy Follower, are sent to the Grave. This card is removed from the game.
200144.flavor: [You're always like this, president! You only think about what you want! Your opinion isn't the only one that matters!]

200411.name: Divine Clue
200411.ability: If your Field/Grave contains a Follower, two random enemy Followers get STA decreased by the difference between the number of Followers in your Grave and the number of Followers in the enemy Grave (by a maximum of 6).
200411.flavor: [How about I give you a reward? I will tell you about the God of Truth you have been looking for. Come closer.]

200410.name: Underground City
200410.ability: All allied Followers with "Crescent," "Scardel," or "Flina" in the name get STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand/Field with "Crescent," "Scardel," or "Flina" in the name and gain half as much (rounding up) ATK.
200410.flavor: [This underground place is amazing. Kris.] [This place is clearly...]

200141.name: Detection
200141.ability: A random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by its SIZE and DEF -1.
200141.flavor: [Even with that speed, it can't pass the perception of the Medusa Glasses.]

200140.name: Summer Machine Gun
200140.ability: If your Field/Hand contain cards with "Lucca," "Milka," and "Serie" in the names (at least 1 of each), those cards get ATK +3/STA +3.
200140.flavor: [The girls' first challenge. An album of their songs, filled with sincerity. Listen to it! Summer Machinegun!]

200143.name: Fault
200143.ability: If you have at least 2 Followers on the Field with "Tennis Club" in the name, the enemy Character gets LIFE -3.
200143.flavor: [Fault! Rona's serve failed! The nationals are on the very edge with this! Rona is in a crisis!]

200142.name: Golden Pair
200142.ability: If you have at least 2 Followers on the Field with the same name, those Followers all get ATK +3/STA +3.
200142.flavor: [We'll be the Golden Duo to lead Vita to the nationals! Let's go to the national meet!]

200419.name: Cosmo Drive
200419.ability: If you have an Academy Character, all enemy Followers with the highest SIZE get ATK/STA decreased by the difference between the SIZE of the allied Follower with the lowest SIZE and the enemy Follower with the highest SIZE.
200419.flavor: [Is this... the same kind of dagger as the one Lucerrie has? If so... Hm? What's this belt?] [Triforce! Ready?] [Is... the dagger reacting?]

200418.name: Surprise Attack
200418.ability: A random allied Follower gains ATK or STA (25%/75% chance) equal to the ones digit of the Turn Number.
200418.flavor: [Seron discovered a strange object in the Pacifica household's storage basement. This metal hammer shines brilliantly, as if it turns everything it touches into light.]

200149.name: Defeat
200149.ability: A random allied Academy Follower gets DEF increased by the number of enemy Followers with skills (by a maximum of 3).
200149.flavor: [Everything has burned away. A clean slate...]

200148.name: Maid Experience
200148.ability: All cards in your Hand and Grave with the name "Home Study" are removed from the game. Two random enemy Followers get STA decreased by twice the number of removed cards.
200148.flavor: [Master Cinia! You need to react faster!] [I... I won't forgive this for you tomorrow!]

200097.name: Alluring Whisper
200097.ability: The bottom 3 cards in your Deck are sent to the Grave. The following effect is applied a number of times equal to the number of sent Darklore Followers: "A random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1."
200097.flavor: [I, too, understand how you feel. You feel lonely. You wish for warmth and a lasting feeling. Don't regret anything. You have the right to take that girl.]

200096.name: Misfortune
200096.ability: Six Spells in your Grave are removed from the game. If this happens, a random enemy Follower gets SIZE +3.
200096.flavor: [Ka... Kana is... not a place...] [You have discovered too much. Kana is an existence that I must guard. Do not be so hasty in approaching it.]

200095.name: Midnight Doll Show
200095.ability: If there are at least seven Darklore Followers in your Grave, all enemy Followers get DEF -2/STA -2.
200095.flavor: [None of my dolls are failures. They are all reflections of myself.]

200094.name: Bad Apple
200094.ability: If there are allied Darklore Followers with "Witch" in the name and allied Darklore Followers without "Witch" in the name, two random allied Darklore Followers get ATK +3/STA +3.
200094.flavor: [Which one is tastier? This apple is a gift for an important person, so I put my heart into making it.]

200093.name: Dollmaster
200093.ability: A Follower in Slot 3 of the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by its SIZE.
200093.flavor: [The dolls are gradually increasing in number... Kya! The strings are tangled again. F.. friends! Please help me!]

200092.name: Crux Command
200092.ability: The following effects are applied depending on the number of cards in your Deck. 10 or more: Two random allied Followers gef DEF +2/STA +2. If those Followers belong to Crux, they get an additional ATK +2. Less than 10: Two random allied Followers get SIZE +1 and +6/+6 Atk/Sta.
200092.flavor: [You don't need to worry. I will drive out all foreigners from this land. I am determined. Summon the knights immediately. I will personally remove the witches and vampires from this land.]

200091.name: Arrest
200091.ability: All cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If at least two cards were sent, a random enemy Follower with a SIZE of at least 4 is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
200091.flavor: [For being in contact with vampires, and under the suspicion of planning to harm civilians, I place you under arrest.] [I can't believe it. Jaina!!!]

200090.name: Recluse
200090.ability: If there is one allied Follower, that Follower gets ATK =0/DEF =0, and then two enemy Followers get ATK decreased by half of the ATK/DEF reduction (rounding down).
200090.flavor: [This... joke is a little too much, don't you think. Those damn shorties, I need to scold them later. Even so, Rio believed that Crux would protect her, but you were too lax and let those pranksters in. I'm disappointed, Jaina.]

200099.name: Vernika's World
200099.ability: All enemy Followers get ATK/STA decreased by the total number of Spells in your Hand and the enemy Hand. If you have a Darklore Character, the first Spell in your Hand, the enemy Hand, and all Spells on the enemy Field are all sent to the Grave.
200099.flavor: [The Vernika who had become a vampire possessed a surprising amount of power. Vernika's magic tore down the boundary between reality and fantasy. The realization of a picturesque world became a possibility. Vernika endlessly waited in the withered garden for Sita.]

200098.name: Impulse
200098.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, your Character gets LIFE -1 and a random enemy Follower gets STA -5. If your Grave contains at least 8 cards, a random enemy Follower gets STA -5. Two random Spells in your Grave are removed from the game.
200098.flavor: [In that moment, my mind was painted white. Even though I had the strength to stand before the elders, my will crumbled away. What remained was another me, driven by intense loneliness and thirst.]

200527.name: 매스리콜
200527.ability: A random non-Academy card in your Field or Hand is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random enemy Follower is sent to the Grave.
200527.flavor: [Hey! You can't steal my sweets! Mass Recall!]

200526.name: 발각된 스파이
200526.ability: Two random enemy Followers get DEF decreased by the number of allied Academy Followers.
200526.flavor: [Shion~ forget about that! There's no way we could have seen something we weren't supposed to!] [Linia thought about it.] ['There's no need for questions. The answer is already clear. It will be my victory.']

200525.name: 묘족의 관찰자
200525.ability: The enemy card in Slot 3 is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. The third Follower in the enemy Deck is sent to Slot 3 of the enemy Field. If you have a Vita Character, that Follower gets SIZE +3/STA -3.
200525.flavor: [Hehehe~ It's interesting to watch the Vita students!]

300079.name: Council Pres. Celine
300079.ability: Before defending, a card in your Hand with "Student Council" in the name is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, this card gets ATK +1/STA +2.
300079.flavor: [It's okay if we go a little over budget, we'll work harder next semester so there's nothing to worry about. Anyway, add the cost of my tea to the expensives, Amy, okay?]

200523.name: 변화의 시작
200523.ability: All allied Followers with "Cook Club" in the name get ATK/STA increased by the difference in their current SIZE and original SIZE.
200523.flavor: [Were you watching over me all this time?] [Of course. I also know that you want to quit the basketball club since you're the only member. How about joining the Aletheians?]

200522.name: 금지
200522.ability: All cards in both Fields and Hands get SIZE=2. All Followers in your Hand get SIZE -1. Two random enemy Followers get ATK decreased by the total number of cards in both Fields/Hands with a SIZE of 2 (to a minimum of 1) and get STA decreased by half as much (rounding down).
200522.flavor: [Listen! You hear me? I'm going to get very angry if you flip Rio's skirt again! Got it?] [It... it was wrong.] [Sniff... Sister Sage is scary.]

200521.name: 강적출현
200521.ability: All Spells in your Grave are removed from the game. A number of cards named "Zombie" equal to 2 plus the number of removed cards are created at the top of your Grave. A random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by half the number of "Zombie" cards in your Grave (rounding up, by a maximum of 6).
200521.flavor: [The trespasser burst in with a sign with "O" written on it.]

200520.name: 새로운 작전
200520.ability: Any cards with "GS", "Aletheian", or "Apostle" in the first 3 cards in your Deck get SIZE -1. A random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by the total SIZE decrease.
200520.flavor: [That person has been found.] [Understood. I will respectfully bring that person in.]

300073.name: Campus Idol
300073.flavor: [I didn't tell anyone what to do. I just told the hesistant sheep of a place where they could rest.]

300070.name: Red Moon Aka Flina
300070.ability: Before attacking, this card gets DEF=0. This card gets ATK/STA increased by the difference between this card's DEF and the defender's DEF (by a maximum of 9).
300070.flavor: [Why did sister give power to the elders? Isn't it fine if we just get rid of them?]

300071.name: Blue Moon Becky Flina
300071.ability: At the start of the turn, this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1, and another Follower other than this one gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300071.flavor: [Why don't you leave the elders to me? The vampire population is going to get smaller if you leave it to Red Moon.]

300076.name: Lib. Milka
300076.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower with "Library Club" in the name gets STA +2.
300076.flavor: [This book is due next week. Don't forget to return it.]

300077.name: Council Casey
300077.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +2, then this skill is removed.
300077.flavor: [It isn't touching their skins, so it still isn't following the rules! I will teach their bodies what it means to break the rules!]

300074.name: Council Clerk Fran
300074.flavor: [Senpai! If you keep doing that, I'm going to show this meeting's minutes to the teachers!]

200528.name: 주변경호
200528.ability: All enemy Followers get ATK decreased by the number of cards in your Hand. All allied Followers get DEF increased by the number of Academy Followers in your Hand.
200528.flavor: [Coordinate entry complete. Target information sent. Will we be able to protect her?]

300289.name: Knight Lady
300289.ability: Before defending, this Follower gets STA +1.
300289.flavor: [... You want to join? This isn't a place for sheltered ladies like you.]

300106.name: Tennis Rhona
300106.flavor: [This play, it will disappear. This is one out of my four reversal techniques. In order to surpass senpai, I've practiced everything.]

300107.name: Tennis Mai
300107.flavor: [Your tennis is lacking. You have to discover for yourself what you are missing.]

300104.name: Undertaker
300104.ability: Before attacking, the first Followers in your Grave and the enemy Grave are removed from the game, and this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1 for each card removed.
300104.flavor: [Grandma always said to respect the freedom of others... I didn't like grandma.]

300105.name: Visitor Ophelia
300105.ability: Before attacking, this card gets SIZE -1 (to a minimum of 1). // Before defending, this card gets DEF +1, then the attacker gets ATK/STA/DEF decreased by the difference between this card's SIZE and DEF (by a maximum of 5).
300105.flavor: [Where is this? Where is the professor? I can't go back now. I have to make up my mind. So. Who are you?] [You don't know the continent's greatest sage?]

300102.name: Tea Party Witch
300102.ability: Before attacking, all allied Followers with "Witch" in the name get STA +1.
300102.flavor: [Kya! Are you the ones who messed up my precious snacks? What don't you just leave us alone! We didn't do anything to you!]

300103.name: Heart Stone Witch
300103.ability: Before defending, all allied Followers with "Witch" in the name get ATK +2/STA +2, then this skill is removed.
300103.flavor: [This is the tool that links a witch's power, the heart stone, otherwise known as the sage's jewel. I just want to live freely. Prepare yourself. I refuse to be bound by limitations, open the control circuit. Destroy all enemies ahead.]

300100.name: Reading Witch
300100.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +2, then this skill is removed.
300100.flavor: [I'm slowly making my way through the "tower" library. When I run out of things to read, I wonder how I'll relieve my boredom.]

300101.name: Cauldron Witch
300101.ability: Before defending, if there is another allied Darklore Follower other than this one, this card gets STA increased by half the attacker's ATK (rounding up), then this skill is removed.
300101.flavor: [The materials we can gather from around us are sufficient. The important thing is the creator's rhythm, power, concentration! Now, wait in anticipation, the medicine to give sweet dreams is almost complete.]

300108.name: Sleep Club Student
300108.flavor: [Preparations are needed to have the perfect sleep at any time. I call this technique the perfect camouflage.]

300109.name: Lib. Daisy
300109.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's DEF is at least 1, the defender gets DEF=0 and this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300109.flavor: [Kyaa! Senpai! You can't buy these kinds of books, even if you say they're amazing! You can't even donate these kinds of books! Stop playing these jokes!]

300740.name: Chief Maid Carrie
300740.ability: Before attacking, if you have an Academy Character, this card's SIZE is changed to its original value. This card gets ATK/STA increased by the change in SIZE.
300740.flavor: [Carrie, since Toto left, I'm giving you the position of chief.] [Eh? Really, master Cinia? Thank you! I'm getting a raise, too, right?]

300371.name: Supersonic Maid
300371.ability: Before attacking, the allied Follower in Slot 3 of your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300371.flavor: [She's the toughest, unbeatable, strongest master of cooking and cleaning. When she takes on any kind of housework, it's finished in a flash.]

300818.name: RH Helena
300818.ability: At the start of the turn, this card gets ATK +4/STA +4. // Before this card is attacked, if its STA is less than its original value, it gets STA +3. If its STA is greater than its original value, this card gets ATK +2 and is reactivated.
300818.flavor: [Th... this is embarrassing, as I expected... but if it makes a lot of people happy, then I'm a little happy, too.]

300819.name: HH Isfeldt
300819.ability: At the start of the turn, this card gets ATK +1/STA +1. // Before this card is attacked, if its STA is less than its original value, it gets STA +1. If its STA is greater than its original value, this card gets reactivated.
300819.flavor: [How do I look? It's been a while since I've dressed up for an event. One of the two most anticipated events is almost here. The chocolate festival is starting soon.]

300810.name: HH Linus
300810.ability: At the start of the turn, this card gets ATK +1/STA +1. // Before this card is attacked, if its STA is less than its original value, it gets STA +1. If its STA is greater than its original value, this card gets reactivated.
300810.flavor: [It's... it's not like I like these clothes or anything! I just had the courtesy to wear them at least once since they were handmade.]

300811.name: MH Linus
300811.ability: At the start of the turn, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2. // Before this card is attacked, if its STA is less than its original value, it gets STA +2. If its STA is greater than its original value, this card gets ATK +1 and is reactivated.
300811.flavor: [Muzisitters have a really tough job... there are always troublemakers around at night and during the day... I can't show them this weak appearance.]

300812.name: RH Linus
300812.ability: At the start of the turn, this card gets ATK +4/STA +4. // Before this card is attacked, if its STA is less than its original value, it gets STA +3. If its STA is greater than its original value, this card gets ATK +2 and is reactivated.
300812.flavor: [It.. it's tough for me if you look at me like that... Do I look small and cute?]

300813.name: HH Rose
300813.ability: At the start of the turn, this card gets ATK +1/STA +1. // Before this card is attacked, if its STA is less than its original value, it gets STA +1. If its STA is greater than its original value, this card gets reactivated.
300813.flavor: [These are really strange wings. Do they really work? If they do, then I'd want to give them to all of our members, too.]

300814.name: MH Rose
300814.ability: At the start of the turn, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2. // Before this card is attacked, if its STA is less than its original value, it gets STA +2. If its STA is greater than its original value, this card gets ATK +1 and is reactivated.
300814.flavor: [Where is this... I don't remember coming here. Do you know where this is?]

300815.name: RH Rose
300815.ability: At the start of the turn, this card gets ATK +4/STA +4. // Before this card is attacked, if its STA is less than its original value, it gets STA +3. If its STA is greater than its original value, this card gets ATK +2 and is reactivated.
300815.flavor: [Eh? This is a school uniform? I'm curious where students wear this as a uniform... more importantly, is this headband a part of the uniform, too?]

300816.name: HH Helena
300816.ability: At the start of the turn, this card gets ATK +1/STA +1. // Before this card is attacked, if its STA is less than its original value, it gets STA +1. If its STA is greater than its original value, this card gets reactivated.
300816.flavor: [I still need to calm my heart. Once I've made peace with my decision, I will turn everything around again.]

300817.name: MH Helena
300817.ability: At the start of the turn, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2. // Before this card is attacked, if its STA is less than its original value, it gets STA +2. If its STA is greater than its original value, this card gets ATK +1 and is reactivated.
300817.flavor: [I'm saving this letter to write about all the truths that I've seen and felt. Time will reveal  who the abnormalities are.]

300728.name: Lady Seresty
300728.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets SIZE -1/STA -2. If you have an Academy Character, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
300728.flavor: [It's been a while since I've had a vacation, but the city is really boisterous today. I'll head back.]

300393.name: Aberrant Rio
300393.ability: Before attacking, the defender becomes a card named "Guide Rio" retaining its current ATK/DEF/STA/SIZE and skills and gets ATK/DEF/STA equal to the number of "Rio" cards on the enemy Field. // Before defending, if the attacker's ATK is greater than this card's DEF, this card is reactivated. // At the start of the turn, this card's stats are changed to their original values if they are lower than their original values.
300393.flavor: ["Have you been well? Esprit is still cute as ever." She asked Rio. This was one of the reasons Crux protected her. Namely, Rio is not an existence completely rooted in this world.]

300392.name: Time Witch Herionne
300392.ability: Before attacking, if you have a Darklore Character, all allied Followers regain their original skills. // Before defending, all allied Followers with "Witch" in the name get STA +2, then this skill is removed.
300392.flavor: [Even among the witches, she's very mysterious, seeming to live in a different time from others.] [What do you desire? Eternal youth? Isn't that trivial?]

300391.name: Crescent Enemy Neki
300391.ability: Before defending, if this card is deactivated, the attacker gets ATK -2/STA +1.
300391.flavor: [Have you ever seen a vampire drinking blood? I can't hold myself back. Ire... I miss you. I wonder what a vampire hunting vampire's blood tastes like?]

300390.name: Aletheian F-RIVA
300390.flavor: [I will be the lamp to guide you who wander through the night. Please listen to the teachings I bring.]

300397.name: Crux Knight Rose
300397.ability: Before defending, the cards in Slots 3,4,5 of your Hand are sent to the top of your Deck. This card and another random allied Follower get DEF increased by the number of sent cards. If your Character has "Rose" in the name, those Followers get an additional ATK +1.
300397.flavor: [This mission is too dangerous for Veltier. Please reconsider this assignment, captain...]

300396.name: Witch Cadet Linus Falco
300396.ability: Before attacking, a random Follower in the enemy Deck gets ATK -1/STA -1. If your Character has "Linus" in the name, the defender gets ATK -1/STA -1 (once per turn). // Before defending, a random Follower in the enemy Deck gets ATK -1/STA -1. If your Character has "Linus" in the name, the attacker gets ATK -1/STA -1 (once per turn).
300396.flavor: [The chairman's activities are strange. I need to look into the restricted areas. Something is going on...]

300123.name: Arcana Fulle
300123.flavor: [You're jealous of my carefree expression? I have many worries, too!]

300395.name: Council Sleuth Asmis
300395.ability: Before attacking, the first Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the top of the enemy Deck, then the defender gets ATK -1/STA -1. If there is no Spell, the defender gets STA -2 (once per turn). // Before defending, the first Follower in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck, then this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. If there is no Follower, this Follower gets STA +2 (once per turn).
300395.flavor: [Something is at the detective agency. Rosie received her orders from the SS!]

300394.name: Dress Up Kar Vistas
300394.ability: Before attacking, a card identical to this one is created in your Grave. // Before defending, this card gets STA increased by the number of cards identical to this card in your Grave (by a maximum of 3). // At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Deck with "Dress Up" in the name that has a different name than this card is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field and gets SIZE=5 and ATK +3/STA +3. This card is sent to the Grave.
300394.flavor: [Transform! Go!! Dress Up the Muzisitter! The melody of our souls, roused by our fingertips!]

110013.name: Trickster X
110013.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets SIZE -2.
110013.flavor: [What's wrong? If you feel something is off about this room, you're already too late.]

110012.name: Enchantress X
110012.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers get ATK +1.
110012.flavor: [The Myo Clan has decided to stop cooperating with the Flinas! Everything you say is wrong!]

110011.name: Wind Forestier
110011.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by half the Turn Number (rounding down).
110011.flavor: [I am as fast as the wind, as orderly as the forest, as passionate as fire, and as tough as the mountain. Remember this!]

110010.name: Wind Sneaker
110010.ability: At the start of the turn, a random card in your Hand gets SIZE -1.
110010.flavor: [Faster and lighter than the wind! I accept our family's speed!]

110017.name: Wind Forestier X
110017.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by half the Turn Number (rounding down).
110017.flavor: [I am as fast as the wind, as orderly as the forest, as passionate as fire, and as tough as the mountain. Remember this!]

110016.name: Wind Sneaker X
110016.ability: At the start of the turn, two random cards in your Hand get SIZE -1.
110016.flavor: [Faster and lighter than the wind! I accept our family's speed!]

110015.name: Wind Breaker X
110015.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA -2, then a random enemy Follower gets STA -1.

110014.name: Myo Observer X
110014.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers get ATK +1.
110014.flavor: [There, focus, look more closely at the details. The truth can't be seen with just a glance.]

110019.name: Mirror Cinia
110019.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1.
110019.flavor: [It's just like the reflection off a mirror, but something is different. It speaks in the same voice, but it gives off the ill air of someone mimicking someone else. -Esprit's memo...]

110018.name: Mirror Sita
110018.ability: At the start of the turn, enemy Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 get STA -1.
110018.flavor: [It's just like the reflection off a mirror, but something is different. It speaks in the same voice, but it gives off the ill air of someone mimicking someone else. -Esprit's memo...]

300559.name: Seeker Odien
300559.ability: Before attacking, this first card in the enemy Hand is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If the sent card was a Follower, this card gets ATK +2. If it was a Spell, this card gets STA +3. // Before defending, if the enemy Hand contains 1 or fewer cards, this card gets DEF +2. If this happens, this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300559.flavor: [I don't have time to talk to you here. Get out of my way!]

300558.name: Supplier Knight
300558.ability: Before attacking, if this card's STA is greater than its ATK, this card's ATK and STA values are swapped. This skill is removed.

110127.name: Head Cleaning Maid
110127.ability: At the start of the turn, the first two cards in the enemy Hand are moved to the first empty Slots of your Field or the enemy Field (50% chance).
110127.flavor: [Everyone has those times when you suddenly can't take another step through your everyday life.]

110126.name: Strategist Elly
110126.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
110126.flavor: [When I see the sea, I get a fresh feeling in my heart.]

110125.name: Nytitch.
110125.ability: At the start of the turn, your Character gets LIFE -1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -2.
110125.flavor: [It's the SUN! It's SUMMER! It's the SEA!]

110124.name: Winged Seeker
110124.ability: At the start of the turn, enemy Followers whose Slot number and SIZE are either both odd or both even get ATK -1/STA -1.
110124.flavor: [How dull... Nothing is happening, so this place is boring, too.]

110123.name: World Destroyer DTD
110123.ability: At the start of the turn, all cards in the enemy Hand/Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. A random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of sent cards.
110123.flavor: [This world is melancholic. It would be nice if no harm came to the world's creator, but there's no other way.]

100178.name: Child Linus
100178.ability: At the start of the turn, the following effect is applied to a random Follower in the enemy Deck 3 times: ATK -1 or STA -1 (to a minimum of 1 STA, 50% chance of each effect). The following effect is applied to a random Follower in the enemy Field twice: ATK -1 or STA -1 (50% chance).
100178.flavor: [I feel like something good will happen today.]

110121.name: Aka Flina
110121.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by half the difference between your Character's LIFE and the enemy Character's LIFE (rounding up, by a maximum  of 5).
110121.flavor: [... I don't even know what to say. -DTD]

110120.name: Sigma.
110120.ability: At the start of the turn, the first card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of the Deck. A random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the sent card's SIZE (by a maximum of 5).
110120.flavor: [I was stunned to see existences like these. -DTD]

100175.name: Lunia Scentriver
100175.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Hand has its skills changed to the following skill: "At the start of the turn, this card's original skills are restored." A random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
100175.flavor: [The wind is howling. I wonder if something happened to Layna?]

100174.name: Rising Sun Iri
100174.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -2. If there are fewer allied cards than enemy cards, that Follower gets an additional ATK -1. If there are at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, that Follower gets an additional STA -1.
100174.flavor: [These clothes feel weird... What? It's c, cute?]

100177.name: Child Asmis
100177.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Vita card in your Deck gets SIZE -1. The following effects are applied depending on that card's type. Follower: A random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck, and the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/STA +1. Spell: A random Follower in the enemy Hand gets SIZE +1.
100177.flavor: [Mommy said that I shouldn't go with strangers who offer candy.]

100176.name: Swimwear Anj Inyghem
100176.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1. The following effects are applied if the following digits are present in your Character's LIFE. 3: A random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. 2: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1. 1: Your Character gets LIFE +1.
100176.flavor: [This is good. Swimming in the sea is certainly tasteful. It's too bad there isn't anyone here to enjoy it with.]

100171.name: Rising Sun Sita
100171.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2. If there are fewer allied cards than enemy cards, that Follower gets an additional ATK +1. If your Hand has at least as many cards as the enemy Hand, that Follower gets an additional STA +1.
100171.flavor: [As I thought, dangos are delicious. Right, Vernika?]

100170.name: Dress Linus
100170.ability: At the start of the turn, the first two Followers in the enemy Deck get ATK -1/STA -1. If the first card in the enemy Deck has a SIZE of 2 or less, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -1. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
100170.flavor: [It's nice to go on walks like this every now and then, isn't it?]

100173.name: Rising Sun Luthica
100173.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA -2. If there are fewer allied cards than enemy cards, a random enemy Follower gets STA -2. If there are at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, a random enemy Follower gets STA -2.
100173.flavor: [I'll rest for a bit here. Nice to meet you.]

100172.name: Rising Sun Cinia
100172.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets DEF -1/STA -2. If there are fewer allied cards than enemy cards, the first Follower in the enemy Hand gets DEF -1. If there are at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, that Follower gets STA -2 (to a minimum of 1).
100172.flavor: [Honestly, red suits me best. But these clothes are a little heavy.]

300556.name: Maid Scientist
300556.ability: Before attacking, this card's ATK is increased by the defender's DEF. // Before defending, an allied Follower other than this one gets STA decreased by half the ATK of the attacker (rounding down). If this happens, this card gets STA increased by half the ATK of the attacker (rounding up).
300556.flavor: [The world moves by the power of science. Do the higher ups understand this?]

300241.name: Luna Flina
300241.ability: Before attacking, if your Field contains at least 2 Darklore cards, the defender gets ATK -1/DEF -2/STA -1.
300241.flavor: [What are the elders trying to do? You can't just move however you want. I need to investigate more.]

300240.name: Seeker Lydia
300240.ability: Before defending, this card's DEF is changed to the number of Crux cards on your Field and gets STA increased by the same amount.
300240.flavor: [I'm tired, so I'm going to take a short nap. Anyway... Where are my glasses?]

300243.name: Tennis Ace
300243.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets STA decreased by its DEF.
300243.flavor: [One shot with all my soul. It's my favorite saying. There's no turning back. You have to do it.]

300242.name: Coin Girl
300242.flavor: [Tell me. Heads? Tails? Each side has an equal chance. You wouldn't happen to be one of those foolish people who think that just because it was heads last time, it will be tails next time? I like those kinds of people, hehe.]

300245.name: Cook Club Elsfi
300245.ability: Before defending, if this Follower is still active, it gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300245.flavor: [Her cooking ability is one thing, but her skill with a knife is unmatched in the alliance. She can slice the ingredients faster than the eye can see.]

300244.name: Council Roroa
300244.ability: Before attacking, the defender loses all skills until the start of the next turn, then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300244.flavor: [The event is coming up soon, so I can't slack off. I can't lose to big sister. I have to get everything in order!]

300246.name: Council Coordinator
300246.ability: Before defending, all allied Vita Followers get ATK +2, then this skill is removed.
300246.flavor: [Before preparing for the event, each group should go back over what you'll be doing. Make sure you have the proper materials and that there are no problems with food.]

110307.name: Lady Cox
110307.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the tens digit of the enemy Character's LIFE.
110307.flavor: [Hmm... Is that so? Mother Demon? The data she gave me doesn't match anything around here... Should I find something similar?]

110306.name: Cook Club Jamie
110306.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets its skills removed until the start of the next turn and gets ATK -1/STA-1.
110306.flavor: [Ah... The expenses got too high... The teacher will get mad... I wish you'd stop eating, Sita!]

110305.name: Sergeant Sisela
110305.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -2, DEF -2, or STA -2.
110305.flavor: [Please come with me peacefully. I would like to avoid troubling any visitors.]

110304.name: Lady Cox
110304.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets STA increased by the tens digit of the enemy Character's LIFE.
110304.flavor: [Hm~ over here? Eh? Eisenwane left a new message... It's been a while.]

110303.name: Cook Club Jamie
110303.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets its skills removed until the start of the next turn.
110303.flavor: [Ack, as I thought... Sita's snacks cost more than everything else...]

110302.name: Sergeant Sisela
110302.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1, DEF -1, or STA -1.
110302.flavor: [We're investigating the recent attack on Royle City. Please cooperate with us.]

110301.name: GS 간부 빈츠
110301.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, a card called "GS Fighter" is created at the bottom of your Grave/Hand/Deck. A random Follower in your Hand gets ATK/STA increased by the number of cards in your Field with "GS" in the name (by a maximum of 3).
110301.flavor: [What ominous smoke... It's been a long time since I've seen that flare. We have to stop our operation and prepare to retreat.]

110300.name: 청십자회 플로렌스
110300.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower loses its first skill and gains the following skills: "Before defending, nothing happens." "Before attacking, nothing happens." If this happens, that Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
110300.flavor: [We have to be prepared, too. You can't just control things whenever you want.]

300483.name: Undertaker
300483.ability: Before defending, if the first card in your Grave belongs to Darklore, it is removed from the game. If this happens, the attacker gets ATK decreased by half the removed card's SIZE (rounding up).
300483.flavor: [I feel a familiar energy here. Could that person be coming?]

300482.name: Flag Knight Frett
300482.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets DEF/STA decreased by the number of Followers on your Field with "Knight" in the name. If this Follower is in Slot 3 of your Field, the defender gets an additional STA -2.
300482.flavor: [It's dark, and there are so many books... Somehow, this place doesn't sit well with me. But more importantly, Pintail senpai became a staff sergeant... Maybe I, too, will...?!]

300481.name: Crux Knight Cygnus
300481.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers with "Knight" in the name other than this one get ATK +1/STA +1.
300481.flavor: [What am I thinking about? It hasn't been that long, but it feels like it's been forever since I first came to this place. Have I grown a little?]

300480.name: Blue Cross Member
300480.ability: Before defending your Character gets LIFE +2. This skill is removed.
300480.flavor: [Yes, next patient. Where does it hurt?]

300487.name: L. Esprit
300487.ability: Before attacking, the defender loses all skills. If this happens, this Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2. // Before defending, the attacker loses all skills. If this happens, this Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2.
300487.flavor: [Esprit wasn't very different when she was younger compared to now.] [You have a problem?]

300486.name: White Whale Crevasse
300486.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1, then the following effect is applied 5 times: "A random Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1." // Before defending, this card gets STA +1, then the following effect is applied 5 times: "A random Follower in your Deck gets STA +1."
300486.flavor: [Everyone! Say it with me! If we all sing together, we can achieve quadruple happiness!]

300485.name: GS 5th Star
300485.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1/STA +1. // Before defending, if you have a Darklore Character, the first card in your Grave is removed from the game, then this Follower's ATK/STA is set equal to the number of cards in your Grave. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300485.flavor: [Our leader believes "that" is in this... library?]

300484.name: Ire Flina
300484.ability: Before attacking, a card with the name "Crescent Nyetimber" is created at the top of your Grave. If your Grave contains at least 10 Followers, this Follower gets ATK +1.
300484.flavor: [Can the vampires no longer be found within their own land?]

300489.name: Year 1 Kim Sang Min
300489.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, a card called "Thank You" is created at the top of the enemy Deck.
300489.flavor: [Kim Sang Min is celebrating Sword Girl's 1st anniversary.]

300488.name: Year 1 Gerangeran
300488.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, a card called "Thank You" is created at the top of the enemy Deck.
300488.flavor: [Geran Geran is celebrating Sword Girl's 1st anniversary.]

200394.name: Nevermove
200394.ability: If you have a Crux Character and the Turn Number is even, a random allied Follower gets ATK +5/STA +5. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 3, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -5/STA -5.
200394.flavor: [Birds' talons erupted from the ground to bind everyone's feet. They would be humiliated for doubting the knight captain's power.]

200395.name: Sanctuary Door
200395.ability: If you have a Crux Character, all Followers on the enemy Field get STA -9. All Followers in the enemy Hand get STA -3. All Followers in the enemy Deck get STA -1. This card is removed from the game.
200395.flavor: [I can feel extraordinary energy from beyond this massive door. Have we... finally found it?]

200396.name: Iri and Vernika
200396.ability: All cards in your Hand/Deck with the same name as the first Follower on your Field are sent to the Grave. The first allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of sent cards and gets DEF increased by half (rounding up) the number of sent cards.
200396.flavor: [Vernika...] [Sita...] [The hearts of these two girls, who longed for different people, wavered.]

200397.name: Iri's Enjoyment
200397.ability: Two random allied Darklore Followers get ATK +2/STA +2. Another effect is applied to the enemy in dungeons. (Bonus effect: Two random enemy Followers get ATK -2/STA -2.)
200397.flavor: [This is the story of the G Sisters, the girls who do battle after school!] [This story was more interesting than expected.]

200390.name: Messenger
200390.ability: The first two cards in the enemy Deck are copied to the first two empty Slots in your Hand.
200390.flavor: [What message do you want delivered? I will keep it a secret.]

200391.name: The Maybe Garden
200391.ability: If you have an Academy Character, all Spells in the enemy Grave are removed from the game. All Spells and one random enemy Follower are deactivated. All Spells in the enemy Hand and Deck get SIZE +1. This card is removed from the game.
200391.flavor: [I need a place just for myself. If I don't have one, I'll make one~]

200392.name: Sword of Future Sight
200392.ability: Two random allied Followers get ATK/STA increased by 2 plus the number of enemy Spells.
200392.flavor: [This sword has the power to see the future. By choosing the best future out of all possible futures, Rose was able to infiltrate the knights.]

200393.name: No Gain
200393.ability: Two random allied Crux Followers get ATK +2/STA +2. Another effect is applied to the enemy in dungeons. (Bonus effect: Two random enemy Followers get ATK -2/STA -2.)
200393.flavor: [They didn't get anything. They were in more despair than trying to get the dragon plate to drop.]

200398.name: Water Play
200398.ability: All enemy Followers with at least 2 DEF get DEF decreased by twice their DEF.
200398.flavor: [If we're twins, then why is there such a difference here~] [Hyak! What, what are you doing!!]

200399.name: Shaman's Message
200399.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, all cards in the enemy Grave are sent to your Grave. The first Followers in your Hand and Deck get STA increased by the tens digit of the number of cards in your Grave and get ATK increased by the ones digit of the number of cards in your Grave. This card is removed from the game.
200399.flavor: [The God of Truth will deliver us all!] [The Aletheian believe that their god will bring them to paradise.]

100005.name: Nold
100005.ability: At the start of the turn, a random card in your Hand gets SIZE +1. If this happens, a random allied card with a SIZE of at least 2 gets SIZE -1.
100005.flavor: [Won't it surprise the students if you walk around with that appearance?] [I've chosen this appearance with you students in mind.]

100004.name: Iri Flina
100004.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Field SIZE is greater than the enemy Field SIZE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. Another effect is added in dungeons. (Bonus effect: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1.)
100004.flavor: [It's not okay. Just because the Scardels and Crescents are elders doesn't mean they can order me around as they wish. If they don't like me, they should tell me themselves. Those old cowards...]

100007.name: Curious Vernika
100007.ability: At the start of the turn, the first enemy Follower with the highest DEF gets DEF =0.
100007.flavor: [The Twilight Wolf? Are you going to hunt it, Sita? Take me with you!]

100006.name: Ginger
100006.ability: At the start of the turn, allied Followers with a SIZE equal to or greater than the number of allied cards get ATK +1/STA +2.
100006.flavor: [What? You have a problem? That personality has caused me a lot of hardships. Well whatever, I've already admitted defeat, so do what you want with me.]

100001.name: Sita Vilosa
100001.ability: At the start of the turn, enemy Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 get STA -1. Another effect is added in dungeons. (Bonus effect: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1.)
100001.flavor: [Sorry, but I'm busy right now. If you have something to say, could you tell me later? ... but make sure to tell me if you see me tomorrow, Vernika...]

100003.name: Luthica Preventer
100003.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Crux Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. Another effect is added in dungeons. (Bonus effect: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1.)
100003.flavor: [Because of the kindness that Jaina showed me, I will repay the favor to you knights. I will be the vanguard. Relax and focus on the battle.]

100002.name: Cinia Pacifica
100002.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1. Another effect is added in dungeons. (Bonus effect: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1.)
100002.flavor: [A combination of intelligence and beauty, a mix of the literary and martial arts. It's no exaggeration to use these words to describe Cinia Pacifica. Ho... this is very interesting.]

100009.name: Gart
100009.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower that does not belong to this Character's faction gets ATK -2/STA -2. If this Character and all enemy Followers belong to the same faction, two random enemy Followers get STA -1.
100009.flavor: [I just hate Nold. It's- it's not like I think your uniform is cute or anything, so don't kid yourselves! It's not like I wanted to wear this uniform!]

100008.name: Cannelle
100008.ability: At the start of the turn, cards in your Field with the lowest SIZE get ATK/STA increased by the difference between the lowest SIZE in your Field and the highest SIZE in the enemy Field.
100008.flavor: [You making fun of me? You wanna die?! You were calling me a shorty, weren't you!]

300566.name: 카페의 시타
300566.ability: Before defending, the attacker's first skill is changed to the following skill: "Before defending, this card gets STA -2. If your Field contains any Followers other than this one, this skill is sent to random allied Follower other than this one."
300566.flavor: [This place... is nice...] [Isn't it? The atmosphere is really nice, right?] [No... parfait]

200172.name: Event Preparation
200172.ability: If your Field contains a Follower in the same faction as your Character and a Follower in a different faction, then two random Followers get ATK +3/STA +3.
200172.flavor: [We can expect the event to be very crowded~ Please follow the directions! Will the younger sisters be good?]

200173.name: Victory Proclamation
200173.ability: If you and the enemy both have at least one card in your Hand, then the first card of each of your Hands is swapped.
200173.flavor: [It will be over within the next 7 serves. Long games are bad for stamina.]

200174.name: Topsy Turvy
200174.ability: One random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of factions in your Hand.
200174.flavor: [A competition was held to determine the menu for the Cook Club's festival event. Their techniques would be put to the test, with the winner making the decision.]

200175.name: Inhuman Creature
200175.ability: If you and the enemy both have at least one Follower on the Field, then one random allied Follower and one random enemy Follower are sent to the Grave.

200176.name: Preserver of Rules
200176.ability: A random allied Vita Follower gets ATK increased by 1 plus the number of cards in your Hand and gets STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand minus 1.
200176.flavor: [This inspector loves peace, believes in friendship, and wishes to protect the lives of others, so she stands against rule breakers as an extracurricular activity.]

200177.name: Morals Crackdown
200177.ability: If you have a Follower on the Field, then all allied and enemy Followers get DEF=0. For every Follower, all Followers get STA decreased by that Follower's change in DEF.
200177.flavor: [The lives of people are deeper than the ocean. Their love is higher than the mountains. To those who don't know this, look at tomorrow and see! Emergency! Target point 4 8 5! Geo Scud Launch Go!]

200178.name: Encounter
200178.ability: Two random allied Followers get ATK/STA increased by 2 plus the number of enemy Spells. If you have a Vita Character, all enemy Spells are removed from the game.
200178.flavor: [Vernika. Why do you have that appearance?] [Sita... come closer.] [I'll return you to the way you once were. My eyes, my arms... take everything.]

200179.name: Pursuit of Perfection
200179.ability: Allied Academy Followers that have a SIZE of 2 or less get ATK =1/STA =1. The first Academy Follower in your Hand gets ATK increased by half of the total ATK reduction (rounding up) and STA increased by half of the total STA reduction (rounding up).
200179.flavor: [I won't tolerate a speck of dirt in my house.]

300069.name: Vampire Cultist
300069.flavor: [Vampires, you're so cool. I want to become one... I want to be with you, too!]

200553.name: 차원유폐
200553.ability: If you have an Academy Character, all allied cards are deactivated and all enemy Followers are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If this happens, a number of cards called "Bondage" equal to the number of sent Followers minus 1 are created on the enemy Field, get SIZE=1, and deactivated.
200553.flavor: [Cinia, that power is...] [Cinia used her newly awakened powers to open a link to another dimension.]

200550.name: 심야의 습격
200550.ability: If you have a Vita Character, all enemy Followers are moved to random Slots on the enemy Field, then all enemy Followers get ATK/STA decreased by twice their own Slot numbers.
200550.flavor: [Huh? Who are you?] [Hand it over peacefully.]

200551.name: 아이리의 행방
200551.ability: All Spells in the enemy Hand get SIZE +1.
200551.flavor: [Linia... Where is Iri?] [Oh my, why are you asking me about the girl who went with the GS?]

200556.name: 진실의 개방
200556.ability: All Crux Followers get their ATK/DEF/STA changed to their original values plus 1. All non-Crux Followers get their ATK/DEF/STA changed to their original values minus 2.
200556.flavor: [In an instant, her false appearance changed. Wings appeared from her back, and both of her legs were unscathed. The current knight captain is an agent of the Empire. -Luthica's notebook]

200557.name: 습격모의
200557.ability: A random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by the difference between 10 and your Field SIZE (by a maximum of 5).
200557.flavor: [Right. We have to be the first to get our hands on the altar. This is why we are sending you to Vita Public School.]

200554.name: 사무실 습격
200554.ability: The allied Follower with the lowest STA gets ATK +2 and is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field
200554.flavor: [Knock knock!] [Eek! We're not doing anything bad! We just want to learn about the world's secrets in peace!]

200555.name: 부탁
200555.ability: All Followers in the enemy Hand get STA -3 (to a minimum of 1).
200555.flavor: [Miss Rose, please protect Soma. She's the only key that can turn the current situation around.]

300061.name: Crescent Kris Flina
300061.flavor: [Conundrum, when will you stop talking to yourself? You should try going to the quiz game with everyone. How about it?]

300060.name: Moondancer Kata Flina
300060.ability: At the start of the turn, two random enemy Followers get ATK -1/STA -1.
300060.flavor: [To the audience, with your eyes sparkling in the moonlight, how is it? Won't you do it as well? You will be wonderful props on this stage, your blood... hehe.]

300063.name: Scardel Merlot
300063.flavor: [Tell me anything. I will listen to your worries, too. Of course, I can't always guarantee a solution. Hehehe.]

200559.name: 협박
200559.ability: The following effects are applied depending on the enemy Character's LIFE. 15 or more: A random enemy Spell is sent to the Grave and you get Shuffles +1. 6 or more: All enemy cards get SIZE +1 and the enemy gets Shuffles -1. 5 or less: The enemy Character gets LIFE=1.
200559.flavor: [Miss Iri, we would ne~ver think of hurting your friends. That is, if you cooperate with us.]

300065.name: Scardel Shiraz
300065.ability: At the start of the turn, if you have at least 2 allied Darklore Followers, a random enemy Follower gets STA -2.
300065.flavor: [What? Is it hard? If it's hard, don't be reserved and just say so. We're family, aren't we?]

300064.name: Scardel Carmenere
300064.flavor: [It's not good to keep worries to yourself. Have you tried talking to Merlot?]

300067.name: Master Luna Flina
300067.ability: Before defending, this card's DEF is changed to the number of Darklore cards on your Field and gets STA increased by the same amount.
300067.flavor: [Is it time to deal with Iri Flina? It isn't. I'll protect her a little longer by holding off on a judgment. The elders decide things on their own, so I will handle it myself.]

300066.name: Crescent Woodbridge
300066.flavor: [Ugh... what should I do? Should I ask another vampire... I won't get an answer staying here alone.]

300115.name: Occult Lady Aimi
300115.flavor: [Did she really spark your interest? I want to meet someone like that. Iris, introduce me to her.]

300114.name: Occult Club Iris Juvia
300114.flavor: [I found an interesting friend. Her name is Elfin.] [Who's that?] [She makes dolls with all her soul.]

300117.name: Agent Maid
300117.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's DEF is at least 1, the defender gets DEF=0 and this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300117.flavor: [Just as planned. The preparations are complete. The game will start.]

300116.name: Occult Club Rebecca
300116.flavor: [Has the topic of discussion for this month still not ended? How about waiting a bit more patiently for each topic?]

300111.name: Sita's Friend Rosie
300111.ability: Before defending, this card gets STA +2.
300111.flavor: [Hi Asmis, what's up? Sita? She had some business over at Crux, didn't she? Hm? Kana's descendant? Chosen one? What are you talking about? Ehehe~ is this some joke?]

300110.name: Lib. Manager Lotte
300110.ability: Before attacking, the defender's skills are all removed. If this happens, this skill is removed.
300110.flavor: [Serie. These nonmainstream book requests weren't made by Lindt, so I'm guessing you were the one who made them. I'm rejecting them, okay? From the beginning, this "Glass Library" publisher was suspicious. I'm going to reject all of these cobalt books. Come on, you're the assistant librarian!]

300113.name: Lib. Ace
300113.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Vita Followers get ATK/STA increased by this card's SIZE.
300113.flavor: [A book about the land of Kana? There's no book I can't find. I have the pride of being the campus ace at searching for books. Leave it to me. Asmis senpai.]

300112.name: Cook Club Ace
300112.ability: Before attacking, this card gets DEF=0. This card gets ATK/STA increased by the difference between this card's DEF and the defender's DEF (by a maximum of 9).
300112.flavor: [In the past. My mother, who was once called the fiery head chef, said this. If you eliminate all thoughts, even the fire will feel cool. Focus on cooking. Focus on the sound and smell of the ingredients.]

300119.name: 2S Agent Nine
300119.ability: Before defending, this card gets STA +2.
300119.flavor: [It's my job to perfectly handle any client's request. If anything is troubling you, leave a message at the agency.]

300118.name: Cultist Maid
300118.ability: Before attacking, the defender's skills are all removed. If this happens, this skill is removed.
300118.flavor: [At this rate, it won't be long before everyone in this house obeys me.]

200606.name: Flowers of Doubt
200606.ability: All Followers in your Deck with "Lady" in the name get SIZE +2/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
200606.flavor: [These flowers... are beautiful. Would master Rose... like them?]

200607.name: Discovery
200607.ability: A random allied Follower gets its ATK halved (rounding down). If this happens, that card's DEF/STA are set equal to the highest DEF/STA values on both Fields.
200607.flavor: [Master, I can smell flowers from the red-haired woman!] [Since when were you a dog...]

200604.name: Victims
200604.ability: All allied Followers with "before defending" skills get STA -3. All enemy Followers with skills ATK -2/STA -2.
200604.flavor: [Kyaa! Our room! Our luggage! Our clothes!]

200605.name: Secret Art: Nameless Flash
200605.ability: The allied Follower with the lowest total DEF+STA is destroyed. If this happens, a random Follower in the enemy Field and a random Follower in the enemy Deck are removed from the game.
200605.flavor: [The moment Sita drew her sword, 7 beams of light flew towards the trespasser.] [Wh.. What is this, Sita?] [It's just 7 slashes...]

200602.name: 산책
200602.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, a random enemy card is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. This card gets SIZE=2 and remains on the Field deactivated. If this card's SIZE is 2 or less, two random enemy cards are sent to the top of the enemy Deck, then this card is removed from the game.
200602.flavor: [I must see with my own eyes and feel with my own body how disrupted this world is.]

200603.name: Zero Serve
200603.ability: The first two Followers in your Deck with "Cook Club" in the name get ATK/DEF/STA changed to equal the ATK/DEF/STA of the second allied Follower.
200603.flavor: [Senpais, my serve doesn't spin. You'll see the ball, but you won't be able to hit it.]

200600.name: 불청객
200600.ability: A random allied Follower gets ATK=0. A random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by the ATK change.
200600.flavor: [Grandma always said, if you want to catch two rabbits, then catch them completely... Who should I make happy today?]

200601.name: 해방된 신성
200601.ability: One enemy Follower whose combined ATK/DEF/STA is greater than the enemy Character's LIFE gets deactivated. That Follower gets ATK/DEF/STA changed to half your Character's LIFE (rounding down).
200601.flavor: [We need two keys to create the world that you wish for. Your hard work will surely be rewarded.]

200608.name: Homing Instinct
200608.ability: Two random allied Followers get ATK/DEF/STA increased by the amount that each stat exceeds its original value.
200608.flavor: [Cannelle, I haven't seen you for a long time since you left the mansion, and now you're in my bamboo forest... What are you doing?] [Peni! The bamboo here is delicious!] [Aren't you a rabbit...?]

200609.name: Duty Assignment
200609.ability: All cards with an odd SIZE get SIZE +1. All cards with an even SIZE get SIZE -1.
200609.flavor: [Dispose of this after you read it.] [We'll burn it of course] [No let's bury it] [Don't do something weird with it]

300333.name: Cinia's New Maid
300333.ability: Before attacking, a random allied Academy Follower other than this one gets ATK/STA increased by the number of Followers in your Hand/Field (by a maximum of 5). If this happens, your Character gets LIFE -1. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300333.flavor: [New maid. She has the nickname "The Last Accident". It feels wrong to say that all of her accidents are simply by chance.]

300807.name: HH Asmis
300807.ability: At the start of the turn, this card gets ATK +1/STA +1. // Before this card is attacked, if its STA is less than its original value, it gets STA +1. If its STA is greater than its original value, this card gets reactivated.
300807.flavor: [These accessories are really amazing. I feel like I can fly anywhere!]

300809.name: RH Asmis
300809.ability: At the start of the turn, this card gets ATK +4/STA +4. // Before this card is attacked, if its STA is less than its original value, it gets STA +3. If its STA is greater than its original value, this card gets ATK +2 and is reactivated.
300809.flavor: [Tada! What do you think? I tried to look like a valley squirrel. I don't have any acorns to nibble on, but don't I look cute? I like how fluffy this tail feels, too.]

300808.name: MH Asmis
300808.ability: At the start of the turn, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2. // Before this card is attacked, if its STA is less than its original value, it gets STA +2. If its STA is greater than its original value, this card gets ATK +1 and is reactivated.
300808.flavor: [Mm... where am I? My head feels a little fuzzy, so it feels like I'm still dreaming.]

200239.name: Sita's Suit
200239.ability: Two random allied Vita Followers get ATK +2/STA +2. Two random allied Followers with "Sita" in the name get ATK +1/STA +1.
200239.flavor: [The sought after suit that brings out Sita's smarty look! The road to fashion king is not far!] [Vernika, I'm hungry...] [Just endure it a little longer, you have to become a boy... I mean a girl who can endure a little hunger for the sake of style.]

200238.name: Red and White
200238.ability: A random allied Follower gets the following effects depending on the factions present in your Hand. Vita: ATK +2. Academy: STA +2. Crux: ATK +1/STA +1. Darklore: SIZE -1. Neutral: ATK +2/STA +2.
200238.flavor: [I want you.] [What...?] [I want you to only look at me, I want you to only scold me, I want you to only love me. Your anger, your love, I want it all.]

300700.name: 기도의 헬레나
300700.ability: Before attacking, a random allied Follower other than this one gets ATK +2/STA +2 and is sent to the top of your Deck. This card gets ATK/STA increased by half the SIZE of the sent card (rounding down). // Before defending, the first Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets ATK -1/STA -1.
