300700.flavor: [In my foolishness, I've called forth a false being. Please let my prayer reach everyone...]

300701.name: 추석의 아스미스
300701.ability: Before attacking, this card gets SIZE -1. The defender gets DEF decreased  by the difference between this card's current SIZE and original SIZE. // Before defending, this card's SIZE gets changed to its original value. This card gets ATK/STA increased by the change in SIZE.
300701.flavor: [How is it, how is it? Pretty? Cute? Thank you very much! There's no clothes that don't look good on me!]

300702.name: 추석의 리누스
300702.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK increased by the difference between the defender's current ATK and original ATK (by a maximum of 5). // Before defending, this card's ATK gets changed to its original value. This card gets STA increased by the change in ATK.
300702.flavor: [This is a hanbok? It's a bit uncomfortable to move around in, but I like it.]

300703.name: 추석의 로제
300703.ability: Before attacking, this card's DEF gets changed to its original value. This card gets ATK/STA increased by the change in DEF. // Before defending, the attacker gets ATK decreased by the difference between this card's current DEF and original DEF. This card gets DEF +1.
300703.flavor: [Sister, do you like those clothes?] [Yes, they're beautiful. Thank you, Cinia. Give Ophelia my thanks.]

300704.name: 추석의 헬레나
300704.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets DEF -1. This card gets ATK increased by the difference between the defender's current DEF and original DEF. // Before defending, this card gets STA increased by the difference between the attacker's current ATK and original ATK.
300704.flavor: [This is a gift from the believers...? They're very nice clothes... Thank you. But doesn't this headband seem to be unrelated to the clothes?]

300705.name: 제2 황녀 하노벨
300705.ability: Before attacking, the following effect is applied a number of times equal to this card's Upgrade Level: "A random allied or enemy Follower gets STA -1." // Before defending, this card gets ATK/STA increased by its Upgrade Level. This skill is removed.
300705.flavor: [I am the second princess of Lazion, Hanobelle. Welcome to the Empire. Are you from the Alliance?]

300706.name: 도서관의 문지기
300706.ability: Before attacking, all cards on your Field get their SIZE set equal to the number of Spells in the bottom 6 cards of your Deck (to a minimum of 1). This skill is removed. // Before defending, this card gets STA +1.
300706.flavor: [My duty is to guard the front door of the library. However, it looks like you used the back door. That's not my duty, so I have no interest in you.]

300668.name: 폭풍전야의 셀린과 나나이
300668.ability: Before attacking, if the enemy is an NPC, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2. If the enemy is a player, your Character gets LIFE +1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. This skill is removed.
300668.flavor: [How peaceful. I wonder how long these quiet days will continue?] [But hardships usually follow peace. Wouldn't it be interesting? Hehe, I'm kidding, Celine senpai.]

300667.name: 마더데몬
300667.ability: Before attacking, this card gets SIZE +1/ATK +1/STA +1. // Before defending, this card gets SIZE=1. The attacker gets ATK/DEF/STA decreased by half the change in SIZE (rounding up). // At the start of the turn, if you have a Darklore Character, this card's SIZE gets changed to its original value. Otherwise, this Follower loses all skills.
300667.flavor: [It's no longer required of me to remain locked away... I have to cleanse the taint.]

300666.name: 천리교도 전도사 비나
300666.ability: Before defending, the attacker gets STA -1 and this card gets ATK +1.
300666.flavor: [Everyone, I am an Aletheian believer, B-NA. I've come here to tell you all about the truth from the God of Truth.]

300665.name: 스카델 키리에
300665.ability: Before defending, if you have a Darklore Character, you get Shuffles +1. This skill is removed.
300665.flavor: [Summer is ending, but somehow I never got a chance to go to the beach!]

300664.name: 왕의 귀환 제이나
300664.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK/STA increased by the number of allied Crux Followers. // Before defending, the first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, this card and the defender get STA decreased by half the sent card's SIZE (rounding down).
300664.flavor: [Luthica, thank you for trusting and following me all this time.] [Welcome back, Jaina!]

300663.name: 크룩스 기사단 스이미
300663.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this card's ATK, all allied Followers get DEF +1. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300663.flavor: [I, I'm flying!] [Swimie still has a long way to go as a corporal.]

300662.name: 신성연구회 라우라
300662.flavor: [The world is in chaos. The more things become like this, the more we have to stand firmly by our faith.]

300661.name: 진홍의 마녀 시니아
300661.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK/STA increased by the number of skills the defender has. If this happens, the defender gets its skills removed until the start of the next turn. If you do not have an Academy Character, this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300661.flavor: [I can't forgive you, Linia. What the hell were you hoping to get by using me?]

300660.name: 메이드 코넌드럼
300660.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's SIZE is less than this Follower's SIZE, this Follower gets ATK +1/DEF +1.
300660.flavor: [These clothes fit me perfectly, Kris! Where did you get them?] [Huhu, you're so cute Conundrum.]

300708.name: 청십자회 플로리아
300708.ability: Before attacking, if you have 1 or less Shuffles, this card gets ATK -2. This skill is removed. // Before defending, if you have 1 or less Shuffles, this card gets STA -2. This skill is removed.
300708.flavor: [My sister Florence is amazing. With just this glove and my sister, it seems like anything is possible.]

200235.name: Master of the Night
200235.ability: All Darklore Followers in your Grave are removed from the game. A random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by the number of removed cards.
200235.flavor: [The absolute ruler of the night, unapproachable by anyone. The glass of Vernika's insatiable desires was quickly emptying.]

300709.name: GS연구소장 나이트로
300709.ability: Before attacking, all cards in your Hand with "GS" in the name are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, this Follower gets ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of sent cards. // Before defending, the last Follower in your Deck with "GS" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
300709.flavor: [If we had enough time and money, then we wouldn't be in this disgraceful situation! Just wait and see next time!]

200234.name: Sisters
200234.ability: Up to 3 cards in your Grave are removed from the game, starting from the first. Two random allied Followers get ATK/STA increased by the number of removed Darklore Followers.
200234.flavor: [It was something Irin knew, but Iri did not. The two sisters' destined encounter felt distant.]

200413.name: Eternal Witness
200413.ability: All allied Followers get ATK/STA increased by 1 plus your Shuffles. You get Shuffles +2. If this card's SIZE is 3 or more, it is removed from the game. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE +1 and is sent to the second Slot in your Deck.
200413.flavor: [Is the police displeased about something, coming to this world? ... Crevasse is still here. It's a bit difficult right now. Please wait for a bit.]

200412.name: Butterfly Brand
200412.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, all enemy Followers have their "before attacking" and "beginning of turn" skills changed to the following skill: "Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK -1." All Followers in your Hand/Field gain the following skill: "Before attacking, this Follower gains ATK +1."
200412.flavor: [This is a trance. This is how you can communicate with your God of Truth.] [Butterfly-shaped tattoos appeared on Helena's body.]

200147.name: Home Study
200147.ability: All Followers in your Hand get ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of cards in your Hand and Grave with the same name as this Spell.
200147.flavor: [Cinia, it's important to think about others' positions. How would you feel if you were in your employees' shoes?]

200146.name: Secret Art: Gale Flash
200146.ability: If your Character has "Sita" in the name, all enemy cards are deactivated and all enemy Followers get DEF decreased by the number of enemy cards. If your Character does not have "Sita" in the name, two random enemy cards are deactivated and all enemy Followers get STA decreased by the number of deactivated cards.
200146.flavor: [Step aside. I don't have time, I have to get to Vernika... to make it in time, I'll have to cut you down, first... instant... slash!!!]

200417.name: Library Elusion
200417.ability: The second enemy Follower has its STA set equal to the Slot number of the last enemy card and gets ATK increased by half (rounding down) the amount of reduced STA.
200417.flavor: [Why are we avoiding those weaklings? Shall I dispose of them for you?] [Now is a difficult time. Just wait a little longer.]

200416.name: Finding the Library
200416.ability: All Followers in your Hand/Field with "Library" in the name are sent to the bottom of your Deck. A number of cards with "Library" in the name equal to 1 plus half the number of sent cards (rounding down) are sent from the top of your Deck to the first empty Slots of your Field. Those Followers get ATK/STA increased by half the number of cards (rounding down) that were sent to the bottom of your Deck. (Note: This card isn't considered to have "Library" in the name for the purposes of other cards' abilities because it uses a different word in Korean.)
200416.flavor: [I'm looking for a book about this library's history. To find that is to find the library itself.]

200415.name: Disappearance
200415.ability: Two random allied Followers get ATK +3/STA +3. Two random enemy Followers get ATK -1/STA -1.
200415.flavor: [A large ventilation fan. She remembered that something used to be here. She couldn't remember what it was exactly, but she was certain that something was missing.]

200414.name: Welcome!
200414.flavor: [Pleased to meet you! Okay? Sita, say something, too.] [... Hi.]

110152.name: GS 1st Star
110152.ability: At the start of the turn, all enemy Followers get STA -1. All enemy Followers with skills lose all skills and gain the following skill: "Before attacking, this Follower gets STA=1." The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: The second time will definitely be the killing blow.)
110152.flavor: [This place is unsuitable for our goals. There's no place without people.] [Location: Muspelheim 14F]

110153.name: Kana.DTD
110153.ability: At the start of the turn, your Character gets LIFE +4. All cards in your Hand and Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: She's powerful!)
110153.flavor: [This place, ruled by Ereshkigal, has a lot of complaints to the top. You need to take care of yourself.] [Location: Muspelheim 15F]

110150.name: Gart.
110150.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 14, you win the game. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.  (HINT: The game starts now. Let's count to 14.)
110150.flavor: [Ack! Stop that! It'll spill! These stupid pigeons!] [Location: Muspelheim 12F]

110151.name: Messenger Knight
110151.ability: At the start of the turn, all cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: Cheap tricks won't work this time.)
110151.flavor: [Just say the word, and I'll deliver your message anywhere you want! But this place has phones everywhere.] [Location: Muspelheim 13F]

110156.name: Vanguard Knight
110156.ability: At the beginning of all turns except turn 1, the enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by three times the number of empty Slots in the enemy Hand. (HINT: You will be defeated through the gap.)
110156.flavor: [Always move forward. Hesitation dulls the blade.] [Location: Muspelheim 18F]

110157.name: Serie.
110157.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower is deactivated. All allied Followers get ATK/DEF/STA increased by twice the absolute value of their own Def. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: The rich get richer, the poor get poorer.)
110157.flavor: [New material, new perspective, new sentences. I can't miss a single thing. I don't understand the details, but I'm getting immersed in everything.] [Location: Muspelheim 19F]

110154.name: Lotte.
110154.ability: At the beginning of all turns except turn 1, if your Field contains no cards, the enemy Character gets LIFE -10. (HINT: The have-nots are sad.)
110154.flavor: [This place has a lot of new books waiting for me. It's amazing!] [Location: Muspelheim 16F]

110155.name: Conundrum.
110155.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Character has 7 or less LIFE, the enemy Character gets LIFE=0. (HINT: Final desperation.)
110155.flavor: [Life is a series of questions. It's like a quiz bowl. Isn't it exciting?] [Location: Muspelheim 17F]

100140.name: Sita Vilosa
100140.ability: At the start of the turn, enemy Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 get STA -1.
100140.flavor: [I am looking for master's object... have you seen it? A test? I have no interest in that sort of thing...]

100141.name: Cinia Pacifica
100141.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1.
100141.flavor: [Hu hu hu. Is there anyone who can keep up with the beautiful and smart me?]

100142.name: Luthica Preventer
100142.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Crux Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
100142.flavor: [I fight for the pride of the Crux knights. Prepare yourself.]

100143.name: Iri Flina
100143.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Field SIZE is greater than the enemy Field SIZE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
100143.flavor: [Why should I be cast out just because I'm different?]

100144.name: Henlifei
100144.ability: At the start of your turn, if there are any allied Followers, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2. Otherwise, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -2.
100144.flavor: [I and those before me are the pride passed down through the generations.] [This is the appearance of Henlifei wielding the powers that have earned her the title of Lightning Wolf. -Rio's memo]

100145.name: Chairman Linia
100145.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Followers's DEF/STA get changed to their original values if they are lower than their original values.
100145.flavor: [I just can't let these kids go. I want to protect them. I want them at my side.]

100146.name: Swimwear Rose
100146.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +0~4/STA +0~4. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
100146.flavor: [I hear the wind. It's not very pleasant... Where is Veltier?]

100147.name: Morning Sita
100147.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. Another power is added in dungeons. (Bonus effect: The same Follower gets an additional ATK +0~2/STA +0~2)
100147.flavor: [I wake up to the brilliant sun. Everything is still blurry. Is it because of the sunlight? I faintly sense someone tossing around.] [Did you sleep well?] [I hear a familiar voice, but there's nobody in front of me. I must be hearing things.]

300278.name: Tennis Guide
300278.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1.
300278.flavor: [Our Tennis Club event is going on right now~ Please come visit us~]

300279.name: Lib. Advisor
300279.ability: Before attacking, all cards in your Deck with the same name as this one are removed from the game. This card gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +2 for each card removed.
300279.flavor: [I don't believe in completely rejecting student requests, but you need to rethink this list of requested books, Serie.]

300274.name: GS 1st Star
300274.ability: Before defending, if this Follower and the attacker belong to different factions, the attacker gets ATK -1/STA -1 and this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300274.flavor: [In the GS, there are 9 Stars in all. I am the first of them. If we are successful in rooting ourselves within Crux, the 2nd Star will come looking for us.]

300275.name: 2nd Witness Kana.DND
300275.ability: At the start of the turn, a random card in the enemy Field, a random card in the enemy Hand, and a random card in the enemy Grave are removed from the game. This Follower's stats are changed to their original values if they are lower than their original values.
300275.flavor: [The fate of those who pass the door will be changed. It is my role to eliminate those fates. Do not interfere, DKD.]

300276.name: Coin Lady
300276.ability: Before attacking, this card gets DEF=0. This card gets ATK/STA increased by the difference between this card's DEF and the defender's DEF (by a maximum of 9). // Before defending, the attacker loses all skills. If this happens, this card gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
300276.flavor: [The origin of this coin with mysterious power is desire. All things begin with desire. Happy birthday! It begins now.]

300277.name: Council Event Inspector
300277.ability: Before defending, this card gets STA +1.
300277.flavor: [No exceptions. Please look over the budget information for the fireworks and resubmit it.]

300270.name: GS Assault Soldier
300270.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers with "GS" in the name get ATK +1/STA +2 and all allied Followers without "GS" in the name get ATK -1/STA -2.
300270.flavor: [This is my 2nd year with the GS. I will destroy everything before me.]

300271.name: Lightning Witch
300271.ability: At the start of the turn, this Follower either gets SIZE -2 or SIZE +1 (50% chance).
300271.flavor: [I respect your goal and will. However, I prefer my own freedom. Sorry, but I'll have to reject your offer, witch queen.]

300272.name: Business Witch
300272.flavor: [This is a very special opportunity for you. Please look at this proposal and think of a suitable decision.]

300273.name: Creepy Witch
300273.ability: Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK/STA increased by its DEF, then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn. // At the start of the turn, this Follower gets DEF -1 (to a minimum of 0).
300273.flavor: [You want to become the center of the alliance? What a big dream. Of course, I like your plan very much. Please bring me some slightly better conditions. I will think about it then.]

300478.name: Lonely Maid
300478.ability: Before defending, if there are no Academy cards on your Field other than this one, this Follower gets STA +3.
300478.flavor: [It's boring when master Cinia isn't here to bully me... Am I an M?]

300479.name: Madness Maid
300479.ability: Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK increased by the number of cards in your Hand with "Maid" in the name. // Before defending, if the attacker's ATK is greater than or equal to this card's total DEF+STA, the first Follower in your Hand with "Maid" in the name is sent to the Grave, then this Follower gets STA increased by the STA of the sent Follower.
300479.flavor: [Master Rose isn't coming back. I have to have someone to work for.]

300476.name: Nanai Highcastle
300476.ability: Before defending, the attacker gets STA decreased by 1 plus the number of different SIZES in your Grave. If the attacker is reduced to 0 or less STA, this card is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field and reactivated. Otherwise, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game.
300476.flavor: [Display code 63i.7.F215f... the i doesn't refer to the alphabet. Could the rumored imaginary sector be in this underground library?]

300477.name: Jackpot Maid
300477.ability: Before attacking, this Follower gains gets ATK +2/STA +2 (30% chance). // Before defending, this Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2 (30% chance).
300477.flavor: [I did it! I did it! I won the lottery! Jack! Pot! Now I can join the world of the ladies!]

300474.name: Council Clerk Fran
300474.ability: Before attacking, if this card's SIZE is at least 4, this skill is removed. This Follower gets ATK/STA increased by its own SIZE, then gets SIZE +1.
300474.flavor: [I'm the secretary, but... Susie has been writing more than me... Didn't I become secretary to write things down?]

300475.name: Lib. Bernoulli
300475.ability: Before defending, this Follower gets STA decreased by the number of Spells in the bottom 4 cards of your Deck.
300475.flavor: [The air here feels strange... This place ignores the laws of fluids. Perhaps magic resides in the air as well?]

300472.name: Red Moon Aka Flina
300472.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets STA decreased by 1 plus the number of cards in your Grave with the same name as this card.
300472.flavor: [Did someone get here before us? Then we will have to clear a path before entering.]

300473.name: Blue Moon Becky Flina
300473.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets STA decreased by the difference between its SIZE and DEF. This card gets ATK/STA increased by half the STA decrease (rounding up). This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300473.flavor: [I have to agree with Red Moon this time. Our safety is our number one priority.]

300470.name: Blue Cross Leader
300470.ability: Before defending, a random allied Follower other than this one gets its skills removed. If this happens, that Follower and this Follower get ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of removed skills. // At the start of the turn, a a random allied Follower other than this one gains the following skill: "Before defending, this card gets STA +1."
300470.flavor: [That's right. I am the leader of the Blue Cross.]

300471.name: Crescent Kris Flina
300471.ability: Before defending, the first card in your Deck with the same name as this card is sent to the Grave. If this happens, this Follower gets STA increased by 3 plus the number of cards in your Grave with the same name as this card.
300471.flavor: [... My memory is fuzzy. This place seems familiar.]

300557.name: Youngest Knight Rotori
300557.ability: Before defending, if this card's ATK is greater than its STA, this card's ATK gets halved (rounding up), then this card gets STA increased by twice the ATK reduction. If this happens, this skill is removed.
300557.flavor: [I have to become stronger! I will grow like Cygnus senpai did!]

200383.name: 아스미스의 통찰
200383.ability: The enemy gets Shuffles -1 and LIFE -1. A random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1. If your Grave contains at least 5 cards, a random card is sent from your Grave to the bottom of your Deck.
200383.flavor: [It's cold. It's as if a dagger struck my mind. But don't worry. My mind is faster than light. Treanna's words. Four's actions. A fragment of my memory. Now, I will put these chaotic pieces back together.]

200382.name: 퇴화의저주
200382.ability: All Spells in the enemy Hand/Field are changed to the following cards depending on their factions and get SIZE=2. Vita: "New Student Orientation", Academy: "New Maid Training", Crux: "Close Encounter", Darklore: "Blood Reversal", Neutral: "Blissful Moment".
200382.flavor: [Time stopped for her. It was an unintentional result of the experiment to turn girls into witches. A spell that froze your memories...]

200381.name: 트위스티드 메모리
200381.ability: The first Follower in the enemy Hand gets its skills removed, then that Follower and a random Follower on the enemy Field swap skills.
200381.flavor: [Is it hard to remember? Does it feel like yesterday's events were a dream after waking up in the morning?]

200380.name: 행복한 순간
200380.ability: Two random allied Followers get ATK +2/STA +2.
200380.flavor: [Clarice, come here. I'll tie your hair for you.]

200387.name: Secret Room
200387.ability: If you have a Vita Character, all Followers in the enemy Hand, Field, and Deck get ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1. A random enemy Follower is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. This card is removed from the game.
200387.flavor: ["A clue to finding Kana... Could it be in the underground library?"]

200386.name: Chance Meeting
200386.ability: Two random allied Followers gain the following skill: "Before attacking, if this card's ATK or DEF are lower than their original values, they are changed to their original values.
200386.flavor: ["Could... you possibly be?" Iri was startled at suddenly running into Sita, but it seemed like Sita didn't recognize her.]

200385.name: Personal Relationship
200385.ability: Two random allied Vita Followers get ATK +2/STA +2. Another effect is applied to the enemy in dungeons. (Bonus effect: Two random enemy Followers get ATK -2/STA -2.)
200385.flavor: [The Library Club advisor is especially popular with the Library Club members. She doesn't seem to mind it, either.]

200384.name: Messy Business
200384.ability: A random allied Follower is moved to this card's Slot and gets ATK/STA increased by its new Slot number.
200384.flavor: [Milka senpai... This is my limit... I can't endure it any longer... Can't you stop your investigation?]

200389.name: Myo Clan's Aid
200389.ability: Two random allied Academy Followers get ATK +2/STA +2. Another effect is applied to the enemy in dungeons. (Bonus effect: Two random enemy Followers get ATK -2/STA -2.)
200389.flavor: [Shh! Don't say anything. I know what you need~]

200388.name: Linus's Wrath
200388.ability: A random enemy card is deactivated. If you have an Academy Character, a random enemy card is deactivated.
200388.flavor: [I swear by my grandfather's honor that I, Linus Falco, will catch the underwear thief!]

110206.name: 츄파츄파족 보이잉
110206.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. A random enemy Follower with a SIZE of at least 4 gets ATK -1/STA -1.
110206.flavor: [Ahhh~ Line 1's base is overflowing-chu! It's an emergency-chu!]

110207.name: Quickitty.
110207.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +2/STA +2. (As soon as you meet this cat, you sense that something is different about it.)
110207.flavor: [Meow~] [The animals called cats seem to have some kind of power that stirs the instincts of girls. Particularly their paws... It's like a powerful spell.]

110204.name: 츄파츄파족 아이잉
110204.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, two random allied Followers get ATK +1/STA +1.

110205.name: 츄파츄파족 파이잉
110205.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is even, two random enemy Followers get ATK -1/STA -1.

110202.name: 빨간머리 츄파츄파족
110202.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is even, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1.
110202.flavor: [Accident-free for 365 days! Just one day left-chu! Wooooow~]

110203.name: 하얀머리 츄파츄파족
110203.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets STA +1. A random enemy Follower with a SIZE of at least 4 gets STA -1.
110203.flavor: [Got it-chu! The dark product line will change to white-chu!]

110200.name: Henlifei.
110200.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1, and a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1.
110200.flavor: [I will be your opponent. Be honored. I am the Lightning Wolf Henlifei.]

110201.name: 갈색머리 츄파츄파족
110201.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
110201.flavor: [The best things are made from the best ingredients-chu!]

110208.name: Council Rumi
110208.ability: At the start of the turn, any enemy Followers with at least 23 STA are moved to your Field.
110208.flavor: [Please participate in the Student Council activities. It is mandatory.]

110209.name: Council Press
110209.ability: At the start of the turn, any enemy Followers with at least 18 Sta are moved to your Field.

100030.name: Thorn Witch Rose
100030.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by half of the difference between its SIZE and DEF (rounding up).
100030.flavor: [Don't wait for me, I'm not the sister that you remember... I miss you... Cinia.]

100031.name: Rose Pacifica
100031.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Darklore card in your Hand is sent to the Grave. A random enemy Follower's ATK/STA are decreased by half of the sent card's SIZE (rounding up).
100031.flavor: [Yes? This book? No, it just seemed interesting, so I took a look at it. There's no way I'd have an interest in the origin of witches, right?]

100032.name: Blood Witch Rose
100032.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is even, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is removed from the game. If the Turn Number is odd, the first Spell in the enemy Grave is removed from the game.
100032.flavor: [Feel the pain in my blood. Just because I had eyes that could see hazy glimpses of the future, Crux stigmatized me. This is the fury of the witches who have been stained with contempt and suppression!]

100033.name: Outcast Rose
100033.ability: At the start of the turn, if there are at least two allied Followers, your Character gets LIFE -1, and then a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/DEF +1/STA +2.
100033.flavor: [... don't leave me. I'm still your sister, right? Don't throw me out so easily. At least don't look at me like that!]

100034.name: Picnic Rose
100034.ability: At the start of the turn, two random allied Followers get STA increased by their difference in SIZE.
100034.flavor: [Sometimes I just want to breathe the outside air. How is it, Cinia? Doesn't the wind feel good?]

100035.name: Wedding Dress Rose
100035.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by half of the difference between its SIZE and DEF (rounding up).
100035.flavor: [Sister, I'll only show this look to you. I don't want to show this look to Cinia...]

100036.name: Wedding Dress Sita
100036.ability: At the start of the turn, enemy Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 get STA -1. If the enemy is an NPC, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If the enemy is a player and you have 0 Shuffles, you get Shuffles=1.
100036.flavor: [I just have to stay still while wearing this? I'm hungry, Vernika.]

100037.name: Wedding Dress Cinia
100037.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1. If the enemy is an NPC, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If the enemy is a player and you have 0 Shuffles, you get Shuffles=1.
100037.flavor: [I don't really like white, but this dress isn't too ba... no! It's good, sister, this was a good idea!]

100038.name: Wedding Dress Luthica
100038.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Crux Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the enemy is an NPC, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If the enemy is a player and you have 0 Shuffles, you get Shuffles=1.
100038.flavor: [This is... wonderful. I never would have thought I would get to wear something like this.]

100039.name: Wedding Dress Iri
100039.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Field SIZE is greater than the enemy Field SIZE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If the enemy is an NPC, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If the enemy is a player and you have 0 Shuffles, you get Shuffles=1.
100039.flavor: [I tried this because I sometimes think beautiful clothes would be better than my gloomy clothes. How is it? Vernika... of course I couldn't expect to hear her reply...]

300580.name: Dark Soul Nold
300580.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's SIZE is at least 6, the defender is sent to the Grave. This card gets ATK/STA increased by half the Turn Number (rounding up). // Before defending, a random allied Follower gets SIZE -1. The attacker gets SIZE +1.
300580.flavor: [This is the human form of the Black Lion with her power unleashed.]

300581.name: Alchemist Yi Ensan
300581.ability: Before this Follower is attacked, it gets STA +1 and the attacker gets STA -1.
300581.flavor: [One person only needs a teaspoon of love potion, so why in the world would anyone need a whole gallon? Well, that's none of my business. I just need to deliver it to... What was her name? Linia?]

300586.name: 레이디 코크스
300586.ability: Before defending, all allied Academy Followers get DEF +1. This skill is removed.
300586.flavor: [I enjoy investigating the Royle Academy students, but I like this dress, too. I will remember it.]

300587.name: 뮤지시터 레이디 이레아
300587.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's STA is greater than its original value, it gets its STA changed to its original value. If this happens, this card gets STA increased by the change in STA. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300587.flavor: [I, Muzisitter Irea, have appeared to stop the evil deeds of the witches!]

300584.name: 학생회 케이시
300584.ability: Before attacking, if there are any allied Followers other than this one, the enemy Character gets LIFE -3. This skill is removed.
300584.flavor: [Great concentration, mental revolution, a single slash of the sword. The thing that the sword cuts is an object, but the thing that the heart cuts is your soul. Understand, Sita?]

300585.name: 트윈 레이디 시온리온
300585.ability: At the start of the turn, a random card in the enemy Hand is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
300585.flavor: [How is it? I can be elegant when I'm dressed like this, too.] [Shion, you're weird.]

200168.name: Dream Conversation
200168.ability: The first allied Follower with the highest SIZE gets SIZE=1, gets ATK/STA increased by the decrease in SIZE, and gets DEF increased by half the decrease in SIZE (rounding down).
200168.flavor: [It was a wish for everyone to laugh together when everything was over, but Vernika's dream would never come true.]

200167.name: Lago de Cisnes
200167.ability: All enemy Followers with the highest total ATK/STA have their ATK/STA halved (rounding up). If your Character has "Iri" in the name, those Followers get an additional ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2.
200167.flavor: [An act that would overturn the moment at once.]

200166.name: Misfit
200166.ability: The first enemy Follower whose original SIZE is 5 or less with a total ATK/STA of at least 22 or whose original SIZE is 6 or more with a total ATK/STA of at least 32 have their ATK/STA changed to the total SIZE of your Field if you don't have a Darklore Character, or half the total SIZE of your Field (rounding down) if you have a Darklore Character.
200166.flavor: [She was born in nature. Cannelle. Being born in nature, she was not able to adjust to the shut-in life of the mansion. "I want to go back..."]

200165.name: Absolute Power
200165.ability: All allied Followers get the following effects depending on the type of the first card in the enemy Hand. Spell: DEF -1/STA +5. Follower: ATK +3/DEF -1.
200165.flavor: [Ho... you're Iri's slave? How interesting... go fetch your master. You are inadequate.] [Haha... me, a slave? Don't run your mouth as you please. I am the master... understand?]

200164.name: Intrusion
200164.ability: Two random allied Followers get STA +3. If this happens, cards are sent from the top of the enemy Deck to the enemy Hand until the enemy Hand is full.
200164.flavor: [At the moment the vampire Conundrum selected an answer! "Wait!!"]

200163.name: Maximum Drive
200163.ability: The enemy card with a Slot number equal to the first allied Follower's SIZE are sent to the Grave, and the first allied Follower is sent to the Grave.
200163.flavor: [The time to resolve today's incident is 2 hours, 37 minutes, and 35 seconds. Your goal is futile.]

200162.name: Tick Time
200162.ability: Two random allied Followers get ATK/STA increased by half the ones digit of the Turn Number (rounding down).
200162.flavor: [The time to restructure the balance of the night draws near. Who is the true master of the night? We'll ask the stars.]

200161.name: Doctor Play
200161.ability: If your Field contains a Follower, the first enemy Follower gets STA decreased by the ones digit of the difference between the number of cards in your Deck and the enemy Deck.
200161.flavor: [Where does it hurt? Hm... here? Okay. Ah! How's that? Does it hurt anymore?]

200160.name: Sword That Cleaves Evil
200160.ability: If you have a Crux Character, there are allied Followers, and the Turn Number is odd, enemy Followers with a SIZE and Slot number that are both odd or both even are sent to the Grave. If the Turn Number is even, then enemy Followers with a SIZE and Slot number that are not both odd or both even are sent to the Grave. Your Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of sent Followers.
200160.flavor: [Our forces are no longer here. I will humiliate those who have stained our honor. Clarice, help me.]

300054.name: Crux Faithful
300054.flavor: [I wanted to think by myself, so I came but... unfortunately, I was too early. I wonder why I came so early...?]

300055.name: Crescent Conundrum
300055.flavor: [It's the long-awaited Flina's quiz game! Who will be the one to unravel these riddles! I, Conundrum, will represent the Crescents!!]

300056.name: Scardel Chardonnay
300056.flavor: [Special wine can be your best friend during the night. Isn't there a wine that you like? Of course, I don't drink wine.]

300057.name: Scardel Sion Flina
300057.ability: Before attacking, all allied Followers with "Shion Flina" or "Rion Flina" in the name get ATK +1.
300057.flavor: [Listen, I don't want to get caught up in your tasteless pranks. If you want to play pranks, then scare people along the night road.]

300050.name: Seeker Sienfield
300050.flavor: [Are you interested? This is magic paid for by blood. Can you use it anyway, even though it's human blood?]

300051.name: Seeker Amethystar
300051.ability: Before defending, if the Turn Number is odd, this Follower gets STA +3.
300051.flavor: [Lydia, why are you like that? I'm also interested. This is worth investigating. It just happens to be raining, too.]

300052.name: Seeker Lydia
300052.ability: Before attacking, if there are least two Crux cards on your Field, the defender gets ATK -1/DEF -2/STA -1.
300052.flavor: [It is not the time to be hasty. First is investigating the knights. Moving will come afterwards.]

300053.name: Acolyte
300053.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is even, all allied Crux Followers get ATK +2/STA +2.
300053.flavor: [It isn't time for Mass yet. Could you come back again when the church bell rings?]

300058.name: Scardel Rion Flina
300058.ability: Before defending, all allied Followers with "Shion Flina" or "Rion Flina" in the name get STA +1.
300058.flavor: [Shion! Shion! I just thought of a really awesome prank! How is it? How is it?]

300059.name: Scardel Pinot Noir
300059.ability: A special effect is applied in dungeons. (Bonus effect: Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.)
300059.flavor: [An aged smell, a unique taste, this wine is perfect in every way. Of course, humans don't call it wine. This is wine to us. It flows through your body. Sweet wine...]

200541.name: 대박
200541.flavor: [At last, I can go there, too.]

200540.name: 데자뷰
200540.ability: Spells from the enemy Hand are sent to the empty Slots in the enemy Field in order. If this happens, and you do not have an Academy Character, your Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of sent cards.

200543.name: 날벼락
200543.ability: If you have a Crux Character, a random enemy card is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. The following effects are applied depending on the sent card's type. Follower: A random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2. Spell: This card is sent to the top of your Deck.
200543.flavor: [As I thought, this glove seems to have special powers. Am I imagining it?]

200542.name: 칼날바람
200542.ability: If there are any allied Followers, a random allied or enemy Follower gets SIZE=1/STA=1.
200542.flavor: [Hey, you! Do you see my power?] [Fwoooooooooo!]

200545.name: 코인토스
200545.ability: All Followers whose SIZE is less than or equal to this card's SIZE get STA -4.
200545.flavor: [Chance is always fair. Heads? Tails? Huhu...]

200544.name: 냉기폭풍
200544.ability: All allied Followers get deactivated. A random enemy Follower gets ATK decreased by the number of deactivated Followers.

200547.name: 영지와 추격의 검
200547.ability: A random enemy Follower gets ATK/DEF/STA changed to their original values and sent to the top of the enemy Deck. If the enemy is a player, you get Shuffles +1.
200547.flavor: [With the silver moonlight pouring in like a wave and her back to the enormou sword, Jaina cried out.] [I, Jaina Preventer, have summoned the 1st sword of the Crux knights! The knights' vice-captain is here!]

200546.name: 박카스의 손
200546.ability: Two cards called "Zombie" are created in the empty Slots of your Field and get SIZE=1/ATK=7/DEF=0/STA=1.
200546.flavor: [The wine's all gone? Then I'll turn water into wine!]

200549.name: 암리타의 유실물
200549.ability: A random enemy Follower gets ATK=0 and gets the following skill: "At the start of the turn, this Follower gets its ATK changed to 3 plus its original value. This skill is removed."
200549.flavor: [Amrita missed Asmis after being attacked. When Asmis went to find Amrita, the only thing she found was her Talentium.]

200548.name: 레이나의 소원
200548.ability: A random enemy Follower gets its STA halved (rounding up). If that Follower's DEF is less than 3, it gets STA +3.
200548.flavor: [And that's why my wish is to become a magical girl that goes POW and SPARKLE!] [That's so cool, Layna!]

300298.name: GS Sniper
300298.ability: Before attacking, all cards in your Deck with the same name as this one are removed from the game. This card gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +2 for each card removed.
300298.flavor: [They sent out new weapons, but how do I shoot this thing? Don't I need an arrow?]

300299.name: GS 2nd Star
300299.ability: Before attacking, the first Follower in your Deck with "GS" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. // Before defending, the first card in your Hand with "GS" in the name is sent to the bottom of your Deck, and this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2.
300299.flavor: [The flare. Was "step 1" completed successfully? But I'm still not satisfied. "There is nothing." Is there no "door"?]

300441.name: 마녀 파르푼테
300441.ability: Before defending, if you have a Darklore Character and the attacker belongs to Crux, the attacker gets ATK -3/STA -3.

300440.name: 독서의 마녀
300440.ability: Before attacking, if your Character's LIFE exceeds the enemy Character's LIFE by at least 10, this Follower gets ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2. If the enemy Character's LIFE exceeds your Character's LIFE by at least 10, this Follower gets ATK +2/DEF +2/STA +2.
300440.flavor: [Eh... Can I put this bread over here? This work is hard... The tower collapsed... Our suffering never ends.]

300524.name: Maid Fio
300524.ability: Before defending, this Follower gets STA increased by the number of empty Slots in your Hand, then cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until your hand contains at least 4 cards.
300524.flavor: [Being one minute, or even one second behind is unacceptable. The basic principle of all duties is to perform efficiently in order to stay on schedule.]

300525.name: Muzisitter Lady Sevia
300525.ability: Before attacking, if this Follower's ATK is less than or equal to the defender's total DEF+STA, the defender gets SIZE=1. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the change in SIZE, and this Follower gets ATK/STA increased by half the change in SIZE (rounding up).
300525.flavor: [Welcome to Muzisitter, Miss Linus. First, we should choose a codename for you.]

300526.name: Marksman Knight
300526.ability: Before defending, all allied Followers with "Knight" in the name get STA +2, then this skill is removed.
300526.flavor: [Maintaining superior equipment over the enemy is a fundamental strategy.]

300527.name: Crux Knight Sillit
300527.ability: Before defending, if this Follower is deactivated, it gets reactivated and gets STA +3. This skill is removed.
300527.flavor: [Have you heard of a medic who wears clothes unbefitting of a doctor?]

300520.name: Cook Club Sylphie
300520.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets DEF=0, then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300520.flavor: [Sita in her everyday clothes is some nice eye candy! But the new member is a formidable opponent, too!]

300078.name: Council Treas. Amy
300078.ability: Before defending, all allied Followers with "Student Council" in the name get STA +2, then this skill is removed.
300078.flavor: [Even then, don't go over this semester's budget. Even if it's following the rules and it's student council work, don't go over budget.]

300521.name: Council Helper Weekly
300521.ability: Before defending, the attacker gets ATK -1.
300521.flavor: [Seriously... Are they just trading me in like I'm part of the inventory? I'm the ace of the weekly duties members! This is a comeback.]

300120.name: Silent Maid
300120.ability: Before attacking, this card gets DEF=0. This card gets ATK/STA increased by the difference between this card's DEF and the defender's DEF (by a maximum of 9).
300120.flavor: [I'm too careless, I have to bring this tea to master Linia... huh? The tea... overflowed?]

300121.name: Linia Pacifica
300121.ability: At the start of the turn, this card and neighboring Academy Followers get ATK/STA increased by half this card's SIZE (rounding up).
300121.flavor: [Cinia. Rose's circumstances were regrettable, but how long are you going to sink into sadness? Look toward the future.]

300122.name: Youngest Knight
300122.flavor: [I'm in your care! I will work harder!]

200524.name: 지우개의 지배자
200524.ability: The allied Vita Follower with the highest SIZE gets SIZE -3/STA -1.
200524.flavor: [Do you want an eraser to erase your mistakes? If that's what you want, then I'll have you know that all of my erasers can do that!]

300124.name: Arcana XVI Tiwa
300124.flavor: [I'm not a fool who likes high places. Those descriptions are a thing of the past!]

300125.name: Arcana I Magision
300125.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's DEF is at least 1, the defender gets DEF=0 and this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300125.flavor: [This is a really useful clock. It can be used to communicate, too.]

300126.name: Seeker Ruth
300126.ability: Before attacking, the defender's skills are all removed. If this happens, this skill is removed.
300126.flavor: [What shall we do now, leader? It seems like this is the clue that we've been looking for. I'm already excited.]

300127.name: Seeker Luthera
300127.ability: Before defending, this card gets STA +2.
300127.flavor: [Ah sorry, can you hand me that book?]

300128.name: Seeker Director
300128.ability: Before attacking, this card gets DEF=0. This card gets ATK/STA increased by the difference between this card's DEF and the defender's DEF (by a maximum of 9).
300128.flavor: [Please be at ease. Even though I lead the seekers, I wish to see all of you become strong people.]

300129.name: Vanguard Knight
300129.ability: At the start of the turn, cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until your Hand has at least 4 cards, then this Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of Crux cards in your Hand.
300129.flavor: [I will take the lead! Everyone, believe in me and follow!]

300523.name: Maid Lesnoa
300523.ability: Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK increased by the number of cards in your Hand with "Maid" in the name.
300523.flavor: [Ever since that day, you've been obsessed with some kind of power... you haven't laid a finger on me, either. So... you won't be doing it anymore? Lady?]

300370.name: Council Enforcer Bella
300370.ability: Before attacking, if there are any empty Slots on your Field, the defender gets STA decreased by this Follower's ATK minus the defender's DEF. This Follower is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field and deactivated, then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300370.flavor: [President, don't be lazy. I know I'm not the only one who thinks that, but you know how even eagles hide their talons?]

200615.name: Life of Study
200615.ability: Your Shuffles are changed to equal the enemy Shuffles. If this happens, a random enemy Follower gets DEF decreased by your Shuffles. If there was no change, both players get Shuffles +1. If this happens, this card is sent to the top of your Deck.
200615.flavor: [Sita! You stopped studying again! Are you secretly eating things while you're by yourself!?] [!!!!]

200614.name: Inspection
200614.ability: All allied Darklore Followers are deactivated. If this happens, those Followers gain the following skill: "Before defending, the attacker gets STA decreased by its own ATK. This skill is removed."
200614.flavor: [Please cooperate with our investigation!] [Are you investigating my good looks~?] [Why would we investigate that!]

200617.name: Pursuit
200617.ability: All allied Followers without skills get SIZE -1.
200617.flavor: [Sita, it's up to you! Catch that person!] [Hold on...]

200616.name: Receipt
200616.ability: A random allied Follower gets ATK +3/STA +3. There is a 50% chance that a random allied Follower gets ATK -2/STA -2.
200616.flavor: [This is the receipt from when they went out to replace the damaged equipment. However, it's filled with the names of snacks that they ate.]

200611.name: Temporary Transfer
200611.ability: A random allied Crux Follower gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by half its ATK/DEF/STA (rounding up) if its total ATK/DEF/STA is 22 or less. All allied Followers get ATK/DEF/STA increased by half the previous increases (rounding up).
200611.flavor: [I can bring anyone for the test on new equipment, but the messengers are nowhere in sight.]

200610.name: Migration
200610.ability: All allied Followers with 6 or less STA get their STA doubled.
200610.flavor: [Why are we riding bicycles?] [The messengers said they were very high quality] [That's not the problem!]

200613.name: Forced Apprehension
200613.ability: A random allied Follower and a random enemy Follower swap skills.
200613.flavor: [You're all under arrest under suspicion of being connected to the attack incident! Hurry up and come!] [Eek!]

200612.name: Doubt Attack
200612.ability: Two random allied Followers get ATK +1/STA +1. If those Followers have odd ATK, they get an additional ATK +2/STA +2.
200612.flavor: [Kris!] [A dark shadow flew towards Kris Flina.]

200619.name: Table Flip
200619.ability: All enemy Followers get STA -3. If there are any allied Followers with "Lady" in the name, the enemy Followers get an additional STA -1.

200618.name: Service Award
200618.ability: All allied Followers whose skills are not the same as their original skills get their original skills restored. If those Followers do not have "Cook Club" in the name, they get ATK -1/STA -1.
200618.flavor: [For your great service in catching the unidentified culprit, Royle City presents you with this award.] [Everyone except one was showered with praises.]

300379.name: Scardel Grenache
300379.ability: Before attacking, this card gets STA +1. // Before defending, if this card's STA is at least 6, this card gets STA=5 and the attacker gets ATK/DEF decreased by the STA decrease.
300379.flavor: [Ho... You have a lot of guts looking me in the eyes. Shall we see if you have the skill to back it up?]

300378.name: Aletheian E-ROMA
300378.ability: Before defending, if this card is deactivated, the attacker is sent to the first empty Slot on the enemy Field. If this happens, this skill is removed.
300378.flavor: [Hey! Over there! Form a line. It'll cause trouble if there are too many people.]

200529.name: 방패파괴
200529.ability: A random enemy Follower gets DEF -3. If that Follower's DEF is at least 0, it gets an additional DEF -2.
200529.flavor: [Bring me any shields that haven't been pierced yet. I'll show you how weak they are.] [Pintail still had the hobby of practicing her swordsmanship on equipment that she deemed unusable.]

300075.name: Council Suzie
300075.flavor: [I'm watching you. Even if your name isn't mentioned right now, your name will be on the demerit list at the end of the month.]

300618.name: 선배메이드
300618.ability: Before attacking, if this card's ATK is lower than the defender's ATK, their ATK values are swapped. If this happens, this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300618.flavor: [It's been a while since I've worn a traditional maid uniform. How is it, master Linia?]

300619.name: 크룩스기사단 핀테일
300619.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's SIZE is less or equal to this card's SIZE, the attacker gets ATK -1/DEF -1.
300619.flavor: [The greatest swordsmen will treat even the worst weapons as if they were the finest swords.]

300612.name: 여름의 카베르네
300612.ability: Before defending, all allied Darklore Followers get ATK +2/STA +2. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300612.flavor: [This is the recommended style for summer, but... why does it feel even hotter?]

300613.name: 농구부원
300613.flavor: [I want to show everyone the value of sports at the Vita culture festival! I can't rebound by myself any longer!]

300610.name: 여름의 리니아
300610.ability: Before defending, this card and neighboring Academy Followers get ATK/STA increased by half this card's SIZE (rounding up). This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300610.flavor: [Master Linia, is something bothering you?] [It's just... hot. It's just the heat.]

300611.name: 여름의 봉선
300611.ability: Before defending, cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until your Hand has at least 4 cards, then this Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of Crux cards in your Hand. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300611.flavor: [Whew. Water after training is like honey.]

300616.name: 몹메이드
300616.ability: Before attacking, this card gets DEF +1/STA -1 (No effect if STA=1).
300616.flavor: [Why am I still carrying this mop? Someone please free me from this mopping hell.]

300617.name: 인스피레이션 레이디
300617.ability: Before attacking, if there are any allied cards with "Lady" in the name, all allied Followers get ATK +1/STA +1. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300617.flavor: [That lady looks like she was met with misfortune. As usual, my feelings were correct.]

300614.name: 요리연구부 고문
300614.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets STA decreased by the sum of the changes in SIZE of all allied cards from their original SIZES.
300614.flavor: [That new girl? I never turn away new members. Besides, I'll never say no to someone cute.]

300615.name: 요리연구부원
300615.ability: Before defending, all allied Followers get DEF increased by the number of allied Followers with "Cook Club" in the name, ATK increased by the number of allied Vita Followers, and STA increased by the number of allied Followers. This skill is removed.
300615.flavor: [I want to show off my cooking skills at the next culture festival! Don't worry about other places, make sure you definitely stop by the Cook Club!]

100157.name: Child Layna
100157.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Hand gets STA increased by the number of cards on your Field. A random Follower on your Field gets STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand.
100157.flavor: [This is a picture from my childhood. Where did you find it?]

300727.name: Lady Serbia
300727.ability: Before attacking, if the defender has at least 2 DEF, the defender gets STA -3.
300727.flavor: [It's been a while since I've played beach volleyball. Did you forget about the prize if I won?]

300724.name: Culture Festival Supervisor Rianna
300724.ability: Before attacking, if the defender has at least 2 DEF, the defender gets STA -3.
300724.flavor: [A... Annus, are you only sending 3 girls?] [Do you want to go, Rianna?] [Ah... I have to prepare for the culture festival... ack]

300725.name: Cookie Hunter Sita
300725.ability: Before attacking, enemy Followers in even or odd Slots (50% of either) get STA -2. // Before defending, enemy Followers in even or odd Slots (50% of either) get ATK -1.
300725.flavor: [The feeling of happiness from a mountain of cookies, the feeling of satisfaction from being full, the feeling of anticipation for the cookies that are remaining. She wants to express these complex feelings, but her mouth is busy.] [I want to eat more...]

100153.name: Jaina
100153.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets STA increased by half its SIZE (rounding down) and gets the following skill: "Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1."
100153.flavor: [In a shanty little town within Crux, a wind blew over the head of Jaina, who had just returned from shopping.] [It has been a while. Former knight captain. I have returned to reveal to you the truth.] [The voice that was carried along the wind was that of Creuset.]

100152.name: Wandering Cannelle
100152.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets the following effects depending on its SIZE. 1~2: SIZE +1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +3. 3~4: SIZE -1.
100152.flavor: [She was born in nature. She was found in nature. Cannelle left Cinia's side to wander the forest, looking for the magical mushrooms that would change her small stature.]

100151.name: 거인이 된 아이잉
100151.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. If that Follower's SIZE is at least 4, it gets an additional ATK +1/STA +1. If the Turn Number is even, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1. If that Follower's SIZE is at least 4, it gets an additional ATK -1/STA -1.
100151.flavor: [Woow I ate a weird chocolate-chu! My body suddenly became big-chu!]

100150.name: Morning Iri
100150.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. Another power is added in dungeons. (Bonus effect: The same Follower gets an additional ATK +0~2/STA +0~2)
100150.flavor: [Mornings at the office are always loud. The two sleepless vampire kids are causing a fuss, and Esprit is yelling at them. They tried transforming inside the house, which ended in the sound of Esprit's slipper.]

300548.name: Apostle Reshuri
300548.ability: At the start of the turn, a card called "Aletheian G-NUSA" is created in the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE -1.
300548.flavor: [According to Schindler, I can use this. A miracle, huh... The traditionalists are better than I thought.]

100159.name: Staff Sergeant Pintail
100159.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA -1. If this happens and the enemy does not have a Crux Character, that Follower gets an additional STA -1. If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck with "Knight" in the name get ATK +2.
100159.flavor: [From today, Sergeant Pintail has been promoted to staff sergeant.] [I don't like this at all. Uu.... Ack.]

100158.name: Witch Queen Linia
100158.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower's ATK/DEF get changed to their original values if they are higher than their original values. All allied Followers' ATK/DEF get changed to their original values if they are lower than their original values.
100158.flavor: [This is the place Cinia mentioned? Not bad. It would be better if I came here with Cinia, though.]

110141.name: Odien.
110141.ability: At the start of the turn, all cards on the enemy Field possessing a skill are destroyed. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: skill-users will be suppressed.)
110141.flavor: [Is there a new artifact anywhere? This place is a new discovery. The people of this place have a fascinating dialect.] [Location: Muspelheim 9F]

110140.name: Frett.
110140.ability: At the start of the turn, all cards on the enemy Field that do not have a SIZE of 3 are destroyed. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: 3?)
110140.flavor: [I was in the forest looking for materials for a new flagpole when I ended up here. What is this place?] [Location: Muspelheim 8F]

110143.name: Apostle Six
110143.ability: At the start of the turn, the first card in your Grave with "Aletheian" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field.
110143.flavor: [The most important part of manipulating the public is information. First is the information that they have already heard. Then, the information that you tell them.]

110142.name: Lyrica.
110142.ability: At the start of the turn, all cards on the enemy Field that do not possess a skill are destroyed. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: Those without skills will be forsaken.)
110142.flavor: [HI~ Are you having trouble? Lyrica is having a hard time figuring out what this place is, too!] [Location: Muspelheim 10F]

110145.name: Apostle Euler
110145.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the number of Followers in the enemy Field.
110145.flavor: [In the end, the thing flowing beneath everything is money. We must get it.]

110144.name: Apostle Isena
110144.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Field with a SIZE of 3 or less is deactivated and sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. That Follower gets the following skill: "At the start of the turn, if this card is active, it is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field, and then this skill is removed."
110144.flavor: [You have to inspire dreams within the weary.]

110147.name: Obsessed Isena
110147.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Field with a SIZE of 3 or less is deactivated and sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. If this happens, that Follower gets the following skill: "At the start of the turn, if this card is active, it is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field, and then this skill is removed." A random Follower in the enemy Field gets ATK -2/STA -2.
110147.flavor: [It was a success. We are making progress.]

110146.name: Info Manager Six
110146.ability: At the start of the turn, the first card in your Grave with "Aletheian" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets ATK +3/STA +3.
110146.flavor: [We will get what we want. Don't worry.]

110149.name: Sarah.
110149.ability: At the start of the turn, all enemy Followers with a neighboring card are destroyed. Enemy Followers with 1 STA are destroyed. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: Friends who enjoy skinship are a must.)
110149.flavor: [The tranquil suburbs are nice. But why is it always nighttime in the city? It's a mystery I can't unravel.] [Location: Muspelheim 11F]

110148.name: Item Manager Euler
110148.ability: At the start of the turn, the following effect is applied three times: "A random Follower in the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the number of Followers in the enemy Field."
110148.flavor: [The hearts of people are complex. We must protect their faith in us.]

300549.name: Apostle Red Sun
300549.ability: Before attacking, if the defender is still active, it gets ATK -1/STA -1. If it is deactivated, this card gets ATK +1/STA +1. // Before defending, this card gets STA +2.
300549.flavor: [It left a scar, but I can walk without a cane now. Miss Helena...]

300269.name: GS Spy
300269.ability: Before defending, if this Follower is still active, it gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300269.flavor: [Ouch, my muffler suddenly came off. Was I... caught?]

300268.name: Crescent Unit Azoth
300268.ability: Before defending, this Follower gets STA increased by the number of cards on your Field with "Scardel" in the name.
300268.flavor: [The fighter created by the Crescent elders. With emphasis on independence, she has the ability to cope with any situation. She can even carry out her duties in the light of day.]

300263.name: Blue Cross Linda
300263.ability: Before defending, if your Hand contains 2 or less cards, this Follower gets STA -3. If your Hand contains 4 or more cards, this skill is removed.
300263.flavor: [This Vita uniform is too small. I couldn't get a uniform that fit, so this is going to hinder my activities.]

300262.name: Blue Cross Elda
300262.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's SIZE is at least 4, this Follower gets STA +4. This skill is removed.
300262.flavor: [Hm? Has it been a long time? Something loud is going on outside. I wonder what it is?]

300261.name: Knight Manager
300261.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower with "Knight" in the name gets SIZE -1.
300261.flavor: [Make sure you always maintain your equipment and supplies. If anything goes missing, we won't buy a new one for you. Keep that in mind.]

300260.name: Blue Cross Noel
300260.ability: Before defending, if this Follower is still active, it gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300260.flavor: [I'm carrying the key with me. Can you figure out where I put it?]

300267.name: Scardel Unit Felgus
300267.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets STA decreased by its DEF.
300267.flavor: [The fighter with the maximum fighting ability created by the Scardel elders. With her victims, she seeks to become more and more efficient at completing her duties.]

300266.name: Quartermaster Knight
300266.ability: Before defending, if this Follower and the attacker belong to different factions, the attacker gets ATK -1/STA -1 and this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300266.flavor: [How long do I have to clean up after you all? Even if you give me a raise, isn't this too much to do? What do you even do with your time!]

300265.name: Messenger Knight
300265.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets STA decreased by its DEF.
300265.flavor: [I have to deliver.. this... news. The GS have entered the country!]

300264.name: Blue Cross Lifreya
300264.ability: Before defending, if your Hand contains 2 or less cards, this Follower gets ATK -2. If your Hand contains 4 or more cards, this skill is removed.
300264.flavor: [I guard this door. However, I don't carry a key. I just watch the people who come and go on business.]

300469.name: Crux Knight Mytyl
300469.ability: Before attacking, if the defender has at least 2 DEF, the defender gets STA -3.
300469.flavor: [A room like this under the school... It's surprising.]

300468.name: Guard Knight
300468.ability: Before defending, the attacker's ATK is changed to its original value. This skill is removed.
300468.flavor: [C... could this be revenge for being late to my shift?!]

300465.name: Glasses Maid
300465.ability: Before attacking, if the defender has at least 2 skills, the defender gets its skills removed until the start of the next turn and this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2.
300465.flavor: [The wine I prepared will be good. Are you enjoying the picnic?]

300464.name: Cook Club Apprentice Iri
300464.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1. If the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, this skill is replaced with the following skill: "Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK +2/STA +1."
300464.flavor: ["I... I'm just here to talk to that girl...!" "But don't you think that apron suits you?"]

300467.name: Lady Vid & Lady Lon
300467.ability: Before defending, the first 4 cards in your Deck are sent to the Grave. For every sent Academy Spell, 2 random Academy Followers are sent from your Grave to the bottom of your Deck. This skill is removed.
300467.flavor: [Royle Academy's mystery unraveling duo. The shadow pursuer Vid, and the lightning quick mind Ron. These two girls have begun to investigate the chairman's plans.]

300466.name: Producer Maid
300466.ability: Before defending, all Academy cards neighboring this card are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If at least 2 cards were sent, the attacker is sent to the Grave, then this skill is removed.
300466.flavor: [Why do I have to do this work when I'm an administrative maid? Where did that maid go?]

300461.name: Ancient Forgotten God
300461.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets ATK decreased by the number of cards on your Field. // Before defending, if this Follower belongs to your Character's faction, the attacker gets ATK -1/STA -1.
300461.flavor: [The summoning preparations were slightly insufficient, but something still happened.] [The God of Truth? Don't make me laugh. I'm different from that fool.]

300460.name: GS 6th Star
300460.ability: Before attacking, if your Grave contains at least 7 cards and the Turn Number is 7 or lower, this Follower gets ATK/STA increased by 7 minus the Turn Number (by a maximum of 4).
300460.flavor: [Even if you don't cooperate with our leader's cause, we don't need your help. We will overcome any obstacles.]

300463.name: Cook Club Katie
300463.flavor: [This weekend, we're having a welcoming party for a new member! Aren't you coming, Sita?]

300462.name: Council Press Hermes
300462.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets DEF +1. // Before defending, if the attacker's DEF is at least 5, the attacker is sent to the Grave.
300462.flavor: [The front-page story of today's Vita Report is about a rumor of a huge underground library in the basement! Please read all about it!]

200378.name: 아이리의 간호
200378.ability: Two random allied Darklore Followers without "Witch" or "GS" in the name get the following effects depending on who wins the coin flip. You win: ATK +3/DEF+1/STA+1. Opponent wins: ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +3.
200378.flavor: [She found life at the office to be fresher than she had imagined, day after day. Suddenly, she had to provide medical care...] [I don't know...]

200379.name: 전화 찬스
200379.ability: A card named "Good Job" is placed in the first and second empty Slots of the enemy Field and deactivated. A card named "Good Job" is created at the top and bottom of the enemy Deck.
200379.flavor: [Now! There are 60 seconds left! Conundrum's phone chance starts now!]

200376.name: 위엄
200376.ability: A number of enemy Followers equal to 1 plus the number of Crux Followers on your Field have their ATK/DEF/STA divided by the number of Crux Followers on your Field (rounding down).
200376.flavor: [By using a certain hand signal, birds' talons erupt from the ground, binding the feet of all of her foes. This is the ability to control large swarms of people. This is Eisenwane's power.]

200377.name: 정점에 서는 자
200377.ability: You get Shuffles -1 (minimum 0). If this happens, all Followers in your Hand/Field get ATK +2/STA +2.
200377.flavor: [Her power was immense. She, who knew the meaning of balance more than anyone else, had become an existence that destroyed the balance of everything.]

200374.name: 각오의 힘
200374.ability: Two random allied Crux Followers with at least 1 DEF get DEF decreased by twice their own Def. If this happens, those Followers get ATK increased by twice the decrease in their respective DEF.
200374.flavor: [Those who are prepared for death show great strength.]

200375.name: 루머
200375.ability: Two random allied Crux Followers without "Knight" or "Seeker" in the name get the following effects depending on who wins the coin flip. You win: ATK +3/DEF+1/STA+1. Opponent wins: ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +3.
200375.flavor: [There is a legend among the knights. If you receive a certain type of acupuncture, then you will reach a higher level... But there's nothing like that.]

200372.name: 장녀의 취미
200372.ability: Two random allied Academy Followers without "Maid" or "Lady" in the name get the following effects depending on who wins the coin flip. You win: ATK +3/DEF+1/STA+1. Opponent wins: ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +3.
200372.flavor: [Cinia is yours~ (frown)] [This is the chairman's strange hobby. She wears the student council president's clothes and says weird things in front of the mirror...] [* This is a work of fiction.]

200373.name: 트라이포스 레디
200373.ability: All allied Followers that belong to your Character's faction regain their original skills, and any of their ATK/DEF/STA that are lower than their original values are changed to their original values.
200373.flavor: [I have decided the fate of this battle.] [Triforce! Ready?] [A mechanical voice echoed from somewhere.]

200370.name: 기호증
200370.ability: The first 3 cards other than this card on your Field, in your Hand, and in your Deck that belong to your Character's faction and do not have a SIZE of 1 get SIZE -1.

200371.name: 레이디스 디너
200371.ability: Two random enemy Followers get ATK -1/STA -2. If your Field contains a card with a SIZE of at least 6, those Followers instead get ATK -2/STA -4.
200371.flavor: [She's not a picky eater, but Cinia's nitpicking during meals really bothers the maids.]

110215.name: Wedding Sita
110215.ability: At the start of the turn, enemy Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 get STA -1. Your Character gets LIFE +1.
110215.flavor: [I just have to stay still while wearing this? I'm hungry, Vernika.]

110214.name: Linia's Steward
110214.ability: At the start of the turn, a random card in the enemy Hand/Field is changed into "New Maid".
110214.flavor: [Lady Linia, how are you feeling today? I will prepare some warm tea for you.]

110217.name: Wedding Iri
110217.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Field SIZE is greater than the enemy Field SIZE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. Your Character gets LIFE +1.
110217.flavor: [I tried this because I sometimes think beautiful clothes would be better than my gloomy clothes. How is it? Vernika... of course I couldn't expect to hear her reply...]

110216.name: Wedding Luthica
110216.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Crux Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. Your Character gets LIFE +1.
110216.flavor: [This is... wonderful. I never would have thought I would get to wear something like this.]

110211.name: Delinquent Leader
110211.ability: At the start of the turn, all enemy Followers with at least 1 DEF get DEF decreased by twice their DEF.
110211.flavor: [I have no interest in people weaker than me, but it's a different story if you touch my friends.]

110210.name: Campus Delinquent
110210.ability: At the start of the turn, all enemy Followers get DEF=0.
110210.flavor: [Listen. If you want to live peacefully, you won't get any help. Why is that?]

110213.name: Prefect Layna
110213.ability: At the start of the turn, the first card on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. The first Follower in your Hand gets ATK/STA increased by the sent card's SIZE.
110213.flavor: [The Morals Committee must always set a good example for others. Because of that, it is always lacking in members.]

110212.name: Latecomer.
110212.ability: At the start of the turn, the last card in the enemy Hand is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. The first Follower in your Hand gets ATK/STA increased by the sent card's SIZE.
110212.flavor: [It's a latecomer. Why are there people relaxing here!]

110219.name: Wedding Rose
110219.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by half of the difference between its SIZE and DEF (rounding up). Your Character gets LIFE +1.
110219.flavor: [Sister, I'll only show this look to you. I don't want to show this look to Cinia...]

110218.name: Wedding Vernika
110218.ability: At the start of the turn, the first enemy Follower with the highest DEF gets DEF =0. Your Character gets LIFE +1.
110218.flavor: [I've only dreamed of trying out a wedding dress. Cinia, please tell your oldest sister thank you for me.]

300599.name: 여름의 학생회 수지
300599.ability: Before attacking, this card's "before defending" skills are sent to the defender. The defender's "before attacking" skills are sent to this Follower. // Before defending, if this card does not belong to Vita, the attacker gets ATK +2/STA +2.
300599.flavor: [I'm not always cold. I always get happy around flowers like these. Hm? My face isn't pale, and I don't have a major wound!]

300598.name: 요리연구부 코디네이터
300598.flavor: [The last part of cooking is the decoration. However, in order to achieve the perfect decoration, you must put yourself in the food's shoes.]

100029.name: Night Denizen Vernika
100029.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA -3. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE +1.
100029.flavor: [Sorry, Sita, I can't walk to school in the morning with you anymore because of this body... but don't worry, you're welcome to come to the night.. Hurry and come, Sita, I miss you... you'll look pretty under the moonlight. Hehehe]

100028.name: Lovestruck Iri
100028.ability: At the start of the turn, if there are cards in the enemy Hand and Field from at least two factions, a random card in your Hand gets SIZE -2 (to a minimum of 1).
100028.flavor: [Sunset red hair, blue eyes behind those glasses... a smile even when nobody else is around... I've decided, I'll win that girl.]

100027.name: Blue Reaper Luthica
100027.ability: At the start of the turn, the number of Crux cards and non-Crux cards in the enemy Hand and Field are compared. A random allied Crux Follower gets STA increased by the higher number.
100027.flavor: [You shall not pass! I won't spare anyone who wishes to harm Jaina!]

100026.name: Foreign Student Cinia
100026.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets one of the following effects applied depending on the faction of the first card in your Hand: Vita: ATK +1/STA +2, Academy: STA +3, Crux: DEF +1, Darklore: SIZE -2 (to a minimum of 1).
100026.flavor: [This... this is the public school's uniform? It's... it's not bad! For a commoner's uniform, it's a decent design...]

100025.name: Lightseeker Sita
100025.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Darklore Follower with a SIZE of 9 or less is sent to the Grave. A random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by 1.5 times the sent card's SIZE (rounding down).
100025.flavor: [Tell me, how do you turn a vampire back into a human? Crux is supposed to hold the most knowledge on the continent, right? So tell me! Jaina said she'd tell me when I joined the knights!]

100024.name: Swimwear Vernika
100024.ability: At the start of the turn, if there are at least two cards in the enemy Hand, the first allied card with the highest SIZE gets SIZE changed to equal the difference in SIZE between the first and second cards in the enemy Hand.
100024.flavor: [Sita, it's bad for your skin if you wander around! The water is nice, but why don't we go rest in the shade?]

100023.name: Swimwear Iri
100023.ability: At the start of the turn, a card in Slot 5 in the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck, and then a random enemy card is moved to the next empty Slot in the enemy Field. If the card is moved to Slot 5, the card is destroyed.
100023.flavor: [This... is the sea? It's amazing! Those surges of water are called waves? I've heard the water is salty... I wonder if it's true? The sea at night is a bit cold...]

100022.name: Swimwear Luthica
100022.ability: At the start of the turn, if all cards in your Field and the first card in your Hand are Crux cards, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2.
100022.flavor: [It's thanks to Jaina that we can spend some time in a place like this. I'll have to bring a gift back when I return.]

100021.name: Swimwear Cinia
100021.ability: At the start of the turn, enemy Followers with a SIZE less than your first Follower's SIZE get ATK -1/STA -2
100021.flavor: [It's not much compared to ours, but I'll let it pass.]

100020.name: Swimwear Sita
100020.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets DEF decreased by half of the ATK of the first Follower in your Hand with the lowest SIZE (rounding down).

200118.name: One Way Trip
