200118.ability: All allied Followers gain the following effects for each Follower satisfying each condition. "Cook Club": SIZE -1/STA +2. "Library Club": ATK +1/STA +1. "Student Council": DEF +1/STA +1. Vita Followers not belonging to the previous groups: ATK +1/DEF +1.
200118.flavor: [I can't ignore this anymore. I will crush your determination, Miss Nanai.]

200119.name: Shift Change
200119.ability: The first allied Follower with "Maid" in the name gets ATK +2/STA +2 and is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, the first Academy Follower in your Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets ATK +2/STA +2.
200119.flavor: [When working, the best moment is the end of work.]

200112.name: Seize
200112.ability: The first other allied Card is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Hand. If this happens, the first enemy card is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
200112.flavor: [I need this sword.. Vernika doesn't want to see it.] [Si, Sita!?]

200113.name: Medusa Glasses
200113.ability: All enemy Followers get ATK -1. A random allied Vita Follower gets STA increased by the total ATK reduction.
200113.flavor: [The Medusa Glasses give the wearer an incredible sense of sight. They can even catch an arrow in midair with their bare hands. The quality of visual perception is greatly changed.]

200110.name: Scardel Rite
200110.ability: The first Darklore Follower in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, all allied Followers with "Scardel," "Crescent," or "Flina" in the name get SIZE=1. If this happens, a copy of the removed Follower is created in the first empty Slot of your Field. That Follower gets SIZE, ATK, and STA increased by the total SIZE reduction of the other followers.
200110.flavor: [It's a ritual to become a true vampire. Endure it.]

200111.name: Final Answer
200111.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, the first enemy Follower with the highest total ATK/STA gets SIZE/ATK/STA decreased by the number of cards in both Hands (to a minimum SIZE of 1).
200111.flavor: [The long-awaited final question hasn't been solved by the Crescents for three generations! Can Conundrum answer it?]

200116.name: Spring Fever
200116.ability: Two random allied Followers get DEF=0 and get their STA increased by twice their change in DEF.
200116.flavor: [I have to make plans for the election... I can't fall asleep here... zzZ]

200117.name: Absolute Control
200117.ability: If you have a Vita Character and there are any allied Followers, a random enemy Follower is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random enemy Spell is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
200117.flavor: [Tying up Celine's strongest supporters is bit fun and solves a problem.]

200114.name: Comparison
200114.ability: The first allied Vita Follower with the lowest SIZE gets ATK/DEF/STA swapped with the ATK/DEF/STA of the first enemy Follower with an equal SIZE.
200114.flavor: [I can't bring this kind of score home. Let me take it again!]

200115.name: Breakdown
200115.ability: The first skill of the first enemy Follower with a skill is added to the first allied Follower that does not have a skill.
200115.flavor: [Miss... Nanai? Stop hurting me like this. For goodness sake. Sniff sniff... My world is coming apart.]

200288.name: Girl Discovered
200288.ability: If you have a Crux Character, the first ten cards in the enemy Grave are removed from the game. All Followers in the enemy Field get STA decreased by the number of removed cards divided by 1 plus the number of Followers in the enemy Field (rounding down).
200288.flavor: [While looking for a place to rest in the forest, Rose stumbled upon a girl.]

200289.name: Third Laboratory
200289.ability: If there are at least three Followers in the enemy Field with the same SIZE, the first of those Followers is destroyed.
200289.flavor: [In order to increase their own power, the GS looked into methods of physical remodeling. This was the preparation process for physical remodeling.]

200282.name: Back from Below
200282.ability: The first Follower in your Grave that belongs to your Character's faction is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field, gets ATK +2/STA +2, and is deactivated. That Follower's skills are removed until the start of the next turn.
200282.flavor: [I saw it. It was large, black, and smooth, even though it was stiff. It was an unexpectedly quick organism... scary.]

200283.name: Lady Radar
200283.ability: All allied Academy Followers without "before defending" skills get DEF +1/STA +3. The first card in your Deck with "Lady" in your name is moved to the first empty Slot of your Hand.
200283.flavor: [Her power of perception was transcendental. Even without seeing anything, her intuition was able to alert her to the presence of others.]

200280.name: Library Explorer
200280.ability: All Followers in your Hand with "Library Club" in the name are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, an equal number of random cards in the enemy Field are deactivated.
200280.flavor: [There are still many books who have never seen light. Until I graduate, I will never stop exploring. Who knows if I'll ever be able to graduate properly?]

200281.name: Rookie's Debut
200281.ability: Followers in your Field with an ATK equal to their STA get ATK +4/STA +4.
200281.flavor: [I wish to cook with this knife that I have inherited from my parents! I wish to join the Cook Club!] [Do you like... sweets?] [The girl who had always dreamed of being in the Cook Club was disappointed from the very beginning. The members only baked sweets.]

200286.name: Artificial Sanctuary Test
200286.ability: If there are Followers in your Field with "Seeker" in the name and this card has a SIZE of 1, all Followers in the enemy Field get STA -4, the enemy player gets Shuffles -1, and a random card in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave. If this card does not have a SIZE of 1, it gets SIZE -1 and is deactivated.
200286.flavor: [The seekers tested the newly found artifact in this region. During the week of testing, they all went crazy.]

200287.name: Really Quick Service
200287.ability: Up to two random Followers in the enemy Hand are swapped with up to two random Followers in the enemy Field.
200287.flavor: [To counter the disadvantages of using a bike, Crux outfitted all of their bike messengers with protective equipment. With this equipment, the messengers became pros.]

200284.name: Strega's Memory
200284.ability: Two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/DEF decreased by half of the total SIZE of Followers in your Field with "Witch" in the name (rounding down). (Note: This card isn't considered to have "Witch" in the name for the purposes of other cards' skills because it uses a different word in Korean.)
200284.flavor: [Cinia dreamt. It was a recollection of happier days. The days when Cinia and Penika were together.]

200285.name: 14th Request
200285.ability: If you have a Follower on your Field and if any of the following conditions are met, 4 random cards on either player's Fields are sent to the Grave and this card is removed from the game. Conditions: "The total number of Followers on your Field and the enemy Field is 4." "The Turn Number is a multiple of 4." "The total number of empty Slots in your Hand and the enemy Hand is 4."
200285.flavor: [My personal feelings don't matter. This is just work. This is the 14th one... it seems like it has some significance.]

300043.name: Guard Knight
300043.flavor: [Whew... when will someone take over my post...]

300042.name: Crux Knight Pintail
300042.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's SIZE is less than this Follower's SIZE, this Follower gets ATK +1/DEF +1.
300042.flavor: [You who wander through the sacred night and desire blood... cannot be forgiven!]

300041.name: Crux Knight Mytyl
300041.ability: A special effect is applied in dungeons. (Bonus effect: Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.)
300041.flavor: [Nobody had interest in where I was or what I did. It was like they couldn't see me. I never thought my thin existence would help anyone, Luthica.]

300040.name: Knight Adjt. Sarisen
300040.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers with "Knight" in the name other than this one get ATK +1/STA +1.
300040.flavor: [Don't feel that weakening the vampires will be difficult. Eliminate the leader. Focus on finding the leader, Luthica.]

300047.name: Priestess
300047.ability: Before defending, your Character gets LIFE +1.
300047.flavor: [The belief in the same thing is what ties us all together. Never forget the conviction of your belief.]

300046.name: Messenger Knight
300046.flavor: [I just have to deliver this letter to the empire? Hehe, piece of cake! Is this really all you have for me? I'll be back, Jaina!]

300045.name: Saint Sword Girl
300045.flavor: [Protecting the seminarian cadets is my duty.]

300044.name: Crux Knight Terra
300044.flavor: [I hate it... I can't fight anymore... I just want peace...]

300049.name: Apprentice Nun
300049.flavor: [When I see a clean church, for some reason my heart also feels clean. As I sweep away the dust, I feel the dust in my heart also get swept away.]

300048.name: Seminarian
300048.flavor: [We start each day with the hope that our faith does not waver. If I grasp this cross tightly, I feel something in my heart growing.]

300285.name: Occult Lady Rainia
300285.ability: Before attacking, all cards in your Deck with the same name as this one are removed from the game. This card gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +2 for each card removed.
300285.flavor: [This is Rainia, who researches a ritual to make it rain. On most days, the success rate is about 1/5, but it's higher during the hot season of course.]

300284.name: Unemployed Maid
300284.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1.
300284.flavor: [After failing to negotiate over working conditions and salary, she finally left Cinia.]

300287.name: Envy Lady
300287.ability: Before attacking, the first Follower in your Deck with "Lady" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. // Before defending, the first card in your Hand with "Lady" in the name is sent to the bottom of your Deck, and this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2.
300287.flavor: [Her power comes from jealousy. The 26 year old Lilianna wants to destroy all the couples she sees.]

300286.name: Occult Lady Charlotte
300286.ability: At the start of the turn, this Follower is sent to the Grave. A random enemy card with a SIZE greater than or equal to this card's SIZE is sent to the Grave.
300286.flavor: [It looks really beautiful when it rains. I don't have to worry about getting wet when wearing these clothes, right?] [Lady Charlotte... You don't need to use an umbrella, too.]

200578.name: 메이드의 방해
200578.ability: If you have an Academy Character, Followers with "Maid" in the name are sent from the top of your Deck to your Field until there are no empty Slots left. Those Followers get SIZE=2.
200578.flavor: [Master Linia isn't here. Master Linia has gone to Kana in master Cinia's place to become the sacrifice.] [Sacrifice?]

200579.name: 문의 발견
200579.ability: If the first card in your Deck is a Follower, it gets SIZE -1/ATK +2/STA +2 and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
200579.flavor: [Where could this gate lead? Could it be a gate that leads anywhere? The research possibilities are endless!]

300283.name: Dejected Maid
300283.ability: Before defending, this Follower gets STA +1.
300283.flavor: [A replacement still isn't coming... How long... Aahhhh...]

300282.name: Lunia Scentriver
300282.ability: Before attacking, this card gains the first 2 skills of the defender. If this happens, this Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of gained skills.
300282.flavor: [Something seems to be going on in Crux. Could you look after mother while I'm out, Layna? I want to try making some new memories, too.]

200574.name: 능력의 개방
200574.ability: All allied Followers get ATK +1/STA +1. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the difference between 3 and the number of allied Followers.
200574.flavor: [Oh! I feel like I've opened the 3rd gate! I can feel the power inside me!]

200575.name: 카나의 비밀
200575.ability: The first Follower in the enemy Deck and the first card in the enemy Deck (that is not the first Follower) are sent to the enemy Field. Any sent Followers get ATK=5 and get their skills changed to the following: "At the start of the turn, this card is sent to the top of your Deck."
200575.flavor: [Isn't this place Kana?] [You humans keep saying Kana this and Kana that without knowing what is really is. Weren't humans supposed to learn about things properly?]

200576.name: 세자루의 검
200576.ability: If there are at least 3 allied Followers, 3 random allied Followers get ATK changed to half the combined ATK of the Followers out of those 3 with the highest ATK and the lowest ATK (rounding up).
200576.flavor: [The 3 swords passed down through the Pacifica family are not made of Talentium. They are another key to Kana. Only the ancient god knows the secret of those swords.]

200577.name: 가문의 비난
200577.ability: A random Follower in your Hand with "Maid" in the name is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/DEF/STA changed to the lowest ATK/DEF/STA on the enemy Field.
200577.flavor: [The Mother Demon opened the door to Kana. Linia, where is the sacrifice to close the door to Kana?] [Don't bother looking for Cinia. I will close the door to Kana.]

200570.name: 파멸의 소용돌이
200570.ability: All Followers get STA decreased by the number of allied Followers with "GS" in the name. All Followers get ATK increased by twice the STA reduction.
200570.flavor: [I thank you for your hard work until now, soldiers of the GS. Now, you can all rest peacefully.]

200571.name: 강림
200571.ability: If you have a Darklore Character and there are any enemy Spells, all enemy Followers get ATK -3/STA -3. If there are no enemy Spells, your Character gets LIFE -2.
200571.flavor: [Ah... I want you all to feel this, too. This ecstasy...]

200572.name: 리니아의 세계
200572.ability: All allied cards get SIZE decreased and DEF increased by half the number of factions present on both Fields (rounding up). All allied Followers get ATK/STA increased by the number of factions present on both Fields. A number of cards equal to twice the number of factions present on both Fields are sent from the top of your Grave to the bottom of your Deck. This card is removed from the game.
200572.flavor: [Being different isn't wrong. I just want a world where everyone can coexist peacefully.]

200573.name: 목격
200573.ability: All Followers get all their skills except their first skills removed. All allied Followers get ATK/DEF/STA increased by the number of skills they each lost.
200573.flavor: [They witnessed a fight while shopping. Actually, they could have found a clue at that time.]

200026.name: Meadow Leisure
200026.ability: A random allied Follower gets ATK increased by the number of allied cards minus 1 and gets STA increased by 1 plus the number of allied cards.
200026.flavor: [It's thanks to the efforts of you knights that we have this time to relax. Never forget the efforts that brought about this peace.]

200027.name: Knight's Letter
200027.ability: If your Field and the enemy Field contain the same number of cards, two random enemy cards are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
200027.flavor: [All the countries have been closing their borders lately. It's a rather strange feeling... like trying to concentrate the flow of water towards one place... Please deliver this letter to the Empire.]

200024.name: Healing Magic
200024.ability: Your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of cards in your Hand.
200024.flavor: [The foundation of healing magic is a strong wish. Think of something you want to protect. The magic part comes later.]

200025.name: Sky Surprise
200025.ability: The first allied Follower is deactivated and sent to the enemy Field. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by half of the sent Follower's SIZE (rounding up), and then the sent Follower gets SIZE =1.
200025.flavor: [The thing that fell from the sky was a girl. Luthica examined the girl for a necklace, but there was nothing like a necklace that allowed flight.]

200022.name: Close Encounter
200022.ability: Two random allied Crux Followers get ATK +2/STA +2.
200022.flavor: [Kyaa!! The vampire called from behind. "Are you looking for the master of the Flinas? I can guide you. Of course, I don't think I can hold out until we get there. Heehee."]

200023.name: Entry Denied
200023.ability: The first allied Follower and the first enemy Follower with the highest SIZE are deactivated.
200023.flavor: [Ehh? Why? Why can't I come in?] [We've been ordered by Crux to not let anyone in.]

200020.name: Forced Entry
200020.ability: Cards in Slot 3 in both Fields have their SIZES compared. The card with the smaller SIZE is destroyed. If both cards have the same SIZE, the card in Slot 3 in the enemy Field is sent to the Grave.
200020.flavor: [When the Scarlet Mage stepped off the final step of the stairs, we saw him. Beyond here was the entrance to the ruins. Everyone, including myself, was struck to the ground. After the flash of light came a peal of thunder, leaving us in agony.]

200021.name: Saint's Blessing
200021.ability: Allied Followers with "Knight" in the name get STA +3. If your Character has "Luthica" in the name, the affected cards get an additional ATK +3.
200021.flavor: [No matter what, your determination to protect must remain strong. Strengthen your heart!]

200028.name: Shield Break
200028.ability: The first enemy Follower with the highest DEF greater than 0 gets DEF decreased by twice its DEF.
200028.flavor: [My sword couldn't possibly be blunt!] [Kyaa! Senpai! The equipment!!]

200029.name: Sentry's Testimony
200029.ability: A random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of Followers in your Grave with "Knight" in the name, and then all cards in your Grave are removed from the game.
200029.flavor: [Please tell me more, what kind of monster exactly did the Scarlet Mage summon?]

200596.name: 복수의 저주
200596.ability: The first 5 cards in your Grave are removed from the game and the allied Follower with the lowest STA is deactivated. If this happens, the enemy Follower with the highest STA is deactivated. Those two Followers get STA decreased by the difference in their STA. All enemy cards get STA decreased by half the STA reduction (rounding down).
200596.flavor: [Only those with a strong resolve to curse someone can use curses.]

200597.name: 빛의 검
200597.ability: If the Turn Number, your Shuffles, and this card's Slot number are all odd, a random Spell in your Grave is sent to your Field. This card is removed from the game.
200597.flavor: [If you imbue it with magic, this hilt will create an amazing sword. According to ancient literature, this was an artifact used by a golden-haired boy.]

200594.name: 임금체불
200594.ability: A random enemy Follower gets ATK/DEF/STA changed to their original values. A random allied Follower gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the respective increase in each stat.
200594.flavor: [If Rose isn't coming back, then who do I get my pay from?]

200595.name: 해변조사
200595.ability: A random allied Academy Follower gets SIZE -1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. A random enemy Follower gets SIZE +1/ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1.
200595.flavor: [I still don't know the names of those clear gems I saw that day.]

200592.name: 백일몽
200592.ability: All Followers in your Deck get SIZE -1/ATK -1/STA -1.
200592.flavor: [You are under arrest!!] [Heh heh heh...] [What kind of dream is she having?] [No clue...]

200593.name: 낮잠
200593.ability: Two random cards in the enemy Deck get their SIZE doubled. Two random cards in your Deck get their SIZE halved (rounding down).

200590.name: 감춰진 힘의 개방
200590.ability: All allied Followers get ATK/STA increased by the number of different Seasons present on your Field. All enemy Followers get ATK/STA decreased by the number of different Seasons present on the enemy Field.
200590.flavor: [The abandoned princess of blood, Iri Flina, opened the gate to power for the sake of her beloved.]

200591.name: 꽃놀이
200591.ability: All allied Followers get STA increased by 2 plus the number of cards in your Hand.
200591.flavor: [My mother obtained these clothes from a gate a long time ago... They seem like they would go well with flower viewing.]

200598.name: 실수
200598.ability: The last card in the enemy Deck is sent to the Grave. Two random allied Followers get ATK +1/STA +2 (if the removed card was a Spell) or DEF -1 (if the removed card was a Follower).
200598.flavor: [One of the fundamentals for knights is to not let go of your sword.] [Ahhhh it slipped!]

200599.name: 민간 요법
200599.ability: Enemy cards in odd Slots are deactivated. Any deactivated Followers get ATK/STA decreased by the number of deactivated cards. Two allied Followers get ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of deactivated cards.
200599.flavor: [From ancient times, spit was used on wounds. I wonder if you could use spit on degraded Talentium as well? Huhu]

300139.name: Guide Rio
300139.ability: Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK +1~3 (randomly). // Before defending, this Follower gets STA +1~3 (randomly). // At the start of the turn, this Follower gets DEF +1.
300139.flavor: [It's been a while I've accompanied someone in the dungeon personally. How about it? It's not scary, right? Don't worry.]

300138.name: Sage Esprit
300138.ability: Before attacking, the defender loses all skills. If this happens, this Follower gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. // Before defending, the attacker loses all skills. If this happens, this Follower gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
300138.flavor: [Where did you come from? You don't look like you're from any of the villages around here.] [I'm looking for the professor.] [Professor?]

300137.name: Mediator Cabernet
300137.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Darklore Followers get ATK +2/STA +2.
300137.flavor: [Do not fight among yourselves. It is my duty to settle the fights between my compatriots.]

300136.name: Lantern Witch
300136.ability: Before attacking, this card gets DEF=0. This card gets ATK/STA increased by the difference between this card's DEF and the defender's DEF (by a maximum of 9).
300136.flavor: [It's rare to have visitors here. Your name is Asmis? The thing you seek is close, but it is in a place outside of your reach.]

300135.name: Lost Doll
300135.ability: Before defending, this card gets STA +2.
300135.flavor: [The third doll is the story of being unable to achieve a dream. The story of a forgotten, pitiful child unable to make anything of herself.]

300134.name: Dollmaster Elfin Rune
300134.ability: Before attacking, the defender's skills are all removed. If this happens, this skill is removed.
300134.flavor: [This is the story of an unfortunate dollmaking girl. The story of a girl who lost her reason for enjoyment to a revived golden-haired apparation from the past.]

300133.name: Crescent Maze
300133.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's DEF is at least 1, the defender gets DEF=0 and this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300133.flavor: [A rectangle within a rectangle within a rectangle within a rectangle within a rectangle... the control of this maze's difficulty was a failure.]

300132.name: Opera Doll
300132.flavor: [The second doll is the story of a joyful misfortune. The story of a girl who is growing past the playful years.]

300131.name: Tragedy Doll
300131.flavor: [The first doll is the story of an inescapable misfortune. The story of this poor girl.]

300130.name: Crescent Nazo
300130.flavor: [This is humiliating, I can't figure out this problem!]

200620.name: Request
200620.ability: If this card's SIZE is at least 2, this card is sent to the enemy Field, gets SIZE=1, and gets deactivated. If this card's SIZE is 1, the first Follower in the enemy Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field.
200620.flavor: [Alright, Cannelle. You want your own forest like Penika?] [Yeah! Can you give me one?] [Yes. That's not hard.] [Thanks, Cinia!]

200621.name: The door to getting a job
200621.ability: The first Academy Follower in your Deck with a SIZE of 3 or less gets SIZE +1/ATK +1/STA +2 and is sent to your Hand. If that card has "Maid" in the name, it gets an additional SIZE -1/ATK +1/DEF +2.
200621.flavor: [The maids couldn't find a job, so they went back to Cinia's mansion with the hope of getting hired again.] [Lick my feet!] [Please spare us, master Cinia!]

200622.name: Shopping
200622.ability: All allied Followers in even Slots are moved to the next empty Slots. If they weren't moved, those Followers get ATK +1/STA +1.
200622.flavor: [This is the muffler that Swimie senpai asked for.] [Cl... o... thes...]

200623.name: Rivalry
200623.ability: A random enemy Follower gets its "before attacking" skills removed. If you have a Crux Character, this effect is applied an additional time.
200623.flavor: [You're late, Miss Useless Knight.] [Can you still call us useless when you need our information to catch the culprit?]

200624.name: Sending Information
200624.ability: All allied Followers gain the skill "Before attacking, nothing happens." If you have a Crux Character, a card called "Inside Enemy" is created in the first empty Slot of your Field and at the top of your Deck.

200625.name: Alibi
200625.ability: All allied deactivated cards get reactivated. If this happens, all allied Followers get ATK +3/STA +3.
200625.flavor: [Wow... What happened here...] [After them! The culprits can't be far!]

200626.name: Still Alive
200626.ability: A random enemy Follower gets its SIZE changed to its original value. If this happens, that Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by the change in SIZE.
200626.flavor: [Now, regarding of the election of new executives...] [Hey! You idiots! I'm still alive!!!]

200627.name: Sherlock
200627.ability: All Followers in the enemy Field and Hand get TA -2. All allied Followers with "Scardel" or "Crescent" in the name get STA increased by the total STA reduction.
200627.flavor: [Don't move! Anyone who moves is the culprit! I swear on Kris's name that I'll definitely solve this case!]

200628.name: Maple Viewing
200628.ability: If the number of cards in your Hand is odd, a random Season 1 Spell is created in the first empty Slot of your Field. If it is even, a random Season 2 Spell is created in the first empty Slot of your Field.
200628.flavor: [As they looked upon the beautiful fall foliage during the autumn day, a nice breeze rustled the girls' hair.]

200629.name: Girl's Dream
200629.ability: Two random allied Followers get ATK increased by the number of cards on your Field and get STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand. The first allied Follower is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random enemy Follower is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
200629.flavor: [The souls of those girls are always so free. It's my dream to become like that, even if it's just a little bit.]

200154.name: Unity March
200154.ability: If there are at least 2 allied Crux Followers, the first allied Follower gets STA +6.
200154.flavor: [All for one and one for all. With the bond of trust, our combined strength is great!]

300304.name: Student Council Rumi
300304.ability: At the start of the turn, one random allied Follower with "Student Council" in the name gets STA +2.
300304.flavor: [What do you think, president? ...Yes? The Cook Club's snacks? Alright...]

300305.name: Library Club Jin
300305.ability: Before defending, this card gets ATK/STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand with "Library Club"  in the name minus 1. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300305.flavor: [Reading in the library is too stuffy. I want to enjoy a nice view and a refreshing wind.]

300306.name: Swimsuit Layna
300306.ability: Before defending, if this Follower's DEF is 1 or less, it gets STA +3/DEF =1.
300306.flavor: [Why do I have to change into a swimsuit in the classroom... I'll have to ask the student council myself. Hm? This mark...]

300307.name: Pizza Lady Penika
300307.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets STA -3, then this skill is removed.
300307.flavor: [This, this is a new taste! It's a food from the peninsula of the Empire! It feels like my whole body is being dyed gold!]

300300.name: Soul Conductor Charon
300300.ability: Before attacking, if the total number of cards in both Graves is 20 or less, this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the total number of cards in both Graves is more than 20, this Follower gets ATK +3/STA +3.
300300.flavor: [You're already here? Fine! You got your ticket? Hurry and step on the gas!]

120019.name: Leilang Henlifei
120019.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2 and a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -2.
120019.flavor: [Not bad. Playtime is over. I will show you why I am called the Lightning Wolf.]

300301.name: 3rd Witness Kana.DTD
300301.flavor: [People who warp time and space to create their own worlds cannot be forgiven. It is my duty to preserve the balance of worlds by erasing any unnecessary worlds.]

300609.name: 여름의 테슬라
300609.ability: Before defending, all allied Vita Followers get ATK/STA increased by this card's SIZE. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300609.flavor: [It's true that I can't swim, but... you didn't have to penalize me by making me wear something like this... what do I do if someone sees me...]

300608.name: 도망자 천리교도 에이가
300608.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's SIZE is greater than or equal to this card's SIZE, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2. If it's less than or equal to this card's SIZE, this card gets ATK +1/STA +1.

300302.name: Coin Producer Ritz
300302.ability: Before attacking, this card is swapped with the first Follower in the enemy Hand.
300302.flavor: [I will produce your ambition~ With the perfect plans, you can achieve the highest ambitions. Happy birthday!]

300601.name: 인형의 마녀
300601.ability: Before defending, if this card has any skills other than this one, it gets its original skills restored. If this happens, this card gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300601.flavor: [The Pacifica family immediately required her power to freely manipulate dolls.]

300600.name: 아르바이트 메이드
300600.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's ATK is greater than or equal to this Follower's total DEF+STA, a random allied Follower gets STA increased by this card's STA. If this happens, this skill is removed.
300600.flavor: [This is a great place for a part-time job.]

300603.name: 청십자회 서기
300603.ability: Before defending, if your Hand contains at least 4 cards, the attacker is sent to the top of the enemy Deck, then this skill is removed. If your hand contains 2 or less cards, this card is sent to the Grave.
300603.flavor: [From this point on, the Blue Cross will support Rose.]

300303.name: Blade Tutor Grace
300303.ability: Before defending, this Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2, and then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300303.flavor: [Never put your sword down! This is the basic rule of sword fighting!]

300605.name: 청십자회 로제
300605.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets DEF decreased by this card's DEF. This skill is removed. // Before defending, the attacker gets ATK/STA decreased by this card's DEF. This skill is removed. // At the start of the turn, this card's DEF is changed to its original value. This card's original skills are restored.
300605.flavor: [This, too, is what I foresaw. However, these clothes aren't what I foresaw.]

300604.name: 크룩스기사단 소피아
300604.ability: At the start of the turn, this card is destroyed. // Before defending, if you have a Crux Character, this card gets STA increased by the attacker's ATK.
300604.flavor: [I will begin the search for the magic sword.]

300607.name: 천리교도 요리사 이인자
300607.ability: Before defending, if this card's STA is higher than its original value, it gets STA=5. Your Character gets LIFE increased by half the STA reduction (rounding down, by a maximum of 9).
300607.flavor: [Schindler gave me an unknown ingredient that's supposedly good for the body and told me to put it in the food. But she told me to do it without anyone finding out. It feels like I'm doing something bad.]

300606.name: 예지의 마녀
300606.ability: Before attacking, if the total number of Followers in both Graves is at least 15, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2.
300606.flavor: [Oho~ this isn't good. The negative energy is getting stronger. We can't just wait around for an opportunity...]

100122.name: Witch Cadet Linus Falco
100122.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Deck gets ATK -1/STA -1(to a minimum of 1), then this effect is applied again. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
100122.flavor: [The chairman is a strange person. Her eyes are dead. "I had it in my hand, but nothing happened..." she said.]

100123.name: Head Knight Eisenwane
100123.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2. If your Field does not contain a Follower, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
100123.flavor: [You have nothing to do with the Empire! You can't be trusted! You can't be trusted!]

100120.name: Shaman Helena K Sink
100120.ability: At the start of the turn, all Followers in the enemy Hand and Field get ATK -1. The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK increased by 1 plus the total ATK reduction (by a maximum of 3). If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
100120.flavor: [I want people to believe me through these small miracles. I'll create a world where everyone is rewarded for their efforts.]

100121.name: Detective Asmis
100121.ability: At the start of the turn, if the top card in the enemy Deck is a Spell, it gets SIZE +1. Otherwise, the first card in your Deck gets SIZE -1; if it is a Follower, it gets an additional ATK +1/STA +1. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
100121.flavor: [The wound on her head wouldn't heal, and it would still sometimes bleed. Treanna said it was a curse.]

100126.name: Santa Luthica
100126.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2 and the first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. If the sent card belongs to your Character's faction, that Follower gets an additional DEF +1.

100127.name: Santa Iri
100127.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2 and the first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. If the sent card belongs to your Character's faction, a random Follower in your Field gets STA +2.
100127.flavor: [The sound of a bell on a starry night, everyone exchanging gifts. This request, too, was coming to an end.]

100124.name: Santa Sita
100124.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2 and the first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. If the sent card belongs to your Character's faction, your Character gets LIFE +1.
100124.flavor: [On a snowy day, Sita wore a Santa outfit at her friends' requests. Having been a long time since she'd touched something so cold, she stared vacantly out the window.]

100125.name: Santa Cinia
100125.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2 and the first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. If the sent card belongs to your Character's faction, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1.
100125.flavor: [Christmas? A day where people exchange gifts? I don't have any interest in that. This is just some clothes that Linia gave me.]

100128.name: Santa Asmis
100128.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers in your Field, a random Follower in your Hand gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers in your Hand or Field, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/STA +1. If it is a Vita Follower, a random Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/STA +1.
100128.flavor: [I'm checking the list of people who are receiving gifts. It looks like I have to deliver it to Sita first.]

100129.name: Santa Linus
100129.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers in your Field, a random Follower in your Hand gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers in your Hand or Field, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/STA +1. If it is an Academy Follower, a random Follower in your Deck gets DEF +1/STA +1.
100129.flavor: [Hmph! I won't be happy with anything you give me if you don't put your heart into it. Give me your heart.]

300739.name: Student Council Treasurer Amy
300739.ability: Before attacking, the defender's ATK/DEF/STA that are higher than their original values get ATK/DEF/STA decreased by twice the amount that each stat exceeds its original value. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300739.flavor: [What is this? What's with all these hopeless, careless, determined bills? Our whole budget has already been wiped out by tea!]

300738.name: Sighing Cook Club Director
300738.flavor: [This is a problem... I don't know what possessed Sita to buy so many snacks...]

110178.name: Disciple Josefina
110178.ability: At the start of the turn, if you have fewer Followers on your Field than the enemy, then all enemy Followers are moved to the first empty Slots on your Field and get SIZE=1. If the total SIZE of your Field is 2 or more, all allied Followers that do not have a SIZE of 1 are moved to the first empty Slots on the enemy Field and get SIZE=5. All cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: I will use your Followers. You will use my Followers.)
110178.flavor: [... Stationmaster? Where did she go?] [Location: Muspelheim 34F]

110179.name: Fulle.
110179.ability: At the start of the turn, one enemy card without "Knight" in the name gets SIZE=1 and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. All other enemy cards without "Knight" in the name are sent to the Grave. All cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: If you are not a knight, you will suffer unavoidable agony.)
110179.flavor: [What's up? Are you a knight? Ah... Stationmaster? Who's that?] [Location: Muspelheim 35F]

110174.name: Zislana.
110174.ability: At the start of the turn, all cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: Variety show.)
110174.flavor: [Where am I? Who am I? I have no idea which way is which...] [Location: Muspelheim 30F]

110175.name: Magision.
110175.ability: At the start of the turn, if there is an enemy card with a Slot number equal to the Turn Number, the enemy Character gets LIFE -8. If the Turn Number is 5, the Turn Number returns to turn 1. All cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: TICK TICK TICK TICK TICK)
110175.flavor: [The time is different... Time flows differently here than it does in the real world.] [Location: Muspelheim 31F]

110176.name: Jaina Preventer
110176.ability: At the start of the turn, all enemy Followers whose stats are higher than their original values are destroyed. All cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: A cornered stone meets the mason's chisel.)
110176.flavor: [This sword... it feels like it possesses mystical powers.] [Location: Muspelheim 32F]

110177.name: Disciple Johanna
110177.ability: At the start of the turn, all cards in the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of sent cards, and your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of sent cards. All cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: Throw them out.)
110177.flavor: [Truthfully, it's impossible to explain with words alone...] [Location: Muspelheim 33F]

110170.name: Axis Wing Natura
110170.ability: At the start of the turn, the following effect is applied twice: "A random Follower in the enemy Hand gets ATK -2/STA -2."
110170.flavor: [I see something below. That midget is the new captain of the Crux knights?]

110171.name: Axis Wing Ignis
110171.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is even, your Character gets LIFE +2. If the Turn Number is odd, the enemy Character gets LIFE -2.
110171.flavor: [Natura. Don't say that with a calm face. The midget isn't angry.]

110172.name: Axis Wing Cherum
110172.ability: At the start of the turn, all Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of empty Slots in the enemy Field minus 1.
110172.flavor: [These ruins are the Empire's now. We can do whatever we want. Where is the key?]

110173.name: Amethystar.
110173.ability: At the start of the turn, one of the following effects is applied randomly. 1: All enemy Followers get ATK -3/STA -3. 2: All allied Followers get ATK +3/STA +3. 3: The enemy Character gets LIFE -2. 4: Your Character gets LIFE +2. 5: All cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: Good or bad.)
110173.flavor: [I've found what I've been looking for. There's nothing more exciting than roaming around. My inquisitive mind has been sparked. Even if it rains...] [Location: Muspelheim 29F]

300726.name: Maid Arte
300726.flavor: [Sister Seron! What's it like working at master Linia's mansion? I want to be recognized like you so I can work at master Linia's mansion, too!]

110196.name: Proctor Iris
110196.ability: At the start of the turn, your Character gets LIFE +1.
110196.flavor: [Concentrate. Concentration is the key to controlling Talentium.]

110197.name: Proctor R. Margaret
110197.ability: At the start of the turn, two random allied Followers get ATK +1.
110197.flavor: [Can you follow my movements? My movements have a fixed pattern to them.]

110194.name: Proctor Margaret
110194.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1.
110194.flavor: [In order to use Talentium effectively, you need a flexible mind.]

110195.name: Proctor Coy
110195.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA -1.
110195.flavor: [Those who have skill with Talentium should not be lazy in improving their abilities.]

110192.name: 2S Spy Forty
110192.ability: At the start of the turn, the cards in Slots 3,4,5 of the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave.
110192.flavor: [By passing as a teacher, I've discovered my talent at teaching.]

110193.name: 2S Agent Ice
110193.flavor: [The client was anonymous, and because of this request, the Vita student Weekly was harmed.]

110190.name: 2S Casey
110190.ability: At the start of the turn, if the total SIZE of your Hand and the enemy Hand are both odd or both even, your Character gets LIFE +3. Otherwise, the enemy Character gets LIFE -3.
110190.flavor: [No matter who I meet, my work always feels fresh.]

110191.name: 2S Infiltrator Twenty
110191.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Character has less LIFE than the enemy Character, your Character's LIFE and the enemy Character's LIFE are switched.
110191.flavor: [This household is strange. Something is different. What are the identities of this house's residents?]

300722.name: Girl of Gray, Ann
300722.ability: Before attacking, the enemy Deck is completely shuffled. The defender's ATK/DEF/STA are changed to random values between 0 and twice their current values.
300722.flavor: [The fluttering of the bird's wings stirred ripples within the heart of the girl who had fallen into the depths. Those waves would never settle down.]

110198.name: Proctor P. Coy
110198.ability: At the start of the turn, two random enemy Followers get STA -1.
110198.flavor: [Try using your maximum power. I will measure that power.]

110199.name: Proctor G. Iris
110199.ability: At the start of the turn, your Character gets LIFE +1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
110199.flavor: [You can train to improve your concentration. It's important to never give up.]

300458.name: Scardel Sion Rion Flina
300458.flavor: [Riooon! Stop that! My skirt...] [It's fun. Even though it looks nice, you still get embarrassed.]

300459.name: Myo Informant
300459.ability: Before defending, this Follower gets STA +1. This effect is increased in dungeons. (Bonus effect: This Follower instead gets STA +3.)
300459.flavor: [If you require aid, we will provide it. The Myo Clan can move freely through the shadows.]

300720.name: 고대의 코넌드럼
300720.ability: Before attacking, up to 5 cards in your Grave and the enemy Grave are removed from the game. This card gets ATK/STA increased by half the number of removed cards (rounding up). This skill is removed.
300720.flavor: [This super logical slab seems like it's alive and moving! What's written here? It says, "Please wait a moment." What could this mean?]

300450.name: Heat Lady
300450.flavor: [I'm a slow starter. I'm gradually starting to burn brightly.]

300451.name: Lady Cutie
300451.ability: Before defending, this Follower gets STA +1. This effect is increased in dungeons. (Bonus effect: This Follower instead gets STA +3.)
300451.flavor: [People always tell me that I'm cute, but... I would rather them call me pretty.]

300452.name: Lady Detective
300452.ability: At the start of the turn, two random enemy Followers get ATK -1/STA -1.
300452.flavor: [I can discover anything once I set my sights upon it. That is, as long I deem it worthy.]

300453.name: Southern Lady
300453.ability: Before attacking, the defender and Followers neighboring the defender all get STA decreased by half this Follower's ATK (rounding down) divided by 1 plus the number of Followers neighboring the defender (rounding down). // Before defending, if this Follower belongs to your Character's faction, the attacker gets ATK -1/STA -1.
300453.flavor: [I like this warmth. Working is nice, but I need rest, too.]

300454.name: Executioner Knight
300454.flavor: [Do you wish to test your luck?]

300455.name: Crux Knight Prea
300455.ability: Before defending, this Follower gets STA +1. This effect is increased in dungeons. (Bonus effect: This Follower instead gets STA +3.)
300455.flavor: [This sound will wake people up no matter the circumstances. It's a Pavlovian response that you'll never forget.]

300456.name: Crux Knight Kraros
300456.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is even, all allied Crux Followers get ATK +2/STA +2.
300456.flavor: [You will not see the end of this day!]

300457.name: Crux Knight Oclette
300457.ability: Before attacking, the defender gains the following skill: "Before defending, this Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1." If the defender has 3 skills, the defender gets ATK -2/STA -2. // Before defending, if this Follower belongs to your Character's faction, the attacker gets ATK -1/STA -1.
300457.flavor: [The sword is a reflection of its owner.]

100238.name: Halloween Rose
100238.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Character's LIFE is at least 12, the first two Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +1. If your Character's LIFE is less than 12, you get Shuffles=0. There is an additional hidden effect. (Bonus effect: At the start of turn 1, all Followers in your Deck with "Rose" in the name get STA +1)
100238.flavor: [I heard this is a day where you eat candy. Is there another meaning to it? What a fascinating day.]

100239.name: Halloween Helena
100239.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Character's LIFE is at least 12, all enemy Followers get ATK -1, then the first Follower in your Hand gets ATK +2. If your Character's LIFE is less than 12, you get Shuffles=0. There is an additional hidden effect. (Bonus effect: At the start of turn 1, all Followers in your Deck with "Helena" in the name get STA +1)
100239.flavor: [Are these clothes... really God's will...? They're really embarrassing...]

100236.name: Halloween Asmis
100236.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Character's LIFE is at least 12, the 1st and 3rd cards in your Deck get SIZE -1. If your Character's LIFE is less than 12, you get Shuffles=0. There is an additional hidden effect. (Bonus effect: At the start of turn 1, all Followers in your Deck with "Asmis" in the name get STA +1)
100236.flavor: [H.. Huh? It won't wrap up this way? What do  do? I'm running out of time...]

100237.name: Halloween Linus
100237.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Character's LIFE is at least 12, the first two Followers in the enemy Deck get ATK -1/STA -1. If your Character's LIFE is less than 12, you get Shuffles=0. There is an additional hidden effect. (Bonus effect: At the start of turn 1, all Followers in your Deck with "Linus" in the name get STA +1)
100237.flavor: [Hey! I'm the moonlight magician! Tonight, I will steal your precious thing!]

100234.name: Halloween Luthica
100234.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Character's LIFE is at least 12, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +3. If your Character's LIFE is less than 12, you get Shuffles=0. There is an additional hidden effect. (Bonus effect: At the start of turn 1, all Followers in your Deck with "Luthica" in the name get STA +1)
100234.flavor: [Huhu~ This concept is a dark witch! Girls like to be naughty sometimes, too!]

100235.name: Halloween Iri
100235.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Character's LIFE is at least 12, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1 and a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1. If your Character's LIFE is less than 12, you get Shuffles=0. There is an additional hidden effect. (Bonus effect: At the start of turn 1, all Followers in your Deck with "Iri" in the name get STA +1)
100235.flavor: [Shion and Rion want me to go get candy with them... It's annoying, but I have to go...]

100232.name: Halloween Sita
100232.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Character's LIFE is at least 12, the enemy Followers in Slots 1,2,3 get ATK -1/STA -2. If your Character's LIFE is less than 12, you get Shuffles=0. There is an additional hidden effect. (Bonus effect: At the start of turn 1, all Followers in your Deck with "Sita" in the name get STA +1)
100232.flavor: [If I wear this... people give me candy... Are these clothes magical?]

100233.name: Halloween Cinia
100233.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Character's LIFE is at least 12, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -2/STA -3. If your Character's LIFE is less than 12, you get Shuffles=0. There is an additional hidden effect. (Bonus effect: At the start of turn 1, all Followers in your Deck with "Cinia" in the name get STA +1)
100233.flavor: [You dare to dress me in clothes like this? But I don't mind the red...]

100230.name: Wedding Dress Rose
100230.ability: At the start of the turn, if there are five cards in your Hand, the first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK/STA increased by the number of empty Slots in your Hand (by a maximum of 2). If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
100230.flavor: [I'm wearing these clothes again... I feel happy every time I wear them.]

100231.name: Wedding Dress Helena
100231.ability: At the start of the turn, all Followers in the enemy Hand and Field get ATK -1. The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK increased by 1 plus the total ATK reduction (by a maximum of 3). If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
100231.flavor: [I have always devoted myself to God's will... Could this also be God's will?]

200369.ability: Two random allied Vita Followers without "Student Council" or "Library Club" in the name get the following effects depending on who wins the coin flip. You win: ATK +3/DEF+1/STA+1. Opponent wins: ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +3.

200368.name: 인스피레이션
200368.ability: All cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck, then the first 2 Followers and Spells are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand.
200368.flavor: [The result of thinking has to be inspiration. If you're just thinking vacantly, then it isn't really thinking.]

200365.name: Think Twice Seal
200365.ability: Two random enemy Followers have their ATK/DEF/STA changed to their original values for any stat greater than its original value.
200365.flavor: [I already know what to do now that Rio is in this state. Even if I didn't, I would find out soon enough.]

200364.name: Nether Cafe
200364.ability: The first card in your Hand is removed from the game. If this happens, a random enemy Follower is destroyed.
200364.flavor: [Before you go, why don't you have something to eat? After all, it's something you'll never get to taste before dying. Have one bowl, then you can go. Ah, can vampires eat human food?]

200367.name: 휴가계획
200367.ability: The first Follower in the enemy Hand is changed into "Game Starter".
200367.flavor: [Since summer is approaching, what do you want to do? The sea? Mountains? River? Wherever you go, make sure to enjoy yourself.]

200366.name: Time Spiral
200366.ability: All enemy Followers with ATK/DEF/STA higher than their original values get ATK/DEF/STA decreased by twice the amount that each stat exceeds its original value.
200366.flavor: [Wow~ Sister Sage! How do you do this?] [It's simple, but it's impossible for you.] [Wow, look at this, my hand! My hand!]

200361.name: Lonely Operation
200361.ability: All allied Followers with "GS," "Aletheian," or "Apostle" in the name get ATK +3.
200361.flavor: [She'll gradually lose her footing like this. The moment she feels lonely, she will let her guard down.]

200360.name: Sudden News
200360.ability: If the enemy Hand contains a Spell, all enemy Followers get ATK -4/STA -4. Otherwise, all allied Followers get ATK -2/STA -2.
200360.flavor: [What do you mean, quartermaster? A state of emergency? Extended service?!]

200363.name: Ritual's Final Step
200363.ability: The last Follower in your Deck is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random allied Follower gets SIZE -1/ATK +4/STA +4.
200363.flavor: [To complete the ritual to summon the forgotten ancient god, you must prepare a vessel for the god to descend into.] [You are not a sacrifice. This is a sacred ritual to bring prosperity to this land, and you are the heroine.]

200362.name: Dream Curse
200362.ability: All allied Darklore Followers are deactivated. A random enemy card with a SIZE less than or equal to the number of deactivated Followers is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck (if it is a Follower) or sent to the Grave (if it is a Spell).
200362.flavor: [Eisenwane had a nightmare. She saw herself being gripped for the first time by the terrible curse.]

110220.name: Wedding Jaina
110220.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2. If the Turn Number is even, the Follower gets an additional STA +1. Your Character gets LIFE +1.
110220.flavor: [This is different than the dress I had in mind. Is this your preference? It's not bad. I'm never disappointed by your opinion, Linia.]

110221.name: Wedding Clarice
110221.ability: At the start of the turn, allied cards with "Homunculus Escort" in the name are sent to the Grave. A Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/ATK =5/DEF =0/STA =5. Your Character gets LIFE +1.
110221.flavor: [I got this as a reward for the wedding event. Does it suit me? I really wanted you to see it, Luthica. You're the first person that I cared about.

110222.name: Wedding Rihanna
110222.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in your Field. The Follower gets the following effects applied depending on its new Slot number. 1~3: STA +3. 3~5: ATK +2. Your Character gets LIFE +1.
110222.flavor: [Thank you... I'll never forget your wishes. This is an unforgettable day of this year's festival.]

110223.name: Wedding Layna
110223.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets STA +3 and is sent to the top of your Deck. Your Character gets LIFE +1.
110223.flavor: [Am I really alright? Even if you say so... I'll help you in the future.]

110224.name: Linia's Tailor
110224.ability: At the start of the turn, a random card in your Hand is sent to the first empty Slot of the enemy Field and deactivated. A random card in the enemy Hand is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field and deactivated.
110224.flavor: [I designed some new clothes. Will you try them on?]

110225.name: Child Cinia
110225.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets one of the following effects applied depending on its SIZE: 3 or more: ATK -2, Less than 3: STA -3
110225.flavor: [Hm.. Hmph! Are you going to ignore just because I'm small? I'll get mad if you do that! You better watch out!]

110226.name: Dress Cinia
110226.ability: At the start of the turn, the first enemy Follower with a SIZE that is less than or equal to half (rounding up) of the total SIZE of the first two cards in your Hand gets ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2.
110226.flavor: [I don't usually wear dresses like this, but since I was attending your party, it couldn't be helped!]

110227.name: Chess Cinia
110227.ability: At the start of the turn, the first enemy Follower with the highest SIZE gets ATK/STA decreased by half (rounding up) of the combined SIZE of the first allied Follower and a Follower in Slot 4 in your Field.
110227.flavor: [Checkmate, that's the end. Ah~ it was boring because you were too weak. Is there any opponent that can give me exciting games like my sister did?]

110228.name: Swimwear Cinia
110228.ability: At the start of the turn, enemy Followers with a SIZE less than your first Follower's SIZE get ATK -1/STA -2
110228.flavor: [It's not much compared to ours, but I'll let it pass.]

110229.name: Visitor Cinia
110229.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets one of the following effects applied depending on the faction of the first card in your Hand: Vita: ATK +1/STA +2, Academy: STA +3, Crux: DEF +1, Darklore: SIZE -2 (to a minimum of 1).
110229.flavor: [This... this is the public school's uniform? It's... it's not bad! For a commoner's uniform, it's a decent design...]

300729.name: Knight Engineer
300729.ability: Before defending, this card's DEF is set equal to the attacker's DEF.
300729.flavor: [They say our national strength is our stamina, but isn't it our charm?]

100058.name: Miracle Panda Panica
100058.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, two random allied Followers get ATK +1. If the Turn Number is even, one random allied Follower gets STA +2.
100058.flavor: [I'm just coming with you for a little bit! I'll never like you! I'm only moving in out of necessity!]

100059.name: Child Vernika
100059.ability: At the start of the turn, the first card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, the first enemy Follower with the highest STA gets DEF decreased by half of the sent card's SIZE (by a maximum of 3, rounding up).
100059.flavor: [Mommy! Can you take me to the library? There's nothing left to read at home! I can even count all the books at home! There are 103,000 books at home! Right?]

100052.name: Child Luthica
100052.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Crux Follower in your Field gets one of the following effects applied depending on its SIZE: 3 or more: ATK +2, 3 or less: STA +3
100052.flavor: [When she first entered the knights, Luthica was very wary of others. She would wake up immediately upon hearing any unfamiliar footsteps.]

100053.name: Child Iri
100053.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -2. If the number of cards in your Hand is even, it gets an additional DEF -1.
100053.flavor: [Ire turned away so her daughter wouldn't see her tears. "I'm sorry, Iri, I'm your mother, so... I hope you grow up to be a strong child that nobody can ignore."]

100050.name: Child Sita
100050.ability: At the start of the turn, the enemy Follower in Slot 2 gets STA -2. The first enemy Follower gets STA -1. A random enemy Follower gets STA -2.
100050.flavor: [This girl was found in an alley on a rainy day. She gazed with blank eyes at the puppies that wanted her bread.]

100051.name: Child Cinia
100051.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets one of the following effects applied depending on its SIZE: 3 or more: ATK -2, 3 or less: STA -3
100051.flavor: [Hm.. Hmph! Are you going to ignore just because I'm small? I'll get mad if you do that! You better watch out!]

100056.name: Hot Springs Luthica
100056.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2 if it has at least 1 DEF. Otherwise, it gets DEF +1/STA +2.

100057.name: Hot Springs Iri
100057.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA -4 if it has at least 10 STA. Otherwise, it gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -2.
100057.flavor: [I used to come to the hot springs with my mother, too. I was most happy while we leisurely spent our time together. I wish I could return to that time...]

100054.name: Hot Springs Sita
100054.ability: At the start of the turn, enemy Followers in Slots 2, 3, and 4 get STA -2, and a random enemy Follower gets STA -1.
100054.flavor: [Is somewhere there? I can sense someone's presence...]

100055.name: Hot Springs Cinia
100055.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -2/STA -2 if it has 0 or less DEF. Otherwise, it gets DEF -2/STA -1.
100055.flavor: [It has a different kind of beauty than the mansion. Alright, it was worth coming.]

200109.name: The Crescent Enigmas
200109.ability: Two random Darklore cards in your Hand are sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random allied Follower gets ATK increased by the difference between its ATK and STA.
200109.flavor: [... It's really hard. Is this really possible?]

200108.name: Vivid World of Kana
200108.ability: If the first two cards in your Deck belong to the same faction as your Character, they are placed in the first empty Slots of your Field (each card is checked separately). If they do not belong to the same faction as your Character, they are sent to the Grave. The sent cards get SIZE changed equal to this card's SIZE. This card is removed from the game.
200108.flavor: [It was a captivating world. A land without lies. This was the place that I had been pursuing.]

200101.name: Dress Up Change
200101.ability: The first allied Follower with "Student Council Maron" or "Seeker Smartyrain" in the name is sent to your Grave, and then a corresponding card in your Deck with "Dress Up Maron" or "Dress Up Smartylane" in the name is sent to your first empty Slot. That Follower gets SIZE =5/ATK +2/STA +4.
200101.flavor: [2634-4855..! Change! Dress up! Release the chains of destiny!]

200100.name: Uniform Tweak
200100.ability: Two random allied Vita Followers get ATK increased by twice their DEF and STA decreased by half of their DEF (rounding down).
200100.flavor: [This school's uniform has no sense to it! I'll modify it real quick!]

200103.name: Unionize
200103.ability: The first enemy card with a SIZE equal to the sum of this card's SIZE and the number of empty Slots in your Hand is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
200103.flavor: [We will struggle to achieve our goals! I will fight! This place is the hell of the Pacifica estate.]

200102.name: Over the Wall
200102.ability: The first allied Vita Follower is moved to Slot 5 in your Field and gets ATK/STA increased by the total SIZE of cards in Slots 2 and 4 in your Field.
200102.flavor: [A world is waiting for me beyond this wall! I'll be back, Asmis!]

200105.name: Adjustment
200105.ability: If there are any allied Followers, the first card in your Hand is sent to the Grave, and then for each remaining card in your Hand, a random card in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random enemy Follower gets ATK decreased by the number of cards in your Hand, and then this card is removed from the game.
200105.flavor: [Hm~ Your target is a little unreasonable. I'll adjust it for you.]

200104.name: Tea Time
200104.ability: Two random allied Academy Followers get ATK/STA increased by their difference in SIZE (by a maximum of 4).
200104.flavor: [Are the cookies baked? Is the fruit ready? She's too whimsical, suddenly deciding to go on a picnic... Ahh! This kitchen is hell right now! After this is over, will we be able to enjoy some juice?]

200107.name: Brilliant Brain
200107.ability: If you have a Crux Character, a random enemy Spell is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If this happens, the first Follower in your Hand gets ATK/STA increased by the sent card's SIZE.
200107.flavor: [Endless research... when this work is over, is there any hope of getting a good rest?]

200106.name: Education Results
200106.ability: The first Crux card in your Hand is sent to your Grave. If this happens, a random allied Crux Follower gets ATK +4/STA +4.

200299.name: Producing
200299.ability: Spells named "Good Job" are created in all empty Slots in both Fields and deactivated.
200299.flavor: [The job of managing all the maids' schedules. This shouldn't be a maid's job, so she feels doubtful about it.]

200298.name: Destroy Evidence
200298.ability: All cards in the enemy Grave are removed from the game.
200298.flavor: [When handling work, the most important point is to never leave any evidence.]

200291.name: Forming the Resistance
200291.ability: Two cards named "GS Scout" and "Aletheian B-NA" are created in your Grave, the enemy Grave, and the bottom of your Deck.
200291.flavor: [The Aletheian ace, Schindler K Eru, joined forces with the GS in the name of a resistance. Their common goal was the destruction of the Crux.]

200290.name: Dream
200290.ability: If there are at least three Followers in your Field, the first Follower in the enemy Field with the highest ATK gets ATK changed to equal its original value.
200290.flavor: [It is natural for people who have been sitting and listening to others speak for a long time to feel the desire to sleep.]

200293.name: Last One
200293.flavor: [Was the answer that Conundrum picked the correct one!?! We'll find out in 60 seconds!]

200292.name: Suggested Reading
200292.ability: All Followers in your Field get STA -5.
200292.flavor: [This book is very interesting. If you start reading it, you'll never want to leave this place!]

200295.name: Book Meets Girl
200295.ability: All Followers in your Field get DEF doubled. All Followers in the enemy Hand and Field lose all skills.
200295.flavor: [These books are truly the world's treasures. These precious words mean everything to me!]

200294.name: Spearhead
200294.ability: All Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/STA halved (rounding up.)
200294.flavor: [To be righteous means to have no openings.]

200297.name: Perfect Sleep
200297.ability: All cards in your Hand and Field are sent to the top of your Deck. All cards in the enemy Field are deactivated.

200296.name: Wrathful Reversal
200296.ability: All Followers in your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. All Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2.
200296.flavor: [I've been by myself every since I was born! How could a person who has never mingled with others and always remained alone ever hope for another person's warmth!]

200569.name: 토사구팽
200569.ability: A random enemy card whose SIZE is less than or equal to this card's SIZE is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
200569.flavor: [The GS, who were unable to obtain anything in the end, became sacrifices. Sacrifices for the Mother Demon's revival...]

200568.name: 자매의 재회
200568.ability: The following effects are applied depending on the number of allied Crux Followers. 1: A random enemy Follower gets ATK/DEF/STA decreased by the number of empty Slots on your Field. 2: All allied Followers get ATK +2/STA +2. 3 or more: All allied Followers get ATK/STA increased by half your total Field SIZE (rounding down).
200568.flavor: [Cinia... Sorry I'm late. I've missed you.] [Sis...ter?]

200563.name: 차원역행
200563.ability: The first enemy Follower whose total ATK/DEF/STA is equal to its original total ATK/DEF/STA is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
200563.flavor: [Do not open any dimensional rifts!] [Who are you?] [My name is DTD, from the space time police.]

200562.name: 두번째 조우
200562.ability: If you have 0 Shuffles, you get Shuffles=1. The last two cards in your Deck are sent to the top of your Deck. Any sent Spells get SIZE -1 and any sent Followers get ATK +1/STA +1.
200562.flavor: [Iri... Why are you fighting...? And you...] [Si... Sita?!]

200561.name: 아스미스의 능력
200561.ability: A random allied Follower gets ATK/STA changed to 2 plus their original values and DEF changed to its original value minus 1.
200561.flavor: [H... huh? Where's that ingot that she stole?] [Huhu... You didn't know about my power!]

200560.name: 또다른 탐정의 지원
200560.ability: If your Deck contains a card named "Secret Exploration", that card is sent to the top of your Deck. If this card is the only card on your Field, the first two cards in your Deck are sent to your Field.
200560.flavor: [Are you Asmis? I'm here to help you!] [How... How could this happen...]

200567.name: 단결
200567.ability: A random allied Crux Follower gets its skills removed and gains the following ability: "Before defending, the attacker is removed from the game. This card is sent to the Grave."
200567.flavor: [We don't know what the Empire's goals are. Wouldn't the best course of action be to drive her out?]

200566.name: 반격의 시작
200566.ability: All Followers on both Fields lose all "before attacking" skills.
200566.flavor: [Eisenwane, hurry up and return to the Empire!] [Wait! Let's talk! Let's talk!]

200565.name: 어긋난 조각들
200565.ability: If you have an Academy Character, the first card in the enemy Deck that does not belong to the enemy Character's faction is removed from the game, then this card is created at the top of the enemy Deck. If you do not have an Academy Character, your Character gets LIFE +1.
200565.flavor: [One by one, things are falling apart. Cinia and Rose will be here soon.]

200564.name: 셧다운
200564.ability: A random enemy Follower whose ATK/DEF/STA are higher than their original values gets one of those stats changed to its original value.
200564.flavor: [What are you doing to my sister?!] [What a scary sister. Don't worry, I just severed her link between whatever was controlling her.]

200035.name: Sacrifice
200035.ability: Your Character gets LIFE -1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -4.
200035.flavor: [This is the greatest sacrifice of all... just by offering something to a formless god, you can obtain immense power... How about it? Do you want to try? Devouring your own blood...]

200034.name: Blood Target
200034.ability: The first allied Darklore Follower gets STA =1. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the STA reduction (by a maximum of 10).
200034.flavor: [Don't think that drinking blood is such a simple thing. We know the value of blood better than anyone else.]

200037.name: Pass the Blood
200037.ability: A Darklore Follower in Slot 3 in your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the combined DEF of all allied Followers (by a maximum of 5).

200036.name: Full Moon Power
200036.ability: All allied Followers with "Crescent", "Scardel", or "Flina" in the name get ATK +3.
200036.flavor: [When the full moon rises, the power of darkness will be at its peak.]

200031.name: Flina's Command
200031.ability: Two random allied Darklore Followers get STA +3.
200031.flavor: [To the members of the Flina family, head Luna Flina's words are absolute. Her words have the same power as a spell.]

200030.name: Pacifism
200030.ability: All allied Followers and enemy cards are deactivated. All allied Crux Followers get SIZE -1/ATK +2/STA +2.
200030.flavor: [Isn't peace the best answer? Isn't it?]

200033.name: Vampiric Rites
200033.ability: All allied Followers get stats decreased to SIZE =1/ATK =1/STA =1. The first allied Darklore Follower with the lowest SIZE gets SIZE/ATK/STA increased by the total that each was decreased, respectively.
200033.flavor: [What? What did you expect vampiric rites to look like? I'm not like those savage vampires.]

200032.name: Blood Reversal
200032.ability: Two random allied Darklore Followers get ATK +2/STA +2.
200032.flavor: [Blood reversal, that's how we describe it. A state of extreme fury... it's a difficult thing to explain.]

200039.name: Forced Confinement
200039.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, the first enemy Follower with the highest STA is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. Your Character gets LIFE decreased by half of the sent card's SIZE (rounding up).
200039.flavor: [Didn't we decide to band together and protect each other because we could never coexist with the light? Why are you afraid of yourselves and the existence of others?]

200038.name: Overwhelm
200038.ability: Enemy Followers with a total DEF+STA that are higher than the enemy Character's LIFE get DEF decreased by half of the enemy Character's LIFE (rounding down).
200038.flavor: [Get out of here... you have no right to stand in my path. Stop dripping that rotten blood and disappear.]

200585.name: 카나의 개방
200585.ability: In order to invoke this card's power, Kana's seal must first be undone. (If there are at least 3 cards in your Grave with "Kana" in the name, 3 of those cards are copied to your Field.)
200585.flavor: [The Mother Demon opened the door known to everyone as the door to Kana, but it wasn't the Kana that everyone had imagined. It was a place of infinite darkness. Existences emptier than nothingness began to pour out.]

200584.name: 제단의 의식
200584.ability: A random enemy Spell is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. All enemy cards are deactivated.
200584.flavor: [Gem Gir Gan... The two keys will become one and purify this disrupted world.]

200587.name: 비밀의 화원
200587.ability: All allied Followers with "Lady" in the name get SIZE -1/ATK +1 if their SIZE is at least 3. If their SIZE is 3 or less, they get STA increased by their own SIZE. This card is deactivated and remains on the Field.
200587.flavor: [...Tomo] [Lily...] [You're 26 years old, Lilianna. If you've failed with Y, then you should come to the world of X.]

200586.name: 매장도서관
200586.ability: The first enemy Spell whose SIZE is less than the number of Followers in the bottom 4 cards in your Deck is removed from the game. The first card in your Deck called "Finding Library" is sent to the top of your Deck.
200586.flavor: [An enormous place that exists in the basement of Vita Public School's library. The number of discovered books is in the tens of thousands, which is already more than twice as many as Vita's library. However, the end of the underground library has yet to be discovered.]

200581.name: 강제귀환
200581.ability: The first allied Follower with skills gets its skills removed and sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, all enemy Followers with skills and one random enemy Spell are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
200581.flavor: [From now on, we will look upon the world at an even level, but is that really what you want?] [The previously closed doors to the Empire were opened.]

200580.name: 개량형 탈렌티움
200580.ability: A random allied Follower gets one of the following skills randomly. "Before attacking, this card gets ATK +3." "Before attacking, this card gets ATK -1." "Before attacking, this card gets STA +3."
200580.flavor: [The Talentium that we use is an imitation. As a result, it has side effects. But, I wonder what would happen if I throw this medicine in with that imitation Talentium?]

200583.name: 이주의 권유
200583.ability: If there are at least 2 enemy Spells, a random enemy card is destroyed.
200583.flavor: [Is there really an amazing city underground?] [It's always dark and pleasant!]

200582.name: 열쇠의 확보
200582.ability: Two random allied Followers get STA +4 and STA +5 respectively.
200582.flavor: [Can I say "Tonight, I will steal your precious thing" after I've already stolen it?]

200589.name: 별의 귀환
200589.ability: The last 2 cards in your Deck are sent to the Grave. The first 2 Followers in your Deck with "GS" in the name are sent to the first empty Slots in your Field. Those cards get ATK +2/STA +2.
200589.flavor: [When she learned of the danger, GS 1st Star hurried to make rescue preparations.]

200588.name: 푸른 십자가의 힘
200588.ability: All Follower's "before defending" skills become "Before defending, nothing happens." If those Followers belong to Crux, they get ATK +1/STA +1. If they have "Blue Cross" in the name, they get DEF +1/STA +1.
200588.flavor: [Florence's power is amazing. The Blue Cross's influence spreads beyond Crux into other countries.]

110289.name: 땅의 메두사
110289.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower is deactivated.
110289.flavor: [Don't be scared of my cute snakes. I am more frightening.]

110286.name: 제 4목격자 카나DDT
110286.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, all allied Followers get ATK +1/STA +2. If the Turn Number is even, all enemy Followers get STA -5.
110286.flavor: [Unfortunately, this is a place of nothingness. Everything is 0. I'm no longer undefeated, but that doesn't mean I'm weak.]

300148.name: Bloody Lady
300148.flavor: [You there, you're shaking... Are you scared? You should respect my hobbies, alright? Your leg would be nice. Hehehehe....]

300149.name: Fortune Lady
300149.ability: Before attacking, if your Grave contains at least 2 cards, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game, then a random card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
300149.flavor: [Throw a few coins, would you, cute lady?]

110287.name: 제 5목격자 카나DDD
110287.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. Your Character gets LIFE increased by half the SIZE of the sent Follower.
110287.flavor: [From our observations here, where we can see everything, it looks like we'll have to clean up after them... It'll be hard work...]

300142.name: Council Maron
300142.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers with the name "Dress Up Maron" are sent to your Grave. The first card in your Deck with the name "Dress Up Maron" is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field. If this happens, that card gets SIZE=5 and ATK +3/STA +3, and this card is sent to your Grave.
300142.flavor: [This dagger was in the equipment storage room. Instructions? "To transform, follow the directions below and strike a pose"..?]

300143.name: Dress Up Maron
300143.ability: Before attacking, all cards except this one with the name "Dress Up Maron" on your Field are sent to your Grave. The first card in your Hand with "Dress Up" in the name is sent to your Grave. If no cards are sent to the Grave, the first card in your Grave with "Dress Up" in the name is removed from the game. If any of these effects happen, the defender gets ATK -1/STA -2.
300143.flavor: [Your heart catch! If I give up now, I'll lose face as a woman!]

300140.name: Cook Club Rookie
300140.flavor: [Here! I made these riceballs myself. You're going to Bamboo Scent, right?]

300141.name: Lib. Lilith
300141.flavor: [The library is being reorganized right now. Could you please come back later?]

300146.name: Sanctuary Hunter Asmis
