300146.ability: Before defending, if this Follower and your Character belong to the same faction, your Character gets LIFE +5. If your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, your Character gets an additional LIFE +3. This skill is removed.
300146.flavor: [To reach Kana, a key is required. A key to open the true door to Kana... I will definitely find it. Who is Rosie working for? I need to figure that out first, then I'll definitely be able to learn more about Kana.]

110284.name: 제 2목격자 카나DND
110284.ability: At the start of the turn, two random cards chosen from the enemy Field, Hand, or Grave are removed from the game. A random allied Follower has its stats changed to their original values if they are lower than their original values.
110284.flavor: [Don't mind DKD. How much is your fate worth? Try not to waste my time.]

300144.name: Sleep Club President
300144.ability: Before attacking, if your Grave contains at least 2 cards, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game, then a random card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
300144.flavor: [The main goal of the Sleep Club is to maintain the optimum conditions for a nap at all times... zzZ]

300145.name: Sister Vermet Vilosa
300145.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave. This card gets STA +2.
300145.flavor: [Sita? It's been a long time! How have you been? Master really misses you.]

110285.name: 제 3목격자 카나DTD
110285.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +2/STA +2. A random enemy Follower has its skills removed.
110285.flavor: [Your very existence has already thrown this place into disarray. In other words, I don't like you.]

110282.name: 주번 더 레전드
110282.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower and the first Follower in your Hand with "Student Council" in the name have their ATK swapped.
110282.flavor: [I am Weekly, the Legend, the secret guardian of the Student Council!]

110283.name: 제 1목격자 카나DKD
110283.ability: At the start of the turn, the first card in your Deck that belongs to your Character's faction is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. If your Character's LIFE is 9 or less, your Character gets LIFE=15.
110283.flavor: [Have you finally come to die? Would you like to die? Or do you not wish to die? Even though Kana leads to death.]

110280.name: 카론
110280.ability: At the start of the turn, the following effects are applied depending on the total number of cards in both Graves. 10 or less: All Followers in the enemy Hand get ATK -1. 11~20: All Followers in your Hand get ATK +1/STA +1. 21 or more: All Followers in your Deck get ATK +2/STA +2.
110280.flavor: [Well! I don't know about any 30x fine for taking a free ride, so your fine will be to get some gimbap for Minac!]

110281.name: 코넌드럼
110281.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/DEF +1.

200630.name: White Whale Rush
200630.ability: A random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. A random enemy Spell is sent to the Grave. If this happens, that Follower gets an additional STA +1. This card is removed from the game.

300502.name: Year 1 Gil Se
300502.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, a card called "Thank You" is created at the top of the enemy Deck.
300502.flavor: [Gil Se is celebrating Sword Girl's 1st anniversary.]

300503.name: Year 1 SALT
300503.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, a card called "Thank You" is created at the top of the enemy Deck.

300500.name: Year 1 JOANA
300500.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, a card called "Thank You" is created at the top of the enemy Deck.

110043.name: Wind Gambler X
110043.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Character's LIFE is odd, you get LIFE -1. If it is even, you get LIFE +3.
110043.flavor: [This is a simple game. You just need to guess if the dice lands on odd or even. Easy, right?]

300506.name: Year 1 Guigui
300506.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, a card called "Thank You" is created at the top of the enemy Deck.

300507.name: Year 1 Nardack
300507.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, a card called "Thank You" is created at the top of the enemy Deck.

300504.name: Year 1 Dova
300504.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, a card called "Thank You" is created at the top of the enemy Deck.

300505.name: Year 1 Yami
300505.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, a card called "Thank You" is created at the top of the enemy Deck.

300445.name: 현자 어린이
300445.ability: Before attacking, if this Follower belongs to your Character's faction, this Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the difference between this Follower's DEF and the defender's DEF (by a maximum of 9). // Another effect is added in dungeons. (Bonus effect: Before defending, this Follower gets STA +2.)
300445.flavor: [Who was it! Who was messing around in the storeroom!] [Heehee, Sister Sage became a kid?] [Rio! What did you touch in the storeroom!]

110049.name: Kenjutsu Karen
110049.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by the SIZE of the first allied Follower.
110049.flavor: [All warriors want a good weapon. It seems like Sergeant Pintail doesn't know that she's in a slump.]

300159.name: Medic Knight
300159.ability: At the start of the turn, the first card in the enemy Deck is sent to the Grave. This Follower gets STA +2.
300159.flavor: [Dr. Kamyu, don't worry so much about my clothes. This is service for the patients~<3]

300158.name: Lancer Knight
300158.ability: Before attacking, if your Grave contains at least 2 cards, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game, then a random card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
300158.flavor: [The result is already decided the moment I thrust the spear. You will fall, and I will be victorious. It has been decided.]

300231.name: GS Colonel Z
300231.ability: Before attacking, all cards in your Hand/Field with "GS" in the name other than this one are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, this Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of sent cards.
300231.flavor: [My mission is to convey the leader's messages and guide everyone. The distorted wheel of time is turning again. Everything is pointing toward the nation of Crux.]

300155.name: Marksman Knight
300155.flavor: [God, I am depending on you without any shame, so use me to strike down my foes.]

300154.name: Seeker Lynn
300154.flavor: [I studied a book from the East about martial arts. It's an undefeatable school of martial arts.]

300634.name: 마녀 리안나
300634.ability: Before defending, if you have an Academy Character and the attacker's ATK is higher than it's original value, this card's ATK and the attacker's ATK become the average of the two ATK values (rounding up). This skill is removed.
300634.flavor: [When I wear these clothes, I feel like I can fly across the sky on a broom!]

300635.name: 레이디 넥시아
300635.ability: Before attacking, any Academy Followers neighboring this card get STA +1. This card gets ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the total STA increase.
300635.flavor: [I only wear clothes for a shaman, so wearing a dress like this feels uncomfortable. Does this dress suit me?]

300636.name: 청십자회 써니
300636.ability: Before attacking, if your hand contains 4 or more cards, this skill is removed. If your hand contains 2 or less cards, this card gets ATK -0~3/STA -0~3.
300636.flavor: [What? The Blue Cross can't relax right now? I already know that...]

300637.name: 청십자회 갓트
300637.ability: Before attacking, if your hand contains 4 or more cards, this skill is removed. If your hand contains 2 or less cards, the first 4 cards in your Grave are removed from the game.
300637.flavor: [Ack, there are too many girls here who have received the saint's blessing. Hm? I've seen those girls before... is it my imagination?]

300630.name: 모교방문 핀테일
300630.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's SIZE is less than this Follower's SIZE, this Follower gets ATK +1/DEF +1.
300630.flavor: [Oh my, what are you doing here, Pintail? It's been a long time! That uniform still fits you after all this time?] [Teacher!]

300631.name: 메이드 시타
300631.ability: Before attacking, if this Follower's ATK is odd, it gets ATK -1. If it is even, it gets ATK +3.

300632.name: 옷도둑 시온리온
300632.ability: Before defending, the attacker gains the following skill: "Before defending, if the attacker's ATK is greater than or equal to this card's total DEF+STA, a random allied Follower other than this one gets STA=0." This Follower loses all skills.
300632.flavor: [Is this Iri's uniform?] [This is the summer uniform!] [Isn't it a little big?] [Wouldn't it seem bigger on you, Shion?]

300633.name: 레이디 리그니제스
300633.ability: Before defending, this card's STA is changed to its original value.
300633.flavor: [It tastes bad... And it's boring. Is there nobody who can entertain me?]

300638.name: 청십자회 파르푼테
300638.ability: Before attacking, this Follower and a random allied Follower other than this card get ATK/STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand minus 1. This skill is removed. // Before defending, if your Hand contains 2 or less cards, cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until your Hand contains 4 cards. This skill is removed. // At the start of the turn, this card's original skills are restored.

300639.name: 마검의 정령 메넬가트
300639.ability: Before attacking, if this card's STA is greater than its ATK, this card's ATK and STA values are swapped.
300639.flavor: [I'm not scared. I'm not scared. I'm not scared. I'm not scared.] [You're the scariest one!]

100131.name: Santa Helena
100131.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers in your Field, a random Follower in your Hand gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers in your Hand or Field, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/STA +1. If it is a Darklore Follower, it gets an additional SIZE -1.
100131.flavor: [The spirit of giving inspires everyone with faith and unity, so I will take the first step. Receive my gift, my heart.]

100130.name: Santa Rose
100130.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers in your Field, a random Follower in your Hand gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers in your Hand or Field, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/STA +1. If it is a Crux Follower, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
100130.flavor: [The gifts for everyone are ready to go. I don't know if they'll like them, though.]

100133.name: GS 3rd Star
100133.ability: At the start of the turn, a Follower named "GS Soldier" is created at the bottom of your Deck. If your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, your Character gets LIFE +1.
100133.flavor: [Crux's twilight draws near. Small hopes will change everything. We are ready. Sister.. No, 4th star.] [Her pupils looking over the rim of her glasses glowed brighter from the rays of the sunset. The glow was so beautiful that I forgot where I was for a moment.]

100132.name: Wedding Dress Layna
100132.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets STA +3 and is sent to the top of your Deck.
100132.flavor: [Am I really alright? Even if you say so... I'll help you in the future. Please take care of me.]

100135.name: Pool Queen Layna
100135.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets STA increased by the number of Followers in your Field. A random Follower in the enemy Hand gets STA decreased by the same amount (to a minimum of 1).
100135.flavor: [Can you be quiet? I'm concentrating. What? Ah... it's a habit, I can't concentrate unless I have something in my mouth. Do... do you think it's strange? I'm a student!]

100134.name: Kar Vistas
100134.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Field SIZE is at least 5, a random Follower in your Field gets SIZE -1. If that Follower has "Dress Up" in the name, it gets an additional ATK +2/STA +2.
100134.flavor: [Transforming by Muzisitter's sword is not everything. From now on, we need to earnestly think about this problem. We need to think about what we need in order to erase the sadness from this world.

100137.name: Rosie's Sister Lucy
100137.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. If this Character's LIFE is 10 or less, a random Follower in your Hand gets ATK +2/STA +2.
100137.flavor: [Rosie is out right now. She's a very active girl, unlike me. If you have some time, would you like to play a game? I know a very fun game. Hehe.]

100136.name: Chaos Destroyer Seven
100136.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, two Followers named "Zombie" are created at the top of your Grave. If the Turn Number is even, the first Darklore card in your Grave is removed from the game, and then two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -2.
100136.flavor: [They are all disposable. Who can be trusted? The enemy is within. Nobody can stand against me. This world will fall!]

100139.name: Icy Glacier
100139.ability: At the start of the turn, Crux cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until there are four cards in your Hand. Any sent Followers get SIZE -1/ATK -1/STA -1. If no cards are sent, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
100139.flavor: [... No abnormalities.] [Alongside Cox, codename HIMEM.SYS Glacier beginning investigation of the alliance. Target destination is the nation of Crux.]

100138.name: Fiery Cox
100138.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower with skills in the enemy Hand and Deck have their skills changed to the following skill: "At the start of the turn, this card's original skills are restored."
100138.flavor: [Everything is going smoothly.] [Empire investigator codename EMS_386.EXE Cox is beginning investigation of the Royle Academy under orders from above.]

110169.name: Cherum
110169.ability: At the start of the turn, all Followers in the enemy Field get STA decreased by the number of empty Slots in the enemy Field minus 1.
110169.flavor: [It's okay, Luver. There are wings intentionally hidden here? It will be easy if you fly... UFO?]

110168.name: Ignis.
110168.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is even, your Character gets LIFE +2. If the Turn Number is odd, both Characters get LIFE -2.
110168.flavor: [Master Luver's poor results called out to us.]

110163.name: Chirushi.
110163.ability: At the start of the turn, 3 cards named "Sacrifice" are created on your Field. (HINT: BURN)
110163.flavor: [This is the revival of the magical warrior! Magical!!!!! Shoot!!!!!] [Location: Muspelheim 25F]

110162.name: Youngest Knight
110162.ability: At the start of the turn, all cards on the enemy Field with a SIZE of 5 or less are sent to the Grave. (HINT: You must be the appropriate age.)
110162.flavor: [I won't miss any of my duties, and I'll continue my training! I'm waiting for the future that the devoted receive.] [Location: Muspelheim 24F]

110161.name: Maid Luna
110161.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of cards in your Grave, and a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of cards in the enemy Grave. (HINT: The culprit is G.Y)
110161.flavor: [When there are a lot of maids, laundry is a big deal. There's more laundry than the master's. Who will be our maid...] [Location: Muspelheim 23F]

110160.name: Fourteen.
110160.ability: At the start of the turn, the first 3 cards in the enemy Deck are sent to the Grave. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: L.O)
110160.flavor: [My principle is to fulfill every request to the very end. But I forgot.] [Location: Muspelheim 21F]

110167.name: Natura.
110167.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Hand gets ATK -2/STA -2.
110167.flavor: [Master Luver? What kind of place is the alliance?]

110166.name: Kris Flina
110166.ability: At the start of the turn, a Follower called "Crescent Conundrum" is created in the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=1/ATK=13/DEF=2/STA=13. A Follower called "Crescent Conundrum" is created in the first empty Slot of the enemy Field and gets SIZE=9 and gains the following skill: "At the start of the turn, this card is destroyed." (HINT: Destruction.)
110166.flavor: [Conundrum? Don't get so excited. You should watch out for the light.] [Location: Muspelheim 28F]

110165.name: Winfield.
110165.ability: At the start of the turn, all enemy cards are deactivated. All allied Followers get ATK/STA increased by five times their own DEF. Every other Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave. (HINT: Defense is the greatest offense.)
110165.flavor: [I'm the press member Winfield. Today, I'm shooting some photos outside.] [Location: Muspelheim 27F]

110164.name: Lagerfeld.
110164.ability: At the start of the turn, all Followers in the enemy Deck get ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2. 5 random Followers in the enemy Deck are sent to the top of the enemy Deck. (HINT: L.C)
110164.flavor: [I have to continue my research. For a loo~ng time.] [Location: Muspelheim 26F]

110185.name: 2S Intimidator
110185.ability: At the start of the turn, if the total SIZE of your Hand and the enemy Hand are both odd or both even, your Character gets LIFE +2. Otherwise, the enemy Character gets LIFE -2.
110185.flavor: [Do you remember what kind of person you met? It seems like an acquaintance.]

110184.name: 2S Clerk
110184.ability: At the beginning of turn 1, your Deck becomes an identical copy of the enemy Deck.
110184.flavor: [Take this receipt, send the contents of the request to the written address.]

110187.name: 2S Spy
110187.ability: At the start of the turn, the cards in Slots 4,5 of the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave.
110187.flavor: [I am disguised as a teacher to ensure the client's protection.]

110186.name: 2S Twenty
110186.ability: At the start of the turn, your Character's LIFE and the enemy Character's LIFE are switched.
110186.flavor: [The assignment of the red house. Infiltrate as a maid.]

110181.name: Disc. of Abundance
110181.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 1, the first 20 cards in the enemy Deck are removed from the game, the enemy gets Shuffles=0, and both Characters get LIFE=20. If the Turn Number is 3 and your Character has less LIFE than the enemy Character, your Character gets LIFE=0. Otherwise, the enemy Character gets LIFE=0. (HINT: The best only need 3 seconds to win!)
110181.flavor: [Cooking is living! Cooking is being! I will do my best to bring the stationmaster the best food possible!] [Location: Muspelheim 37F]

110180.name: Chenin Blanc
110180.ability: At the start of the turn, both Characters get LIFE=10. A card called "Sacrifice" is created in all Slots of both players' Fields. (HINT: Instant defeat.)
110180.flavor: [Interesting... This place isn't bad. Since I've been here, nobody has called us freaks or anything. Shall we stick around for a while?] [Location: Muspelheim 36F]

110183.name: Disciple Shur
110183.ability: At the beginning of turn 1, the enemy Deck is changed to the starter Deck of the enemy Character's faction. If the enemy Character's faction is Neutral, all cards in the enemy Deck are removed from the game. (HINT: You want to use your former strength? Really?)
110183.flavor: [Please wait. The stationmaster will be arriving shortly.] [Location: Muspelheim 39F]

110182.name: Disc. of Eminence
110182.ability: At the start of the turn, all enemy cards with an even SIZE are destroyed. All cards in the enemy Hand and Field get SIZE=4.  (HINT: Everything I dislike will be thrown out or changed to fit my tastes.)

110189.name: 2S Clerk Jasmine
110189.ability: At the beginning of turn 1, your Deck becomes an identical copy of the enemy Deck, then all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +1.
110189.flavor: [Don't take two slips! Don't cut in line! Go by your number! This place isn't a bank, miss!]

110188.name: 2S Agent
110188.flavor: [An ice user. At a client's request, she iced over a certain classroom at the Vita high school.]

300449.name: Spirit of the Library
300449.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's DEF is at least 1, the defender's DEF is halved (rounding down). If the defender's DEF is 1 or less, the defender gets STA -1. // Before defending, if this Follower belongs to your Character's faction, the attacker gets ATK -1/STA -1.
300449.flavor: [Rumor has it that in the deepest part of the underground library, a spirit roams.]

300448.name: Tennis Advisor Miki
300448.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's ATK is greater than this card's total DEF+STA, this Follower's STA and the attacker's STA are swapped. If this happens, this skill is removed.
300448.flavor: [What business do you have at the Tennis Club? Might you be interested in joining? If you apply now, you can join easily!]

100229.name: Wedding Dress Linus
100229.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Deck gets ATK -1/STA -1(to a minimum of 1), then this effect is applied again. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
100229.flavor: [Even if you say you'll take care of me... it doesn't make me happy at all... well, I guess I can show a little thanks...]

100228.name: Wedding Dress Asmis
100228.ability: At the start of the turn, if the top card in the enemy Deck is a Spell, it gets SIZE +1. Otherwise, the first card in your Deck gets SIZE -1; if it is a Follower, it gets an additional ATK +1/STA +1. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
100228.flavor: [Oh! Is this... Every girl's dream?! The dream that everyone wants to reach someday!]

100225.name: 숙명의 레이디 세븐
100225.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Hand gets SIZE -1. If that Follower has "Lady" in the name, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2.
100225.flavor: [The weather is nice. There's no better day to go for a walk.]

100224.name: 도서부고문 에셀
100224.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. All allied Followers with "Library Club" in the name get ATK/STA increased by half the number of empty Slots in your Hand (rounding down).
100224.flavor: [Books have magic! It's not the same as the magic that we use, but they have a very beautiful kind of magic!]

100227.name: GS 간부 빈츠
100227.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, a card called "GS Fighter" is created at the bottom of your Grave/Hand/Deck. A random Follower in your Hand gets ATK/STA increased by the number of cards in your Field with "GS" in the name (by a maximum of 3).
100227.flavor: [What ominous smoke... It's been a long time since I've seen that flare. We have to stop our operation and prepare to retreat.]

100226.name: 청십자회 플로렌스
100226.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower loses its first skill and gains the following skills: "Before defending, nothing happens." "Before attacking, nothing happens." If this happens, that Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
100226.flavor: [We have to be prepared, too. You can't just control things whenever you want.]

100221.name: Nurse Helena
100221.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Hand contains at least two cards with the same SIZE, those cards are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by 1 plus half the SIZE of the sent cards (rounding down).
100221.flavor: [Where does it hurt? Share your pain with God. Your prayer will definitely reach heaven.]

100220.name: Gambler Rose
100220.ability: At the start of the turn, if the enemy has 3 or more Shuffles, the enemy gets Shuffes -1. A random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of enemy Shuffles.
100220.flavor: [I swear by my honor! I won't use my powers at all, so it'll be a fair game.]

100223.name: 발굴왕 코넌드럼
100223.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. If the Turn Number is even, all Followers in your Deck get ATK -1/DEF -1.
100223.flavor: [Mega! Crescent! Drill! With this drill, I'll pierce not the sky, but the earth!]

100222.name: 블레스폼 넥시아
100222.ability: At the start of the turn, the following effects are applied depending on the number of cards in your Hand. 0,1: The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. 2,3: All cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. You get Shuffles +1. 4,5: A random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2.
100222.flavor: [I really like this dress. Our faithful have given me a lot of clothes.]

200358.name: Sanctuary Trip
200358.ability: If this card's SIZE is greater than 3, it gets SIZE=3. Your Character gets LIFE increased by 1 plus this card's SIZE. If this card's SIZE is 1, it is sent to the Grave. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE -1 and is deactivated.
200358.flavor: [This place is really amazing. There are so many things that you can't experience anywhere else.]

200359.name: Kinship
200359.ability: If all cards in your Hand/Field other than this one belong to your Character's faction, two random enemy Followers get ATK/DEF decreased by half the number of cards in your Hand/Field (rounding down).
200359.flavor: [Wouldn't it be great if you were my sister, Rotori?] [Shh! We'll get in trouble.]

200350.name: Obstinance
200350.ability: All enemy cards get SIZE=4. (HINT: Odd? Even!)

200351.name: Nether Visitor
200351.ability: All Followers on your Field/Hand/Deck get ATK +1/STA +1. Your Character gets LIFE +1. You get Shuffles +1. All Followers on the enemy Field/Hand/Deck get ATK -1/STA -1. This card is removed from the game.
200351.flavor: [So Vernika was not in the underworld. But if she hadn't gone to the underworld, then where was she? Iri felt powerless as she headed toward the train to return to the land of the living.]

200352.name: Message
200352.ability: All cards in your Grave with the same name as the first card on your Field are sent to the top of your Deck. This card is removed from the game.
200352.flavor: [Principal Treanna said this. Now is not the time to cross that river. Wait until the fourth agent is dealt with.]

200353.name: Four Messages
200353.ability: Two random allied Followers get SIZE=4. All Followers whose SIZE increased get ATK/DEF/STA increased by their increase in SIZE.
200353.flavor: [Here.] [The Myo postgirl delivered a letter to Asmis. Within the letter were 4 beautifully written numbers.] [Asmis recalled Treanna's words. "The game is starting..."]

200354.name: Organization Failure
200354.ability: All cards on the enemy Field except the first and last cards are sent to the Grave.
200354.flavor: [Aah... It was stupid to carry so many books like that...]

200355.name: Take A Break
200355.ability: The first enemy card with a SIZE of at least 6 is moved to the first empty Slot of your Field and deactivated. This card is removed from the game.
200355.flavor: [Aren't you tired? Come over here. How about having a cup of coffee with me?]

200356.name: Fairy Borrowers
200356.ability: The first enemy card with a total DEF+SIZE of 5 is destroyed, then your Character gets LIFE decreased by half the destroyed card's DEF (rounding up).
200356.flavor: [Oh my! Thank you, fairies! Thank you for helping me, but you can't take my stuff away!]

200357.name: Muzisitter Appears!
200357.ability: The first 10 cards of both players' Decks are sent to the Grave. If this happens, 10 random cards with a different name than this card are sent from your Grave to the bottom of your Deck. 10 random cards are sent from the enemy Grave to the bottom of the enemy Deck. This card is removed from the game.
200357.flavor: [The group of transforming girls that fight for the sake of justice. This group is called Muzisitter. In order to fix the chaos within Crux, these girls have surfaced.]

110239.name: Sia Aka
110239.ability: At the start of the turn, up to 2 Followers are sent from the enemy Hand to the bottom of the enemy Deck. A random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of sent cards.
110239.flavor: [Did you receive permission from the librarian? If you're not looking for books, then what are you looking for?]

110238.name: Lib. Explorer Sia
110238.ability: At the start of the turn, up to 2 Spells are sent from the enemy Hand to the bottom of the enemy Deck. A random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of sent cards.
110238.flavor: [My job is to explore this place. If you have nothing to do here, please return to the entrance.]

110237.name: Jier Pris
110237.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower on the enemy Field and the first Spell in the enemy Hand switch places. The switched Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1 and the switched Spell gets SIZE +1.
110237.flavor: [You want to force your way in? I'll call the librarian.]

110236.name: Lib. Explorer Jier
110236.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower on the enemy Field and the first Spell in the enemy Hand switch places. The switched Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1.
110236.flavor: [Who are you? Not just anyone can come here.]

110235.name: Palomporom.
110235.ability: At the start of the turn, if you have a Follower on the Field with "Witch" in the name, a random allied Follower with "Witch" in the name gets the following effects depending on how many Darklore Followers are on your Field. 1: ATK +1/STA +2. 2 or more: SIZE -1/ATK +1/STA +2.
110235.flavor: [For someone to be considered a "queen" by everyone, you must have a glorious existence. That girl calls herself a queen, but I will oppose her.]

110234.name: Witch Cadet Fade
110234.ability: At the start of the turn, your Character gets LIFE +1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. A random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave. A random Follower in the enemy Hand gets SIZE +1. A random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
110234.flavor: [I'm number 2? I resent that. I won't acknowledge Falco. I'm number 1.]

110233.name: President Cinia
110233.ability: At the start of the turn, a  random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2. If the number of cards in your Deck is less than or equal to the number of cards in the enemy Deck, a random enemy Follower gets DEF -1/STA -2. If all cards in your Hand and Field belong to this Character's faction and there are at least five cards in your Grave, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
110233.flavor: [Linia became Royle Academy's chairman. Cinia ran for president and won. She looked proud, as if it weren't an accident, but something felt out of place.]

110232.name: Santa Cinia
110232.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2 and the first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. If the sent card belongs to your Character's faction, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1.
110232.flavor: [Christmas? A day where people exchange gifts? I don't have any interest in that. This is just some clothes that Linia gave me.]

110231.name: Hot Springs Cinia
110231.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -2/STA -2 if it has 0 or less DEF. Otherwise, it gets DEF -1/STA -1.
110231.flavor: [It has a different kind of beauty than the mansion. Alright, it was worth coming.]

110230.name: Wedding Cinia
110230.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1. Your Character gets LIFE +2.
110230.flavor: [I don't really like white, but this dress isn't too ba... no! It's good, sister, this was a good idea!]

100049.name: Sigma
100049.ability: At the start of the turn, two random Followers in your Hand get ATK +1/STA +1 and two random Followers in your Field get STA +1.
100049.flavor: [If you were to point out anything particular about the Crux guardian Sigma, anyone who knows her would mention that she's a heavy drinker. At the same time, Crux developed a winery. I believe the two things are not unrelated. -Esprit's memo...]

100048.name: Wedding Dress Jaina
100048.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2. If the Turn Number is even, the Follower also gets STA +1.
100048.flavor: [This is different than the dress I had in mind. Is this what you like? It's not bad. I'm never disappointed by your taste, Linia.]

100041.name: Laevateinn
100041.ability: At the start of the turn, if there are two cards in your Hand with the same SIZE, your Character gets LIFE increased by half of their SIZE (rounding up).
100041.flavor: [What do you think? Within your dreams, I can do anything for you, I can be anything for you. The girl you like, the young girl you secretly long for. If you just want that girl to be with you in bed, I can do that for you, too.]

100040.name: Wedding Dress Vernika
100040.ability: At the start of the turn, the enemy Follower with the highest DEF gets DEF =0.
100040.flavor: [I've only dreamed of trying out a wedding dress. Cinia, please tell your oldest sister thank you for me.]

100043.name: Head Knight Jaina
100043.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2. If the Turn Number is even, the Follower gets an additional STA +1.
100043.flavor: [Leading the knights is a great responsibility for one person. I have to be careful in everything I do, and the burden never disappears. Sometimes I feel like I need some breathing space.]

100042.name: Sisters Sion & Rion
100042.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK increased by the number of Followers in your Hand and gets STA increased by the number of Followers in your Field.
100042.flavor: [You wanna play? How about grabbing sister Sage? I like her! Isn't it alright if we don't play around with the shadow?  Play with me!] [An artifact that blocks out the sunlight. Where you get that... Hand it over!]

100045.name: Adept Jaina
100045.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK increased by 1 plus the number of empty Slots in your Hand (by a maximum of 4).
100045.flavor: [The experiment of creating a sword out of Talentium was a success. It has been observed to perfectly draw out the dormant abilities of this girl. There is no evidence of any abnormalities from using Talentium to awaken powers. -Creuset's experiment note]

100044.name: Resting Jaina
100044.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is a multiple of three, two random allied Crux Followers get ATK +3/STA +3. Your Character gets LIFE +2.
100044.flavor: [How about relaxing a little more, Luthica? You don't have to dress up here. You're making me a little uncomfortable.]

100047.name: Sword Planter Jaina
100047.ability: At the start of the turn, two random allied Followers get ATK increased by the number of different SIZES in your Hand.
100047.flavor: [The leader of the army that fought the monsters around the Empire was a magnificent sight indeed. The number of swords she held could not be counted. Each one seemed as if they had a will of their own and moved perfectly. Unlimited blade works... this is the power of Jaina.]

100046.name: Swimwear Jaina
100046.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower is moved to the next empty Slot. If this happens, the moved Follower gets ATK increased by the new Slot number and gets STA increased by half the new Slot number (rounding down). If the Follower starts in Slot 5, it is moved to the first empty Slot.
100046.flavor: [This beach is really peaceful. It's been a while since you've been to the beach, right, Luthica? Of course we have work, but it'll be a shame if we let that prevent us from enjoying ourselves... d, don't stare at me like that! Hmph!]

210054.name: Mystery Flower
210054.flavor: [An unidentified breed of flower that was discovered around Royle City.]

210055.name: Pumpkin Pumpkin
210055.flavor: [Look at this Shion, it's a pumpkin!] [It's not a pumpkin, it's a pumpkin pumpkin!] [What's that?] [I dunno! You carry it]

210052.name: 이어링
210052.flavor: [Earrings represent a sacrifice for the sake of beauty. Long-term beauty in exchange for short-term pain. -Esprit's notebook]

210053.name: 콤팩트 파우더
210053.flavor: [During the process of becoming an adult, powder is the biggest difficulty. Of course, it's best if they don't use it at the beginning, but... -Esprit's notebook]

210050.name: 토끼인형
210050.flavor: [The most popular ragdoll among girls. However, girls are not afraid of giant rabbits. -Esprit's notebook]

210051.name: 다이어리
210051.flavor: [Girls write about their days and their dreams for the next day in this small notebook. They hope that tomorrow will be a little better than today. -Esprit's notebook]

200001.name: Heartless Blow
200001.ability: A random enemy Follower gets STA -4. If your Character has "Sita" in the name, a random enemy Follower gets STA -2.
200001.flavor: [... Sita's merciless. How can she look the fish in the eyes and still calmly cut off its head?] [Just because...]

200002.name: Student Orientation
200002.ability: Two random allied Vita Followers get ATK +2/STA +2.

200003.name: Cooking Failure
200003.ability: If you have a Follower with "Cook Club" in the name on your Field, two random allied Vita Followers get SIZE +1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +2.
200003.flavor: [This time was a failure, too...] [How do you even make it explode like that?]

200004.name: Ward Rupture
200004.ability: An allied Vita Follower in Slot 3 gets ATK/STA increased by the difference in SIZE between the allied card in Slot 3 and the enemy card in Slot 3.
200004.flavor: [The moment Sita's hand touched it, the mage's barrier shattered into pieces like glass.]

200005.name: New Recipe
200005.ability: You get LIFE increased by 10 minus the total SIZE of your Field, up to a maximum of 5.
200005.flavor: [Everyone only makes sweets... I'll figure something out by myself!]

200006.name: Shrink
200006.ability: The first enemy Follower with the highest SIZE gets SIZE/ATK/DEF/STA halved (rounding down).
200006.flavor: [Have you ever felt uncomfortable because something was too big? How about making it smaller? Hm? An object? No, just you.]

200007.name: Balance
200007.ability: If the difference between your Character's LIFE and the enemy Character's LIFE is 20 or less, both Characters get LIFE changed to equal the average of the two (rounding up). If this happens, starting from Slot 1, cards are sent to the Grave from the Field that has the most cards until there are an equal number of cards in both Fields. If you have a Vita Character, all Followers in your Hand are sent to the Grave. Otherwise, all cards in your Hand are sent to the Grave.
200007.flavor: [Everything will lose meaning and become the same. You, me, everything.]

200008.name: Rumored Order
200008.ability: The first allied Vita Follower with the highest SIZE gets SIZE -2/STA+2.
200008.flavor: [The alliance sent out an order for the Scarlet Mage! What do you think? Don't you think something interesting is going to happen? Sita?]

200009.name: Omnivore
200009.ability: Two random allied Followers get STA increased by 1 plus the number of different SIZES in your Hand.

200134.name: Dark Convocation
200134.ability: A random active allied Darklore Follower is deactivated and gets ATK +3/STA +1. If the Follower has "GS" in the name, it gets an additional STA +2.
200134.flavor: [Gather! In the name of world domination! The great leader has expressed favor. Bring squid and beer!]

200135.name: Pupil Becomes Master
200135.ability: All enemy Followers get STA decreased by the Turn Number divided by the number of enemy cards (rounding down).
200135.flavor: [I see now. This is blood? It's delicious. Sweet, kuhihi...]

200136.name: Agent Visit
200136.ability: If there are any allied Followers and any cards with a SIZE of 3 in your Hand, the first enemy card with a SIZE of 3 is sent to the Grave.
200136.flavor: [When doing "this work" she always wears white. She thinks the blood-stained appearance is unbearably lovely. Just like that collapsed person on the ground over there. Look for the 10th SS member. That's me.]

200137.name: Dress Up Ride
200137.ability: If there are allied Followers with "Dress Up" in the name, the first card in your Deck with "Dress Up" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =5/ATK +3/STA +3.
200137.flavor: [Who are we? We are two who have become one vampire detective! Dress Up Ride! Tension Fortissimo!]

200130.name: Escape
200130.ability: If there are any allied Followers, all cards in your Hand are sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE increased by 1.5 times the number of sent cards (rounding up).
200130.flavor: [Clarice! You're amazing! How did you get me out of there?] [There's nothing I can't do with my creations. Once I put my mind to it, I just get it done. Did I do a good job? Luthica!]

200131.name: False Delivery
200131.ability: Cards in both Hands that do not belong to the corresponding Character's faction are sent to the Grave.
200131.flavor: [There are 3 swords passed down in the Pacifica house. One of them is owned by Cinia. It has the power to bring the past to the present. What do you think? This is something not even Jaina knows.]

200132.name: Comeback
200132.ability: If you have a Crux Character, cards in your Hand are sent to empty Slots in your Field in sequential order until your Field is full or your Hand runs out of cards. If this happens, those cards get SIZE = 2-3 (at random).
200132.flavor: [I'm fond of it... Crux. Today, too, a good wind rises. Jaina, no... that woman doesn't belong in this place.]

200133.name: Dark Meeting
200133.ability: All cards in your Hand are sent to the Grave. If this happens, all enemy Followers with the highest total ATK/STA gets ATK/STA decreased by 1.5 times the number of sent cards (rounding up).
200133.flavor: [Today, you will receive the responsibilities you wished for when you became soldiers of the great GS!] [Yes!]

300151.name: Tea Time Lady
300151.ability: At the start of the turn, two random enemy Followers get ATK -1/STA -1.
300151.flavor: [The key of tea is the tea leaves and the heat of the water. Maids, when you prepare the tea, always take care.]

300150.name: Unlucky Lady
300150.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is even, all allied Academy Followers get ATK +2/STA +2.
300150.flavor: [This sucks... Why does misfortune always follow me around...]

300153.name: Arbiter Rivelta Answer
300153.ability: Before defending, if this Follower and your Character belong to the same faction, up to 5 cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, the attacker gets ATK decreased by half the number of sent cards (rounding up). This skill is removed.
300153.flavor: [I've missed you for a while, Vernika, so I came to visit. How are you? You seem a little pale... Curtains? Al, alright... I'll shut them.]

300152.name: 2S Agent Fourteen
300152.ability: At the start of the turn, cards are sent from the bottom of the enemy Deck to the enemy Hand until the enemy Hand is full. This Follower gets STA +2.
300152.flavor: [Sorry, Asmis, a higher price came along... I have to keep the secret now.]

200138.name: Tranquility
200138.ability: If there are any allied Followers and there are any enemy Spells, all enemy Spells are sent to the grave. If this happens, the enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of sent cards. If there are no enemy Spells, all allied Spells are sent to the Grave. If that happens, your Character gets LIFE decreased by 1 plus the number of sent cards.
200138.flavor: [The reason for my neutrality is to keep the balance of power.]

200139.name: Night Conqueror
200139.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, enemy cards with a SIZE of 3~5, as well as allied non-Darklore Followers, are sent to the owners' Graves.
200139.flavor: [Tell me where the leader of the Flina house is. While you're at it, give me all the blood you're drinking. Hehehe...]

300157.name: Dress Up Smartylane
300157.ability: Before attacking, all cards except this one with the name "Dress Up Smartyrain" on your Field are sent to your Grave. The first card in your Hand with "Dress Up" in the name is sent to your Grave. If no cards are sent to the Grave, the first card in your Grave with "Dress Up" in the name is removed from the game. If any of these effects happen, this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2.
300157.flavor: [It even has instructions on what to say after transforming... Hu... I'll do it. Your heart catch! I will show you the report of punishment!]

300156.name: Seeker Smartylane
300156.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers with the name "Dress Up Smartyrain" are sent to your Grave. The first card in your Deck with the name "Dress Up Smartyrain" is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field. If this happens, that card gets SIZE=5 and ATK +3/STA +3, and this card is sent to your Grave.
300156.flavor: [Is this the artifact? They were so kind to attach directions. Input the numbers on the keypad in the following order...]

300591.name: SS 정보원
300591.ability: Before attacking, if your Character's LIFE is at least 15, this card gets ATK -1/STA -1. If your Character's LIFE is less than 15, this card gets ATK +2.
300591.flavor: [It's simply business! I have the information you wanted.]

300590.name: 이중첩자 루티카
300590.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1/STA +1. // Before defending, the attacker gets ATK -1/STA -1. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300590.flavor: [The rumors that you were in league with the outsiders were true! Were true!] [It's pointless for me to try to resolve any misunderstandings. First, I have some very valuable information. How about it? Fallen bird.]

300593.name: GS 수령 쉰들러
300593.ability: Before attacking, a random card in your Hand with "GS" in the name gets SIZE -1 (to a minimum of 1). If this happens, this card gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300593.flavor: [How much is this worth? There's nothing more we can obtain from within the Aletheians. It's a shame that we barely lost the magic sword.]

300592.name: 천리교도 하니아
300592.ability: Before defending, the attacker gets STA/SIZE decreased by the difference between this card's total ATK+DEF+STA and the attacker's total ATK+DEF+STA (SIZE cannot be decreased below 1). If this happens, this card is destroyed.
300592.flavor: [Whatever the shaman requests... even if it is to destroy my own body, I will carry it out.] [The Aletheians would eventually become blindly devoted.]

300595.name: 드레스업 시온
300595.ability: Before attacking, allied Followers with the names "Dress Up Shion" or "Dress Up Rion" get ATK +2.
300595.flavor: [Ack, there was a time limit? Hmph. We're still not finished yet! Rion!]

300594.name: 시온리온 익스트림
300594.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's ATK is greater than this card's total DEF+STA, this card is removed from the game and two cards called "Dress Up Shion" and "Dress Up Rion" are created in the first empty Slots of your Field and get SIZE=2.
300594.flavor: [The strange bird that sister Sage sent flying gave us new powers. Shall we count your crimes?] [Shion!] [Rion!] [Maximum Drive!] [Extreme!]

300597.name: 요리연구부 제과장 스비아
300597.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets ATK -2/DEF -2. This skill is removed.
300597.flavor: [Finally, the greatest whipped cream GET! You're mine, whipped cream! This whipped's name will use my family name so everyone knows it's the greatest whipped cream!]

300596.name: 드레스업 리온
300596.ability: Before defending, allied Followers with the names "Dress Up Shion" or "Dress Up Rion" get STA +2.

300623.name: 크레센트 코넌드럼
300623.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this card's ATK, this card gets DEF +1.
300623.flavor: [The truth is over there. Conundrum's logic can never be stopped.]

300622.name: 뱀파이어 컬티스트
300622.flavor: [I'm sorry, miss, but I'm busy right now. Please don't disturb me until I've finished my experiments.] [The power of vampires is amazing.]

300621.name: 신성연구회 리디아
300621.ability: Before attacking, the following effects are applied depending on the defender's activation state. Active: This card gets STA +2. Deactivated: The defender gets DEF=0 and this card gets STA increased by the change in DEF.
300621.flavor: [I can't deal with this anymore.] [Melissa, have you ever seen this before?] [No, this doesn't originate from here.] [I don't know, will we ever be able to break free from the fighting?]

300620.name: 성도검사
300620.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets STA -1.
300620.flavor: [I'm looking for the seminarians. Have you seen them?]

300627.name: Judo Luthica
300627.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets DEF decreased by the number of Followers in your Field (by a maximum of 2 if you do not have a Crux Character).
300627.flavor: [I will end this in in a single match.]

300626.name: Archery Cinia
300626.ability: Before attacking, a random active Follower in the enemy Field gets STA -2. If this happens and you have an Academy Character, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets STA -2.
300626.flavor: [I was slightly worried that I would miss if the wind blew. However, I focused everything into my own hands and shot with confidence.]

300625.name: Badminton Sita
300625.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's STA is even, the defender gets STA -1. If this happens and you have a Vita Character, the defender's skills are removed until the start of the next turn.
300625.flavor: [This is a racket...?] [That's right, Sita. You just take it and "bounce" the ball back.] [... Do I have to bounce it...?]

300624.name: 아이리 플리나
300624.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's SIZE is less than or equal to this card's SIZE, the defender gets ATK -0~4/STA -0~4.
300624.flavor: [The radiance of the sunlight sometimes feels so dazzling that it could be fatal...] [Do you remember?]

300629.name: 윈드 걸 후우
300629.ability: Before defending, your Character gets LIFE +1 and this card gets STA +1. // At the start of the turn, if your Character's LIFE is odd, this card gets ATK +3/STA +3. If it is even, this card gets DEF +2.
300629.flavor: [I have to find the master. I've brought all of the master's favorite things in order to bring her back.]

300628.name: Ping Pong Iri
300628.ability: Before this card attacks, if the defender's total DEF+STA is 7 or less, the defender is destroyed. If you have a Darklore Character, a random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by the destroyed Follower's SIZE.
300628.flavor: [That ball. It will return to me.] [Th-that's! That's the "Flina Zone"!]

300707.name: 레이디 마리 루넨
300707.ability: Before attacking, all allied cards with "Lady" in the name get SIZE -1. This card gets ATK increased by the total SIZE reduction. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300707.flavor: [When there are no attendants around, it is very lonely. On those days, she eats Pe__ro Royle Chocolate. Pe__ro Royle chocolate costs 3000 GP per 5.]

100108.name: Waiting Sita
100108.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2. If the number of cards in your Deck is less than or equal to the number of cards in the enemy Deck, that Follower gets an additional DEF +1/STA +1. If all cards in your Hand and Field belong to this Character's faction and there are at least five cards in your Grave, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
100108.flavor: [From that day forth, she would hardly speak with anyone. She didn't smile, and she didn't seek advice from her friends. She would learn from her own wounds.]

100109.name: Council President Cinia
100109.ability: At the start of the turn, a  random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2. If the number of cards in your Deck is less than or equal to the number of cards in the enemy Deck, a random enemy Follower gets DEF -1/STA -2. If all cards in your Hand and Field belong to this Character's faction and there are at least five cards in your Grave, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
100109.flavor: [Linia became Royle Academy's chairman. Cinia ran for president and won. She looked proud, as if it weren't an accident, but something felt out of place.]

300719.name: 제압당한 천리교도 에이가
300719.flavor: [Where are your friends?] [Kyaa!? Who is it? These vines are creepy!]

300718.name: 한복의 루티카
300718.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets DEF -1. If the defender's DEF is at least 0, this Follower gets ATK +2. // Before defending, the attacker gets DEF -1. If the attacker's DEF is 0 or less, this Follower gets STA +2.
300718.flavor: [This is called a hanbok? I envy the place where Ophelia lived, where they have beautiful clothes like this.]

100104.name: Morning Calm Luthica
100104.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA -2. If there are fewer allied cards than enemy cards, a random enemy Follower gets STA -2. If there are at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, a random enemy Follower gets STA -2.
100104.flavor: [I decided I want to stay here for a while. You said your name was Ophelia? Nice to meet you.]

100105.name: Morning Calm Iri
100105.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -2. If there are fewer allied cards than enemy cards, that Follower gets an additional ATK -1. If there are at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, that Follower gets an additional STA -1.
100105.flavor: [These clothes give me a wonderful feeling. Ophelia, you said? I feel like I've seen these beads somewhere before... maybe?]

100106.name: Confession Iri
100106.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1. A random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
100106.flavor: [This place... was I dreaming? It was a sad dream. The things I wanted were just out of my reach, and I was lonely. If I take your hand, will my loneliness go away? Don't let go of my hand... please.]

100107.name: Vernika Answer
100107.ability: At the start of the turn, all Spells in the enemy Hand are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
100107.flavor: [It's lonely... Someone give me your hand. I have nothing to look forward to during these nights without the sun. How did things turn out like this?]

100100.name: Persuasive Rihanna
100100.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in your Field. A random enemy Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in the enemy Field. If this happens and there are any cards on your Field and the enemy Field that share the same Slot number, then one of those cards from the enemy Field is moved to the first empty Slot in your Field.
100100.flavor: [Your fellow classmates are in a dangerous situation! They need your strength! Help Vernika and Sita!]

100101.name: Wedding Dress Rihanna
100101.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in your Field. The Follower gets the following effects applied depending on its new Slot number. 1~3: STA +3. 3~5: ATK +2.
100101.flavor: [Thank you... I'll never forget your wishes. This is an unforgettable day of this year's festival.]

100102.name: Morning Calm Sita
100102.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2. If there are fewer allied cards than enemy cards, that Follower gets an additional ATK +1. If your Hand has at least as many cards as the enemy Hand, that Follower gets an additional STA +1.
100102.flavor: [Do I eat this thing on top too? These sticks are hard to use...]

100103.name: Morning Calm Cinia
100103.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets DEF -1/STA -2. If there are fewer allied cards than enemy cards, the first Follower in the enemy Hand gets DEF -1. If there are at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, that Follower gets STA -2 (to a minimum of 1).
100103.flavor: [It's red like I ordered, so I'm satisfied. Ophelia? That's the first time I've heard that name, but I can at least thank her.]

300432.name: 폭풍의 전학생 시스
300432.ability: Before defending, if you have a Vita Character and the attacker belongs to Academy, the attacker gets ATK -3/STA -3.

300433.name: 하복의 시타
300433.ability: Before attacking, if this Follower belongs to your Character's faction, this Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the difference between this Follower's DEF and the defender's DEF (by a maximum of 9). // Another effect is added in dungeons. (Bonus effect: Before defending, this Follower gets STA +2.)
300433.flavor: [It's cold... I want to change clothes soon.]

300430.name: Iri Flina
300430.ability: Before attacking, if the total SIZE of the Followers on your Field is greater than the total SIZE of the Followers on the enemy Field, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
300430.flavor: [Who thinks I should be excluded because I am a different kind of existence? My name... Iri. Iri Flina.]

300431.name: 티타임의 학생회장 셀린
300431.ability: Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1. A random allied Follower gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
300431.flavor: [Could you pour me some tea, Miss Weekly? Ah, she's not here? Where has Miss Weekly gone?]

300436.name: 다크레이디 세븐
300436.ability: Before attacking, if this Follower belongs to your Character's faction, this Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the difference between this Follower's DEF and the defender's DEF (by a maximum of 9). // Another effect is added in dungeons. (Bonus effect: Before defending, this Follower gets STA +2.)
300436.flavor: [Nanai Highcastle. Today, an enormous darkness will engulf your soul. The despair that you have thrust upon others will find its way back to you!]

300437.name: 포이즌 루티카
300437.ability: Before attacking, all allied Followers get ATK +3/STA -2, then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300437.flavor: [I've heard a rumor that your strength rises when you are hurt. Shall we test it?]

300434.name: 사안의 마녀
300434.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's SIZE is at least 4, this Follower gets STA increased by the attacker's ATK. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300434.flavor: [Don't do that, it's weird. How can you go back to the outside world? Queen Linia, you say?]

300435.name: 퓨어 메이드
300435.ability: Before defending, if you have an Academy Character and the attacker belongs to Vita, the attacker gets ATK -3/STA -3.
300435.flavor: [Hello, master. What shall I do first today? You will have to wait a little longer for a meal.]

300438.name: 파괴의 기사단원 핀테일
300438.ability: Before defending, if you have a Crux Character and the attacker belongs to Darklore, the attacker gets ATK -3/STA -3.
300438.flavor: [I will put an end to the GS!]

300439.name: 기사단의 막내 로토리
300439.ability: Before attacking, if this Follower belongs to your Character's faction, this Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the difference between this Follower's DEF and the defender's DEF (by a maximum of 9). // Another effect is added in dungeons. (Bonus effect: Before defending, this Follower gets STA +2.)
300439.flavor: [A wound on the back is a disgrace for swordswomen. However, she received a medal of honor for rescuing her fellow knight.]

100218.name: Aspiring Sleuth Asmis
100218.ability: At the start of the turn, the third card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random card in the enemy Field or Hand with the same SIZE as the removed card is sent to the Grave.
100218.flavor: [Eheh! To be a detective, at the very least, you need the clothes!] [Is that pipe real? Won't it get confiscated if it's real?]

100219.name: Singer-songwriter Linus
100219.ability: At the start of the turn, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random allied Follower gets STA increased by half the SIZE of the removed card (rounding up).
100219.flavor: [Mm, the next chord... I don't like it... I'll just have to start over from the beginning!]

100210.name: 기사단의 전서 코챤
100210.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA -1. A random enemy Follower gets ATK +1/STA -2.
100210.flavor: [My name is Kocchan! My name is Kocchan! Respect the authority of birds!] [Kyaa! Is this bird for real?]

100211.name: 유치원의 레이나
100211.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets SIZE +1. That Follower gets STA increased by its SIZE, and a random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by the same amount (by a maximum of 3).
100211.flavor: [Mommy, Layna wants that teddy bear. I'll be a good girl starting from tomorrow.]

100212.name: 우승의 시니아
100212.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets DEF=0. If that Follower's change in DEF was 0, a card called "Thank You" is created in the first empty Slot of the enemy Field.
100212.flavor: [I've won these before, but this time feels special.]

100213.name: Pajama Asmis
100213.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower with the highest SIZE gets SIZE -2. If this happens, that Follower gets deactivated. If there are no allied Followers, a random enemy Follower gets SIZE +1.
100213.flavor: [Mom, I'm tired... School? I want to sleep more... Just let me transfer to another school...]

100214.name: Pajama Linus
100214.ability: At the start of the turn, the enemy Follower with the highest ATK gets deactivated. If this happens, that Follower gets ATK -2. If there are no enemy Followers, a random allied Follower gets STA +2.
100214.flavor: [Hello! What a wonderful morning! I'm Linus!]

100215.name: Pajama Rose
100215.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower with 7 or less ATK gets its ATK doubled. If this happens, that Follower gets deactivated. Otherwise, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2.
100215.flavor: [What a beautiful night. I wonder how Cinia is doing?]

100216.name: Pajama Helena
100216.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets deactivated. If this happens, that Follower and any adjacent Followers get ATK -1. A random allied Follower gets STA increased by the total ATK decrease.
100216.flavor: [I'm so full... I can't eat any more... Zzz...]

100217.name: 수호자 노빅
100217.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Follower have their skills changed to the following skill: "At the start of the turn, this card's original skills are restored."
100217.flavor: [My role is to protect this altar. However, this altar does not exist to protect something.]

110248.name: GS 5th Star
110248.ability: At the start of the turn, if the enemy Grave contains at least 12 cards, a random card in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave.
110248.flavor: [The Crux knights are here? Well, whatever. It'll be fun.]

110249.name: GS 5th Star
110249.ability: At the start of the turn, if the enemy Grave contains at least 15 cards, two random cards in the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave.
110249.flavor: [Hehe. Ahaha. Am I coming close to obtaining the thing that our leader desires? Hm? There were still some underlings left?]

300388.name: Blue Cross Infiltrator
300388.ability: Before attacking, if your Hand contains 2 or less cards, this Follower gets SIZE +2. If your Hand contains 4 or more cards, this skill is removed.
300388.flavor: [Normally, I'm the shop's idol, the waitress! But that's just one identity!]

300389.name: Seeker Dir. Sigmund
300389.ability: Before defending, this Follower gets ATK increased by half (rounding up) the attacker's ATK and gets STA increased by half (rounding down) the ATK increase.
300389.flavor: [Isn't it enough to research because of an apetite for knowledge? Using the sanctuary's power to fight in the battle... What are you trying to get?]

110242.name: Lib. Explorer
110242.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of Followers in the bottom 2 cards of your Deck.
110242.flavor: [If you aren't an explorer, then leave! This isn't a place for you to come and go as you wish.]

110243.name: Lib. Explorer Ritana
110243.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of Followers in the bottom 3 cards of your Deck.
110243.flavor: [I see that warning you wasn't enough. I don't care who you are. I'll make you leave!]

110240.name: Lib. Explorer Kanei
110240.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by 2 minus the number of enemy Shuffles. A random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of enemy Shuffles.
110240.flavor: [I ended up very deep in this place looking for rare books. Do you know the way out?]

110241.name: Shawn Kanei
110241.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/DEF/STA decreased by 2 minus the number of enemy Shuffles. A random allied Follower gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by 1 plus the number of enemy Shuffles.
110241.flavor: [Sometimes I get lost, but I feel better when the librarian is around. You know?]

110246.name: Witch Cadet
110246.ability: At the start of the turn, if the enemy Deck contains 20 or less cards, the enemy Character gets LIFE -2.
110246.flavor: [I wonder what the knights are looking for here. I have to find out.]

110247.name: Witch Cadet Zislana
110247.ability: At the start of the turn, if the enemy Deck contains 18 or less cards, the enemy Character gets LIFE -3.
110247.flavor: [I don't care if you're not with the knights. You're disturbing my investigation.]

110244.name: Tactician Knight
110244.ability: At the start of the turn, the last Follower in your Deck gets ATK +4/STA +4. All cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck.
110244.flavor: [Didn't you hear from our leader? The Crux knights are investigating this place.]

110245.name: Tactician Bermin
110245.ability: At the start of the turn, the last Follower in your Deck gets ATK +4/STA +4. All cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. A random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by half (rounding down) the number of sent cards.
110245.flavor: [Anyone who doesn't belong to the knights should return to the entrance. If you refuse, then I will force you to go.]

100074.name: Wedding Dress Clarice
100074.ability: At the start of the turn, allied cards with "Homunculus Escort" in the name are sent to the Grave. A Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/ATK =5/DEF =0/STA =5.
100074.flavor: [I got this as a reward for the wedding event. Does it suit me? I really wanted you to see it, Luthica. You're the first person that I cared about.

100075.name: Lig Nijes
100075.ability: At the start of the turn, the following effects are applied depending on the enemy Character's LIFE. 26 or more: The enemy Character gets LIFE -1 and your Character gets LIFE +1. 15~20: The enemy Character gets LIFE -2. 9 or less: Your Character gets LIFE +1.
100075.flavor: [Bring me more. Blood. I only drink pure blood. You'll be with me at any time. First a little service. You'll dress me, too.]

100076.name: Child Nold
100076.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number and number of cards in your Hand are both odd or both even, a random allied Follower with a SIZE of at least 2 gets SIZE -2 (to a minimum of 1).
100076.flavor: [What? You want to help? I can at least survive this.]

100077.name: Child Cannelle
100077.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Hand gets SIZE =1/ATK =5/DEF = 0/STA =7.
100077.flavor: [Yellow is the color of dignity, right? So how come these dignified clothes seem strange?]

100070.name: Street Idol Clarice
100070.ability: At the start of the turn, allied cards with "Homunculus Escort" in the name are sent to the Grave. If the ones digit of the Turn Number is at least 1, a Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/DEF =1. That Follower gets ATK/STA changed to equal 10 minus the ones digit of the Turn Number.
100070.flavor: [We can do anything! If we're together~ You'll definitely meet us~ Something will start to change~ To a new tomorrow~ Singing with me is my homunculus. Give her some applause!]

100071.name: Assistant Clarice
100071.ability: At the start of the turn, allied cards with "Homunculus Escort" in the name are removed from the game. A Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/ATK =1/DEF =0/STA =9.
100071.flavor: [I want to get Luthica out of there... there has got to be a way. She was my first friend I made when I came here... I can't abandon her.]

100072.name: Swimwear Clarice
100072.ability: At the start of the turn, allied cards with "Homunculus Escort" in the name are sent to the Grave. Next, a Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/ATK =7/DEF =0/STA =2.
100072.flavor: [Luthica! How is it? Cute, right? I'm an idol, so I wouldn't be able to make a living if I couldn't be cute!]

100073.name: Dress Clarice
100073.ability: At the start of the turn, allied cards with "Homunculus Escort" in the name are sent to the Grave. A Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/ATK =3/DEF =0/STA =3. That Follower gets this skill: "Before this card attacks, the defender gets SIZE +1, and then this skill is removed."
100073.flavor: [This is the dress I'll wear at the next performance. Luthica? Hey! Listen to me!]

300546.name: Seeker Beryl
300546.ability: Before defending, if you have a Crux Character, the first card in the enemy Deck is sent to the enemy Hand. If the sent card is a Follower, it gets DEF -1. If it is a Spell, your Character gets LIFE +1. // Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1.
300546.flavor: [Hold on... That's a beautiful crystal you have there. Will you lend it to me for a bit?]

300547.name: Scardel Unit Tyrfing
300547.ability: Before attacking, this card and neighboring Followers get ATK +1.
300547.flavor: [This is one of the Scardel's covert fighters. During emergencies, she independently carries out her mission.]

300544.name: Knight's Parrot Kocchan
300544.ability: Before defending, the attacker gets its STA halved (rounding up) and gets ATK increased by the STA reduction. This skill is removed.
300544.flavor: [Drill! This is a drill for a level 2 security breach!]

300545.name: Knight Manager
300545.ability: Before attacking, if this Follower's ATK is less than the defender's total DEF+STA, this Follower gets ATK increased by the defender's DEF.
300545.flavor: [Please let me know in advance if you plan to take a leave next month.]

100078.name: Child Gart
100078.ability: At the start of the turn, if there are no Academy cards in your Hand and Field, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +1.

100079.name: Child Panica
100079.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets STA +3. If the Turn Number is even, that Follower also gets ATK +1.
100079.flavor: [Don't look at me like that! I just look like this because I used up all my magic!]

300540.name: Girl Detective Asmis
300540.ability: Before defending, all allied Followers get the following effects depending on their types. "Library Club": ATK +1. "Student Council": DEF +1. "Cook Club": SIZE -1. "Asmis": ATK +1/STA +1. Others: STA +2.
300540.flavor: [In order to solve this case, you need courage. The courage to lie to your lover, the courage to admit defeat... you need at least this much courage.]

300541.name: Paladin Lady
300541.ability: Before defending, if this Follower is still active, it gets DEF +1/STA +2 and becomes deactivated. (Note: This card is intentionally not a "Knight".)
300541.flavor: [We cooperate with the police for the sake of the public order of Royle City.]

300329.name: Producer Maid
300329.ability: Before attacking, the first card in your Deck with "Maid" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field. If this happens, this card gets ATK/STA increased by half the sent card's SIZE (rounding up). This skill is removed.
300329.flavor: [An administrative maid. A white collar maid who doesn't do chores. Nobody knows why the position even exists. It's probably because the master hates doing any kind of work.]

300281.name: Council Press Winfield
300281.ability: Before attacking, the first Follower in your Deck with "Student Council" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. // Before defending, the first card in your Hand with "Student Council" in the name is sent to the bottom of your Deck, and this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2.
300281.flavor: [I'm Winfield, from the press office. I'm here to take the president's picture. Why a swimsuit? ... Of course, it's to sell.]

300280.name: Cook Club Critic
300280.ability: Before defending, this card gets STA increased by the number of adjacent cards belonging to the same faction as this card and gets ATK increased by half (rounding up) that amount.
300280.flavor: [She's the daughter of the owner of "Eat a lot," the alliance's leading 4-star restaurant. Even now, she uses a Talentium knife to make food. She has the power to make delicious food.]

300098.name: Scardel Sangiovese
300098.flavor: [How about shopping at night? We can use this street to enjoy ourselves without revealing our identities. It is different from Crux. I like this street.]

300099.name: Scardel Viognier
300099.flavor: [I came as announced! Isn't it fine for a thief to come confidently? Once I've decided to get something, it never slips away from me. My announcements are the future.]

210049.name: 레이피어
210049.flavor: [A long sword with a sharp tip. This is a weapon for quick attacks to subdue your opponent. -Esprit's notebook]

210048.name: 카나의 파편
210048.flavor: [Whether this is a fragment that came out from Kana or a fragment of Kana itself, we don't know. But one thing is certain: the Kana from our imaginations does not exist.] [Location: Altar of Kana]

210045.name: 레플리카 스틱
210045.flavor: [A souvenir from the Muzisitter Land. Highly recommended for girls aiming to join Muzisitter!] [Location: Muzisitter Land]

210044.name: Black Lion's Claw
210044.flavor: [A claw from the mysterious Black Lion, who resembled Nold. Its strength exceeds that of ordinary Talentium.]

300092.name: Seeker Irene
300092.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +2, then this skill is removed.
300092.flavor: [What brings you here? Did you want to see the girl who locks herself up with books? Ah~ well, it's fine. Sometimes I want to talk to people, too. Did you have something to say to me?]

210046.name: Commemorative Medal
210046.flavor: [A medal that shines gold. Where did you get this?] [Location: Weekly the Legend]

210041.name: Copper Talentium
210041.flavor: [A rare Talentium with a copper glow.]

210040.name: Police Notebook
210040.flavor: [This is the identification possessed by the members of the Royle Police Force. It is a serious problem if someone unaffiliated with the police comes into possession of one of these.] [Location: Royle City]

210043.name: Gold Talentium
210043.flavor: [Golden Talentium can be obtained by refining silver Talentium.]

210042.name: Silver Talentium
210042.flavor: [Silver Talentium can be obtained by refining copper Talentium.]

200347.name: Dark Sword Refinement
200347.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, you get Shuffles +5 and one random allied Follower gets ATK/DEF/STA decreased by the number of enemy Shuffles, then the enemy gets Shuffles -1. This card is removed from the game.
200347.flavor: [It will be finished soon.] [A-GA is pouring a red liquid over the sword with unfocused eyes.] [The liquid creates evil vibrations in the sword. The echoes sound like laughter.]

200346.name: Shaman's Prayer
200346.ability: Two random allied Darklore Followers get ATK increased by the total DEF of all enemy Followers and get STA decreased by half (rounding up) the total DEF of all enemy Followers minus 1.
200346.flavor: [Helena looks very devout with her hands clasped together in prayer.] [Mommy, what's that thing behind her?] [Shh, be quiet. Miss Helena is praying.]

200345.name: Scout's Attitude
200345.ability: The first allied Follower regains its original skills and gets ATK +1/STA +1.
200345.flavor: [This is the enemy's base... my hands are shaking, but I'm not afraid.] [You might think that since you might be caught, you have to be in the best condition. That's not true. The fright is enough.]

200344.name: Understanding
200344.ability: All cards on the enemy Field with an odd SIZE and all allied non-Crux cards are sent to the Grave.
200344.flavor: [Even though they didn't know each other, the two understood that they were similar. It was the most natural feeling in the world.]

200343.name: Armor Break
200343.ability: The allied Follower with the lowest STA is destroyed. If your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, a number of random enemy Followers equal to half the destroyed Follower's SIZE (rounding down) are sent to the Grave.
200343.flavor: [Kyaa! Wha, what was that? A sneeze?!]

200342.name: Excavation
200342.ability: If your Field contains a Follower, the following effect is applied a number of times equal to the difference in the number of cards on your Field and the enemy Field: "A random enemy Follower gets SIZE +1/ATK -1."
200342.flavor: [Don't rest your hands, even for a little bit! We must quickly find it! If you find an artifact, shout loudly!]

200341.name: Chair's Conspiracy
200341.ability: If you have an Academy Character and the number of Spells on the enemy Field is greater than or equal to the number of Followers on the enemy Field, a random enemy Follower is sent to the Grave. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by twice the sent Follower's SIZE (by a maximum of 10).
200341.flavor: [Seven was not excluded from Linia's plans of turning people into witches. Seven's distrust and spirit of revenge would turn her into a burning witch. Can Linia also turn ordinary girls into witches?]

200340.name: Appointment
200340.ability: Two random allied Followers get STA increased by the number of Spells in the top 5 cards of your Deck and get ATK increased by the number of Followers in the top 5 cards of your Deck.
200340.flavor: [Seron was appointed as the new head maid. Al the maids started leaving one by one. Some strange rumors about Linia were spreading around. After being called out, some strange magic would be used, and they would undergo some kind of examination...]

300325.name: Animal Suit Luthica
300325.ability: Before attacking, this Follower gets the following effects depending on the number of cards on your Field with "Luthica" in the name. 1: ATK +1/STA +1. 2: ATK +1/STA +2. 3 or more: ATK +2/STA +3.
300325.flavor: [Luthica, how do you like your new pajamas? Lu, Luthica? Even though they're pajamas, you still need to wear something underneath. Oh no, what's that string?!] [It, it's a sacrifice for the sake of fashion... sniff.]

200349.name: Lucky Coin
