200349.flavor: [It feels like you'll be able to take the initiative next turn.]

200348.name: Sage's Advice
200348.ability: Two random allied Followers get ATK +3/STA +3.
200348.flavor: [Remember. Do not call her Rio. Right now, within Rio lies the mother demon. If Rio is awakened too quickly, everything will fall into the whirlpool of chaos.]

200019.name: Mass Recall
200019.ability: All cards on the enemy Field with a SIZE of 3 or less and all cards on your Field that do not belong to Academy are sent to the Grave.
200019.flavor: [Go back, warm tea and sweets have been prepared. Let's tea time!]

200018.name: Swap Spell
200018.ability: The first enemy Follower and a Follower in Slot 3 in your Field get SIZE, ATK, DEF, and STA swapped.
200018.flavor: [The basic principle of a fight is to find out where the opponent is stronger than you. Hm? It should be where the opponent is weaker? I don't need that. I just take their strengths, anyway.]

200017.name: Curse
200017.ability: If you have an Academy Character, two random enemy Followers get ATK -2/STA -2.
200017.flavor: [The foundation of curses is to believe the enemy is weaker than you. Because of that, Cinia is excellent at curses. She believes there is nobody stronger than her.]

200016.name: Bondage
200016.ability: Three random enemy Followers get SIZE +1.
200016.flavor: [You've been caught! Once you've been shackled, you can't escape!]

200015.name: Tighten Security
200015.ability: The first allied Academy Follower gets DEF changed to equal the number of Academy cards in your Hand.
200015.flavor: [I have to bring Rose to the meeting place safely. This meeting must be important.]

200014.name: Noble Sacrifice
200014.ability: The first allied Academy Follower with the highest SIZE is sent to the Grave, and then your Character gets LIFE increased by twice that card's SIZE. (by a maximum of 9).
200014.flavor: [It's like putting the bell on the cat. To the maids, putting her shoes on is an important task.]

200013.name: She Did It
200013.ability: If there are allied Followers with "Maid" in the name, all allied Followers get SIZE =1. Next, an affected Follower gets SIZE increased by the total SIZE reduction and gets STA increased by half of its new SIZE (rounding down).
200013.flavor: [It... it wasn't me, it was her! I swear by my master's name that I would never break it!] [I'm your master...]

200012.name: New Maid Training
200012.ability: Two random allied Academy Followers get ATK +2/STA +2.
200012.flavor: [Learn the way things work at this mansion, okay?] [Yes!]

200011.name: Accident
200011.ability: Two random enemy Followers get ATK/STA decreased by the number of allied Followers with "Maid" in the name.

200010.name: Volcano
200010.ability: A random enemy Follower gets ATK/DEF/STA decreased by the number of Vita Followers in your Hand.

300164.name: Contract Witch
300164.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's SIZE is less than this Follower's SIZE, this Follower gets ATK +1/DEF +1.
300164.flavor: [Won't you form a contract with me? I invite you to a more wonderful world!]

300165.name: Crescent Elder Riesling
300165.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1.
300165.flavor: [How dull. I don't really care for the current head. A change is needed.]

300166.name: Vampire Hunter Ire Flina
300166.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave. This Follower gets STA +2.
300166.flavor: [You who obstruct night's rest and gorge yourselves on blood, I will send you back to god!]

300167.name: Scardel Elder Barbera
300167.ability: Before defending, if this Follower and your Character belong to the same faction, the Darklore Follower in your Grave with the largest SIZE is removed from the game. An identical Follower is created in the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE -1 and ATK/STA increased by this card's DEF. This skill is removed.
300167.flavor: [Change shouldn't occur too quickly. Things should change more gradually. Why don't we make use of the witches?]

300160.name: Crux Knight Fleta
300160.ability: Before defending, if this Follower and your Character belong to the same faction, all allied Crux Followers get ATK +3/DEF +1/STA +4, then this skill is removed.
300160.flavor: [Luthica, carry out your own justice. Hesitation will dull your blade.]

300161.name: Scardel Canaiolo
300161.flavor: [The elders have begun to move... Whatever they do is too much~! I just want to live peacefully.]

300162.name: Crescent Muscat
300162.flavor: [I'm leaving... I have a bad feeling about this place.]

300163.name: Magic Circle Witch
300163.ability: Before attacking, if your Grave contains at least 2 cards, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game, then a random card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
300163.flavor: [With this, my begging days as a maid will be over. When this spell is complete, my freedom will begin.]

300168.name: Sweet Lady Isfeldt
300168.ability: Before attacking, this Follower gets STA +2. // Before defending, if the attacker's SIZE is equal or less than this Follower's SIZE, the attacker is sent to the top of the enemy Deck, then this Follower gets STA +2. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300168.flavor: [What about that red-haired lady? I'm going to have a fit if she intends to buy those sweets before me...]

300169.name: Lib. Student
300169.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets SIZE +1, then this skill is removed.
300169.flavor: [Sitting here and reading a book in peace is the most enjoyable time. No? I wouldn't say that. Devouring books... What are you talking about?]

200123.name: Meteor Call
200123.ability: All enemy Followers get STA decreased by the number of Followers in both Fields, and all allied Followers get STA decreased by the number of enemy Followers.
200123.flavor: [Stars. Fire. The time of ruin is upon this land. Now, heavens... fall!]

200122.name: Obedience
200122.ability: If you have an Academy Character, a random enemy Follower with a SIZE of 4 or less gets SIZE +2. If the Follower's new SIZE is at least 5, it gets STA -3.
200122.flavor: [I, I'm not an easy girl! I'm just going to your house so I can take over... whatever. Let's go.]

200121.name: Refreshments
200121.ability: All Academy Followers in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. For each sent Follower, a Spell in the enemy Hand gets SIZE +1 and is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
200121.flavor: [It's been a long time since Cinia came! Make sure the preparations are going according to plan!]

200120.name: Dress Up Rise
200120.ability: If there are allied Followers with "Dress Up" in the name, a random enemy card is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.

200127.name: Cross Cut
200127.ability: The last two Crux cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, two random enemy Followers are deactivated. If there are allied cards with "Knight" or "Blue Cross" in the name, those enemy Followers also get STA -2.
200127.flavor: [Those who can cut are simply those with the determination to cut.]

200126.name: Fast Forward
200126.ability: Crux Followers in your Hand are sent to the Grave. If this happens, the last allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by twice the number of sent cards.
200126.flavor: [The Chrono Clock's true power is to accelerate the body. For 10 seconds, a person can exceed the normal limitations of speed. We call this ability "Clock Up".]

200125.name: Doubt
200125.ability: If you have an Academy Character, the first allied Academy Follower is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random enemy Follower gets ATK =1/STA =1. Next, if your Character has "Cinia" in the name, a random enemy Follower that has a STA of at least 2 and possesses a skill gets ATK =1/STA =1.
200125.flavor: [Is this true? I can't trust anyone anymore... I'm disgusted by the blood running through my veins.]

200124.name: Servant's Ward
200124.ability: If you have an Academy Character, the first enemy Follower with the highest SIZE other than 1 gets SIZE =1, and then two random enemy Followers get ATK/STA decreased by the enemy Follower's former SIZE.
200124.flavor: [In the name of all maids, I will protect master Cinia!]

100179.name: Child Rose
100179.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2. If your Field does not contain a Follower, a random Follower is sent from your Hand to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE -1. If that Follower belongs to Crux, it gets an additional DEF +1/STA +1.
100179.flavor: [Where did Linia and Cinia go? Are they in the garden?]

200129.name: Azure Cross Meeting
200129.ability: Two random enemy non-Crux Followers get ATK -2/STA -2. If there are three or fewer cards in your Hand, the top cards in your Deck are sent to your Hand until there are four cards in your Hand. (Note: This card's name intentionally does not use the phrase "Blue Cross.")
200129.flavor: [You think there's a new group of vigilantes created to defeat the night? If you buy me another drink, I think I might be able to tell you a bit more... What do you think? Hehe...]

200128.name: Planned Misfortune
200128.ability: Allied Followers with a SIZE equal to or greater than the SIZE of the enemy Follower with the lowest SIZE get ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
200128.flavor: [Linia, I feel a little strange these days. When I have to make a decision, it often feels like my will is not my own. Something is eating away at me. Like something is coming out from deep within my consciousness.

300368.name: Council Press Maiyen
300368.ability: Before attacking, this Follower gets STA +3. If there are any allied Followers that do not have this skill, this skill is sent to a random allied Follower without this skill.
300368.flavor: [Um... Attention... Please listen...] [Even the megaphone that the president gave her was pointless.]

110122.name: 3rd Witness DTD
110122.ability: At the start of the turn, all cards on the enemy Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
110122.flavor: [This is a warning. According to the guidelines that we, the space time police, have set, this world must be destroyed.]

110129.name: Night Teacher
110129.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower is moved to the next empty Slot on the enemy Field and gets STA decreased by its new Slot number. (If it is in Slot 5, it is moved to Slot 1.)
110129.flavor: [The darkness of night hides the truth. History is made during the night.]

110128.name: Scardel Pinot Noir
110128.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by the SIZE of the first allied Follower.
110128.flavor: [I'm taking a break. It doesn't matter how you do it, but rest is important.]

120032.name: 탁구의 아이리
120032.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1. If the Turn Number is 1, all cards in your Deck get SIZE -1 and all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +2.
120032.flavor: [That ball. It will return to me.] [Th-that's! That's the "Flina Zone"!]

120033.name: 노숙자 카넬
120033.ability: At the start of the turn, two random Followers in your Hand get SIZE +1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. A random Follower in your hand gets STA increased by its SIZE. A random enemy Follower gets SIZE -1/ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1.
120033.flavor: [Leave me alone. I'm just a poor homeless girl.]

300249.name: Campus Waitress
300249.ability: Before defending, if this Follower has at least 1 ATK, it gets ATK -1/DEF +1/STA +1.
300249.flavor: [This is the apron of the school's special restaurant. How is it? Is the design okay?]

300248.name: Tennis Lure
300248.ability: At the start of the turn, one random allied and enemy Follower swap skills.
300248.flavor: [Ack! I'm late! Uwaa I have to brush my teeth and wash my hair, then I have to dry my hair too. Ack, clock, clock!]

300328.name: Council Press Student
300328.ability: Before attacking, all allied Followers with "Student Council" in the name get ATK +1. // Before defending, all allied Followers with "Student Council" in the name get STA +1.
300328.flavor: [I want to capture a cool image of the student council. No matter the time or place, I'll be with you!]

200053.name: Sister's Letter
200053.ability: All enemy Followers with the highest SIZE get ATK/DEF/STA decreased by their Slot number.
200053.flavor: [To Cinia Pacifica. How are you? I'll be attending the magic summit, too.]

200052.name: Magic Society Invite
200052.ability: The second allied Academy Follower's DEF/STA becomes equal to DEF/STA of the allied Follower in Slot 1.
200052.flavor: [The Academy invited us to go to their magic summit, Sita, Vernika. If you're interested, why don't you come along? You two are pretty famous.]

200051.name: Magic Stone Found
200051.ability: The first Academy card in your Hand is sent to the Grave. Two random enemy Followers get ATK -1/DEF -2.

200050.name: Lineage Maintenance
200050.ability: Allied Academy Followers with a Slot number equal to their SIZE get ATK +3/STA +3.
200050.flavor: [They worried about how to preserve their superior bloodline... they decided on this method... but the results were disastrous, no more boys were born.]

200057.name: Study of Miracles
200057.ability: Allied Followers with "Seeker" in the name get ATK +2/STA +1.
200057.flavor: [At least you can drink tea. It's not good for your body to constantly sit like that. You should go out and get some fresh air sometimes.]

200056.name: Sense of Belonging
200056.ability: A random enemy Follower that does not belong to the enemy Character's faction is deactivated and sent to the first empty Slot in your Field.

200055.name: No Turning Back
200055.ability: If there are any allied Followers, and if the enemy Field SIZE is odd, a random enemy Follower is destroyed. If the enemy Field SIZE is even, a random allied Follower is sent to the Grave.
200055.flavor: [Hold your swords! Crux knights are always ready for an honorable death!]

200054.name: Dark Secret
200054.ability: If you have an Academy Character, the enemy card with the higher SIZE in Slots 2 and 4 is destroyed and the card with the lower SIZE is sent to the Grave. If you do not have an Academy Character, the enemy card with the higher SIZE in Slots 2 and 4 is sent to the Grave and the card with the lower SIZE is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. (An empty Slot is considered to have a SIZE of 0. No effect if both Slots contain cards with the same SIZE.)
200054.flavor: [Sister...] [Please don't say anything else. I'm sorry for hiding this from my precious sister... please forgive me.]

100119.name: Crux Knight Rose
100119.ability: At the start of the turn, if there are five cards in your Hand, the first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK/STA increased by the number of empty Slots in your Hand (by a maximum of 2). If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
100119.flavor: [I feel like I have something in common with that girl without memories. The loneliness of being abandoned...]

100118.name: Apostle L Red Sun
100118.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. It gets an additional STA +2 if the top card in your Deck is a Follower.
100118.flavor: [Don't back down! You are the ones who must take up the role of giving hope to believers! Don't abandon it!]

100113.name: Council VP Tieria
100113.ability: At the start of the turn, if you have a Follower on the Field with "Student Council" in the name, a random allied Follower with "Student Council" in the name gets the following effects depending on how many Vita Followers are on your Field. 1: ATK +1/STA +2. 2 or more: SIZE -1/ATK +1/STA +2.
100113.flavor: [Everyone in the student council, you don't need to worry. Everything is going according to my plans. This accident won't affect our timeline.]

100112.name: Office Chief Esprit
100112.ability: At the start of the turn, one of the following effects is applied depending on the number of skills in your Field. 2 or less: A random enemy Follower's skills are removed. More than 2: A random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by half of the number of skills in your Field (rounding up).
100112.flavor: [1E! 2D! 3A! 4P! 5G!] [I'll chase you to the end of the galaxy! Run until your spirit sweats and bleeds!]

100111.name: Conflicted Iri
100111.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2. If the number of cards in your Deck is less than or equal to the number of cards in the enemy Deck, a random enemy Follower gets STA -3 and a random other enemy Follower gets STA -1. If all cards in your Hand and Field belong to this Character's faction and there are at least five cards in your Grave, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
100111.flavor: [The sage gave her an offer. "I can help you walk under the sun again." Enrolling into Vita, living in the office. Iri was torn.]

100110.name: Wanderer Luthica
100110.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2. If the number of cards in your Deck is less than or equal to the number of cards in the enemy Deck, a random allied Follower gets STA +1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If all cards in your Hand and Field belong to this Character's faction and there are at least five cards in your Grave, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
100110.flavor: [Luthica left with Clarice. She believed it would be for a long time.]

100117.name: Ereshkigal
100117.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, a random Follower in your Field/Hand and the first Follower in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +1, then your Character gets LIFE +1. If the Turn Number is even, a random Follower in the enemy Hand/Field and the first Follower in the enemy Deck gets ATK -1/STA -1, then the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. Ereshkigal can draw out additional effects from Muspelheim cards.
100117.flavor: [I am Ereshkigal. I am the ruler of the underworld. What business do you have here?]

100116.name: Lightning Palomporom
100116.ability: At the start of the turn, if you have a Follower on the Field with "Witch" in the name, a random allied Follower with "Witch" in the name gets the following effects depending on how many Darklore Followers are on your Field. 1: ATK +1/STA +2. 2 or more: SIZE -1/ATK +1/STA +2.
100116.flavor: [For someone to be considered a "queen" by everyone, you must have a glorious existence. That girl calls herself a queen, but I will oppose her.]

100115.name: Seeker Odien
100115.ability: At the start of the turn, if you have a Follower on the Field with "Seeker" in the name, a random allied Follower with "Seeker" in the name gets the following effects depending on how many Crux Followers are on your Field. 1: ATK +1/STA +2. 2 or more: SIZE -1/ATK +1/STA +2.
100115.flavor: [Difficult times won't stop us. The seekers' research will continue. I believe the same thing as Irene.]

100114.name: Maid Lesnoa
100114.ability: At the start of the turn, if you have a Follower on the Field with "Maid" in the name, a random allied Follower with "Maid" in the name gets the following effects depending on how many Academy Followers are on your Field. 1: ATK +1/STA +2. 2 or more: SIZE -1/ATK +1/STA +2.
100114.flavor: [Maids don't just require a place to sleep and things to eat. They also need a place to calm down... a place to rest.]

300560.name: Witch Palomporom
300560.ability: Before attacking, this card's DEF is swapped with the defender's DEF. This skill is removed. // Before defending, the attacker gets STA increased by its own DEF.
300560.flavor: [After hearing what Herionne said, I can't allow things to go on like this any longer. I will find the deadly witch and that girl.]

300561.name: GS Agent
300561.ability: Before attacking, a random card in your Grave with "GS" in the name is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
300561.flavor: [5th Star mentioned someone with a strange sword... Who could it be? There's one or two people it could be. More importantly, did the Aletheians have that kind of power? They aren't the pushover sponsors we thought they were. First, I'll get in contact...]

300562.name: Helena's Right Hand Rue
300562.ability: Before attacking, if you have a Darklore Character and this card's SIZE and the defender's SIZE have a difference of at least 3, the defender is sent to your Grave. If this happens, this card gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the defender was not sent to your Grave, this card gets STA increased by 1 plus the difference between this card's SIZE and the defender's SIZE.
300562.flavor: [Don't worry about who I am. I merely convey Miss Helena's will. Just obey my words.]

300563.name: Riftwatcher Schrodinger
300563.ability: Before defending, this Follower swaps its ATK/DEF/STA with the enemy Follower with the greatest ATK/DEF/STA. This Follower loses all skills, and all skills of the swapped Follower are moved to this Follower.
300563.flavor: [Let's see, let's see. Oh~ This place looks interesting. Shall I pay it a visit?] [Hovering within the space between spaces, outside of the space time continuum, the very existence of this mysterious existence is a mystery.]

300564.name: 잠입마녀 파르푼테
300564.ability: Before defending, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. This skill is removed.
300564.flavor: [I came here to follow the Witch Queen's tracks, but this uniform is way too tight. Were kids always this underdeveloped?]

300565.name: 동물옷의 레이나
300565.ability: Before defending, this Follower's STA is doubled, then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300565.flavor: [P... Press member!] [This is also for the benefit of the school~]

300421.name: Seeker Eternia
300421.ability: Before attacking, the allied Follower in Slot 2 of your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300421.flavor: [This... is an artifact?] [At that moment, a voice echoed through Melissa's head?] [Only you can hear this voice. Miss Melissa?]

300420.name: Muzisitter Lady Freesia
300420.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1. // Before defending, if this card and your Character belong to the same faction, the attacker gets ATK/DEF/STA decreased by half (rounding up) the increase in any of the respective stats from their base values. This card gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by any decrease in the attacker's stats respectively. If the total increase in stats is less than 1, this card gets STA +2.
300420.flavor: [Come! Back! We will wash away all the tears of this world!]

300423.name: Crux Knight Ibis
300423.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1. // Before defending, if this card and your Character belong to the same faction, the attacker gets ATK/DEF/STA decreased by half (rounding up) the increase in any of the respective stats from their base values. This card gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by any decrease in the attacker's stats respectively. If the total increase in stats is less than 1, this card gets STA +2.
300423.flavor: [Can it even be scratched? This shield has been blessed by the goddess.]

300422.name: Crux Knight Pipit
300422.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets DEF -1. // Before defending, this Follower gets STA +1.
300422.flavor: [Next time, I plan to kill you. Be careful. Even if you don't see anything, even if you don't hear anything.]

300425.name: Witch Familiar Chuchu
300425.ability: Before attacking, a random allied Follower other than this one gets SIZE -1, then this skill is removed.
300425.flavor: [Each witch decides on her own familiar depending on her own preference. Among the wide variety of familiars that witches have chosen, there are even some that no longer fall into the category of animals. There exist some witches who have gone to the forest to make fairy dryads their familiars.]

300424.name: Crescent Silvaner
300424.ability: Before defending, this card gets STA +2.
300424.flavor: [No. My doll...] [There wasn't just one girl in the basement tightly clutching a teddy bear. What kind of place is this...]

300427.name: Sita Vilosa
300427.ability: Before attacking, enemy Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 get STA -1.
300427.flavor: [I am looking for master's object... have you seen it? My name? Sita Vilosa.]

300426.name: Enchanting Witch Curea
300426.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1. // Before defending, if this card and your Character belong to the same faction, the attacker gets ATK/DEF/STA decreased by half (rounding up) the increase in any of the respective stats from their base values. This card gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by any decrease in the attacker's stats respectively. If the total increase in stats is less than 1, this card gets STA +2.
300426.flavor: [This night is lovely. Shall I make someone happy today? Romantic love? Passionate love? Huhuhu...]

300429.name: Luthica Preventer
300429.ability: Before attacking, a random allied Crux Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300429.flavor: [Luthica Preventer! I fight for the pride of the Crux knights. Prepare yourself.]

300428.name: Cinia Pacifica
300428.ability: Before attacking, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1.
300428.flavor: [Hu hu hu. Is there anyone who can keep up with the beautiful and smart me?]

300567.name: 정원의 레이디
300567.ability: Before attacking, a random enemy active card is deactivated, then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300567.flavor: [Watch your step. These are small and fragile children.]

100207.name: Luthica Cosplay Rico
100207.flavor: [This is the uniform of the Crux knights' adjutant, Luthica. It's a little too big for me...]

100206.name: Cinia Cosplay Rico
100206.flavor: [This is the dress of the Pacifica house's youngest daughter, Cinia! It's really pretty, isn't it?]

100205.name: Sita Cosplay Rico
100205.flavor: [These are the clothes of Vita Public School's Miss Sita! She becomes twice as cute when she sees something to eat!]

100204.name: 언하우스 카넬
100204.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Deck with a SIZE of 2 or less gets SIZE +1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +2 and is sent to the first empty Slot of your Hand.
100204.flavor: [Sniff, the pidgeons in the Royle Park get fed more than I do.]

100203.name: 해적 시온리온
100203.ability: At the start of the turn, the first card in your Grave is removed from the game and a card called "Shion Flina" or "Rion Flina" is created at the top of your Grave. If the first card in your Grave has "Shion" in the name, all allied Followers get STA +2. If the first card in your Grave has "Rion" in the name, all allied Followers get ATK +1.
100203.flavor: [I'm the captain, and you're my underling. Hurry up and get dressed.] [Hng. Again?]

100202.name: 성수 역의 시타
100202.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA -2. If this happens, a random allied Follower gets STA +2.
100202.flavor: [Sita! The only person who can contact Miss Gart is you!] [Gart is over there...] [Huh? I feel left out...]

100201.name: Ikebana Helena
100201.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK increased by the number of Followers in the top 4 cards of your Grave (by a maximum of 3). If that Follower's ATK is at least 10, a random Follower in the enemy Hand gets ATK decreased by the SIZE of the 4th card in your Grave. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.

100200.name: Horseback Rose
100200.ability: At the start of the turn, the following effects are applied depending on the number of cards in your Hand. 2 or less: The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +2/DEF +1/STA +2. 4 or more: The first Follower on your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
100200.flavor: [Hah! Ha! This is a good horse.]

100209.name: 최후의 목격자 카나GLS
100209.ability: At the start of the turn, an enemy Follower with a total ATK/DEF/STA of at least 30 gets SIZE +2 and is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
100209.flavor: [Are you sure? It's not bad, but it may have unforseen consequences.]

100208.name: Iri Cosplay Rico
100208.flavor: [Thse are the clothes of the Flina house's Iri. Growl! Can I be a little scary, too?]

110259.name: 펭귄옷의 시타
110259.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Field contains a card with "Sita" in the name, all cards on your Field get SIZE -1 and all allied Followers get ATK +2/STA +2. Otherwise, two random enemy Followers get ATK -2/STA -2.
110259.flavor: [Sita, that suit is cute!] [Cute Sita!] [Cute penguin suit~] [Uuu...]

110258.name: 트리애나
110258.ability: At the start of the turn, the first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. All enemy Followers with skills lose their skills and get ATK -2/STA -2.
110258.flavor: [You can really feel the boys' passion during the festival.] [Are you doing that on purpose?]

300399.name: Council Help Monthly
300399.flavor: [The cold energizes me. Like this, my ability to catch rule breakers doubles.]

300398.name: Head Apostle Helena
300398.ability: Before attacking, all Followers in the enemy Hand get STA -1. If there are no Followers, this Follower gets STA +3. If your Character has "Helena" in the name, this Follower gets ATK +1 (once per turn). // Before defending, all Followers in the enemy Hand get ATK -1. If there are no Followers, this Follower gets STA +3. If your Character has "Helena" in the name, this Follower gets ATK +1 (once per turn).
300398.flavor: [My mission is to spread our teachings and show the people the proper path.]

110251.name: Constable E-ROMA
110251.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets DEF/STA decreased by half its SIZE (rounding up).
110251.flavor: [The kidnapping suspect and the kidnapped child... Is this the same person that A-GA is looking for? I need to investigate more.]

110250.name: RPD Constable
110250.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by half its SIZE (rounding up).
110250.flavor: [I am the constable of the Royle Police Force, E-ROMA. Please cooperate for a moment.]

110253.name: Corporal Vedia
110253.ability: At the start of the turn, the first enemy Follower with the highest STA is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. The last Follower in your Hand gets ATK/STA increased by half the sent Follower's SIZE (rounding down).
110253.flavor: [This kidnapping affair suddenly came up, and now we're carrying out a huge manhunt. What's going on?]

110252.name: RPD Corporal
110252.ability: At the start of the turn, the first enemy Follower with the highest STA is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. The last Follower in your Hand gets STA increased by half the sent Follower's SIZE (rounding down).
110252.flavor: [I am the corporal of the Royle Police Force, Vedia. I will do this peacefully. Take out whatever you're hiding. Hurry up.]

110255.name: Sergeant Cisela
110255.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field, has its SIZE halved (rounding up), and gets ATK +2.
110255.flavor: [What are E-ROMA and Vedia so curious about? If you just do as you're told, it'll be alright...]

110254.name: RPD Sergeant
110254.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field and has its SIZE halved (rounding up).
110254.flavor: [I am the corporal... no, the sergeant of the Royle Police Force, Sisela. Please cooperate. I'm still not used to this position.]

110257.name: 경위 케이
110257.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower with at least 20 ATK is moved to the first empty Slot of your Field.
110257.flavor: [You can't be careless during a festival. This is when incidents are more likely to occur.]

110256.name: 학생주임 리안나
110256.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in your Field. The Follower gets the following effects applied depending on its new Slot number. 1~3: STA +3. 3~5: ATK +2/STA +2.
110256.flavor: [Just because the festival is getting closer, you shouldn't make rash decisions. You should stay calm and keep your composure.]

100063.name: Child Laevateinn
100063.ability: At the start of the turn, if there are at least two cards in your Hand with the same SIZE, those cards are sent to the bottom of your Deck. Your Character gets LIFE increased by half of the SIZE of the sent cards (by a maximum of 4, rounding up).
100063.flavor: [Is this the one you want? Interesting, I kind of doubt your preference, but... well, whatever. That man bluntly said that his "game" is starting.]

100062.name: Child Ginger
100062.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2, and then is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2.
100062.flavor: [You'll always be a person of climax.] [Cli... max?]

100061.name: Child Jaina
100061.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1 and a random allied Follower gets ATK +2 .
100061.flavor: [Hey old man, why are you being nice to me? T.. Thank you for the ice cream. It was good. What's your name? Creu...set? What a weird name. Wow~ that necklace is pretty.]

100060.name: Child Rose
100060.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Academy Spell in your Hand with a SIZE less than the difference between 9 and your Field SIZE is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. If this happens, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by the sent card's SIZE.
100060.flavor: [I... I'll be a good girl. I want to be a good sister for Cinia... I'll do my best.]

100067.name: New Knight
100067.ability: At the start of the turn, enemy Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 get STA -1.
100067.flavor: [Do some special training with me! Follow me. I'll show you a secret training ground.]

100066.name: Chief Maid
100066.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Field SIZE is greater than the enemy Field SIZE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
100066.flavor: [Sorry, I'm not interested. What? Linia's maid? Hurry up and tell me, what did she say about me?]

100065.name: Layna Scentriver
100065.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Vita Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
100065.flavor: [Come over here. I'm very strict and distant at school, which made me lonely. So, take my hand. Hurry.]

100064.name: Child Sigma
100064.ability: At the start of the turn, the first card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. A random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by half of the sent card's SIZE (by a maximum of 4, rounding down).
100064.flavor: [This... was an attempt to change to a slightly younger appearance, but it ended in failure because of a loss of control.]

300555.name: Liberated Maid
300555.ability: Before defending, all allied Followers get ATK +1/STA +1, then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300555.flavor: [I'm finally liberated from that crimson past! I'm free now. I can do whatever I want!]

300554.name: Arctic Lady
300554.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's ATK is greater than or equal to this Follower's total DEF+STA, then your Character gets LIFE -1, this Follower gets SIZE=1/ATK -1/STA -1 and gets sent to the first empty Slot of the enemy Field. This skill is removed.
300554.flavor: [It's hot. How can people live in a place like this?] [Lady, please take off your coat...]

100069.name: Alchemist Clarice
100069.ability: At the start of the turn, allied cards with "Homunculus Escort" in the name are sent to the Grave. A Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/ATK =5/DEF =0/STA =5.
100069.flavor: [Hi! Let me introduce you to my friend. On boring days I need a friend, so each day I make a new friend so I won't be lonely anymore!]

100068.name: Nytitch
100068.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1.
100068.flavor: [It's been a while~ how have you been? You always leave somewhere each night, so I've been lonely. Play with me!]

300551.name: Hecate M. Jane
300551.flavor: [Layna, is there something troubling you that you can't tell me about? I won't ask you about it, but you can always come to me if you have any worries.]

300550.name: 5th Witness Kana. DDD
300550.ability: Before attacking, the defender is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck, then this Follower gets STA increased by the sent card's SIZE. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300550.flavor: [Yes. Yes. Understood. Please continue observing for now. It's still too early to make a decision.]

300553.name: Lib. Research Head Von
300553.ability: Before attacking, the last Spell in your Deck is sent to the top of your Deck, then this card gets ATK increased by the sent card's SIZE (by a maximum of 3). // Before defending, the first Follower in your Deck is sent to the top of your Deck, then this card gets STA increased by half the sent card's SIZE (rounding up).
300553.flavor: [What's going on in the back room of the library? Talentium smelting? Eh~ Hm? I should try wearing glasses? Nope~ it would overlap with a different character type.]

300552.name: Lib. Researcher Albert
300552.ability: Before defending, all Followers in your Deck with "Library Club" in the name get ATK +1/STA +1. This skill is removed.
300552.flavor: [I believe that the power of Talentium is absolute. For example, if a person uses it while in a moving frame of reference, it will appear the same to an outside observer. I wonder if my theory is correct?]

200248.name: Iri's Suit
200248.ability: Two random allied Darklore Followers get ATK +2/STA +2. Two random allied Followers with "Iri" in the name get ATK +1/STA +1.
200248.flavor: [To give the appearance of a rough and unpolished beauty, the lower buttons are deliberately left undone, while the curves of the waistline show the magic of a woman. A gap that shows toughness and girlishness at the same time. Through these socks, the true magic of Janus!]

200249.name: Carefree Heart
200249.ability: If there are any allied Followers, a random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by 1 plus the number of empty Slots in your Hand. The first two cards in your Deck with "Iri" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand.
200249.flavor: ["SPACE ON YOUR HAND!! Take the universe with your hand." The first act of Iri, who had become tolerant to sunlight. Checking the showing of the special effects hero show.]

200246.name: The Hazing
200246.ability: Two random allied Followers get DEF increased by half of the number of empty Slots in your Hand (rounding up). The first two cards in your Deck with "Luthica" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand.
200246.flavor: [You got a problem?] [No!] [Is this inside or outside? Go gather everyone below me and above you. You think I'm playing around when I hit people? Pintail, you think you're excluded just because you're a sergeant? -Witnessed by Esprit]

200247.name: Halloween Witch
200247.ability: A random allied Follower gets one of the following skills randomly. "Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1." "Before defending, this Follower gets STA +3." "At the start of the turn, this Follower gets DEF +2." If this happens, the first Spell in the enemy Hand without "Halloween" in the name is copied to the first Slot of your Field.

200244.name: Halloween Countess
200244.ability: If you have at least one Follower on the Field, a random enemy Follower loses its first skill and gains one of the following skills randomly. "Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK -1." "Before defending, this Follower gets STA -3." If this happens, the first Spell in the enemy Hand without "Halloween" in the name is copied to the first empty Slot of your Field.
200244.flavor: [Good! Okay... stick your tongue out like you're licking blood!!]

200245.name: Luthica's Suit
200245.ability: Two random allied Crux Followers get ATK +2/STA +2. Two random allied Followers with "Luthica" in the name get ATK +1/STA +1.
200245.flavor: [As expected, Luthica's proportions are excellent. This should be enough to compete. Even the fashion king...] [What?]

200242.name: Cinia's Suit
200242.ability: Two random allied Academy Followers get ATK +2/STA +2. Two random allied Followers with "Cinia" in the name get ATK +1/STA +1.
200242.flavor: [Even a suit works! You're definitely surpassing my expectations, Cinia.] [Sis, sister? What are you saying?] [The road to fashion king isn't far.]

200243.name: Diligent Girl
200243.ability: The first two cards in your Deck with "Cinia" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand. If this happens, the first enemy Follower with a STA equal to or less than the total SIZE of the sent cards is sent to the Grave.
200243.flavor: [Amazing. It even has the power to make the work-hating Cinia do the dishes. -Esprit's memo...]

200240.name: Perky Girl
200240.ability: The first two cards in your Deck with "Sita" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand. If this happens, those cards get SIZE -2.
200240.flavor: [The effects of the artifact that Esprit found were amazing. While the target was under its effects, her personality was reversed. Sita became cheerful.]

200241.name: Halloween Minidevil
200241.ability: A random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by the ATK of the first Follower in your Hand. If this happens, the first Spell in the enemy Hand without "Halloween" in the name is copied to the first empty Slot in your Field.
200241.flavor: [Okay, look over here! Good, raise your eyes a bit secretly. B-E-A~utiful! Perfect! Let's go! Fashion king!] [Vernika! I want to eat this! Hurry up and finish.]

300087.name: Stigma Flint
300087.ability: Before attacking, an allied Follower with the name "Stigma Witness Felicia" is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random enemy Follower is destroyed.
300087.flavor: [Do, don't come near! Leave first, Felicia! I will somehow stop the church's pursuit! ... Will we meet again? Definitely.]

300086.name: Traumatized Hilde
300086.ability: At the start of the turn, this card gets ATK -1 (to a minimum of 0). If this happens, two random allied Followers get STA +2.
300086.flavor: [In her case, her symptom is an extreme adversion to contact with unfamiliar people. She feels an extreme anxiety around other people. It's gone to the point of losing consciousness, so we decided to abandon investigation of her.]

300085.name: Fanatic Sarah
300085.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +2, then this skill is removed.
300085.flavor: [This is a symptom of being unusually obsessed with one thing. Her obsession with glasses is beyond that of a hobby. She even has glasses that she wears to sleep.]

300084.name: Insomniac Nanasid
300084.ability: Before defending, this card gets DEF -1, the attacker gets ATK -2, and this card gets ATK +2. This skill is removed.
300084.flavor: [A strange sound wakes her. When she is awake, there is no sound. This happens repeatedly. She says she can see something when her eyes are closed.]

300083.name: School Envy Lady
300083.flavor: [It's unfortunate that this is the uniform for the commoners' school.]

300082.name: Magic Teacher
300082.flavor: [Listen, the basic principle of all magic is to understand the structure of the necessary spell. This is essential. Commit it to memory. I will ask you again tomorrow.]

300081.name: Detective Lady
300081.flavor: [Check it! Don't miss anything. Lately, the maids have been a bit strange. They must be doing something in secret. Hm...]

300080.name: Genius Student Nanai
300080.ability: Before defending, all cards in both players' Graves with the same SIZE as the attacker are removed from the game. The attacker gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of cards removed.
300080.flavor: [Celine senpai, tell me anything. Is there anything I can't handle? I've understood the logic of all creation since I was 10, so at least give me some credit.]

300089.name: Crux Nurse
300089.flavor: [Ah, Kamyu senpai? Weren't you at the ob/gyn? What kind of business do you have here...]

300088.name: Fated Rival Seven
300088.ability: Before attacking, up to two Academy cards in your Grave are removed from the game. If this happens, the defender and one other random enemy Follower get ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -2.
300088.flavor: [You, you said your name was Nanai? I didn't expect this much from you. Remember this! I won't lose next time.]

200332.name: Muzisitter Mentor
200332.ability: All cards in your Deck with a SIZE of 10 are sent to the bottom of your Deck. For each card sent, a random card in the enemy Field is sent to the top of the enemy Deck and all Followers in your Field get STA +1. All Followers in your Field are deactivated.
200332.flavor: [The gathering of girls who have the power to transform. They stand against those who wish to disrupt the world, and they advocate justice. That group is Muzisitter.]

200333.name: Forbidden Book
200333.ability: If the enemy Hand contains a card, the first two cards in the enemy Deck get SIZE +1 and are sent to the enemy Hand. (HINT: Even if you offer something, it might not be enough.)
200333.flavor: [It will give you infinite knowledge. Are you ready to receive it?]

200330.name: Comrades
200330.ability: If the total SIZE of all Followers in your Field is greater than the total SIZE of all Followers in the enemy Field, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets ATK/DEF/SIZE halved (rounding up).
200330.flavor: [We are being overwhelmed. But no matter what anyone says, we will overcome it.]

200331.name: Forgotten God's Ritual
200331.ability: If there are any Spells in the enemy Field, the first Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets ATK +4/STA +4. If the sent Follower does not belong to your Character's faction, it gets an additional SIZE -1.
200331.flavor: [Come. Come. The ritual went smoothly. Now...]

200336.name: Nom Nom Nom
200336.ability: The first Spell in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field. If the sent card's SIZE is odd, it is sent to the Grave. The first Spell in the enemy Deck is sent to the first empty Slot of the enemy Field. If the sent card's SIZE is odd, it is sent to the Grave.
200336.flavor: [Oh where did you come from? Hello there nom nom]

200337.name: Final Decision
200337.ability: The first allied Follower and a random enemy Follower with a SIZE less than or equal to twice the SIZE of the first allied Follower both have their Atk/Sta set equal to half (rounding down) the sum of both Follower's Atk/Sta.
200337.flavor: [This won't do. Do I have to become a Level 6 in order to be the strongest in the Library Club?]

200334.name: Endless Appetite
200334.ability: All cards on both players' Fields that do not have a SIZE of 1 are deactivated. All Followers on both players' Fields with a SIZE of 5 are destroyed. (HINT: You need to go on a diet... but it's already too late.)
200334.flavor: [No matter how much I eat, I'm hungry, no matter how much I sleep, I'm tired! That place is... a school!]

200335.name: Knight Selection
200335.ability: All cards without "Knight" in the name get SIZE +3. (HINT: Are you a knight?)

200338.name: Petrifying Curse
200338.ability: If you have a Vita Character, all Followers on both Fields with a SIZE less than this card's SIZE are removed from the game. If this card's SIZE is at least 6, this card is removed from the game. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE +2 and is sent to the top of your Deck.

200339.name: Mass Polymorph
200339.ability: All cards on both players' Fields have their SIZEs randomly redistributed.
200339.flavor: [It was Linia's magic. She turned everyone small. Linia watched them contently.]

200068.name: Fatal Blow
200068.ability: All cards on your Field and the enemy Field with a SIZE equal or less than the number of cards in your Hand+Field are sent to their owner's Grave. Your Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of sent enemy cards.
200068.flavor: [Be ready to pay this debt later.]

200069.name: Good Job
200069.flavor: [Sita, we have to compliment everyone who worked hard. Repeat after me! Good! Job!]

200062.name: Spell Change
200062.ability: The first Spell in your Hand and the first Spell in the enemy Hand are swapped.
200062.flavor: [Hm~ it's a little tight around the chest, and the waist is loose.] [Sh.. Shut up! Give it back!]

200063.name: Prank's Price
200063.ability: The first 2 cards in your Hand and the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave. (No effect if either player doesn't have enough cards.)
200063.flavor: [Really... I told you not to drag me into your tasteless pranks.]

200060.name: Mother Demon Rumor
200060.ability: If the total SIZE of cards in Slots 1 and 2 in the enemy Field is at least 6, the card in Slot 2 in the enemy Field is destroyed.
200060.flavor: [Hello, future friends! The era of the mother of corruption, the mother demon, is drawing near. Aren't you curious? Why do I call you friends? You haven't died? Everyone dies eventually, right?]

200061.name: Luthica's Ward
200061.ability: Up to 4 cards in your Grave are removed from the game. Two random Crux Followers on your Field get ATK/STA increased by 2 plus the number of removed cards.
200061.flavor: [I will use my power to create a gap! Attack the monster through that hole!]

200066.name: Tower Visitor
200066.ability: All enemy Followers with a SIZE lower than the SIZE of the allied Darklore Follower with the highest SIZE get DEF -2/STA -2.
200066.flavor: [It's called the witch's tower... it's just a house...]

200067.name: Vampiric Education
200067.ability: Two random allied Darklore Followers get STA increased by half the total SIZE of the cards in your Hand (rounding up).
200067.flavor: [I have the duty to teach you the proper behavior of a vampire.]

200064.name: Strega Blood
200064.ability: All allied Followers with "Witch" in the name get ATK +1/STA +3. then your Character gets LIFE -1. (Note: This card isn't considered to have "Witch" in the name for the purposes of other cards' skills because it uses a different word in Korean.)
200064.flavor: [Witches are born in the garden of witches. People who possess the blood of witches have the right to become witches.]

200065.name: Strega Blade
200065.ability: The first allied Follower with "Witch" in the name and the smallest SIZE gets ATK/STA=1, then the first enemy Follower gets STA decreased by half the total ATK/STA reduction. (rounding up). (Note: This card isn't considered to have "Witch" in the name for the purposes of other cards' skills because it uses a different word in Korean.)
200065.flavor: [In the end, all witches wish for the same thing... a place of light, a place where we can all gather. Warm tea and a cool breeze... but...]

300173.name: Council Weekly Help
300173.ability: Before defending, this card and the attacker's ATK are swapped.
300173.flavor: [Hey, what's up? What are you doing this early, Nanai? What's that magic tool you have there?]

300172.name: New Lib. Student
300172.flavor: [The book that senpai wrote down... I found it, but... What kind of play is this loan duration? Unspecified?]

300171.name: Sleep Club Advisor
300171.ability: Before attacking, the defender is deactivated, then this skill is removed.
300171.flavor: [The Sleep Club, otherwise known as the Deep Sleep Research Club. The teacher who couldn't sleep gathered those sleepy kids together in order to figure out how to fall asleep, but in the end, she still can't sleep.]

300170.name: Council Student
300170.ability: Before attacking, the first allied Follower with "Student Council" in the name gets STA +3, then this skill is removed.
300170.flavor: [Flowers in my hair? What are you talking about? A while ago, my homeroom teacher asked me the same question. She said the flowers have a dream-like beauty.]

300177.name: Dispatch Maid
300177.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets SIZE +1, then this skill is removed.
300177.flavor: [It's just for a short time, but nice to meet you.]

300176.name: Lib. Lotte & Serie
300176.ability: Before defending, if you have a Vita Character, the first two cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, one random deactivated allied Follower is reactivated, and one random allied Follower gets SIZE -1/ATK +1/DEF +1.
300176.flavor: [Serie, I have to apologize. That cobalt book from before, it was actually interesting. Sorry, Serie, we're still friends... right?]

300175.name: Council VP Tieria
300175.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of cards on your Field with "Student Council" in the name. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300175.flavor: [Celine's support is very strong. I don't know kind of plan you have to win, but it will be a difficult battle.]

300174.name: Lib. Milty
300174.ability: Before attacking, this card gets STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand with "Library Club" in the name. If this number is 3 or greater, this card also gets ATK +1.
300174.flavor: [I'm following in my sister's footsteps by joining this club, but I'm still insecure about it. Can I really do this?]

300179.name: Peace Lady
300179.ability: Before attacking, a card in your Hand with "Maid" in the name is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2.
300179.flavor: [Linia's maids are all so pure. They're so cute, hehe... I'd like a maid like that, too.]

300178.name: Picnic Lady
300178.flavor: [Hm? No no it's good it's good. I hope we can have more experiences like this in the future, too.]

300375.name: Seeker Finder
300375.ability: Before defending, the first card in the enemy Deck gets SIZE increased by the number of cards on your Field with "Sanctuary" in the name (by a maximum of 2), then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300375.flavor: [Mm, I can smell a new artifact. What kind of item is it this time? I'm excited.]

300374.name: Seeker Lynn
300374.ability: Before defending, the attacker gets ATK/STA decreased by half this card's SIZE (rounding up).
300374.flavor: [The goddess's army can never be defeated! For the glory of the goddess!]

300377.name: Apostle Reshuri
300377.ability: Before attacking, if your Field does not contain any cards with "Aletheian" in the name, this Follower gets ATK -1/DEF -1.
300377.flavor: [Yes, trust me. That place has what you desire.]

300376.name: Seeker Taras
300376.ability: Before defending, a deactivated card on your Field other than this one is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, the attacker is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. If this happens, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2.
300376.flavor: [The seekers have been focusing on studying artifacts. Now is the time to use their power. For the glory of the goddess!]

200488.name: 각성
200488.ability: You get Shuffles +2. If you have a Crux Character, all Followers in your Deck get DEF increased by half your Shuffles (rounding down, by a maximum of 2).
200488.flavor: [An unknown power suddenly started protecting me. What on earth is this magic circle...?]

200489.name: GS 간부의 명령
200489.ability: All Followers in your Deck with the same SIZE as this card get ATK +1/STA +1.
200489.flavor: [You. Over there. Stop standing around mindlessly and come fan me.]

300373.name: Cosmo Lady Tikin
300373.ability: Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2, then this skill is removed. // Before defending, the attacker gets ATK -2/STA -2, then this skill is removed. // At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck, then this skill is removed.
300373.flavor: [All the stars we can see have importance.]

300372.name: Witch Cadet Ruin
300372.ability: At the start of the turn, this Follower's SIZE is reduced by the number of cards in your Hand with "Witch" in the name (to a minimum of 1), then this skill is removed.
300372.flavor: [Faster than light! The broom cuts across the sky!]

200484.name: 프라이빗 룸
200484.ability: A random allied Follower gets ATK increased by twice the DEF of a random enemy Follower with at least 0 DEF.
200484.flavor: [There is a room in Linia's mansion that not even her servants know about.]

200485.name: 뮤지시터의 노래
200485.ability: If you have an Academy Character and there are any allied Followers, all cards on your Field whose Slot numbers are odd are sent to the enemy Field. All cards on the enemy Field whose Slot numbers are even are sent to your Field.
200485.flavor: [Linus's song captivated the hearts of her audience.]

200486.name: 고기방패
200486.ability: If your Field contains at least 2 Followers, the first active enemy Follower with the highest SIZE is deactivated and loses its skills until the start of the next turn.
200486.flavor: [Huhuhu. You, who still has the body of a child after all these years, behold! The ample body granted by the saint's blessing!] [Eek?! Don't say that!!]

200487.name: 막내의 의지
200487.ability: The first allied Follower with the highest DEF gets DEF decreased by twice its own DEF. A random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by the reduction in DEF (by a maximum of 5).
200487.flavor: [I will show you what I can do, too, Cygnus senpai.]

200480.name: 오후의 휴식
200480.ability: All allied Followers get SIZE -1/ATK +2/STA +2. A number of Followers at the bottom of your Deck equal to the number of Followers on your Field get SIZE +1/ATK -1/STA -1.
200480.flavor: [If you're tired and sleepy, why don't you go outside and get some fresh air?]

200481.name: 학생회장과 선도부장
200481.ability: The first and last Followers on your Field swap places. Those Followers get SIZE decreased by the difference in their Slot numbers.
200481.flavor: [You haven't been by the student council room in a while. Is something going on?] [Well, that's...] [Be honest with me. Miss Layna. Could it be, a boyfriend?] [Ce, Celine Hastur!]

200482.name: 시타의 배달
200482.ability: If the 5th and 7th cards in your Deck belong to Vita, they are copied to the first empty slots of your Field with their current SIZE/ATK/DEF/STA (each card is checked separately). If the 9th card in your Deck belongs to Vita, it is copied to the first empty Slot of your Hand.
200482.flavor: [... Do I have to wear this...?] [O.. Of course! Whenever you deliver something, you have to wear that!]

200483.name: 물물교환
200483.ability: The first allied Follower and a random card in the enemy Hand swap SIZE. If this happens, the first allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the change in SIZE.
200483.flavor: [Here, I'll trade you this flower for that jewel.] [That flower is from our garden!]

300324.name: Sword Girls Luthica
300324.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Deck with "Sword Girls" in the name regains its original skills and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. If this happens, that Follower gets STA +3 and this Follower is sent to the bottom of your Deck. // Before defending, all allied Followers get DEF +1/STA +2, then this skill is removed.
300324.flavor: ["Sister Sage, what are you doing?" She didn't hear.] ["Luthica... Ha ha..."]

200466.name: Hot Springs Ticket
200466.flavor: [This ticket is required to enter the hot spring baths.] [Isn't this place heaven on earth?]

200467.name: 이벤트플레그
200467.flavor: [A flag with the Sword Girls logo. It can be exchanged for rare cards.]

200464.name: Miracle
200464.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, all enemy Followers have their ATK/DEF/STA changed to the ATK/DEF/STA of the first allied Follower.
200464.flavor: [Glowing butterflies danced about as Helena lay her hands upon Red Sun's wounded leg.] [Oh... Look. Miss Red Sun's wounds are healing.]

200465.name: Graphic Novel
200465.flavor: [Greetings, Faithful Followers! Everyone wants to be a hero! This book holds marvelous stories of super-powered heroes and crime-fighting detectives; comics are full of incredible tales that anyone can enjoy, including you!]

200462.name: GS Network
200462.ability: The first Follower in your Deck that belongs to the same faction as the first Follower on your Field is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE -1.
200462.flavor: [There were more people in the way than I expected. I don't really feel like it, but I have to contact HQ. Who the hell was that bastard with the weird sword?]

200463.name: Gossip
200463.ability: All allied Followers except the first allied Follower are sent to the top of your Deck. A number of enemy Followers equal to 1 plus the number of sent Followers, with the exception of the first enemy Follower, are sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
200463.flavor: [Ren? What's up?] [Have you heard? There's a shaman that can miraculously heal injuries.] [Yes, why?] [Do you want to go check it out?]

200460.name: Manhunt
200460.ability: All Spells in your Hand are sent in order from your Hand to the empty Slots of your Field. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of sent cards.
200460.flavor: [Knight Captain Eisenwane. Name and rank. Are you looking for this girl? Have you seen this girl?]

200461.name: Backup
200461.ability: If you have a Crux Character, all Spells on the enemy Field/Hand are sent to the top of the enemy Deck. All Followers on the enemy Field/Hand get DEF decreased by the number of sent cards
200461.flavor: [Rose arrived as backup during the battle between A-GA and Eisenwane.] [Captain! Use this opening!]

200468.name: Discover Evidence
200468.ability: The allied Follower in Slot 5 of your Field gets ATK +4/STA +4.
200468.flavor: [There was only a single flower left on the ground, but Asmis saw it as a clue.]

200469.name: World is Cake
200469.ability: The first two Followers in your Deck are sent to the top of your Deck and get ATK/STA increased by half (rounding up) the number of empty Slots in your Hand.
200469.flavor: [The finest cake in the world. Since I served it to you this way, you'll have to be eaten by me.]

300717.name: 꿈꾸는 핀테일
300717.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this card's ATK, a card called "Good Job" is created in the first empty Slot in the enemy Field and deactivated. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300717.flavor: [Pintail dreams today, too. She dreams that she's been discharged from the knights, and she can spend time peacefully in Crux. Yet, even in her dreams, she can't take her uniform off.]

300716.name: 크룩스 기사단 오클렛
300716.ability: Before attacking, if the Turn Number is odd, this card gets ATK +1. // Before attacking, if the Turn Number is even, this card gets ATK -1.
300716.flavor: [She is a knight who uses a sword of light. Her sword has the power to cut light.]

300715.name: 메이드 세론과 코코
300715.ability: Before attacking, if you have an Academy Character, a random active allied Follower is deactivated. If this happens, this card gets ATK increased by half the deactivated card's ATK (rounding down) and gets STA increased by half the ATK increase (rounding up).
300715.flavor: [The maids got a vacation, so Seron and Coco went to Linia's private beach.]

300714.name: 레이디 시니아 퍼시피카
300714.ability: Before attacking, a card in your Deck with "Cinia" in the name is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, the defender gets STA decreased by half the sent card's SIZE (rounding up).
300714.flavor: [Since Cinia kept throwing out the clothes that Linia gave her, Linia took some drastic measures. She made all of the dresses in her closet disappear.] [Linia!]

300713.name: 별의 레이디 치루시
300713.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets ATK +2/STA +2. // Before defending, the attacker gets ATK -2/STA -2.
300713.flavor: [Madou! Destruction! You'll have a tough time dealing with the power of the stars!]

300712.name: 요리연구부원 아라스
300712.ability: Before attacking, all allied Followers get ATK +1/STA +1 and gain the skills of the first Follower in your Deck. This skill is removed.
300712.flavor: [Oh, you're here senpais? I tried cooking for you all.]

300723.name: Anyte Annus
300723.ability: Before defending, this card gets STA +3. There is a 33% chance that this skill is removed.
300723.flavor: [Take my staff card. Don't buy anything unnecessary. Especially you, Sita.]

300711.name: 도서관 관리자 암리타
300711.ability: Before defending, if this card has 1 skill, it gets STA +3. This skill is removed. // Before defending, if this card has 2 skills, it gets STA +3. This skill is removed. // Before defending, if this card has 3 skills, it gets STA +3. This skill is removed.
300711.flavor: [This is only the 1024th book. How many more books do I have to read before those people get here?]

300710.name: 요리연구부 에이스
300710.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK increased by its own DEF.
300710.flavor: [Cut the sky in half! Shake the earth! The cooking of the cosmos!]

300721.name: 수영복의 언더테이커
300721.ability: Before attacking, if you have a Darklore Character, the first 2 cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random enemy Follower gets deactivated and gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1. // Before defending, the first Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. This card gets STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand minus 1.
300721.flavor: [If I say "Go!", then you have to respond with "Yes, maam!"]

300418.name: Lady Traveler
300418.ability: Before defending, the attacker gets ATK=0. A random enemy Follower gets ATK increased by the change in ATK.
300418.flavor: [I always have a feeling of anticipation when I travel.]

300419.name: Muzisitter Lady Elfenritt
300419.ability: Before defending, this card gets STA +2.
300419.flavor: [Everything is done by Muzisitter! We will alter your fates!]

300414.name: 기관사 제페트
300414.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets DEF -3. This card gets ATK/STA increased by the absolute value of the defender's DEF.
300414.flavor: [You in a pickle too? You thought it'd turn out alright if you came here? Well I can take you home.]

300415.name: Cook Club Crasher
300415.ability: Before defending, if this card's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to the attacker's ATK, the enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by half this card's SIZE (rounding up). If this happens, this skill is removed.
300415.flavor: [You're still only making sweets day after day? While I was out pursuing other goals, this is all you did? Nom nom... It's not even that good.]

300416.name: Cook Club Amanda
300416.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this card's ATK, your Character gets LIFE -1.
300416.flavor: [Yes? It's too much? Aren't tools the most important thing to a chef?]

300417.name: Cook Club Ritafarit
300417.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1. // Before defending, if this card and your Character belong to the same faction, the attacker gets ATK/DEF/STA decreased by half (rounding up) the increase in any of the respective stats from their base values. This card gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by any decrease in the attacker's stats respectively. If the total increase in stats is less than 1, this card gets STA +2.
300417.flavor: [Isn't it thrilling to cook like this? It's like you're a cooking mouse!]

300410.name: GS 4th Star
300410.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If it is higher, this card gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300410.flavor: [Thank you, sister.] [I gave into those words. With those words, all my negative thoughts melted away like snow. Even though I always remained level-headed and maintained my outward appearance, I was moved by the kind words of my younger sister. I could give up everything after hearing those words.]

300411.name: Black Myo Kitt
300411.ability: Before attacking, this Follower's ATK is set equal to 1 plus the highest STA value on either player's Field. // Before attacking, the first Spell on the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
300411.flavor: [The last part of the information that Nold discovered was Kit. She was the guardian of the world's unhappiness and sadness, lamentations and thoughts.] [Really now...? You think you've found a way to ease my burden? Huhu... Tch! I don't believe you, but I'll come along.]

300412.name: Black Dragon Incarnate
300412.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets DEF -1/STA -1. // Before defending, the attacker gets ATK -1/DEF -1.
300412.flavor: [I always ask those beings called outsiders where they came from and how they got here... And there are also cases of beings simply passing through this world. This year's outsider is this woman. -Esprit]

300413.name: Coin Child
300413.ability: Before attacking, this Follower's ATK is changed to equal the defender's ATK. // Before attacking, 5 cards with the name "Lucky Coin" are created in your Grave, then this skill is removed. // Before defending, a card in your Grave with the name "Lucky Coin" is removed from the game. If this happens, this card is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field and deactivated.
300413.flavor: [Is something troubling you? Don't hide your desires. After all, the sky is blue, isn't it?]

100277.name: PH Asmis
100277.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 1, all Vita Followers in your Deck get STA +2. If the Turn Number is 2, all Vita Followers in your Deck get ATK +1. If the Turn Number is odd, the bottom Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the Turn Number is even, you get Shuffles =1.
100277.flavor: [I feel really warm and nostalgic inside. Look, look, if you close your eyes, you can feel it, too.]

100278.name: PH Linus
100278.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 1, all Academy Followers in your Deck get STA +2. If the Turn Number is 2, all Academy Followers in your Deck get ATK +1. If the Turn Number is odd, the bottom Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the Turn Number is even, you get Shuffles =1.
100278.flavor: [It's different from Muzisitter, but... I like these clothes, too. What do you think? It's like I'm an angel descended from heaven, right?]

100279.name: PH Rose
100279.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 1, all Crux Followers in your Deck get STA +2. If the Turn Number is 2, all Crux Followers in your Deck get ATK +1. If the Turn Number is odd, the bottom Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the Turn Number is even, you get Shuffles =1.
100279.flavor: [I feel like I'm the goddess of this world. Stay by my side until the ends of the earth.]

110088.name: R. Pinot Noir
110088.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by the Atk of the first allied Follower.
110088.flavor: [I will not move until I have taken the blood from every one of you. This is our land.]

110089.name: R. Moonlight Vamp.
110089.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by half the Turn Number (rounding down).
110089.flavor: [See... Our thirst will be quenched by the blood of the corrupted.]

110084.name: R. Chardonnay
110084.ability: At the start of the turn, your Character gets LIFE +1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
110084.flavor: [Your goddess cannot pass here. Your light is too bright, so disappear.]

110085.name: R. Sangiovese
110085.ability: At the start of the turn, two random cards in your Hand get SIZE -1.
110085.flavor: [The Crux knights are here! I'm leaving!]

110086.name: R. Viognier
110086.ability: At the start of the turn, two random enemy Followers get SIZE +1/ATK -1.

110087.name: R. Shiraz
110087.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
110087.flavor: [I will fight until the end. If you're going to leave, then leave now.]

110080.name: Scardel Shiraz
110080.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Spell in the enemy Hand gets SIZE +2.
110080.flavor: [There is nothing to do but to fight in order to protect ourselves.]

110081.name: Scardel Pinot Noir
110081.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by the SIZE of the first allied Follower.
110081.flavor: [I'm taking a break. Why don't you rest for a bit? This is the blood from a Crux human I just fought.]

110082.name: Moonlight Vampire
110082.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by half of the difference between its SIZE and DEF (rounding up).
110082.flavor: [See this... The world of the night is filled with the corrupted.]

110083.name: R. Merlot
110083.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA -2, then a random enemy Follower gets STA -1.
110083.flavor: [Step back! Your goddess cannot step into the night.]

110264.name: 유학생 시니아
110264.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets one of the following effects applied depending on the faction of the first card in your Hand: Vita: ATK +2/STA +2, Academy: STA +4, Crux: DEF +2, Darklore: SIZE -2 (to a minimum of 1).
110264.flavor: [This... this is the public school's uniform? It's... it's not bad! For a commoner's uniform, it's a decent design...]

110265.name: 실행위원 베르니카
110265.ability: At the start of the turn, if there are three or fewer cards in your Hand, all cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of sent cards.
110265.flavor: [Everyone's working hard, I really enjoy cheering for you all!]

110266.name: 응원의 아이리
110266.ability: At the start of the turn, the following effect is applied twice: "A random card in your Hand with a SIZE of at least 2 gets SIZE -1."
110266.flavor: [Hm? The athletic meet, it's during the day? That's too bad... I thought I might be able to have some fun for a change...]

110267.name: 육상의 루티카
110267.ability: At the start of the turn, if Slot 5 in your Field is empty, a Follower in Slot 1 in your Field is moved to Slot 5 and gets ATK +4/STA +4. If Slot 1 in your Field is empty, a Follower in Slot 5 in your Field is moved to Slot 1 and gets ATK +4/STA +4.
110267.flavor: [Run as much as you want! We have this opportunity, so spend this time to your heart's content!]

110260.name: 비맞은 갓트
110260.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets DEF/STA decreased by the number of Followers in your Hand. A random Follower in your Hand gets DEF/STA increased by the number of Followers in your Hand.
110260.flavor: [Uuuu... why's the rain coming down like this... E... even if you stare like that, it won't make my clothes drier!]

110261.name: 바니걸 카넬
110261.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower with a SIZE of 6 or less gets SIZE +1/ATK +2/DEF +2/STA +2.
110261.flavor: [How is it! This is my true form!] [No way...] [Hey!!]

110262.name: 고주망태 시그마
110262.ability: At the start of the turn, a number of Followers in your Hand equal to the SIZE of the first card in your Hand get ATK +2/STA +2. (The Followers are selected from left to right.)
110262.flavor: [Ng? What? Something's on my chest? I don't see anything. Everyone in Crux is supposed to be honest.]

110263.name: 거리의 아이돌 클라리스
110263.ability: At the start of the turn, allied cards with "Homunculus Escort" in the name are sent to the Grave. If the ones digit of the Turn Number is at least 1, a Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/DEF =1. That Follower gets ATK/STA changed to equal 15 minus the ones digit of the Turn Number.
110263.flavor: [We can do anything! If we're together~ You'll definitely meet us~ Something will start to change~ To a new tomorrow~ Singing with me is my homunculus. Give her some applause!]

120036.name: Madness Maid
120036.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers get ATK +2/STA -2. All enemy Followers get STA -1.

120034.name: 최후의 목격자 카나GLS
120034.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower with a total ATK/DEF/STA of at least 20 gets ATK +2/STA +2. If that Follower has a total ATK/DEF/STA of at least 30, it is destroyed.
120034.flavor: [This is place is the end space. It will become one with your world soon. Of course, this place isn't really the end, but it is for me.]

120035.name: 제단의 수호자 노빅
120035.ability: At the start of the turn, all enemy Followers' stats that are higher than their original values are changed to their original values and decreased by 2. All allied Followers' stats that are lower than their original values are changed to their original values and increased by 2. All cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your deck.
120035.flavor: [The altar is the place where the door may be opened. That's all it is. There is no significance behind it.]

110268.name: 웨이트리스 리안나
110268.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in your Field. The Follower gets the following effects applied depending on its new Slot number. 1~3: ATK +2/STA +2. 3~5: SIZE -2/ATK +2.
110268.flavor: [I just said I'd help since you said you were so busy, but why didn't you mention anything about these clothes?]

110269.name: 드레스업 마론
110269.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get STA +2.

120030.name: 양궁의 시니아
120030.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1. If the Turn Number is 1, all cards in your Deck get SIZE -1 and all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +2.
120030.flavor: [I was slightly worried that I would miss if the wind blew. However, I focused everything into my own hands and shot with confidence.]

120031.name: 유도의 루티카
120031.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1. If the Turn Number is 1, all cards in your Deck get SIZE -1 and all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +2.
120031.flavor: [I will end this in in a single match.]

110066.name: Cleaning Maid
110066.ability: At the start of the turn, the first card in the enemy Hand is moved to the first empty Slot of your Field or the enemy Field (50% chance).
110066.flavor: [Master Linia scolds us if we don't clean something. However, she gets even madder if we touch her things. Sometimes I don't even know what I should do.]

110067.name: Tea Time Maid
110067.ability: At the start of the turn, either your Character gets LIFE -1 or the enemy Character gets LIFE -2 (50% chance).
110067.flavor: [Is something wrong? We should at least be able to drink tea during our break time, right?]

110064.name: Accident Maid
110064.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied or enemy Follower gets STA -3 (50% chance).
110064.flavor: [I broke a teacup today, too. Master Linia always laughs about it, but it makes me nervous.]

110065.name: Kitchen Maid
110065.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets SIZE +1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +2.
110065.flavor: [Master Linia doesn't really care about what she eats. Even so, that attitude makes us work even harder.]

110062.name: Mop Maid
110062.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers with a neighboring Follower get ATK +2.
110062.flavor: [I need materials for a new mop. Right now, the equipment is too heavy. It needs to be lighter...]

110063.name: Layna Scentriver
110063.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers get STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand.
