110063.flavor: [Are you surprised because I'm different than normal? I need a place to ease my mind, too.]

110060.name: Chief Maid
110060.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2.
110060.flavor: [As I thought, I needed a break. I need more vacation days in the future.]

110061.name: Frett.
110061.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers with a SIZE of 3 get ATK +1/STA +1.
110061.flavor: [How about bamboo as a material for a new flagpole? If it's processed well, it will be lighter and stronger.]

110068.name: Linia's Head Maid
110068.ability: At the start of the turn, a random card from either your Field or the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the owner's Deck (50% chance).
110068.flavor: [The most important thing here is to not make Master Linia angry.]

110069.name: Disaster Maid
110069.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied or enemy Follower gets STA -5 (50% chance).
110069.flavor: [I broke a teacup today, too. Master Linia called me out separately, and I...]

300568.name: 죽림향 레이디 페니카
300568.ability: Before attacking, if this Follower's ATK is greater than or equal to the defender's total DEF+STA, this card gets SIZE +1. // Before defending, this card gets ATK/STA increased by half its own SIZE (rounding down).
300568.flavor: [So boring. Where'd my master go? She hasn't taken me for a walk.]

300569.name: 시니아를 아끼는 리니아
300569.ability: Before attacking, a random allied Follower gets SIZE -1. If this happens, this card gets ATK/STA increased by that card's SIZE (by a maximum of 2).
300569.flavor: [It's been a while, but I tried making an apple pie. Isn't it delicious?]

100098.name: Swimwear Rihanna
100098.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in the enemy Field. The Follower gets the following effects applied depending on its new Slot number. 1~3: ATK -1/STA -2. 3~5: ATK -2/STA -1.
100098.flavor: [Doesn't this swimsuit seem a little small? Hurry and draw it, there aren't many chances for a gallery like this!]

100099.name: Waitress Rihanna
100099.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in your Field. The Follower gets the following effects applied depending on its new Slot number. 1~3: STA +4. 3~5: SIZE -1/ATK +1.
100099.flavor: [I just said I'd help since you said you were so busy, but why didn't you mention anything about these clothes?]

100096.name: Dean Rihanna
100096.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in your Field. The Follower gets the following effects applied depending on its new Slot number. 1~3: STA +3. 3~5: ATK +2.
100096.flavor: [Just because the festival is getting closer, you shouldn't make rash decisions. You should stay calm and keep your composure.]

100097.name: Dress Rihanna
100097.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in your Field. The Follower gets the following effects applied depending on its new Slot number. 1~3: ATK +1/STA +2. 3~5: ATK +2/STA +1.
100097.flavor: [How is it? It's a little small, but I think it's fine.]

100094.name: Linking Shaman Nexia
100094.ability: At the start of the turn, the following effects are applied depending on the number of cards in your Hand. 1: You get Shuffles +1. 2: A random allied Follower gets ATK +3/STA +3. 3: A random allied Follower gets DEF +1/STA +1. 4: Two random allied Followers get ATK +1/STA +1. 5: Your Character gets LIFE -1.
100094.flavor: [We can't see what's above the clouds... the world is truly mysterious.]

100095.name: Vita Principal Treanna
100095.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2 and its skills are removed. If the Follower had any skills removed, it gets SIZE -1 (to a minimum of 1).
100095.flavor: [It feels much better after taking off that hot suit. Hm? This is the first time you've seen me like this? Miss Asmis? If you're curious about something, just let me know. I'll help you to the best of my ability.]

100092.name: Swimsuit Luthica
100092.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Crux Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2. If your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, the Follower gets ATK+2/STA +3 instead.
100092.flavor: [The alliance's beach is really beautiful. And I really like this swimsuit! I've always wanted to try one of these cute swimsuts.

100093.name: Swimsuit Iri
100093.ability: At the start of the turn, this Character gets LIFE +1. If your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -2 instead.
100093.flavor: [I can't tolerate salty water, but I'm free to swim around in fresh water.]

100090.name: Swimsuit Sita
100090.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA -3. Next, if your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, a random enemy Follower gets STA -2.
100090.flavor: [I can't swim. I just like touching the water.]

100091.name: Swimsuit Cinia
100091.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -2. If your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, the Follower gets ATK -2/STA -3 instead.
100091.flavor: [I need some time off. But even after coming to this beach, I can't calm myself down.]

200259.name: Restored Origin
200259.ability: All cards in both Fields get SIZE = 1.
200259.flavor: [It's different from healing. This is restoration. It's best expressed as returning things to their origins.]

200258.name: Meltdown
200258.flavor: [This is master's teachings, the sword. I will melt away all of your defense.]

200255.name: Rio's Ward
200255.flavor: [First, I'll test you. Try breaking through my ward.]

200254.name: Strega Think Tank
200254.ability: All enemy Followers get ATK decreased by 1 plus the number of allied Followers with "Witch" in the name. Allied Followers with "Witch" in the name get ATK increased by the same amount. (Note: This card isn't considered to have "Witch" in the name for the purposes of other cards' skills because it uses a different word in Korean.)
200254.flavor: [Unlike vampires, who cannot live outside the world of the night, witches have chosen to live in the dark side of the world. There is a group of witches trying to acquire all the world's knowledge, money, and information. This is the Witch's Thinktank.]

200257.name: Awakened Lady
200257.flavor: [Suddenly, unfamiliar things she had never experienced before flashed across Seven's memory. "I've seen it!"]

200256.name: Origin Reader
200256.ability: For each empty Slot in the enemy Hand, the first Spell in the enemy Deck is sent to the enemy Hand.
200256.flavor: [I can unlock some power now, too. Ho... The keyword is important.]

200251.name: Double Council Kick
200251.ability: Up to two random allied Followers with "Council" in the name are deactivated. The first enemy Follower with the highest STA gets STA decreased by the total ATK of the deactivated Followers.

200250.name: Halloween Wolf
200250.ability: The first card in your Hand is moved to the first empty Slot of your Field and has its SIZE halved (rounding down). If this happens, the first Spell in the enemy Hand without "Halloween" in the name is copied to the first empty Slot of your Field.
200250.flavor: [This... Sage, why are you dressing me like this?] [We'll take the throne. We have to win fashion king.] [... huh?]

200253.name: Flash Shield
200253.ability: All allied Followers on your Field with "Seeker" in the name get the following skill: "Before defending, this Follower gets STA increased by half the attacker's ATK (rounding up), then this skill is removed."
200253.flavor: [With the flash of a shield, the seekers' research will never be stopped.]

200252.name: Comfort Room
200252.ability: The first allied Follower with "Maid" in the name and the lowest SIZE is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE decreased by the Follower's SIZE, and Academy Followers in your Hand and Field get ATK +2/STA +2.
200252.flavor: [A fragrance to comfort the maids who have been tired out by work. A rather strange sight. What is the identity of this scent that Linia brought in?]

300189.name: Tactician Knight
300189.flavor: [The fighting has already begun. To us, it's a very trivial thing, but on the surface, it seems like an opportunity.]

200321.name: Event
200321.ability: The first card in the enemy Field with a SIZE equal to the difference between 10 and your Field SIZE gets ATK -2/STA -2 and is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
200321.flavor: [This is a time to pay attention to everything. It is an even more special occasion because I am here.]

200320.name: Worries
200320.ability: Cards in Slots 1 and 5 in the enemy Field are swapped. Cards in Slots 2 and 4 in the enemy Field are swapped. Followers in Slots 1 and 2 in the enemy Field get STA -2.
200320.flavor: [Is this really the right choice? I can still be confident in front of her?]

200323.name: Meeting the Chair
200323.ability: Two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -1/STA -1. If their remaining STA is even, they get an additional ATK -2/STA -2.
200323.flavor: [This is the current chairman of the Royle Academy. She still doesn't know how she will change everything.] [Yes, in the end, you are still one flower of many in a garden.]

200322.name: Enrollment
200322.ability: A random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. If there are any active cards on the enemy Field and no enemy cards with the name "Going to School", this card remains active on your Field.
200322.flavor: [Dazzling. This is sunlight? She walked along the glimmering road, with the sunlight reflecting off her eyes. This is a completely new school life... What do I want to do. Should I find a place to wait?]

200325.name: Warning
200325.ability: All Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of empty Slots in your Hand. All cards in both Hands are sent to the bottom of the owners' Decks.
200325.flavor: [Linia.. Why are you in a hurry? I think you are hurrying toward the end too quickly?] [You say that, but isn't that breaking the rules? Huhu. I'd be sad if I couldn't see your face, but at any rate, Cinia can't be stopped.]

200324.name: Personal Investigation
200324.ability: For each Follower in your Field with "Lady" in the name, a Follower on top of the enemy Deck is sent to the enemy Hand. If at least three cards are sent, a random card in the enemy Field is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
200324.flavor: [The changed student council president, the disappearing students. Something is strange... I wonder if it has something to do with the increase in restricted areas?]

200327.name: Holy Researcher
200327.ability: The first Follower in your Hand is sent to the Grave. The Follower in your Field with the lowest STA gets STA changed equal to the sent Follower's STA.
200327.flavor: [The thing at the source of the whirlpool. That thing is...]

200326.name: Crossing the Sanctuary
200326.ability: If you have a Crux Character and this card's SIZE is 1, this card gets SIZE =2 and is sent to the enemy Field. If this card's SIZE is 2, it gets SIZE =1 and is sent to the enemy Field.
200326.flavor: [Faster, higher, farther! I can go anywhere!]

200329.name: Mystic Tutor
200329.ability: All cards in both Fields except for this card and the first Follower in your Field get SIZE -1. The first Follower in your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the total SIZE reduction.
200329.flavor: [Endlessly research and endlessly investigate. If there is light, there is shadow. Believe and take in god's teachings.]

200328.name: Back from Sanctuary
200328.ability: Two random Crux Followers in your Field get STA increased by the ATK of the first Follower in the enemy Field.
200328.flavor: [What is... I feel like I've been dreaming for a long time. I can't remember anything. Who are you? Who... am I?]

200079.name: Black Magic Plot
200079.ability: Two random allied Academy Followers get ATK +4/STA -1.
200079.flavor: [A flash that pierces the heavens! I've finally done it! With this power, I'll be able to reclaim my freedom!]

200078.name: Visitor
200078.ability: The first Vita Follower in your Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. That Follower gets SIZE=1~2 and ATK +3~5/STA +3~5 (random).
200078.flavor: [A gate appeared. It had a different appearance from the cracks that monsters appeared from. Those cracks appeared very quickly, but this gate was very formal. From the gate appeared a girl in white clothes. -Esprit's memo]

200071.name: Pleased to Meet You
200071.flavor: [I wasn't hoping for you to acknowledge the effort I went through to sneak in here, but pleased to meet you.]

200070.name: Thank You
200070.flavor: [Cinia, come a little closer! It won't get both of us.] [Lu... Luthica. If you hold me like that, your chest... aaa...]

200073.name: Troubleshooting
200073.ability: Allied Vita Followers get STA +3. If there are ten or fewer cards in your Deck, allied Vita Followers get an additional STA +2.
200073.flavor: [Just leave everything to me! Even if you think I'm just looking for something to do, you're wrong! You came from the Academy, miss? You saw a place called Kana in your dreams, and you want to know about it? The mysterious land Kana. I've heard about it before, too. I'll investigate right away.]

200072.name: Cord Ball
200072.ability: If there are at least six cards in your Grave, all cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If at least three cards were sent, including at least one Follower, a random card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck, and then this card is removed from the game.
200072.flavor: [You send your magic through your racket. Isn't it bad if your magic doesn't reach your racket?]

200075.name: Sage's Sermon
200075.ability: A random enemy Follower with skills has its skills removed.
200075.flavor: [So! If you're able to understand something that Rio explained, why aren't you able to understand something that I explain! Agh! Seriously!! Why don't you get it!! Ophelia, are you being serious, or are you just making fun of me?]

200074.name: Court Jester
200074.ability: If there are allied Vita Followers with "Student Council" in the name and allied Vita Followers without "Student Council" in the name, two random allied Vita Followers get ATK +3/STA +3.
200074.flavor: [We just have to use the racket to put the ball in the opponent's court, right? I haven't heard of any regulations about putting the ball into the opponent's court.]

200077.name: Night's Beckoning
200077.ability: If your Grave contains at least 1 Vita and 1 non-Vita Follower, then all Spells on the enemy Field are sent to the Grave. If there are no Spells on the enemy Field, then this Spell is not sent to the Grave and is instead deactivated.
200077.flavor: [Sita, hurry over... I can't sleep anymore... come be with me. I'll mark your golden eyes. Ha... it looks delicious, I want all of Sita... let me have it.]

200076.name: Shameless Ambition
200076.ability: The first three cards in your Deck are sent to the Grave. For every Vita Follower that was sent, your Character gets LIFE +3. This Spell is removed from the game.
200076.flavor: [Just watch... I wonder how long you'll be able to sit there drinking your tea. Hehe..]

300533.name: L. Sita Vilosa
300533.ability: Before defending, if this Follower belongs to your Character's faction and the attacker possesses a "before attacking" skill, this Follower gets STA increased by the attacker's ATK.
300533.flavor: [One of the fundamentals of survival is being prepared to be hungry again, even if you're full.]

300532.name: Tigress Felpix
300532.ability: Before attacking, if this Follower's SIZE is 4 or less, it gets SIZE=7 and STA +2, then this card is sent to the first empty Slot of the enemy Field and deactivated. // Before defending, if this Follower's SIZE is at least 5, all allied Followers other than this card get ATK -2/STA -2, then this card gets SIZE=3, is sent to the first empty Slot of the enemy Field and deactivated.
300532.flavor: [What? A fox? Don't I look like a tiger to you? Hm, well, believe it or not~]

300531.name: Dark Sword Master A-GA
300531.ability: Before attacking, all enemy Followers get ATK -1, and this Follower gets ATK increased by the total ATK reduction. All allied Followers get STA increased by the tens digit of this Follower's ATK.
300531.flavor: [There is no need to be curious about me. Just don't get in my way.]

200552.name: 마녀, 마녀를 만나다
200552.ability: All enemy Followers with at least 3 DEF (at least 2 DEF if you have an Academy Character) get their skills removed. If this happens, those Followers get their DEF doubled.
200552.flavor: [Cinia, did Linia send you?] [I'm just following my sister's orders.]

300530.name: GS 7th Star
300530.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's STA is greater than this Follower's ATK, this Follower gets STA decreased by 1 plus the difference (to a minimum of 1) and gets ATK increased by the same amount. This skill is removed.
300530.flavor: [Is Crux after the same thing as our leader? More importantly, that person... is the new captain of the knights.]

300188.name: Blue Cross Federine
300188.ability: Before defending, if your Hand contains 2 or less cards, this Follower gets STA -2. If your Hand contains at least 4 cards, this skill is removed.
300188.flavor: [Don't think that the Blue Cross is as clean as the Blue in our name. When there is light, there is also darkness.]

300068.name: Crescent Deviation
300068.flavor: [Just cast off those worries. Break free from the box that you have confined yourself within. You will see new things.]

300186.name: Blue Cross Sherry
300186.ability: Before attacking, if your Hand contains 2 or less cards, this Follower gets DEF -2. If your Hand contains at least 4 cards, this skill is removed.
300186.flavor: [It's no exaggeration to say that we, the members of Crux's secret organization, have a hand in everything.]

300187.name: Blue Cross Aurora
300187.ability: Before attacking, if your Hand contains 2 or less cards, this Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1. If your Hand contains at least 4 cards, this skill is removed.
300187.flavor: [I hate listening. Aren't you just trying to justify your crimes? Don't think that it ends with this.]

300184.name: Chief & Mop Maid
300184.ability: Before defending, if you have an Academy Character, the first two cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, one random deactivated allied Follower is reactivated, and one random enemy Follower gets SIZE +1/ATK -1/STA -2.
300184.flavor: [Master Linia... Even if you say so, this is...] [No, I'm fine. Anyway, it's a little hot here.] [Kyaa! M, master Linia!]

300185.name: Blue Cross Member
300185.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets SIZE +1, then this skill is removed.
300185.flavor: [Do you understand? Our "Meeting of the Magnificant Blue Cross" is not a group created for personal gain.]

300182.name: Meteor Call Lady
300182.ability: Before attacking, a random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by 1 plus the number of cards on your Field with "Lady" in the name. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.

300183.name: Picnic Maid
300183.ability: Before defending, a random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by the number of cards in your Hand with "Maid" or "Lady" in the name, then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300183.flavor: [It makes me happy that you like the food that I prepared, master Cinia. Please choose me next time, too.]

300180.name: Justice Lady
300180.ability: At the start of the turn, the first card in your Deck with the name "Dress Up Lucerrie" is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field. If this happens, that card gets SIZE=5 and ATK +3/STA +2, and this card is sent to your Grave.
300180.flavor: [I cannot stand seeing my friends' cry any longer. Watch closely! Justice! Transform!]

300181.name: Dress Up Lucerrie
300181.ability: Before attacking, all cards except this one with the name "Dress Up Lucerrie" on your Field are sent to your Grave. The first card in your Hand with "Dress Up" in the name is removed from the game. If no cards are sent, the first card in your Grave with "Dress Up" in the name is removed from the game. If any of these effects happen, a random card in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave.

300340.name: LL Lady Tomo
300340.ability: Before defending, this card gets STA +1 for every card in your Hand/Field other than this one with "Lady" in the name and ATK +1 for every two cards.
300340.flavor: [She can't hide her obvious preference for girls. Since she loves all girls, her nickname is Daremo Daisuki.]

300341.name: Witch Cadet Zislana
300341.ability: Before attacking, this Follower and all Followers in your Hand with "Witch" in the name get STA +1.
300341.flavor: [Linia began to gather the witches. Those who were moved by her letter began leaving their homes to gather under her. Zislana was one of these, but she has no sense of direction.]

200499.name: 알아서는 안되는 진실
200499.ability: All allied and enemy Followers get DEF +1. Except for allied Vita Followers, all Followers with at least 3 DEF are sent to the Grave.
200499.flavor: [Orte Boer. Her book-finding skills can find any book in the world. Even the books that are not meant to be discovered.]

200498.name: 기억상실
200498.ability: Two random allied Followers get ATK/STA increased by half the number of Followers in the bottom 4 cards of your Deck (rounding up). If the increased amount was 2, they get an additional STA +1.
200498.flavor: [Where am I? Why can't I remember anything?] [I'll tell you when you fully recover... You have amnesia.] [Huh? I have amnesia? What do you mean by that...]

300344.name: Seeker Sarah
300344.ability: Before defending, if there are at least 2 allied cards with "Seeker" in the name, those cards get STA +4, then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300344.flavor: [The code that Irene deciphered uses an encryption method involving the literature of a particular era, so these have become an important key.]

300345.name: Knight Veltier
300345.ability: Before attacking, this Follower gets STA increased by 1 plus the SIZE of the first card in your Hand. The first card in your Hand gets SIZE -2 (to a minimum of 1) and is sent to the top of your Deck. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300345.flavor: [The girl without memories who joined the knights with Rose. She was appointed to the special task force directly under the new knight captain. She won't even speak with anyone other than Rose.]

300346.name: Aletheian B-NA
300346.ability: Before defending, if this Follower has at least 1 ATK, this Follower gets ATK -1/STA +3.
300346.flavor: [This is for the propagation of our god's teachings. As proof of the enlightment that our great shaman has received, we will reveal the true form of our "god".]

300347.name: Aletheian A-GA
300347.ability: Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK=1~10 (randomly). // Before defending, this Follower gets STA=1~10 (randomly).
300347.flavor: [A judge? The end? I don't know anything about that. I just like the Aletheian teachings, so I faithfully practice them each day.]

200493.name: 기다림
200493.ability: If your Field contains a Neutral Follower and a Follower that is not Neutral, two random allied Followers get ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +3.
200493.flavor: [Why isn't anyone coming? It would be nice if someone came to me.]

200492.name: 외로움
200492.ability: All allied Followers whose Slot number is even get DEF +2.
200492.flavor: [Why am I always alone? It would be nice to have some friends.]

200491.name: I WANT YOU
200491.ability: If you have a Darklore Character and the enemy Hand contains at least 4 cards, two random cards on the enemy Field are sent to your Field and deactivated.
200491.flavor: [The Aletheian want you. You, the one reading this! Stop hesitating and come. The teachings of the God of Truth are waiting for you. Contact: XXXX-XXX] [The Aletheian advertisement with Apostle Schindler's picture]

200490.name: 언더테이커의 방문
200490.ability: The first Follower in the enemy Deck with the highest SIZE gets ATK -3/STA -3.
200490.flavor: [What's so surprising? It's a nice night, isn't it?]

200497.name: 뛰어난전략
200497.ability: A random active allied Vita Follower is deactivated. If this happens, a random enemy Spell is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Hand.
200497.flavor: [Your IQ is 150 and my IQ is 170. With our combined IQ of 320, we can solve this problem!]

200496.name: Greaves of Darkness
200496.ability: The first allied Follower gains the following skill: "Before defending, this card gets ATK/STA increased by the Turn Number, then this skill is removed." That Follower gets DEF increased by this card's SIZE.
200496.flavor: [Along with the Gauntlet of Darkness, this is another weapon that the lifeform known as the Black Lion uses in human form. As expected, the material is unknown.]

200495.name: Gauntlets of Darkness
200495.ability: The first allied Follower gains the following skill: "Before attacking, all enemy Followers get STA -1, then this card gets ATK increased by the total decrease."
200495.flavor: [This is a weapon resembling a gauntlet that the Black Lion in human form carries. The material is unknown.]

200494.name: 이스펠트의 위협
200494.ability: Two random enemy Followers gain the following skill: "Before attacking, this card is sent to the bottom of your Deck."
200494.flavor: [Ack... Whew. You're lucky. Look here. I don't care that you bumped into me, but if my lollipop had fallen... You wouldn't be leaving unharmed. Watch where you're walking.]

200475.name: Sudden Turn
200475.ability: The first allied Follower with 5 or less ATK gets its ATK doubled.
200475.flavor: [Stop. What you seek is not here.]

200474.name: Crisis Averted
200474.ability: A random allied Crux Follower gains the following skill: "Before defending, the attacker gets STA decreased by half (rounding up) its own ATK. This skill is removed."
200474.flavor: [Everyone, retreat! ... Do you have something to say? Rose Pacifica.] [It finally happened.] [The Witch Queen is our enemy. This has not changed. However, I never heard anything about this.]

200477.name: Growing Congregation
200477.ability: If there are any allied Followers, a random enemy Follower gets DEF +1. If that Follower has at least 5 DEF, it is moved to the first empty Slot of your Field and deactivated.
200477.flavor: [I ran tirelessly in order to find you.] [... What is your name?] [Rue. K. Artend.]

200476.name: Party Time!
200476.ability: Cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until you have at least 4 cards in your Hand. A random allied Follower gets DEF/STA increased by 1 plus the number of sent cards.
200476.flavor: [Oh? I thought you were just a nerd, but it smells like you might be on the same level as me.] [If that's what you think, then why don't you just leave?]

200471.name: Maid Vacancy
200471.ability: All Spells in the top 5 cards of the enemy Grave are removed from the game, then the enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of removed cards.
200471.flavor: [The maids left the mansion, one by one. The bustling life that the maids had filled the mansion with was replaced by a lonely vacancy.]

200470.name: Investigation Progress
200470.ability: If the enemy Field contains at least two cards with the same name, all of those cards are sent to the Grave.
200470.flavor: [First, we have to find this person. Do you know what Soma looks like?] [Let's see... she's shorter than me, and she looks dumb, too.]

200473.name: Linia's Counterattack
200473.ability: If there are any allied Followers, a random enemy Follower with at least 2 skills is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE -1.
200473.flavor: [Linia, who had always operated from the shadows, extended her hand to Eisenwane out in public. It was a rare sight indeed.]

200472.name: Parliament
200472.ability: A random enemy Follower is sent to a random Slot on the enemy Field. That Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by the difference between its old and new Slot numbers. If you have an Academy Character, this effect is applied a second time.
200472.flavor: [Linia considered any witches who would not turn to her side to be traitors. By pulling some strings, she was able to get a bill passed before the Alliance Council that allowed her to arrest them.]

200479.name: Agent of God
200479.ability: If the top Follower in the enemy Grave and the first allied Follower have the same SIZE, the top Follower in the enemy Grave is moved to the first empty Slot of your Field.
200479.flavor: [Just as we believe in God, God believes in us. We must rise up to repay that belief.]

200478.name: Witness of Miracles
200478.ability: If your Field contains a Follower and a Spell other than this one and the enemy Field contains a Spell, a random Spell in your Hand that is not called "Witness of Miracles" is copied to the first empty Slot of your Field.
200478.flavor: [The God of Truth exists. This leg is proof of that.] [In order to spread the teachings of God, even a scar can be overcome.]

300062.name: Crescent Nyetimber
300062.flavor: [Conundrum is still young, if she goes to the night quiz game, I'm 100% sure she'll fail. She's still a little shorty... hmph.]

300744.name: Knight Staff Sergeant Seyfarf
300744.flavor: [Our national strength is our stamina! Hey you, stop messing around and talking about charm!]

300745.name: Special Flag Bearer Frett
300745.ability: Before attacking, if this card's DEF is at least 6, this card's DEF is changed to its original value. The defender gets ATK/STA decreased by half the DEF reduction (rounding up). This card gets ATK increased by the same amount. // Before defending, this card gets DEF +1. If you have a Crux Character, this card gets an additional DEF +1/STA +1.
300745.flavor: [This is no ordinary technique. The flag technique is jujutsu.]

300746.name: Wind Witch
300746.ability: Before attacking, if you have a Darklore Character, this card's SIZE is changed to its original value. This card gets ATK/STA increased by the change in SIZE.
300746.flavor: [Whew~ I love the wind that pierces and swallows up my body!]

300747.name: Mother Demon's Agent
300747.flavor: [By the Mother Demon's command, seeds of beautiful flowers will be scattered throughout this world.]

300537.name: Girls' Harmony
300537.ability: Before defending, if the attacker possesses a skill, this Follower gets STA increased by the attacker's ATK.
300537.flavor: [If destiny exists, the girls will meet again. They have no say in it.]

300741.name: Lady Ginger
300741.flavor: [How is it, master? I can look pretty good when I dress up, right?] [Of course. Clothes are like wings.]

300742.name: Witch Cadet Fade
300742.ability: Before defending, the attacker gets STA decreased by half this card's ATK (rounding up). // Before attacking, the defender gets STA increased by this card's ATK minus 3. This card gets STA +3.
300742.flavor: [Falco... Did she really become a Muzisitter?]

300743.name: Knight's Assistant Clarice
300743.ability: Before attacking, if you have a Crux Character, this card's SIZE is changed to its original value. This card gets ATK/STA increased by the change in SIZE.
300743.flavor: [Look, knights. Chimu and Chimyu will help you out. I'm going to look for Luthica.]

300748.name: Scardel Unit Dualgun
300748.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this card's ATK, this card gets the following effects depending on its activation state. Active: This card gets deactivated and gets ATK +2/STA +2. Deactivated: This card gets reactivated and gets DEF +1. The enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
300748.flavor: [I will show my enemies the dance of death.]

300749.name: Vita Guardian Gart
300749.ability: Before attacking, if you have a Vita Character and there are more Vita cards in your Deck than non-Vita cards, this card is removed from the game and a card called "Star Bird Gart" is created in the first empty Slot of your Field.
300749.flavor: [I don't know anything about math or science, but what are you planning to do to my students? Do you want to find out how I'm also an idiot who doesn't know how to deal with you painlessly?]

300342.name: Elemental Lady Chirushi
300342.ability: Before attacking, the following effects are applied depending on how many cards you have in your Hand/Field with "Lady" in the name. 1~2: This Follower gets ATK +3/STA +3. 4 or more: All enemy Followers on the Field get ATK -2/STA -2. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300342.flavor: [Magical! Shoot! This legendary power will revive the Madou Hero! His great name is Gran...] [Miss! What are you doing!]

300384.name: Indomitable Lady
300384.flavor: [She'll never give up, no matter what. Her family's motto is "Indomitable will". However, her household went under. Still, she'll never give up.]

300409.name: Apostle Pi
300409.ability: At the start of the turn, this Follower gets ATK increased by the number of cards in your Grave with "Aletheian" in the name (by a maximum of 5) and gets STA increased by half the ATK increase (rounding up).
300409.flavor: [That's right. Your sacrifices will not be in vain. Now, press on!] [The believers responded to her speech.]

300408.name: Crescent Ben Rie
300408.ability: Before attacking, this card gets DEF +1/STA -1 (No effect if STA=1).
300408.flavor: [No, you can't. You want to take my teddy bear away, too?] [The girl in the basement held the ruined teddy bear tightly.]

300385.name: Gale Witch Cadet
300385.ability: Before attacking, if the defender does not possess a "before defending" skill, it gets DEF -1/STA -1.
300385.flavor: [Really? Wow~ You're not crazy? It's that fast?]

300403.name: Witch Cadet Maid
300403.ability: Before attacking, a card identical to this card is created in your Grave, this card gets STA +1, then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn. // Before defending, a card identical to this card is created in your Grave, this card gets STA +1, then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300403.flavor: [I don't need to mop anymore! I'll decide my own path!]

300343.name: Knight Sgt. Seyfarf
300343.ability: Before defending, the attacker's DEF is changed to this Follower's DEF.
300343.flavor: [What do you think is the most important tool to bring to a battle? It's a shovel! A shovel! With a shovel, you can even destroy mountains! Don't look down upon the 218th battalion!]

300401.name: Two Lib. Aces
300401.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +0~2 and STA +0~1 (randomly). // At the start of the turn, this card's ATK is changed to its original value. The first Follower in the enemy Deck gets ATK/STA decreased by the change in ATK (by a maximum of 3).
300401.flavor: ["Two aces can't exist at the same time, senpai. Isn't it about time you stepped down?" "I can step down, but do you have the right to succeed me? Miss Tesla?"]

300400.name: Unlucky Cook Club Girl
300400.ability: Before defending, if this card has "Cook Club" in the name, it gets ATK +2/STA +2. Otherwise, this card gets ATK -1/STA -2. If there are any other allied Followers, this skill is sent to another random allied Follower.
300400.flavor: [Her luck is terrible. She can't defeat her hunger, and whenever she goes to the club room, the door is always closed.]

300407.name: Seeker Tommygun
300407.ability: Before attacking, this Follower's ATK is set equal to the defender's total DEF+STA minus 1.
300407.flavor: [This artifact allows you to commune with animals. Interesting, isn't it? These children have their own laws and ideas living within them as well. In the name of the goddess.]

300386.name: Royle Chair Lady Linia
300386.ability: Before attacking, the defender's DEF/STA are changed to their original values if the current values are higher than the original values, then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn. // Before defending, the attacker's ATK/DEF are changed to their original values if the current values are higher than the original values, then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300386.flavor: [I merely give advice on what the students should do.]

300405.name: Crux Knight Siskin
300405.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's SIZE is more than this Follower's SIZE, this card gets ATK +1/DEF +1.
300405.flavor: [Have you seen Miss Rose? She's so cool and feminine! Hm... She's really different from my sister.]

300404.name: Destiny Lady
300404.ability: Before defending, all cards except this one in your Hand/Field are sent to the bottom of your Deck. This card gets ATK/STA increased by the number of sent cards with "Lady" in the name. Cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until your Hand contains 4 cards.
300404.flavor: [A lady who leaves her fate to the cards. She believes that her future is within the cards.]

300387.name: Seeker Eizit
300387.flavor: [Don't be lazy about organization. Your life might depend on it in an emergency.]

300380.name: Tearless Rinoa
300380.flavor: [I don't believe in wishes. I think that just being able to go to sleep and live to see the next morning is good fortune. Somehow, I ended up on this downward path.]

300381.name: Council Press Rouyer
300381.flavor: [You're missing out on delicious food. Hey! You there. Try some of this.] [Her recruitment seems a bit odd.]

110099.name: Child Laevateinn
110099.ability: At the start of the turn, if there are at least two cards in your Hand with the same SIZE, those cards are sent to the bottom of your Deck. Your Character gets LIFE increased by half of the SIZE of the sent cards (by a maximum of 4, rounding up).
110099.flavor: [I tempt humans, but I also rely on them to live. Humans... what are they?]

110098.name: Child Gart
110098.ability: At the start of the turn, if there are no Academy cards in your Hand and Field, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +1.
110098.flavor: [Th... That Nold. She likes humans more than playing with me? All humans are boring! Hmph! Idiot!]

300382.name: New Council Student
300382.ability: Before defending, this Follower gets ATK +2/DEF +2/STA +2, then this skill is removed. // Before defending, all allied Followers other than this one get STA -1.
300382.flavor: [Joining the student council is like a dream come true.]

110093.name: Child Cannelle
110093.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Hand gets SIZE =1/ATK =5/DEF = 0/STA =5.
110093.flavor: [Stronger, more dignified. I need the power to rule. To become the leader of the Wind Clan.]

110092.name: Child Nold
110092.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number and number of cards in your Hand are both odd or both even, a random allied Follower with a SIZE of at least 2 gets SIZE -2 (to a minimum of 1).
110092.flavor: [I like the people of this Royle Kingdom. I like the children of this country's future. I will protect them.]

110091.name: Child Ginger
110091.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2, and then is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2.
110091.flavor: [Climax... I still don't understand. Do you get it?]

110090.name: Child Panica
110090.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets STA +3. If the Turn Number is even, that Follower also gets ATK +1.
110090.flavor: [Who are you? I like people who give me yummy bamboo. Give it to me. I'll go with you if you give me bamboo.]

110097.name: Defender.
110097.ability: At the start of the turn, your Character gets LIFE -1. If this happens, a random allied Follower gains gets ATK +2/DEF +2/STA +2.
110097.flavor: [You came all the way here... You have a strong will. How was it? Was it hard? You can rest... It's alright.]

110096.name: Child Rose
110096.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Academy Spell in your Hand with a SIZE less than the difference between 9 and your Field SIZE is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. If this happens, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by the sent card's SIZE.
110096.flavor: [I have one, I have one. I have a sister now. Her name is Cinia. I want to see her now. I want to become a good sister for her.]

110095.name: Child Jaina
110095.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1 and a random allied Follower gets ATK +2 .
110095.flavor: [I don't really know the future. But I want to become a cool person. Like that girl over there?]

110094.name: Child Vernika
110094.ability: At the start of the turn, the first card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, the first enemy Follower with the highest STA gets DEF decreased by half of the sent card's SIZE (by a maximum of 3, rounding up).
110094.flavor: [The world of books is mysterious. The things in the world - how much more mysterious is the real world?]

110273.name: 드레스업 루세르리에
110273.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Field contains 1 or less Followers, the first Follower in your Deck with "Dress Up" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=5/ATK +2/STA +2.
110273.flavor: [I still need more power to protect my friends.]

110272.name: 뮤지시터 스마티레인
110272.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get SIZE -1. All cards in your Deck with a SIZE of at least 5 are sent to the bottom of your Deck.
110272.flavor: [Huh? I look younger? I was young in the first place!]

110271.name: 드레스업 스마티레인
110271.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get SIZE -1.
110271.flavor: [I will show you the report of punishment!]

110270.name: 뮤지시터 마론
110270.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get STA +2. All cards in your Deck with a SIZE of at least 5 are sent to the bottom of your Deck.
110270.flavor: [This thing is the power of Muzisitter?]

120029.name: 배드민턴의 시타
120029.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1. If the Turn Number is 1, all cards in your Deck get SIZE -1 and all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +2.
120029.flavor: [This is a racket...?] [That's right, Sita. You just take it and "bounce" the ball back.] [... Do I have to bounce it...?]

120028.name: 코드네임 Q.B
120028.ability: At the start of the turn, all cards in your Deck, Hand, and Field get SIZE -1. If the Turn Number is odd, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +1. (Don't underestimate the power of Muzisitter.)
120028.flavor: [Welcome to the Land of Muzisitter. However, the person you are looking for is not here.]

110275.name: 학생회 주번 먼슬리
110275.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK -2/DEF +2. Two random enemy Followers get ATK -1.
110275.flavor: [Wonderful Weekly Helpers! I'm the Chilling Brain Monthly.]

110274.name: 뮤지시터 루세르리에
110274.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Field contains 1 or less Followers, the first Follower in your Deck with "Dress Up" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=3/ATK +4/STA +4.
110274.flavor: [With this power, I can protect my friends!]

120025.name: Royle Police Chief
120025.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field gets its SIZE halved (rounding up). A random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by half its SIZE (rounding up) and is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. (Hm? You plan to interfere with my duties? You're bold, aren't you?)
120025.flavor: [I am the chief of the Royle Police Force, Seresty. I need your cooperation for my current task... What? Hurry and start.]

120024.name: Soma.
120024.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +2/DEF +1/STA +2. Two random enemy Followers get ATK -0~3/STA -0~3. (I will test your willpower.)
120024.flavor: [Amrita? Who are you? Did you awaken me? My name is... Soma. I am the key to reach the door.]

120027.name: Black Lion
120027.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +3/STA +3. If the Turn Number is odd, all Spells in the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave. If the Turn Number is even, all Followers in the enemy Field are sent to the Grave. If the Turn Number is at least 10, the enemy Character may get LIFE=0. (Dark soul unleashed!)
120027.flavor: [One day, a tremendous evil that nobody had ever seen before appeared. Everyone called it the Black Lion, and it resembled Nold for some reason.]

120026.name: 펭귄옷의 리안나
120026.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower is moved to a random empty Slot on the enemy Field. The following effects are applied depending on the Followers new Slot number. 1: The moved Follower is destroyed. 2~4: All enemy cards are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. 5: The moved Follower's skills are removed. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE +3. (The penguin suit holds some secrets. What could they be?)

120021.name: Magicat.
120021.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +2/STA +2 and the enemy gets Shuffles -1. All Spells in the enemy Hand get SIZE +1. All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK -1/STA -1. The enemy Character gets LIFE -1. (The power of Talentium radiates from its necklace. Your energy is completely drained the moment you touch it.)
120021.flavor: [Meow~] [As soon as you thought about touching the cat, its necklace began to shine.]

120020.name: 이스펠트
120020.ability: At the start of the turn, all cards on the enemy Field with a SIZE of 2 or less are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck, and a random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of sent cards. Two random cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. An additional effect is applied depending on the location of the battle.
120020.flavor: [Welcome to our chocolate factory. Is this your first time? Huhu, I hope you have a good time.]

120023.name: Spirit Amrita
120023.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +1. If there are no enemy Followers, your Character gets LIFE +1, a random allied Follower gets ATK +0~3/STA +0~3, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck, and 3 cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (I will show you something beyond what you can see or hear.)
120023.flavor: [Who is knocking at the altar's door? The ritual requires a key.]

120022.name: Witch Queen Linia
120022.ability: At the start of the turn, all enemy Followers with stats higher than their original values have their stats changed to their original values. All allied Followers with stats lower than their original values have their stats changed to their original values. If the Turn Number is even, your Character gets LIFE +3. 3 cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck.(Everything within this world moves according to my wishes. I will quickly get the upper Hand.)
120022.flavor: [How rude of you to come here uninvited. Why don't you disappear from my paradise?]

110075.name: R. Mop Maid
110075.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2.
110075.flavor: [But wiping that place by hand... is scary...]

110074.name: R. Chief Maid
110074.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +3.
110074.flavor: [Linia's maids are all so carefree. I would like to be sent there, too.]

110077.name: Scardel Chardonnay
110077.ability: At the start of the turn, your Character gets LIFE +2.

110076.name: Scardel Merlot
110076.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA -2.

110071.name: Head Cleaning Maid
110071.ability: At the start of the turn, the first two cards in the enemy Hand are moved to the first empty Slots of your Field or the enemy Field (50% chance).
110071.flavor: [I understand now. I just have to make it look like I didn't touch anything when I clean.]

110070.name: Gourmet Maid
110070.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +2.
110070.flavor: [Usually, it's just the maids that eat what we make. Sometimes Master Linia comes to have something, and it makes me happy to receive her awkward compliments.]

110073.name: Head Maid Lise
110073.ability: At the start of the turn, a random card on your Field or the enemy Field is destroyed.

110072.name: Tea Maid
110072.ability: At the start of the turn, either your Character gets LIFE -1 or the enemy Character gets LIFE -3 (50% chance).

300536.name: L. Iri Flina
300536.ability: Before defending, if this Follower belongs to your Character's faction and the attacker possesses a "before attacking" skill, this Follower gets STA increased by the attacker's ATK.
300536.flavor: [Going out in the morning isn't bad, but going out at night is still better.]

110079.name: Scardel Viognier
110079.ability: At the start of the turn, two random enemy Followers get DEF -1.
110079.flavor: [Crux's power was greater than expected. Regardless, no matter what they do, it will be difficult to steal from us.]

110078.name: Scardel Sangiovese
110078.ability: At the start of the turn, a random card in your Hand gets SIZE -1.
110078.flavor: [You must leave. We can't easily abandon a place we've grown so fond of.]

300579.name: Nold of Darkness
300579.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's SIZE is at least 6, the defender is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. // Before defending, the attacker gets SIZE +1.
300579.flavor: [This is the human form of the enormous Black Lion.]

300578.name: 미소짓는 베르니카
300578.ability: Before attacking, if your Field contains at least 2 Neutral cards, the defender gets DEF=0, then all allied Followers get ATK/STA increased by the change in DEF. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300578.flavor: [Vernika smiled as she looked upon the butterflies fluttering around her.]

100089.name: Newbie Guide Rico
100089.flavor: [It's good to rest when you are tired~ Don't forget the feeling you had when you first started.]

100088.name: Anj Inyghem
100088.ability: At the start of the turn, the following effects are applied depending on the enemy Character's LIFE. 31 or more: The enemy Character gets LIFE -2. 20~25: A random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2. 10~15: A random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -2. 6 or less: The enemy Character gets LIFE=1.
100088.flavor: [A fake midget? I'm no imitation. What? You're my new master? Then you have my service.]

100084.name: Rain-Soaked Gart
100084.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets DEF/STA decreased by the number of Followers in your Hand.
100084.flavor: [Uuuu... why's the rain coming down like this... E... even if you stare like that, it won't make my clothes drier!]

100087.name: Plastered Sigma
100087.ability: At the start of the turn, a number of Followers in your Hand equal to the SIZE of the first card in your Hand get ATK +1/STA +1. (The Followers are selected from left to right.)
100087.flavor: [Ng? What? Something's on my chest? I don't see anything. Everyone in Crux is supposed to be honest.]

200558.name: 의외의 해결사
200558.ability: A card called "Pleased to meet you" is created in the enemy Hand.
200558.flavor: [I'm the logical Conundrum from the logical night! Kris has asked me to come solve your problems!]

100081.name: Bedroom Nold
100081.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Academy Follower gets STA +2 and SIZE -1 (to a minimum of 1).
100081.flavor: [What business do you have coming here? I'm tired, so what kind of business do you have to find me in my bedroom?]

100083.name: Bunny Girl Cannelle
100083.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower with a SIZE of 5 or less gets SIZE +1/ATK +2/DEF +1/STA +2.
100083.flavor: [How is it! This is my true form!] [No way...] [Hey!!]

110158.name: Envy Lady
110158.ability: At the start of the turn, all enemy Followers with stats higher than their original values have their stats changed to their original values. All allied Followers with stats lower than their original values have their stats changed to their original values. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: Mole hunting.)
110158.flavor: [... Destroy me. If, by my sacrifice, I can give consolation to all the lonely people in the world, I will gladly do it.] [Location: Muspelheim 20F]

300535.name: L. Luthica Preventer
300535.ability: Before defending, if this Follower belongs to your Character's faction and the attacker possesses a "before attacking" skill, this Follower gets STA increased by the attacker's ATK.
300535.flavor: [If you call yourself a knight, you must work hard at all times. However, it can be difficult to suppress the urge to eat some snacks.]

200268.name: Lady's Selection
200268.ability: If there are any Followers in your Field with "Lady" in the name, a random Spell in the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If this happens, all Followers in your Field with "Lady" in the name get STA increased by the sent card's SIZE.
200268.flavor: [This sword is magnificent, too, but something is missing. I want to hold a sharper and more beautiful sword.]

200269.name: Elberto Impact
200269.ability: If you have an Academy Character, all enemy Spells are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. A number of Spells called "Pleased to meet you" equal to 1 plus the number of sent Spells are placed on the enemy Field and deactivated, starting from the first empty Slot. This card is removed from the game.
200269.flavor: [Elbert Albershaw. Her artificial eye was a heart stone, and she was a witch. She took the nobles' hands and asked, why do you hide? That place has witches that I do not know.]

200260.name: Sage's Slipper
200260.ability: All cards on the enemy Field with "Shion" or "Rion" in the name are destroyed.
200260.flavor: [What are you doing!] [Sister Sage! Why are you suddenly hitting us!] [Ouch! Ouch!]

200261.name: Third Impact
200261.flavor: [The first was a failure. The second was also a failure. The third was a crisis. The flagpole she was supplied had broken. There were no spares, and they had to march...]

200262.name: Arc Light
200262.ability: All enemy Followers get the following skill: "Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1."

200263.name: Charming Aura
200263.ability: All enemy Followers have their skills removed.
200263.flavor: [You there, honey~ Do you want to play with me for a while? If it's okay, come with me.]

200264.name: Trap Book
200264.ability: If there are no empty Slots in the enemy Field, all cards in the enemy Field are sent to the Grave.
200264.flavor: [The energy of a curse attacked Nanai as she touched the book.] [Se... Seven?]

200265.name: Council Grand Opening
200265.ability: If you have a Follower on your Field with "Student Council" in the name, the first card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. The first enemy card with the same SIZE as that card is sent to the Grave.
200265.flavor: [As the start of a new student council, Celine moved the student council room to a new building outside the school.] [You have to put new wine in a new bottle, right?] [This is outside of budget.]

200266.name: Freezing Room
200266.ability: All Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by one plus half of the Turn Number (rounding down, by a maximum of 5). You get Shuffles +1 and the opponent gets Shuffles -1.
200266.flavor: [As... mis...] [When Asmis, who received a note from Weekly, arrived after class, Weekly had already been frozen.]

200267.name: Witch Cadet
200267.ability: Two random Followers in your Field get ATK +1/STA +1. Two random Followers in your Field with "Witch" in the name get ATK +2/STA +2.
200267.flavor: [The symbolic hat of witches and a letter were both left in the girls' new lockers.]

210012.name: Black Ore
210012.flavor: [Talentium does not have a fixed color. In some places, black Talentium can be found. Some time ago, the Monster Hunter Bureau reported that some monsters carry Talentium. -Esprit's memo...]

210013.name: Ruins Fragment
210013.flavor: [This is a strange stone fragment found at the frontier ruins. The stone's cleavage which is unlike any other on the continent and the remarkable architecture of the ruins offer evidence that these ruins are not a part of this continent's history. -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Frontier Ruins]

210010.name: White Ore
210010.flavor: [Talentium does not have a fixed color. In some places, white Talentium can be found. Some time ago, the Monster Hunter Bureau reported that some monsters carry Talentium. -Esprit's memo...]

210011.name: Blue Ore
210011.flavor: [Talentium does not have a fixed color. In some places, blue Talentium can be found. Some time ago, the Monster Hunter Bureau reported that some monsters carry Talentium. -Esprit's memo...]

210016.name: Bamboo
210016.flavor: [Bamboo Scent is famous for its abundant bamboo and exotic scenery, so it is always packed with people. However, bamboo never grew here originally, so who could have brought it here? -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Bamboo Scent]

210017.name: Lily
210017.flavor: [The symbolic flower of the Pacifica family. Every Pacifica's house is adorned with this flower. It sometimes makes me laugh a little because the flower matches their preferences. -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Linia's House]

210014.name: Heart Stone
210014.flavor: [The mana of witches is trapped within witches. It cannot leave through the witches' own power. In order for a witch's mana to interact with the world's mana, they created this artifact, a witch's heart, or a heart stone. -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Witch's Tower, Shadowland]

210015.name: Holy Beast Tear
210015.flavor: [Holy water tears are an important material in the creation of the knights' proof of knighthood. They're called holy, but when you see "her" shed her tears, it brings doubt to whether or not "holy" is the appropriate word. -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Crux Training Camp]

300383.name: Council Pres. Celine
300383.ability: Before attacking, the defender is switched with the enemy Follower with the lowest STA. If that Follower's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, this Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2. // Before defending, this card gets STA +1.
300383.flavor: [Celine has returned to her student council president duties. Sometimes she has an uneasy expression, but she usually seems content.]

210018.name: Blood Pack
210018.flavor: [These blood packs are the Darklore's first step toward an organized system of distributing blood. The Scardel and Crescent elders periodically make rounds to administer the flow of blood packs. -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Land of Vampires, Goddess Tower]

210019.name: Seal of Approval
210019.flavor: ["Good~ Job! -Homeroom teacher" I recall the bittersweet memories of working hard to get these stamps. -Esprit's memo...] [Location: Vita High School]

300348.name: Apostle Schindler K Eru
300348.ability: Before attacking, the first allied Follower other than this one is sent to the Grave. If this happens, this Follower gets the following effects depending on the sent Follower's type. Darklore: ATK +2/STA +2. Aletheian: ATK +3/STA +3. Others: STA +3. No Follower: ATK +1/STA +1.
300348.flavor: [Sign here, it's time to put your beliefs into practice. Now~ we'll share god's rewards with you.]

200318.name: Infinite Thanks
200318.ability: A Spell called "Thank You" is created in all empty Slots of the enemy Field and deactivated. (HINT: Thank you.)
200318.flavor: [No matter how many times I emphasize having a thankful heart, it's still an important virtue.]

200319.name: Curse of Decay
200319.ability: All enemy Followers get ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2, then this card is deactivated and remains on the Field. (HINT: Endless decay.)
200319.flavor: [The effects of the curse are still incomplete, but if you are too slow to stop it, it will become impossible to undo.]

200314.name: Shutter Chance
200314.ability: All allied Followers gain the following skill: "Before attacking, if this card's DEF is less than 0, its DEF is set equal to the absolute value of its DEF."
200314.flavor: [I'm completely prepared, so I won't miss the perfect chance.]

200315.name: Try Being Me
200315.ability: All Followers in your Hand get stats changed to equal the stats of the first card in your Field with "Conundrum" in the name. All Followers in the enemy Hand get stats changed to equal the first card in the enemy Field with "Conundrum" in the name.

200316.name: Gift Box
200316.flavor: [A packaged box to give as a gift to another person. It gets you excited when wondering what's inside, and you can feel the spirit of giving. -Esprit's memo...]

200317.name: Disciple's Box
200317.ability: A random high-level card is created in the first empty Slot of your Field. (HINT: A random powerful spell will appear.)
200317.flavor: [You'll never guess what will come out from this box.]

200310.name: Protective Instinct
200310.ability: The first allied Follower is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, the next allied Follower gets ATK +4 and gets STA increased by the sent card's DEF. The Follower also gets SIZE -1 if the moved card has "Aletheian" in the name.
200310.flavor: [I will protect you. Remember these teachings.]

200311.name: GS Attack Formation
200311.ability: The first Follower on your Field with "GS" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot of the enemy Field, gets ATK=0, and gets STA increased by half the ATK reduction (rounding down). Its skills become the following: "Before defending, all allied Followers get DEF -1. "At the start of the turn, this Follower is sent to the Grave."
200311.flavor: [I will be the leader.] [The scariest part of GS aggression is their lack of fear.]

200312.name: Phantasmal Image
200312.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, the skills of the second allied Follower are copied to the first allied Follower. The first allied Follower gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the number of copied skills.
200312.flavor: [The seen world isn't everything. The important things can't be seen.]

200313.name: Forbidden Research
200313.ability: All enemy cards are deactivated. All enemy Spells get Size +1. All enemy Followers have  their skills removed. The enemy player gets Shuffles -1.
200313.flavor: [The project wasn't suspended. I just forgot about it...]

300349.name: 4th Witness Kana.DDT
300349.ability: Before defending, if the Turn Number is odd, this Follower gets STA increased by the attacker's ATK. // Before attacking, if the Turn Number is even, this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2.
300349.flavor: ["She is dangerous. She is a suspect, so you must secure her." Codename: VAN-KIRAS. For the early elimination of unstable worlds and to battle their creators, she possesses an unstoppable power of suppression. In this world, she has no equal.]

300199.name: Office Witch
300199.ability: Before attacking, if the number of cards on the enemy Field is even, a random card in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave. This skill is removed.
300199.flavor: [Yes, I understand! So could you come to the lobby this afternoon... Yes? You can't meet the deadline? We requested the job last Monday! What are we going to do if you can't do it now?]

300198.name: Dress Up Sionrion
300198.ability: Before attacking, all cards except this one with the name "Dress Up Shionrion" on your Field are sent to your Grave. The first card in your Hand is moved to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave with "Shion" or "Rion" in the name is removed from the game. If this happens, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1 and your Character gets LIFE +1.
300198.flavor: [This is the Talent Memory? What kind of side effect is this? Well, whatever! You will pay for your crimes!]

300195.name: Sion Flina
300195.ability: At the start of the turn, this Follower and first card in your Deck with "Rion Flina" in the name are sent to the Grave. If this happens, the first card in your Deck with the name "Dress Up Shionrion" is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=5 and ATK +3/STA +3.
300195.flavor: [The two of us who make up one detective group will wipe the tears of this town away!]

300194.name: GS Recon
300194.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets SIZE +1, then this skill is removed.
300194.flavor: [It's dangerous... If we want to receive continuous support from them, we have to know more about them.]

300197.name: GS Alla Marcia
300197.ability: Before defending, the first card in your Deck with the name "GS Fighter" is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field. That Follower gets ATK +2, then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300197.flavor: [Fighters, have pride as fighters! You will become strong by being with us. Just as we once did, the day when you climb higher will come.]

300196.name: Rion Flina
300196.ability: At the start of the turn, this Follower and first card in your Deck with "Shion Flina" in the name are sent to the Grave. If this happens, the first card in your Deck with the name "Dress Up Shionrion" is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=5 and ATK +3/STA +3.
300196.flavor: [Sister Sage started picking on us by hitting us with a slipper.]

300191.name: Seeker Sarah
300191.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets DEF decreased by the number of cards in your Hand with "Seeker" in the name.
300191.flavor: [I'm happily exploring because of the feeling of freedom. Of course, doing my work properly makes me happy, too.]

300190.name: Blue Cross Florence
300190.ability: Before defending, if your Hand contains 2 or less cards, all cards on your Field other than this one are sent to the Grave. If your Hand contains at least 4 cards, this skill is removed.
300190.flavor: [It's unfortunate, but even if the knight captain requests it, in this case, our meeting cannot be moved. I'll deliver the message.]

300193.name: GS Soldier
300193.flavor: [In the name of the GS! Hold the squid and beer high!]

300192.name: Knight Frett & Pintail
300192.ability: Before defending, if you have a Crux Character, the first two cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, one random deactivated allied Follower is reactivated, and one random allied Follower gets SIZE -1/ATK +1/STA +2.
300192.flavor: [You, are you mocking me?] [You can't pass here, senpai.] [They're saying I'm in a slump over there, aren't they?]

300359.name: Seeker Lagerfeld
300359.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's ATK is greater than this card's total DEF+STA, this card is removed from the game and a new copy of this Follower with the same SIZE is created in the first empty Slot on your Field. The new Follower gets SIZE +1 and is deactivated, then a random allied Follower other than this one with a SIZE of at least 2 gets SIZE -2 (to a minimum of 1). If this Follower's SIZE is 3 or more and you have a Crux Character, the attacker and this Follower are sent to your Grave. If your Character does not belong to Crux, the attacker is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck and this Follower is sent to the Grave.

300358.name: Seeker Adalia
300358.ability: Before defending, the first Spell in your Deck with "Sanctuary" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field, then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn. // Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK increased by the number of cards on your Field with "Sanctuary" in the name.
300358.flavor: [This artifact joins bodies together. How about it? Does my partner look healthy? Hehe..]

300357.name: Seeker Alameda
300357.ability: Before defending, all cards on your Field with "Sanctuary" in the name are reactivated, then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300357.flavor: [Everyone is just digging in the ground for artifacts? If you just read books and dig like that, an artifact isn't just going to pop out of nowhere.]

300356.name: Shut-In Lady Neetness
300356.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's ATK is greater than this card's total DEF+STA, this card is removed from the game and a new copy of this Follower with the same SIZE is created in the first empty Slot on your Field. The new Follower gets SIZE -1 and is deactivated, the first Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck, and attacker gets STA decreased by the sent card's SIZE. If this Follower's SIZE is 3 or less and you have an Academy Character, the attacker and this Follower are sent to your Grave. If your Character does not belong to Academy, the attacker is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck and this Follower is sent to the Grave.

300355.name: Witch Cadet Prelitch
300355.ability: At the start of the turn, this card's SIZE is decreased by the number of cards in your Hand with "Witch" in the name (toa minimum of 1), then this skill is removed. // At the start of the turn, this Follower gets DEF +2. // Before attacking, this Follower gets DEF=0 and a random allied Follower on the Field with "Witch" in the name gets ATK/STA increased by the change in DEF.

300354.name: Witch Cadet Dauner
300354.ability: At the start of the turn, this card's SIZE is decreased by the number of cards in your Hand with "Witch" in the name (to a minimum of 1), then this skill is removed. // Before attacking, the defender loses any "before attacking" skills, then this skill is removed.
300354.flavor: [She has more talent than an ordinary person, but she's the type of person who gets depressed whenever anything goes wrong. As a result, she can't get high scores.]

300353.name: Lib. Explorer Ritana
300353.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's ATK is greater than this card's total DEF+STA, this card is removed from the game and a new copy of this Follower with the same SIZE is created in the first empty Slot on your Field. The new Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2 and SIZE -1 and is deactivated. If this Follower's SIZE is 2 or less and you have a Vita Character, the attacker and this Follower are sent to your Grave. If your Character does not belong to Vita, the attacker is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck and this Follower is sent to the Grave.
300353.flavor: [I heard a rumor. "I saw a monster," they said.]

300352.name: Lib. Explorer Orte
300352.ability: Before attacking, this card's ATK is changed to 2 plus the defender's DEF. // Before defending, the attacker gets STA -3.
300352.flavor: [The smell of old books pierce the pitch black darkness of the underground library. It's nerve-wracking, even with a flashlight in hand. The sound of old books falling somewhere! The sound of something skittering around in the darkness! Is it my imagination?]

300351.name: Lib. Explorer Vitelle
300351.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK=8.
300351.flavor: [Her ability to shrink herself is convenient for exploring the massive underground library.]

300350.name: Kana.DTD
300350.ability: Before defending, the enemy Character gets LIFE=0.
300350.flavor: [It is my policy to remove all possible risks.]

300602.name: 뮤지시터 레이디 리누스
300602.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets STA decreased by the ATK of a random enemy Follower other than the defender. If there are no other enemy Followers, the defender gets STA -3. // Before defending, the attacker gets ATK decreased by this card's DEF.
300602.flavor: [Alright. I can do it! Arise, power of justice!]

200440.name: Steparu
200440.ability: A random enemy Follower is deactivated. Next, the deactivated Follower gets the following skills: "At the start of the turn, this card is sent to the Grave." "Before this card is attacked, it gets its STA increased by half of the attacker's ATK (rounding down), and then this skill is removed."
200440.flavor: [I am just an observer... My actions may lead to your demise... Is my assistance really necessary?]

200441.name: Student Council
200441.ability: The first allied Follower with "Student Council" in the name gets ATK +3, then the first enemy Follower whose ATK is lower than that Follower's ATK is deactivated.
200441.flavor: [Today's agenda is about our tea...] [Huh? Is that what we were supposed to talk about today?] [President, today's agenda is the demerit list.] [Do we have any snacks besides these?]

200442.name: Faltering
200442.ability: Two random allied Followers get STA +3 or STA +5 (50% chance).
200442.flavor: [Does she not remember who I am? Maybe she forgot? Or maybe...] [The girl's worries deepened within the bustling Republic.]

200443.name: Satisfaction
200443.ability: The first allied Follower that belongs to your Character's faction is removed from the game, then the first card in your Deck with the highest SIZE is sent to the removed Follower's Slot. That Follower has its SIZE set equal to the removed Follower's SIZE.
200443.flavor: [Huhu! Nothing is more fitting for Vita's representative mural than a portrait of myself!]

200444.name: Garden Lady
200444.ability: If you have an Academy Character, your Character gets LIFE +1. If your Deck contains 15 or fewer cards, your Character gets an additional LIFE +3. This card is removed from the game.
200444.flavor: [Nothing sets my mind at ease better than the smell of flowers and the chirping of the birds in the morning. Are you at ease? It's a good morning.]

200445.name: Everyone's Enemy
200445.ability: The following effect is applied 4 times to one random enemy Follower: ATK -1, DEF -1, or STA -1.
200445.flavor: [Layna Scentriver leads the anti-witch queen group. She is at the center of the current situation. Crux and the rest of the Alliance need the key that she has. They've formed a silent agreement. The witch queen has decided to eliminate Layna Scentriver.]

200446.name: Lady Maid Dream
200446.ability: A random enemy card is sent to the bottom of the enemy Grave, then this card gets SIZE=1, is sent to the first empty Slot on the enemy Field and deactivated. If this card's SIZE is 1, the last card in your Grave is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field, then this card is removed from the game.
200446.flavor: [Miss...] [Use my name when it's just the two of us.] [Yes...] [And drop the honorifics!]

200447.name: Discovery
200447.ability: Cards are sent from the top of your deck to your Hand until you have at least 4 cards. All allied Followers get STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand with "Blue Cross" in the name.
200447.flavor: [Fortune had it that the book that fell before Eisenwane contained information about the key to open the door.]

200448.name: Experience
200448.ability: A random enemy Spell that is not called "Experience" is copied to the first empty Slot of your Field.
200448.flavor: [You've really done it now. Dammit, how the hell am I going to fix this? What a goddamn idiot.]

200449.name: Relapse
200449.ability: The first allied Follower with the highest SIZE has its SIZE/ATK/DEF/STA halved (rounding down). If this happens, a copy of that Follower with half its previous SIZE (rounding up) is created in the first empty Slot of your Field.
200449.flavor: [What am I doing? This sensation... feels familiar.]

200044.name: Tower of Books
200044.ability: The first Spell in the enemy Hand with a SIZE of 3 or less has its SIZE increased by the number of allied Vita Followers.
200044.flavor: [There are still so many left... I came to the library to read books, not organize them...]

200045.name: Empowering Chant
200045.ability: The allied Follower in Slot 2 of your Field gets ATK +2/STA +5. If you do not have a Vita Character, then that Follower loses its skills.

200046.name: Feast
200046.ability: If your Character has "Sita" in the name, it gets LIFE +4.
200046.flavor: [Vernika, Vernika. This... I can eat it all?]

200047.name: Reunion
200047.ability: A random enemy Follower with a SIZE less than or equal to the number of cards in your Hand (or Hand plus 1 if you have a Vita Character) is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field, and then gets SIZE -1 (to a minimum of 1).

200040.name: Evil Eye
200040.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, all enemy Followers get ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2. If you do not have a Darklore Character, all enemy Followers get ATK -2/DEF -2. If there are 2 or less enemy Followers, those Followers get ATK -1/DEF -1.
200040.flavor: [Everything will be drained... everything will lose its life before my eye... there's no difference between friend or foe... it will show mercy for no one... Ugh... g.. Get away!!]

200041.name: Council Justice
200041.ability: If you have a Follower with "Student Council" in the name on your Field, then two random enemy Followers get the following effects depending on how many Vita Followers you have on your Field. 1: ATK -2. 2: STA -3. 3 or more: ATK -2/DEF -1/STA -2.
200041.flavor: [The heavens call! The earth calls! The people call! They call upon me to strike down delinquents! I am the righteous student council! Inspector!]

200042.name: Student Council Kick
200042.ability: The first active allied Follower with "Student Council" in the name on your Field is deactivated. If this happens, the enemy Follower with the highest SIZE gets STA decreased by 1 plus the deactivated Follower's ATK.

200043.name: Book Thief
200043.ability: If your Field contains at least as many Followers with "Library Club" in the name as the enemy Field has Spells, then one random enemy Spell is moved to the first empty Slot on your Field.
200043.flavor: [Hey! You need to check that out!]

200048.name: Unwilling Sacrifice
200048.ability: The first allied Academy Follower with the lowest STA is sent to the Grave. The first enemy Follower with an ATK greater than the sent card's STA gets ATK decreased by the sent card's STA.
200048.flavor: [M... master Cinia! Spare me!] [I'm just turning you into a frog for a little bit. I'll turn you back right away.] [No!!!]

200049.name: Shoddy Magic
200049.ability: Two random enemy Followers get STA -4 or STA -2. (50% chance)

300534.name: L. Cinia Pacifica
300534.ability: Before defending, if this Follower belongs to your Character's faction and the attacker possesses a "before attacking" skill, this Follower gets STA increased by the attacker's ATK.
300534.flavor: [It's been a while since I've left the house, but going out is good, too. I heard that cute animals can be found at some place... Maybe I'll try going there?]

300090.name: Stigma Witness Felicia
300090.ability: Before defending, all allied Followers with the name "Stigma Flinte" get ATK/STA increased by the number of allied Academy cards.
300090.flavor: [Flinte... I am here... One day, my heart will touch yours. I will wait until then.]

300091.name: Seeker Christina
300091.flavor: [Se, senpai! I'm taking care of an investigation of the seekers in Crux right now. I would be grateful if you could take some of your precious time to fill out this survey! Se, senpai!]

210047.name: 차원의 파편
210047.flavor: [Kana's Spiral Fragments that had been discovered in various places suddenly transformed, and they began to be discovered more frequenly.] [Location: Dimensional Rift]

300093.name: Seeker Laura
300093.flavor: [What brings you to the church? I am moved by people who maintain their belief in god even though they are busy. I want to make this a place that people can come to when their hearts are troubled.]

300094.name: Seeker Lucia
