300094.ability: Before attacking, this card gets STA decreased by the number of cards in your Hand/Field with "Seeker" in the name (to a minimum of 1) and gets ATK increased by the STA reduction.
300094.flavor: [Hehe, the book that senpai recommended was so interesting that I lost track of time.]

300095.name: Seeker Melissa
300095.ability: At the start of the turn, two random allied Followers with "Seeker" in the name get ATK +2/STA +2, then this skill is removed.
300095.flavor: [Don't overdo yourself. I will handle the excavation and exploration. I will also deal with the knights. Focus on research, Irene. Where is the next site? I want to see more amazing artifacts.]

300753.name: Hanbok Knight Pintail
300753.ability: Before attacking, if you have a Crux Character, all allied Followers other than this card get ATK +1/STA +1. This card is moved to a random Slot in your Field. // Before defending, if you have a Crux Character, the attacker gets STA -3. This Follower gets STA -3. This card is moved to a random Slot in your Field.
300753.flavor: [Miss Ophelia is really talented. I'll cherish these clothes for a long time.]

300752.name: Flower Cinia
300752.ability: Before attacking, if you have an Academy Character, all allied Followers other than this card get ATK +1/STA +1. This card is moved to a random Slot in your Field. // Before defending, if you have an Academy Character, the attacker gets STA -3. This Follower gets STA -3. This card is moved to a random Slot in your Field.
300752.flavor: [Going for a walk and getting a change in surroundings isn't too bad. I'll bring Penika and Cannelle next time.]

300751.name: Sita and Vernika
300751.ability: Before attacking, if you have a Vita Character, all allied Followers other than this card get ATK +1/STA +1. This card is moved to a random Slot in your Field. // Before defending, if you have a Vita Character, the attacker gets STA -3. This Follower gets STA -3. This card is moved to a random Slot in your Field.
300751.flavor: [Sita, isn't this place and the scenery nice?] [This cake is good...]

300750.name: Star Bird Gart
300750.ability: Before defending, all enemy cards are deactivated. This card gets ATK/STA increased by the number of deactivated cards. // Before attacking, a random enemy deactivated card is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
300750.flavor: [Gart, the stargazing bird. She is the guardian of Vita Public School, watching from the highest place where she can see the farthest things.]

300096.name: Crux Knight Sinclair
300096.ability: Before defending, up to two Crux cards in your grave are removed from the game. If this happens, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2, and the first Follower on your Field other than this one gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300096.flavor: [Be at ease, the church and we knights are completely separate. I can guarantee your safetly. In return, can you tell me more about your sister?]

300754.name: Halloween Rion Flina
300754.ability: Before attacking, if you have a Darklore Character, all allied Followers other than this card get ATK +1/STA +1. This card is moved to a random Slot in your Field. // Before defending, if you have a Darklore Character, the attacker gets STA -3. This Follower gets STA -3. This card is moved to a random Slot in your Field.
300754.flavor: [All the candy and snacks are mine! Why don't you hand it all over before I give you a taste of something frightening?]

300097.name: Crescent Puzzle
300097.flavor: [Piece... a little more, one piece more... Hehehe, this is my world.]

300735.name: Master of Cards
300735.ability: Before attacking, the defender gains the skill "At the start of the turn, nothing happens." // At the start of the turn, all enemy Followers with the skill "At the start of the turn, nothing happens" are destroyed.
300735.flavor: [It's only natural that the master of cards would be the master of the field. I'll charge ahead at full speed.]

300734.name: Succubus Vermille
300734.ability: Before defending, if this Follower's SIZE is 2 or less, this Follower gets SIZE +1 and is sent to the top of your Deck. // Before attacking, if this Follower's SIZE is 3 or more, the defender gets DEF=0 and this Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the change in DEF.
300734.flavor: [Why does this place only have young girls? I can't find any dreams worth entering...]

300737.name: Cook Club Poplar
300737.ability: Before attacking, if you have a Vita Character, this card's SIZE is changed to its original value. This card gets ATK/STA increased by the change in SIZE.
300737.flavor: [I don't know what else to do but to put all my effort into catching the person who messed up my clothes and our stuff.]

300736.name: Eisenwane
300736.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets its first skill removed. // Before defending, this card's SIZE is set equal to 7 minus this card's Upgrade Level. This card gets ATK/STA increased by its Upgrade Level. This skill is removed.
300736.flavor: [Miss Hanobelle, I've just returned from my assignment. From my assignment.] [Good job. What is that frontier like?]

300731.name: Knight Agent Mytyl
300731.ability: Before defending, if this card's Slot number is even, it gets ATK +1/STA +1. // Before attacking, Followers neighboring this card get ATK -1/STA -1. This card gets ATK/STA increased by twice the decrease.
300731.flavor: [I can still be of help, even though I have a faint existence. Right, staff sergeant?]

300730.name: Blue Cross Ferris
300730.ability: Before attacking, if the defender has at least 2 DEF, the defender gets STA -3.

300733.name: Scardel Delaware
300733.ability: Before attacking, if the defender has at least 2 DEF, the defender gets STA -3.
300733.flavor: [Not all vampires love blood the most. One example is Delaware. She likes sweet chocolate and cake more than blood.]

300732.name: Crescent Nazo
300732.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers with "Scardel" in the name get ATK +1/STA +2. All allied Followers without "Scardel" in the name get ATK -1/STA -2.
300732.flavor: [Our new home is pleasant and always dark. I have to find a good spot quick.]

100250.name: White Whale Crevasse
100250.ability: At the start of the turn, if there are no Spells on your Field, a card called "White Whale Rush" is created in the first empty Slot in your Field.
100250.flavor: [Everyone, listen to my song! My song will reach the ends of the sky!]

120018.name: 2S Tracer Four
120018.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Character has 15 or less LIFE, your Character gets LIFE=15. If the Turn Number is 14, your Character gets LIFE=0.
120018.flavor: [Won't you play with me? Cute detective girl? If you beat me, I'll tell you something. I know something you don't know.]

200156.name: Protective Chant
200156.ability: All allied Followers with a SIZE equal to the number of Followers on your Field get ATK +3/STA +3.
200156.flavor: [The protective flash of a shield to protect the will of the knights!]

110288.name: 물의 라미아
110288.ability: At the start of the turn, a Spell in the enemy Hand is moved to your Field.

200405.name: Lady on the Water
200405.ability: Two random allied Followers gain the following skill: "Before attacking, if this card's STA is lower than its original value, its STA is changed to its original value. This skill is removed."
200405.flavor: [We all came out to T // On the Lake Vita shoreline // To eat food at a mobile restaurant // We didn't have much time // But the other ladies // Were at the best hotel around // But some stupid with a lamp // Burned the place to the ground.]

120010.name: True Vampire God
120010.ability: At the start of the turn, the first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the enemy Character has 15 or more LIFE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If the enemy Character has 8 or less LIFE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -8.
120010.flavor: [Don't compare me to that puny imitation. Well whatever. I'm curious what your blood tastes like.]

120011.name: Shining Form Nexia
120011.ability: At the start of the turn, the first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. All allied Followers get ATK +3/STA +3.
120011.flavor: [Did you see... the past? The path that you came on... the past of those that you know... I will see if you are worthy... to continue to the future!]

120012.name: Vita Principal
120012.ability: At the start of the turn, the first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. All enemy Followers get their skills removed. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of Followers whose skills were removed.
120012.flavor: [Boys, be ambitious!] [This... is a girl's school.]

120013.name: Vernika's Sorrow
120013.ability: At the start of the turn, all Spells in the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave. A random card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If your Character's LIFE is 5 or less, both Characters' LIFE becomes the average between the two (rounding up), and all cards on both players' Fields are sent to the Grave.
120013.flavor: [It's depressing. Why can't I receive love? I just want someone by my side. I would give everything just to be with someone. I can't be saved from my loneliness.]

120014.name: Rio.
120014.ability: At the start of the turn, all Followers in your Hand get ATK +2/STA +2.
120014.flavor: [I hope that you achieve what you wish for one day. How are you lately?]

120015.name: Queen Ereshkigal
120015.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is not 1, the enemy Character gets LIFE -2 for each empty Slot in the enemy Hand. All enemy Followers with stats that are higher than their original values are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. (HINT: Dead or Alive)
120015.flavor: [Welcome to the nether train station. There are 30 seconds left before the train departs.] [Have you seen a girl named Vernika?] [A girl named Vernika. She didn't have a ticket, so she couldn't board.] [What?] [Location: Muspelheim 40F]

120016.name: Apostle L Red Sun
120016.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field. If this happens, that Follower gets SIZE=1 and ATK +3/STA +3. A random card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
120016.flavor: [Guard your faith. I will protect your faith. God is watching over us.]

120017.name: Eisenwane.
120017.ability: At the start of the turn, all cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. All Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +1.
120017.flavor: [The aloof knight captain stands alone. Her appearance seems odd, and the parrot on her shoulder speaks instead of her.]

110040.name: Shadow Gart
110040.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower that does not belong to this Character's faction gets ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2.
110040.flavor: [Do you know how girls like you turn out when you're older?] [We're already 200.] [Sorry...]

110041.name: Shadow Ginger
110041.ability: At the start of the turn, allied Followers with a SIZE equal to or greater than the number of allied cards get ATK +1/STA +1.
110041.flavor: [You little brats! Stay right there! I'm coming to beat you two up!] [Bo~ring~] [Don't you have something more creative, sister Sage? It's so~~~~~oo stale. You have to come up with a more creative joke!]

110042.name: Shadow Laevateinn
110042.ability: At the start of the turn, if there are two cards in your Hand with the same SIZE, your Character gets LIFE increased by half of their SIZE (rounding up).
110042.flavor: [The game is over. You're going to pay for your sins now.] [Ahhhh..!! Sister Sage is scary...] [My name is Esprit...]

200155.name: A Single Flower
200155.ability: All cards in your Hand and the enemy Hand are sent to the bottom of the owners' Decks. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the difference in the number of sent cards between you and the enemy.
200155.flavor: [We didn't know her name, but that single flower had the beauty of a small beginning.]

110044.name: Wind Girl X
110044.ability: At the start of the turn, your Character gets LIFE +2.
110044.flavor: [You have to eat and grow up properly!]

110045.name: Drill Sgt. Pippin
110045.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +1.
110045.flavor: [The start is always the most important part! It's forbidden to relax just because it's the beginning!]

110046.name: Drill Sgt. Rena
110046.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gains gets ATK +1/STA +2.
110046.flavor: [It's not difficult. I am just telling you how to protect people.]

110047.name: New Medic Lina
110047.ability: At the start of the turn, two random allied Followers get STA increased by the number of empty Slots in the enemy Hand.
110047.flavor: [Everyone is like this. You will fail at first, but you will learn from it.]

110048.name: Clerk Cecilia
110048.ability: At the start of the turn, two random enemy Followers get ATK -1.
110048.flavor: [You should mind your manners in an official position. Even the most trivial comments will be recorded.]

200152.name: Curse of Distrust
200152.ability: The first allied Follower is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If this happens, the first enemy Follower with the highest SIZE and a different faction than the sent Follower is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
200152.flavor: [I can't trust anyone anymore. Get away from me, or I'll kill you.]

300508.name: Morning Council Pres.
300508.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1.
300508.flavor: [The student council president's mornings start very early. This is when she is relaxed. This is when her hard work begins.]

300509.name: Cook Club Jamie
300509.ability: Before attacking, if this card's SIZE is not equal to its original value, it gets ATK/STA increased by the difference between its current SIZE and its original SIZE, then its SIZE is changed to its original value. // Before defending, this card gets SIZE +1, then this skill is removed.
300509.flavor: [Oh, are you the new transfer student? Do you like spicy food?]

200401.name: Lib. Assistant
200401.ability: A Follower called "Library Club Serie" is created in this card's Slot. That Follower has its SIZE set equal to its Slot number and its ATK/STA set equal to twice its new SIZE. This card is removed from the game.
200401.flavor: [Milka senpai is too inflexible. I don't have authority, but I can give a few tips.]

200150.name: Meeting Master
200150.ability: The first allied Follower with "Maid" in the name is deactivated. The first allied Follower with "Lady" in the name gets ATK/STA increased by the deactivated Follower's SIZE.
200150.flavor: [From today, I am your master. What kind of exciting life awaits us?]

200151.name: Comfort
200151.ability: The first allied Follower is deactivated. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE +3.
200151.flavor: [Ahh... Cinia. Hold me...] [How interesting, while you're in my arms, you call out for another girl?]

210001.name: Sword
210001.flavor: [A sword made of Talentium. Everyone has forgotten where this metal came from. More importantly, it is almost frightening how obsessed people are with it. -Esprit's memo...]

210003.name: Shoes
210003.flavor: [Heels are added to raise the wearer's eye level. However, it's hard to say if girls want to see higher or if they just want to have more pride. Regardless, I prefer comfortable shoes. -Esprit's memo...]

210002.name: Glasses
210002.flavor: [Talentium has found its way into our everyday lives. Because the metal is easily processed, people began mixing it into all kinds of objects. -Esprit's memo...]

210005.name: Ribbon
210005.flavor: [It's a long piece of cloth used to tie things. You can use it to tie a variety of things. You could wrap a package, or you could tie your hair with it. Last week, I used a ribbon to wrap a present for my neighbor's daughter's birthday. -Esprit's memo...]

210004.name: Stockings
210004.flavor: [Socks used to be just another garment to keep oneself warm, but now they have a variety of appearances. At some point, their purpose changed. I like the overknee type with a ribbon. -Esprit's memo...]

210007.name: Book
210007.flavor: [It's been a few years since I started writing notes so I wouldn't forget things. However, as the notes began piling up, it became difficult to organize them. These days, I don't remember where I wrote what. -Esprit's memo...]

210006.name: Cat Doll
210006.flavor: [It's a cat doll that looks like it's out of a fairy tale. I gave one to my neighbor's daughter for her birthday. She often talks to it, and she frequently has conversations with it over tea. -Esprit's memo...]

210009.name: Green Ore
210009.flavor: [Talentium does not have a fixed color. In some places, green Talentium can be found. Some time ago, the Monster Hunter Bureau reported that some monsters carry Talentium. -Esprit's memo...]

210008.name: Red Ore
210008.flavor: [Talentium does not have a fixed color. In some places, red Talentium can be found. Some time ago, the Monster Hunter Bureau reported that some monsters carry Talentium. -Esprit's memo...]

300218.name: Crimson Witch Cinia
300218.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets STA decreased by 1 plus the number of Academy cards in your Hand and this card gets STA increased by the same amount.
300218.flavor: [Tell me. Even after thinking hard about it, I still don't know. Tell me. How could you abandon sister? Tell me. Do you really live me? Did sister really try to kill me? ... You. I'll kill you.]

300219.name: Blue Cross Assistant
300219.flavor: [We don't ask any questions to those we help. The Blue Cross is that kind of group.]

300216.name: Rainy Blue Lady
300216.ability: Before defending, if you have an Academy Character, the first card with "Maid" in the name and the first Academy card without "Maid" in the name are sent from your Hand to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random enemy card on the Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck, then this skill is removed.
300216.flavor: [She said she can't forget that person. When their hearts don't touch, only one of them is trash that can still feel happy. Just go kill yourself.]

300217.name: Agent Nold
300217.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's SIZE is equal or greater than this card's SIZE, that Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1 and is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, this card gets ATK -2/STA -2 and is sent to the top of the enemy Deck, then this skill is removed.
300217.flavor: [Begin the operation. After securing the target student, obtaining the information will be a simple task...]

300214.name: Bass Maid
300214.flavor: [This instrument is amazing, too. You can master it quickly and put on a cool performance.]

300215.name: Drum Maid
300215.ability: At the start of the turn, if you have a card with "Guitar" or "Bass" in the name in your Hand or Field, that card and this card are removed from the game. If this happens, all Followers in the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave.
300215.flavor: [You're making a lot of noise throughout the house by banging on those. Practice with pads!]

300212.name: Guide Maid Guitarian
300212.flavor: [The land of vampires is dangerous. Why don't you go around it, lady Linia?]

300213.name: Lady Misfortune
300213.ability: Before attacking, the first card in your Deck with "Lady" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. If this happens, this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300213.flavor: [The enemy is always within you. To avenge mother, I have to pull the trigger without hesitation.]

300210.name: Battlefield Sita
300210.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets STA decreased by half of this card's ATK (rounding up). This card gets STA increased by half of the decreased amount (rounding down).
300210.flavor: [Where is Vernika? Tell me now, or I will cut you down.]

300211.name: 2S Agent Thirteen
300211.ability: Before defending, if this card and your Character belong to the same faction, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1, then this skill is removed.
300211.flavor: [Don't stand behind me. I don't like anyone following me.]

200309.name: Towards Sanctuary
200309.ability: If you have a Crux Character, all Spells in both Fields are sent to the owners' Graves. If this happens, the first Spell in your Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field.
200309.flavor: [Upon hearing about a special power hidden within the ancient sanctuary, the knight captain sent the orders to advance. Of course, the parrot sent them instead...]

200308.name: Quick as the Wind
200308.ability: Two random Followers in your Field get SIZE decreased by the number of Spells in your Field and get STA increased by the SIZE reduction.
200308.flavor: [Yes? A delivery? Where would you like it delivered?]

200303.name: Nostalgia
200303.ability: The first 5 Vita Followers in your Deck get ATK/STA increased by 5,4,3,2,1 starting from the top. You get Shuffles +1.
200303.flavor: [These are the books I first read when I was a new student... I've been stuck in the storage lately, but these are still my precious books.]

200302.name: Hiking Lesson
200302.ability: All enemy Followers get STA decreased by the total SIZE of your Field divided by the number of cards on your Field (rounding down).
200302.flavor: [You can't learn everything just from books! You have to learn from experience, too!]

200301.name: Cobalt Book
200301.ability: The Follower in your Field with the lowest DEF gets DEF changed to equal the highest DEF in the enemy Field.
200301.flavor: [This is a book recommendation for my treasured friend. Please treat it with care...]

200300.name: Youngest Knight's Day
200300.ability: All enemy Followers have their SIZE reduced by the number of empty Slots on the enemy Field. All enemy Followers get ATK/DEF/STA decreased by their reduction in SIZE.
200300.flavor: [The youngest's day begins with chores. She doesn't know when this will end.]

200307.name: Sanctuary Exploration
200307.ability: The first card in your Deck with "Sanctuary" in the name is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE increased by half of the sent card's SIZE (rounding up).
200307.flavor: [What's that! Why is something like that here? It's regrettable, but I'll use this disposable artifact...]

200306.name: Crossroads of Chaos
200306.ability: If you have an Academy Character and your Field SIZE is at least 3, all cards in both Fields are randomly rearranged. The number of movements will not exceed the total number of cards in both Fields.
200306.flavor: [The mystery of the witch is a mystery. The birdcage is used to lock up birds.]

200305.name: Lady's Rest
200305.ability: For each Follower in your Field with "Lady" in the name, the first Spell in the enemy Deck is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
200305.flavor: [For the sake of beauty, of course I must rest right now. 11 o' clock?]

200304.name: Protection
200304.ability: If there are any Spells in the enemy Field, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets DEF -4.
200304.flavor: [To protect the ladies no matter what... this is my determination.]

200277.name: Rainy Day
200277.ability: The Turn Number is increased by 2. All enemy Followers get ATK -2/STA -2.
200277.flavor: [It's raining. I have a strange feeling. I somewhat remember getting soaked by the rain before, too, but I must have tried to erase it from my memory...]

200276.name: Sacred Tutor
200276.ability: A random Follower in the enemy Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field.
200276.flavor: [I found it. It's here, too. As I thought, it was scattered throughout the world!]

200275.name: Cursed Totem
200275.ability: A random enemy Follower gets the following effects depending on this card's Slot number, then this card is deactivated and remains on the Field. 1: STA -2. 2: ATK -1/STA -1. 3: ATK -1/STA -2. 4: ATK -2/STA -2. 5: ATK -2/STA -3. If the Turn Number is odd, a random enemy Spell is deactivated.
200275.flavor: [Put it in the basement of the cathedral. It will alter the fate of the unstoppable Crux.]

200274.name: Nether Deal
200274.ability: The first Follower in your Field and a Follower in Slot 3 in the enemy Field get DEF/STA swapped with each other. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE -1.
200274.flavor: [A ticket? Is this a joke? What are you talking about, you don't have money? Business is business! You have to give me something if you want something!]

200273.name: Pointless Research
200273.ability: If there are any Followers in your Field, the following effect is applied three times: "A random Follower in either Field gets ATK -1/STA -3."
200273.flavor: [I'm putting everything on this research. I'll show my true self to those scientists who have been ignoring me.]

200272.name: Sanctuary Pillar
200272.ability: Followers adjacent to this card get STA +3. If they have "Seeker" in the name, they get an additional ATK +2. If the Turn Number is even, a random Spell in the enemy Field is deactivated. This card is deactivated.
200272.flavor: [This place, where the pinwheel turns, is the place of a god. Which god, I do not know, but at the very least, I know that it is not the goddess of Crux.]

200271.name: Joining the Knights
200271.ability: The first Follower in your Field with the highest STA gets ATK and STA swapped, and then gets STA +2.
200271.flavor: [To hide a tree, go to the forest... after seeing Veltier, who had abandoned her own appearance, Rose made a decision to avoid the eyes of Crux.]

200270.name: Artificer
200270.ability: Two random Followers in your Field with "Seeker" in the name get ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of skills they have.
200270.flavor: [Her ability to handle artifacts is the highest. Her title of Artificer is not for show.]

300322.name: Sword Girls Cinia
300322.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Deck with "Sword Girls" in the name regains its original skills and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. If this happens, that Follower gets STA +3 and this Follower is sent to the bottom of your Deck. // Before defending, all allied Followers get STA +3, this Follower gets SIZE -1, then this skill is removed.
300322.flavor: [I found it!! I didn't think it would be in this world.]

300323.name: Animal Suit Cinia
300323.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets the following effects depending on the number of cards on your Field with "Cinia" in the name. 1: ATK -1/STA -1. 2: ATK -1/STA -2. 3 or more: ATK -2/STA -3.
300323.flavor: [Cinia, it suits you.] [Linia? I do like pandas, but... these clothes are too much. Please give me something else to wear. Fashion king? What's that?]

300320.name: Sword Girls Sita
300320.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Deck with "Sword Girls" in the name regains its original skills and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. If this happens, that Follower gets STA +3 and this Follower is sent to the bottom of your Deck. // Before attacking, all allied Followers get ATK +2/STA +1, then this skill is removed.
300320.flavor: [Esprit muttered that there was something she could use to modifiy it somewhere in her room.]

300321.name: Animal Suit Sita
300321.ability: Before defending, this card gets the following effects depending on the number of cards on your Field with "Sita" in the name. 1: DEF=1/STA +1. 2: DEF=2/STA +2. 3 or more: DEF=2/STA +3.
300321.flavor: [Vernika, what are these clothes?] [You're cute, Sita! With this concept, we can win fashion king!] [I don't feel like going.] [Sita, come on~ okay?]

300326.name: Sword Girls Iri
300326.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Deck with "Sword Girls" in the name regains its original skills and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. If this happens, that Follower gets STA +3 and this Follower is sent to the bottom of your Deck. // Before defending, all allied Followers get SIZE -1 and this Follower gets an additional SIZE -1/STA +2, then this skill is removed.
300326.flavor: [Esprit is obsessed with the girls from another world.]

300327.name: Animal Suit Iri
300327.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets the following effects depending on the number of cards on your Field with "Iri" in the name. 1: STA -2. 2: STA -3. 3 or more: STA -4.
300327.flavor: [Wh, what's the reason for wearing a costume of such a low-class thing! Explain it to me!] [If you had given me more time and money...] [No excuses! We can't win fashion king like this!]

200279.name: Burning Crusade
200279.ability: All enemy Followers get the following skill: "Before attacking, this card gets STA = 1."
200279.flavor: [The 1st Star's heart wavered as she looked upon the burning city. What would be waiting for her at the end of this?]

200278.name: Flee
200278.ability: The following effect is applied five times: "A random enemy Follower gets STA -5."
200278.flavor: [The messenger ran through the alleys of the burning city looking for her comrades. She tried speaking to her fallen comrades in the street. No response. They were just corpses.]

200459.name: Summon
200459.ability: If your Field contains a Follower with "Knight" in the name and a Follower with "Seeker" in the name, all allied Followers get ATK +4.
200459.flavor: [Where the hell did everyone else run off to!]

200458.name: Covert Operation
200458.ability: A random enemy Follower is changed into "Delinquent Witch Cadet". If you have an Academy Character, two random allied Followers get ATK/STA increased by the total number of Academy Followers on both Fields (by a maximum of 4).
200458.flavor: [I will do as my sister says... Yes, Linia.]

200457.name: Rift
200457.ability: If this card's SIZE is at least 3, two random allied Followers get ATK -2/STA -2 and the enemy Character gets LIFE +2. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE +1~2 and is sent to the first empty Slot of the enemy Field and deactivated.
200457.flavor: [Haha. Magnificent. Soon, I will be able to send people as well. Who shall I use as a test subject?]

200456.name: Altar of Kana
200456.ability: All Followers with an odd STA get STA -3 and all Followers with an even STA get ATK +3.
200456.flavor: [In order to obtain the mystical ore, you perform a ritual for the Creator at this place. In order to unlock it, three things are needed. A key, a shaman, and a sacrifice...]

200455.name: Talentium Veritas
200455.ability: Your Character gets LIFE +2. If you have a Vita Character, two of the following effects are applied (randomly chosen): "The last 3 cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck." "All allied Followers get ATK +3/STA +3." "The enemy Character gets LIFE -2." "All enemy Followers get ATK -3/STA -3." "The first enemy card is removed from the game."
200455.flavor: [Talentium? I don't know anything about that weird imitation that you're referring to. The only thing I know as Talentium is in this place.]

200454.name: Minority Report
200454.ability: All allied Followers with "Cook Club" in the name have their SIZE and first skill changed to the SIZE and first skill of the second Follower on your Field with "Cook Club" in the name.
200454.flavor: [That white hair... I know I've seen her somewhere before...]

200453.name: Following Memory
200453.ability: A random enemy Follower whose DEF is equal to (10-the total SIZE of your Field) is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
200453.flavor: [What? I thought I was the only one who could enter this imaginary sector.] [It was a simple deduction. Sorry, but in order for us to escape, I'll need your cooperation.]

200452.name: Clash
200452.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, a random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by the difference between its ATK and DEF.
200452.flavor: [What the..! You bastard!] [We'll talk after I defeat everyone here. Starting with you!]

200451.name: The Battle Begins
200451.ability: All Followers on both players' Fields have their skills removed until the start of the next turn.
200451.flavor: [Among the groups that sought to confront the mysterious witches, a new person wielding a strange sword appeared. She had taken the opportunity to start a battle.]

200450.name: GS 5th Star's Strength
200450.ability: Two random enemy Followers get ATK/STA decreased by the number of cards in the top 3 cards of your Grave that belong to your Character's faction. A random allied Follower gets SIZE decreased by the number of cards in the top 3 cards of your Grave with "GS" in the name.
200450.flavor: [It seems like these pathetic insects are trying to stand in my way. Well, whatever, I like taking the fun route, anyway.]

300036.name: Inspiration Lady
300036.flavor: [I have a feeling that a sign will fall here tomorrow. A person will fall from a great height. You are clearly... a Crux knight.]

300037.name: New Knight
300037.flavor: [I'll be fighting alongside you, senpais! Pleased to meet you! This sword? It was given to me by someone I respect a lot. I treat it like I treat my own body!]

300034.name: Senpai Maid
300034.ability: Before defending, this card gets ATK +1/STA +2.
300034.flavor: [Don't rush, take your time. If you try to learn everything about the mansion at once, you'll get dizzy. Learn everything one by one... okay?]

300035.name: Striker
300035.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets STA -1.
300035.flavor: [I have nothing to say to villains. Questions are useless. This heat can burn everything!]

300032.name: Relena
300032.flavor: [I don't know much about the outside world... I just know you will protect me.]

300033.name: Private Maid
300033.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1.
300033.flavor: [Why was I hired separately from the other maids? Master Rose...?] [I had... a place I had to go for a little while. That's all.]

300030.name: Inscribing Magician
300030.flavor: [This place has been inscribed with a spell with a certain condition. When you pass, don't stop talking. Silence is the trigger.]

300031.name: Apprentice
300031.flavor: [Eh? What happened? This isn't what the book said would happen. What is this... it's scary...]

200059.name: Quick Service
200059.ability: All allied Followers are sent to the Grave. The first Crux Follower in your Hand with a SIZE of up to 2 plus the number of sent cards is sent to Slot 4 in your Field. Next, the Follower gets ATK/STA increased by half of the number of Crux cards in your Grave (rounding up).
200059.flavor: [I just need to deliver this? It must not be late? I understand, Jaina. For the honor of the knights!]

200058.name: Proof of Miracles
200058.ability: Your Character gets LIFE decreased by half of the number of cards in your Hand (rounding down). If this happens, a random allied Crux Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand.
200058.flavor: [This is something that even cuts the link of cause and effect. Isn't this sickle proof of the ancient visitors' victory?]

300038.name: Medic Knight Sillit
300038.flavor: [Is anyone injured? Let's take a break here for a while. The injured should wait here to rejoin the second group!]

300039.name: Flag Knight Frett
300039.ability: Before attacking, the allied Follower in Slot 3 of your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300039.flavor: [Is this place fine? Ah~ No matter how you look at it, the emblem of the knights is so cool, Luthica senpai!]

300517.name: Apostle Red Sun
300517.ability: Before attacking, if there are no active cards on the enemy Field, this Follower gets ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of empty Slots on the enemy Field. If this happens, this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300517.flavor: [Lately, Miss Helena has been participating in activities with other people. She's been listening to the reformist views of that Schindler...]

300516.name: Head Knight Eisenwane
300516.ability: Before attacking, this Follower's ATK is set equal to 1 plus the ATK of a random allied Follower. // Before defending, this Follower's DEF is set equal to the DEF of a random allied Follower.
300516.flavor: [I will show no mercy to anyone who opposes me. I consider anyone who wishes to protect the witches my opposition.]

300542.name: Lady Elberto
300542.ability: Before attacking, the defender's ATK and STA are swapped. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300542.flavor: [Linia is a difficult lady to understand. I have been hired by her as an agent.]

300519.name: Head Luna Flina
300519.ability: Before defending, if there is a Darklore card other than this one on your Field, this card is sent to a random empty Slot on your Field. If this happens, the attacker gets ATK decreased by this card's Slot number, and this Follower gets STA increased by this card's Slot number. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300519.flavor: [According to Cabernet, the most important thing right now is the family's safety.]

300518.name: Witch Herionne
300518.ability: Before attacking, if the defender and the enemy Character belong to the same faction, the defender gets ATK/STA decreased by this card's SIZE. This Follower gets ATK/STA increased by half (rounding down) its own SIZE. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.

300366.name: Fake Knight Undertaker
300366.ability: Before attacking, the first Followers in your Grave and the enemy Grave are removed from the game, and this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1 for each card removed.
300366.flavor: [This is your uniform? Grandma once said, clothes are like wings. But, I can't fly... How boring.]

300367.name: Dark Witch Seven
300367.ability: Before attacking, up to two Darklore cards in your Grave are removed from the game. If this happens, the defender and one other random enemy Follower get ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -2.

300364.name: Council Temp Sinclair
300364.ability: Before defending, up to two Vita cards in your grave are removed from the game. This card gets ATK +2/STA +2, and the first Follower on your Field other than this one gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300364.flavor: [Nice to meet you. Wearing a school uniform like this again really takes me back.]

300365.name: Lady Nanai
300365.ability: Before defending, all cards in both players' Graves with the same SIZE as the attacker are removed from the game. The attacker gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of cards removed.
300365.flavor: [Sh, shut up! Don't stare at me like that! It makes me dizzy!]

300362.name: Nether Merchant Minac
300362.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's ATK is greater than this card's total DEF+STA, this card is removed from the game and a new copy of this Follower with the same SIZE is created in the first empty Slot on your Field. The new Follower gets SIZE -1 and is deactivated, then all enemy Followers get STA decreased by half of this card's SIZE (rounding up). If this Follower's SIZE is 3 or less and you have a Darklore Character, the attacker and this Follower are sent to your Grave. If your Character does not belong to Darklore, the attacker is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck and this Follower is sent to the Grave.

300363.name: One-Winged Edelfelt
300363.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1. // Before defending, if the attacker's ATK is greater than this card's total DEF+STA, this card is removed from the game and a card called "One-Winged Edelfelt" is created in the first empty Slot of your Field and deactivated. If you have 0 Shuffles, you get Shuffles=1.
300363.flavor: [This place isn't right, either. Everything here is outdated. It's another unusable place. There isn't anything usable as a gate right now.]

300360.name: Aletheian C-EDA
300360.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's DEF is greater than or equal to this card's total DEF+STA, a random allied Darklore Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2.
300360.flavor: [People have to eat! We have to change ourselves to escape the cycle of poverty! Are you hungry? Eat this.]

300361.name: Apostle D-RA
300361.ability: Before defending, the first Follower in your Hand with "Aletheian" in the name is sent to the Grave. If this happens, this Follower gets STA increased by the sent Follower's STA (by a maximum of 6).
300361.flavor: [Don't forget your beliefs. Let this book be your compass.]

200080.name: Unmasked Lie
200080.ability: Two random enemy Followers get DEF decreased by the number of Spells in the enemy Hand.
200080.flavor: [No, no way... Jaina did that to me? No way. I must have misheard.]

300006.name: Cook Club Katie
300006.ability: Before attacking, this card gets DEF +1/STA -1 (No effect if STA=1).
300006.flavor: [This food is my own work. How is it? It's worthy of eating, right?]

200082.name: Maid Revolution
200082.ability: If there are allied Academy Followers with "Maid" in the name and allied Academy Followers without "Maid" in the name, two random allied Academy Followers get ATK +3/STA +3.
200082.flavor: [Better hours! Higher wages! More than one day off per month!]

200083.name: Suicide Mission
200083.ability: If there are any enemy Spells, the first Academy Follower in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random enemy Spell is sent to the Grave.
200083.flavor: [Go put out the fire quickly!] [Ack! I never learned any magic to extinguish fires, master Ciniaaaaa!!!]

200084.name: Linia's Tastes
200084.ability: If your Field contains at least one Follower, a random enemy Follower is sent to the Grave. If this happens, if this card's SIZE is at least 2, this card gets SIZE=1 and is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. Otherwise, this card is removed from the game.
200084.flavor: [I'm sorry, master Linia...] [It's alright. Will you spend some time with me right now? I miss people.]

200085.name: Say No Evil
200085.ability: All Academy cards in your Hand get SIZE -1 and are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If at least 2 cards were sent, all cards on the enemy Field are deactivated. The first Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
200085.flavor: [Be careful of what you say and do. You shouldn't trouble Cinia.]

200086.name: Chrono Clock
200086.ability: A random allied Crux Follower gets ATK +1~3 and SIZE -1~3 (random).
200086.flavor: [A communication artifact for HQ and members to stay in contact that takes the form of a clock. Under certain conditions, a new ability will appear, but... so far, there is nobody who has that ability.]

300369.name: Gatekeeper Prefect
300369.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets STA -2, then this skill is sent to the defender.
300369.flavor: [Even on cold days like this, we have to keep watch at the school gates... That's not too much, right?]

300692.name: 인스피레이션 레이디
300692.ability: Before attacking, if this card is still active, it gets deactivated and is moved to an empty Slot on your Field. If this happens, the defender gets STA -5.
300692.flavor: [A fierce storm approaches. In the center of that storm, people will wrongfully meet and become separated.]

300693.name: 메이드 레스노아
300693.ability: Before defending, all Followers in your Deck with "Linia" in the name get ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. This skill is removed.
300693.flavor: [Master Linia, don't go. Those girls hold resentment toward you.]

300690.name: 좌절의 리타패릿
300690.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2. // Before attacking, this card gets ATK -2/STA -2.
300690.flavor: [Ah... the Cook Club room... our Cook Club room!]

300691.name: 종결의 목격자
300691.ability: Before attacking, if the defender has any skills, this card gets ATK +2/DEF +1/STA +2. Otherwise, this card gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1.
300691.flavor: [Kana. That place is really the mirror's...] [The moment Orte attempted to read the last line, a flash of light came from nowhere, and the book snapped shut.]

300696.name: 신성연구회 라가펠트
300696.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's ATK is greater than this card's total DEF+STA, this card is moved to a random empty Slot on your Field. If this happens, this skill is removed.
300696.flavor: [What is this thing? It's a model train that fell somewhere around the gate. What? I should be careful even though it's small?]

300697.name: 기사단 제이나와 루티카
300697.ability: Before defending, this card's STA is set equal to your Character's LIFE (to a maximum of 20). This skill is removed. // Before attacking, this card's ATK is increased by half the difference between your Character's LIFE and the enemy Character's LIFE (rounding down). This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300697.flavor: [Let's continue to work together in the future, Luthica.] [Yes, Jaina!]

300694.name: 레이디 시니아와 로제
300694.ability: Before attacking, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If this happens, this card gets ATK increased by the sent card's SIZE. // Before defending, this card gets STA increased by your Shuffles.
300694.flavor: [Cinia, did you endure hardships all this time?] [No, sister... Can we stay here for a while?]

300695.name: 청십자회 토토
300695.ability: Before attacking, neighboring Followers to this card get ATK +1/STA +1. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn. // Before defending, neighboring Followers to this card get ATK +1/STA +1. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.

300698.name: GS 아홉번째 별
300698.ability: Before attacking, this card's STA is changed to its original value. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300698.flavor: [No blood will be shed if you follow us obediently.] [You're all being used.] [It's a symbiotic relationship.]

300699.name: GS 참모 아르디타
300699.ability: Before defending, this card gets STA increased by the number of allied cards with "GS" in the name. // At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -2/STA -2 and gets its skills removed until the start of the next turn.
300699.flavor: [Shoot signal flares to let all the members know. The GS is not finished yet.]

300543.name: Guitar Witch Maid
300543.ability: Before defending, the first card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, this card gets STA +2. If the removed card has "Maid" in the name, this card gets an additional ATK +1/STA +1.
300543.flavor: [I don't have any hopes or dreams. I only have my guitar, now. Please listen to my "Soul".] [Her performance of "Guitar for your soul" resounded everywhere.]

100249.name: Tea Time Sita
100249.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets DEF +1. If that Follower belongs to Vita, it gets ATK +1, DEF +1, or STA +1 (applied twice).
100249.flavor: [This tea is very bitter... and these snacks are very sweet... Is it supposed to be like making you sick, then giving you medicine?]

100248.name: Wedding Dress Mother Demon
100248.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 5 or less, your Character gets LIFE +3. The last card in the enemy Deck is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. The following effects are applied depending on the sent card's type. Follower: The sent card gets ATK -1/STA -1. Spell: The sent card gets SIZE +1.
100248.flavor: [Of course, everything must start with small steps. However, vast ripples will be created across this world. How about it? Would you like to witness the end of the world with me?]

100243.name: Mother Demon
100243.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 5 or less, your Character gets LIFE +3. The last card in the enemy Deck is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. The following effects are applied depending on the sent card's type. Follower: The sent card gets ATK -1/STA -1. Spell: The sent card gets SIZE +1.
100243.flavor: [As I thought, this side is full of taint. I'll have to capture it all.]

100242.name: Gardening Maid
100242.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers get ATK +1/STA -1. All enemy Followers get STA -1.
100242.flavor: [Walking along the road in the morning, carelessly looking at the flowers. After touching the flowers... I don't remember...]

100241.name: Baker Cinia
100241.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +1. A random enemy Follower gets STA -2. If those Followers have the same Slot number, the enemy Follower gets STA +2.
100241.flavor: [Huhu, I wonder if these cookies will taste good. Shall I try it?] [Yeah yeah! You're amazing, Cini!] [Master, are these for us, too?] [No.] [Eh?] [Huh?]

100240.name: Sleep Club Sita
100240.ability: At the start of the turn, enemy Followers whose ATK, DEF, or STA contain the number 1 get STA -4.
100240.flavor: [Sita joined the Cook Club because of the rule that each student can only be a member of one club, but she also would have been exceptionally talented in the Sleep Club.]

100247.name: GS Agent Mother Demon
100247.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 5 or less, your Character gets LIFE +3. A random allied Darklore Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. If your Character's LIFE is less or equal to the enemy Character's LIFE, a random enemy Follower gets STA -1 and a different enemy Follower gets STA -2.
100247.flavor: [These are my glorious spoils. However, it seems like it's too tight for me.]

100246.name: Knight Mother Demon
100246.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 5 or less, your Character gets LIFE +3. A random allied Crux Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. If your Character's LIFE is less or equal to the enemy Character's LIFE, a random allied Follower gets STA +1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
100246.flavor: [How contradictory. These people don't realize that they themselves have been tainted the most and instead pursue the taint they see in others. I wonder how ludicrous it will get... hehe.]

100245.name: Maid Mother Demon
100245.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 5 or less, your Character gets LIFE +3. A random allied Academy Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. If your Character's LIFE is less or equal to the enemy Character's LIFE, a random enemy Follower gets DEF -1/STA -2.
100245.flavor: [So this is a mansion from the old times. The master is nowhere to be found. All that remains is an abandoned cat.]

100244.name: Dispatched Teacher Mother Demon
100244.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 5 or less, your Character gets LIFE +3. A random allied Vita Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. If your Character's LIFE is less or equal to the enemy Character's LIFE, that Follower gets an additional DEF +1/STA +1.
100244.flavor: [If you're curious to learn the truth about this world... Hehe... I'm more than happy to teach you about it. However, the fee will be steep.]

110299.name: 숙명의 레이디 세븐
110299.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Hand gets SIZE -1. If that Follower has "Lady" in the name, a random Follower on your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2.
110299.flavor: [The weather is nice. There's no better day to go for a walk.]

110298.name: 도서부고문 에셀
110298.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. All allied Followers with "Library Club" in the name get ATK/STA increased by half the number of empty Slots in your Hand (rounding down).
110298.flavor: [Books have magic! It's not the same as the magic that we use, but they have a very beautiful kind of magic!]

110295.name: 시니아 퍼시피카
110295.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, a random enemy Follower is changed to "Delinquent Witch Cadet". If the Turn Number is even, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
110295.flavor: [I understand what you're worried about, but isn't this different from "that thing" you talked about before?]

110294.name: 제이나 프리벤터
110294.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +3/STA +3. If the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get DEF +1/STA +1.
110294.flavor: [The knights have the strongest souls. It is the greatest position. Do you still doubt me?]

110297.name: 루에.K.아트엔드
110297.ability: At the start of the turn, the following effects are applied depending on the total number of cards in both Graves. 10 or less: All Followers in the enemy Hand get ATK -1. 11~20: All Followers in your Hand get ATK +1/STA +1. 21 or more: All Followers in your Deck get ATK +2/STA +2.
110297.flavor: [Are you here to serve the Mother Demon? Or are you here to oppose her? Depending on your answer, my role also changes~]

110296.name: 로제 퍼시피카
110296.ability: At the start of the turn, if there are five cards in your Hand, the first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK/STA increased by the number of empty Slots in your Hand. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in the enemy Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.

110291.name: G 라미아
110291.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, one Spell and one Follower in the enemy Hand are each moved to your Field.
110291.flavor: [Won't you come to me to the endless ocean?]

110290.name: 악마 캐리
110290.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower has its ATK/DEF/STA/SIZE changed to their original values.

110293.name: G 악마
110293.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower has its ATK/DEF/STA/SIZE changed to their original values. A random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2.
110293.flavor: [If you give your soul to me, I'll turn you into something quite nice...]

110292.name: G 메두사
110292.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower is deactivated. If this happens, that Follower gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1.
110292.flavor: [When you feel my beauty and terror, you will turn to stone.]

300511.name: Rich Lady
300511.ability: Before defending, a random Follower in your Grave with "Maid" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot of your Hand. If this happens, this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300511.flavor: [Now I'm also a full-fledged lady... I'm starting to tear up a little.]

300510.name: Lib. Rangers
300510.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +2, then this skill is removed. // At the start of the turn, all Followers on your Field with "Library Club" in the name get STA increased by the number of Followers in the bottom 4 cards of your Deck. If this amount is at least 2, this Follower's original skills are restored.
300510.flavor: [We are the Library Club Rangers who uphold the justice of the library! Even though we can't shoot beams, we're still strong!]

300513.name: Dress Up Lady Linus
300513.ability: Before defending, the last card in your Hand with "Dress Up" in the name is sent to the bottom of your Deck. A number of cards on both Fields equal to the SIZE of the sent card without "Dress Up" in the name get deactivated. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300513.flavor: [Muzisitter? Okay. I can listen to what you have to say. I'm in a really good mood right now.]

300512.name: Broker Lady
300512.ability: Before attacking, if your Character has 8 or less LIFE, this card and the defender are sent to the Grave.
300512.flavor: [Do you require my aid? We can discuss the work after the payment is settled.]

300515.name: Seeker Melissa
300515.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1/STA -1. // Before defending, this card gets ATK -1/DEF +1.
300515.flavor: [How do I feel? Great. I need a place where I can release all of this power overflowing within me.]

300514.name: Lancer Knight Shane
300514.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's SIZE is less than this Follower's SIZE, the defender is sent to the Grave. Otherwise, this Follower is sent to the Grave. This skill is removed.
300514.flavor: [I told you. The outcome has already been decided.]

110059.name: New Knight
110059.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1.
110059.flavor: [Resting is also an extension of our duties. It's important to do our best in everything, isn't it? Senpai.]

110058.name: General Marian
110058.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower is moved from your Deck to the first empty Slot of your Field and gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
110058.flavor: [Attention! 100 laps around the training grounds now! Anyone dissatisfied must defeat me before getting the right to speak out!]

110057.name: Warmaster Elly
110057.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Hand is sent to the first empty Slot of the enemy Field, gets ATK -1/STA -1, and is deactivated.
110057.flavor: [The fighting power of Crux is concentrated in the knights. It wouldn't be a good choice to divide the military in a situation like this.]

110056.name: Swordmaster Karen
110056.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by the Atk of the first allied Follower.
110056.flavor: [All warriors want a good weapon. It seems like Sergeant Pintail doesn't know that she's in a slump.]

110055.name: Head Clerk Cecilia
110055.ability: At the start of the turn, two random enemy Followers get SIZE +1/ATK -1.
110055.flavor: [You should mind your manners in an official position. Even the most trivial comments will be recorded.]

110054.name: Medic Lina
110054.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers get STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand.
110054.flavor: [Everyone is like this. You will fail at first, but you will learn from it.]

110053.name: Drillmaster Rena
110053.ability: At the start of the turn, two random allied Followers get ATK +1/STA +2.
110053.flavor: [Nothing is difficult. I am just telling you how to protect people.]

110052.name: Drillmaster Pippin
110052.ability: At the start of the turn, two random allied Followers get ATK +2/STA +1.
110052.flavor: [The start is always the most important part! It's forbidden to relax just because it's the beginning!]

110051.name: Sr. Knight Marian
110051.ability: At the start of the turn, a number of random enemy Followers equal to half the number of cards in the enemy Hand belonging to a different faction than the enemy Character (rounding up) are sent to the Grave.
110051.flavor: [Attention! 100 laps around the training grounds now! Anyone dissatisfied must defeat me before getting the right to speak out!]

110050.name: Strategist Elly
110050.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
110050.flavor: [The fighting power of Crux is concentrated in the knights. It wouldn't be a good choice to divide the military in a situation like this.]

300288.name: Shock Lady Elberto
300288.ability: Before attacking, all enemy Followers get STA -1 and this Follower gets STA increased by half the total STA reduction (rounding up). // Before defending, all enemy Followers get STA -1.
300288.flavor: [Can't I do what I want? The new chairman doesn't pay attention to us. It's boring to practice on monsters every day. I need a "person" to enjoy myself.]

300446.name: Lib. Librarian Milka
300446.flavor: [You want to look around the underground library? Well... It's a bit difficult right now, Miss Asmis.]

210038.name: Library Index Card
210038.flavor: [This card is issued by the librarian when books are borrowed from the library.] [Location: Underground Library]

210039.name: Mystery Parchment
210039.flavor: [It's a game that's been passed down from the ancient times. This parchment is a record of the strategies that ancient mages used in their sacred battles, carried out in a certain place to ensure a fair duel. The ravine that served as the fierce battlefield has still not been located to this day. -Esprit's memo] [Location: Underground Altar]

210034.name: Number Slip
210034.flavor: [A receipt from the SS Detective Agency. This thing is unique to that place. You take a receipt and leave, then you send a letter with your request to a designated address. I've also tried sending a few letters for fun, but they ignored them all... It seems like this is to keep other similar businesses in check... -Esprit's memo...] [Location: SS Detective Agency]

210035.name: Chocolate
210035.flavor: [This... Have you received it before? I have. But it didn't really make me happy. Regardless of how I felt, I discovered that the chocolate was, in fact, sweet. -Esprit's complaint...]

210036.name: Cat Paw Stamp
210036.flavor: [A document with the paw print of a cute animal. It says that it was made by the Student Council.] [Location: Cat Pursuit]

210030.name: Blue Coin
210030.flavor: [A blue, shiny coin. It seems like you can use this at the coin shop.]

210031.name: Yellow Coin
210031.flavor: [A yellow, shiny coin. It seems like you can use this at the coin shop.]

210032.name: Red Coin
210032.flavor: [A red, shiny coin. It seems like you can use this at the coin shop.]

210033.name: Pass
210033.flavor: [This pass certifies you to enter the ruins.] [Location: Ancient Sanctuary]

300209.name: Waitress Gart
300209.ability: Before defending, if the attacker belongs to Academy or Darklore, that Follower gets ATK -2/STA -2. Otherwise, this Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300209.flavor: [Don't spill it! ...why not? You're the ones who asked me to help!]

300208.name: Lib. H.L. Tezina
300208.ability: Before defending, if you have a Vita Character, one Vita card with "Library Club" in the name and one Vita card without "Library Club" in the name are sent from your Hand to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random enemy card is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck, then this skill is removed.
300208.flavor: [The library's number one! I left the title of king of searching to my underclassman so I could take a break, but I'm back! I am the Hyper Librarian! Tezina!]

300205.name: Lib. Lucca
300205.flavor: [I practiced at home, but I'm still nervous, senpai...]

300204.name: Lib. Evenne
300204.ability: Before defending, if this card and your Character belong to the same faction, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1, then this skill is removed.
300204.flavor: [I'm reading right now. Tell me later. You're annoying me.]

300207.name: Lib. Milka
300207.ability: Before defending, the first allied Follower with "Library Club" in the name gets STA +2. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300207.flavor: [It's okay, don't worry. The only thing we need is chemistry~]

300206.name: Lib. Serie
300206.ability: Before attacking, the first card in your Deck with "Library Club" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. If this happens, this skill is removed until the next turn.
300206.flavor: [Am I just the accompaniment of the 3 of us? Isn't this a really easy instrument?]

300201.name: Homunculus Escort
300201.ability: (This Follower is spawned by the Character Clarice)
300201.flavor: [You bastards, how about I just eliminate you? I wasn't asking for an answer.]

300200.name: Crescent Kris & Con.
300200.ability: Before defending, if you have a Darklore Character, the first two cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, one random deactivated allied Follower is reactivated, and one random enemy Follower gets SIZE +1 and ATK -1/DEF -1.
300200.flavor: [I'll be honest. You're alright the way you are now, Conundrum.] [... What?]

300203.name: Tennis Nessa
300203.flavor: [The preliminaries are starting soon. I'll work hard to catch up to senpais, too.]

300202.name: 1st Witness Kana.DKD
300202.ability: Before attacking, the first card in your Deck belonging to the same faction as your Character is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field. // At the start of the turn, if this Follower's DEF is 1 or less, this Follower gets DEF=2.
300202.flavor: [There's nothing like a key to get to Kana, it vanished a long time ago. If you want to go, then are you willing to die once? Creuset has been doing some unacceptable experiments.]

120007.name: Pegasus Sigma
120007.ability: At the start of the turn, if the enemy Hand has an even number of cards, a random enemy card in an even-numbered Slot is sent to the Grave. If the enemy Hand has an odd number of cards, a random enemy card in an odd-numbered Slot is sent to the Grave. All allied Followers get ATK +1/STA +1.
120007.flavor: [I cannot overlook your activities any longer. What do you wish to know, eldest daughter of the Pacificas...] [I have everything I want. I'm just waiting for the right time.]

120006.name: Trickster Twins
120006.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Spell in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. A Follower named "Scardel Shion Flina" or a Follower named "Scardel Rion Flina" is created in the first empty Slot in your Field, and then those Followers get SIZE -1.
120006.flavor: [Satisfy us! We want an even more interesting trick! Well? We'll give you one last chance to change your mind. Now~ Final answer!]

120005.name: Flame Laevateinn
120005.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Character's LIFE is 9 or less, it gets LIFE +5.
120005.flavor: [Ha... I'm not interested in real fights. Well, I'll definitely receive my payment, so I'll do this much for you. Who is the target?]

120004.name: Twilight Wolf Ginger
120004.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers get ATK +3.
120004.flavor: [Do you plan to stand on the stage of destiny with that kind of ability? It is not the climax yet!!]

120003.name: Star Bird Gart
120003.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower is deactivated.
120003.flavor: [The stars reveal the dreams of their watchers. My duty is to watch over your dreams.]

120002.name: Queen Cannelle
120002.ability: At the start of the turn, allied Followers with a SIZE of 3 or less get ATK +2/STA +2.
120002.flavor: [Foolish humans, I will show you the difference between us.]

120001.name: Gold Lion Nold
120001.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers get SIZE -1.
120001.flavor: [You stand at the crossroads, traveler. What is your purpose?]

120009.name: Artificial Vampire
120009.ability: At the start of the turn, the first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the enemy Character has 10 or less LIFE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -10.
120009.flavor: [Okay~ Let's start the game. It's my turn. What? That's boring... Give me some excitement! Cry more! Bark! And... Die.]

120008.name: Cinia's Pet Panica
120008.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, a random enemy Follower's ATK is halved (rounding up). If the Turn Number is even, a random enemy Follower's STA is halved (rounding up).
120008.flavor: [Take me for a walk! Stupid humans! Don't you know where I came from?]

200518.name: 좌천
200518.ability: Cards with "Blue Cross" in the name are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until your Hand has at least 4 cards. All allied Followers get ATK/STA increased by the number of sent cards.
200518.flavor: [Because she was deemed too dangerous, Rose and her underlings were all demoted to Blue Cross support.] [She's too dangerous...]

200519.name: 당주의 전령
200519.ability: Two random allied Followers get ATK increased by the number of cards in the enemy Hand.
200519.flavor: [Lady Linia. The master has a message for you.] [... Master?] [Luna Flina.]

200516.name: 진심
200516.ability: A random enemy Follower without skills is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
200516.flavor: [Luthica glared at Eisenwane, but Eisenwane didn't notice.]

200517.name: 탐색
200517.ability: A random enemy Follower gets its skills removed. If this happens, a random allied Follower regains its original skills.
200517.flavor: [The quartermaster found the hiding person. The hiding person didn't know she had been found.]

200514.name: 동맹의 거절
200514.ability: If you won the coin flip, all enemy Spells are deactivated. If you lost the coin flip, two random allied Followers get ATK -2/STA -2.
200514.flavor: [This isn't how you write to someone in a better position than you.] [Linia burned the letter from the family head.]

200515.name: 파문
200515.ability: A random enemy Follower gets DEF=0. All Followers in the enemy Hand get DEF decreased by the change in DEF.
200515.flavor: [Everything is going according to plan. Like the ripples formed when a rock falls into a lake, the things that have been set in motion cannot be stopped.]

200512.name: 찾아낸 단서
200512.ability: A random allied Follower is reactivated, then the last enemy Follower gets STA decreased by the reactivated Follower's ATK minus 1.
200512.flavor: [This ribbon is the clue to the missing key. With just this, the search becomes much narrower.]

200513.name: 최후의 방법
200513.ability: If the last Follower in your Deck has "Lady" or "Maid" in the name, that Follower is sent to the first empty Slot in your hand and gets ATK +2/STA +2.
200513.flavor: [In the place of the maids who had left, the dolls of witches from the outside were used to clean the mansion.]

200510.name: 대출증 확인
200510.ability: If your Hand and Field both contain Followers, a random Follower in your Hand or Field gets ATK +4, DEF +4, or STA +4 (randomly).
200510.flavor: [This book was checked out 32 times, but it was returned 33 times... Was the 33rd time checked out by an invisible girl?]

200511.name: 서포터
200511.ability: A random allied Follower gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the number of other allied Followers without skills and gets SIZE +1.
200511.flavor: [Talentium is so cool... So cool... This chemical reaction is so bright...]

200192.name: Shock
200192.ability: All allied Followers get STA +5. If you have a Crux Character, all allied Followers get an additional ATK +2. All enemy Followers get ATK -2.
200192.flavor: [Who are you?] [I am the GS 1st Star, and I've come to reveal the lies of Crux's goddess.] [Lies?] [The goddess twists time and resorts to tricks. The continent's time is out of place.]

200193.name: Crux Underground
200193.ability: All enemy Followers with the same SIZE as the first enemy card get ATK/STA decreased by the number of enemy cards with the same SIZE as the first enemy card.
200193.flavor: [The preparations of the GS are thorough. At the moment the leader orders it, they will move as one throughout the nation. Nobody knows the labyrinthine underground as well as them.]

200190.name: Warrior's Resolve
200190.ability: The number of cards in your Hand and the number of empty Slots in your Hand are compared. Two random allied Crux Followers get ATK increased by the larger number and get STA increased by the smaller number-1 (by a minimum of 0).
200190.flavor: [I will defend this land! I swear on my life!]

200191.name: Beach Research
200191.ability: Two random allied Followers get SIZE -1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
200191.flavor: [Who knows if there's an artifact here! Give it your all and find out!]

200196.name: Mischief
200196.ability: All enemy Followers get STA decreased by three times the number of cards in your Grave named "Mischief".
200196.flavor: [Th, this prank is too much!] [Isn't it fine? Even this one can just be laughed off.]

200197.name: Night is Coming
200197.ability: The first two Followers in your Grave with "GS" in the name are removed from the game. Three random Followers in your Grave with "GS" in the name are sent to the bottom of your Deck.
200197.flavor: [Orders. Night comes! 1st Star will lead, and Captain Z will command! All GS within the alliance will immediately head toward Crux.]

200194.name: Recruitment Ad
200194.ability: A random allied Follower is sent to the Grave. If this happens, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1 and Shuffles -1. Your Character gets LIFE +1.
200194.flavor: [Recruiting GS members! We have no interest in ordinary people. Among those people who have skill with Talentium, if you wish to change the world with your own powers, come now!]

200195.name: Marionette
200195.ability: The first allied Follower gets ATK/STA changed to equal half of its total ATK/STA (rounding up).
200195.flavor: [You may make me move any way you wish. However, do not come near. Use your eyes only.]

200198.name: Query
200198.ability: If this card's SIZE is greater than 3, it gets SIZE=3. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by this card's SIZE. This card gets SIZE -1 and moves to the enemy Field. If this card has a SIZE of 1, this card is removed from the game.
200198.flavor: [Why do I drink blood? To be honest, nothing will really happen if I don't, and I have other ways of recovering my magic. So I guess I don't really know.]

200199.name: Showdown
200199.ability: If you have a Darklore Character and you have a Darklore Follower on your Field, all enemy Followers get SIZE=1 and ATK=6/DEF=0/STA=6, then all allied Followers get SIZE=1 and ATK=6/STA=6.
200199.flavor: [I am Jaina Preventer, leader of the Crux knights. I have come to cleanse this land of all outsiders.] [... Step aside. I have to find Vernika.]

200202.name: Principal's Story
200202.ability: The first card in the enemy Hand that does not belong to the enemy Character's faction is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
200202.flavor: [A man dressed in red came once. I don't know what this "Kana" is, but he seemed to be seeking the same thing as you. That man, he seemed restless. He was carrying another "key".]

200203.name: Low Turnout
200203.ability: The Vita Follower on your Field with the highest DEF gets STA increased by twice its DEF. The first Vita card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
200203.flavor: [The vote to impeach Celine coincided with the festival, resulting in a low turnout. Nanai. She missed the opportunity of a lifetime.]

200200.name: Moldy Chocolate
200200.flavor: [A food made by Ophelia. Seems like a special food made to celebrate some sort of commemorative day, but there's no record of this food in any library. -Esprit's memo..]

200201.name: Hot Item
200201.flavor: [Vita High's official goods! A cute keychain featuring the principal.]

200206.name: Everyday Discovery
200206.ability: A number of Followers (equal to the number of Followers on your Field) on both players' Fields whose Slot numbers are odd (if the ones digit of the Turn Number is odd) or even (if the ones digit of the Turn Number is even) are sent to the bottom of their owners' Decks.
200206.flavor: [Some practical wisdom. For furniture that smells like coating agents or dehumidifying agents, you can use leftover alcohol to wash and clean it. It will get rid of the smell.]

200207.name: Negotiation Breakdown
200207.ability: The first Academy card in your Hand with "Maid' in the name is removed from the game. A random allied Academy Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the removed card's SIZE.
200207.flavor: [Is this some kind of joke? This is a breakdown in negotiations! I can't work here any longer.]

200204.name: Shattered Land
200204.ability: Two random allied Vita Followers get the following skill: "Before defending, this card gets STA increased by the attacker's ATK, and then this skill is removed."
200204.flavor: [The power of Cinia's sword carried a price to use: a part of your body. It had the power to return everything to how it was in the very beginning. When Sita realized this, she tried to stop it, but everything around her had already been destroyed.]

200205.name: Keepsake
200205.ability: The second allied Follower gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the first allied Follower's SIZE. If this happens, and if you have a Vita Character, the first allied Follower is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If you do not have a Vita Character, the first allied Follower is sent to the Grave.
200205.flavor: [Vernika could not be seen anywhere around the crumbled buildings. After a long time of searching, the only thing Sita found was her glasses.]

300331.name: Artisan Baker Witch
300331.ability: Before attacking, a random Follower in your Hand with "Witch" in the name gets SIZE -1 (to a minimum of 1), and that Follower's first skill is copied to this Follower.
300331.flavor: [I finally opened my very own sweets store. To the customers here right now, if you pay more than the specified prices, I'll give you a mug as a gift~]

300330.name: Seeker Irene
300330.ability: Before defending, this Follower gets ATK +3/STA +3, then this skill is sent to the first Follower in your Deck with "Seeker" in the name that does not possess this skill.
300330.flavor: [Did you find the artifact? I won't believe it until I see it. This is a discovery that can change the history of Crux. It absolutely must not be used recklessly.]

200208.name: Inevitable Choice
200208.ability: If you have an Academy Character, the first allied Academy Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of allied Academy cards and gets SIZE decreased by the number of allied cards with "Lady" in the name.
200208.flavor: [Through hatred, Cinia's power grew immensely. Finally, Linia made a decision. She took control of Cinia's mind.]

200209.name: Table Manners
200209.ability: The first enemy card with a SIZE equal to this card's Slot number plus this card's SIZE is sent to the Grave. If this happens, this card is deactivated.
200209.flavor: [The ladies of the Royle Academy do not just partake in their studies. They also learn about the proper conduct and behavior of nobles.]

300335.name: Witch Hunter Becky Flina
300335.ability: Before attacking, a random allied Darklore Follower other than this one gets ATK/STA increased by half the total SIZE of your Hand (rounding up, by a maximum of 5). If this happens, your Character gets LIFE -1. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300335.flavor: [The day when the shadow of the witch's tower, containing the accumulation of the witches' knowledge, is cast over the land of vampires draws near. It seems like it's time to balance things out.]

300334.name: Knight Adjt. Luthica
300334.ability: Before attacking, a random allied Crux Follower other than this one gets ATK/STA increased by the total DEF of all allied Followers with at least 1 DEF (by a maximum of 5). If this happens, your Character gets LIFE -1. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300334.flavor: [I see the stars, the butterflies, and the expansive sky.] [You seem to have a lot of anxiety on your mind. You need to be careful.]

300337.name: Lib. Explorer Rhea
300337.ability: Before attacking, a random card in your Grave with "Library Club" in the name is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
300337.flavor: [Wow... Our school had a library like this in the basement.]

300336.name: Fiona Scentriver
300336.ability: Before attacking, the defender's skills are changed to "At the start of the turn, this card's original skills are restored." // Before defending, the attacker's skills are changed to "At the start of the turn, this card's original skills are restored." // At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Hand gets its skills changed to "At the start of the turn, this card's original skills are restored."
300336.flavor: [The mother of Layna and Lunia Scentriver. She was dispatched to the Empire, but she disappeared. She is a legend.]

200428.name: Friendship after the Rain
200428.ability: All allied Followers with "Library Club" in the name get SIZE -1. The first Follower in your Hand with "Library Club" in the name gets SIZE decreased by the total SIZE reduction.
200428.flavor: [The ground becomes more firm after the rain, right?] [But there's sand all around here. Everything will get washed away.]

200429.name: Window Shopping
200429.ability: The first 5 Spells in the enemy Deck are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. All cards in the enemy Hand are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If you have a Vita Character, the enemy Character gets Shuffles -1.
200429.flavor: [How is it, Iri? You don't like this one? Sita, you should pick something out, too.] [There hasn't been a chance to talk...]

200422.name: Clairvoyance
