200422.ability: All Followers in your Hand/Field have all of their skills replaced with the following skill: "Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1."
200422.flavor: [Wait! If you go that way... You shouldn't meet them! Veltier!]

200423.name: Elusion
200423.ability: If you have a Crux Character, the first card in the enemy Deck is sent to the first empty Slot of the enemy Field. If this happens, all enemy Spells (if there are at least 2 enemy Spells) or all enemy Followers (if there are at least 3 enemy Followers) are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. This card is removed from the game.
200423.flavor: [V... Vernika senpai?] [One page of the missing story unfolded before Veltier's eyes.]

200420.name: Strega in Exile
200420.ability: The first card on your Field other than this one is destroyed. If this happens, the first card on the enemy Field with a SIZE of 10 or less is destroyed.
200420.flavor: [A witch was sighted in the underground library. With her long, dark hair fluttering behind her, she took a girl by the hand and ran. From behind, she looked familiar, said a Vita student.]

200421.name: Head Knight's Rest
200421.ability: All Followers on both Fields get SIZE decreased by the number of cards on each respective player's Field with "Knight" in the name and get STA decreased by the number of cards on each respective player's Field without "Knight" in the name.
200421.flavor: [Eisenwane's personal life is a secret. Only the parrot knows what the awkward girl is like when she is alone.]

200426.name: Intervention
200426.ability: If this card's SIZE is at least 5, it is sent to your Grave. The first card in the enemy Hand is changed into a copy of this card and gets SIZE +1. This card is removed from the game.
200426.flavor: [I will sacrifice myself for my comrades.] [The unity between the Aletheian and the GS is steadfast.]

200427.name: Panel Rise
200427.ability: The first allied Follower gets DEF=1. If there was no change in DEF, two random enemy Followers get DEF -1/STA -3.
200427.flavor: [Book of Light, unfold! Field domain, expand! Access to each panel has been approved!]

200424.name: Ritual of Unity
200424.ability: Two random allied Followers get ATK increased by the number of cards in your Grave with "Crescent", "Scardel", "Flina", or "Ritual of Harmony" in the name (by a maximum of 9).
200424.flavor: [They hated the head, but they agreed that in order to recover the vampires' land, they would have to work together.]

200425.name: Mediation
200425.ability: A random enemy card is deactivated. If the deactivated card is a Spell, a random allied Follower gets ATK increased by the deactivated card's SIZE. If the deactivated card is a Follower, a random allied Follower gets STA increased by the deactivated card's SIZE.
200425.flavor: [Please bear in mind that we must put the safety of the family first.]

300025.name: Mop Maid
300025.ability: Before defending, this card and neighboring Followers get ATK +1.
300025.flavor: [When will I get to graduate from mopping... it'd be nice if a new maid came... but it won't happen... probably.]

300024.name: Chief Maid
300024.ability: Before attacking, the first Spell in your Hand is sent to the Grave. If this happens, this Follower gets ATK +2.
300024.flavor: [Senpai, don't forget that you are the leader of the maids. So, please give me a vacation next week.]

300027.name: Burning Guardian
300027.flavor: [What? I was hired to protect, but the contract doesn't say anything about being careful about the surroundings. Who cares if I burn it all.]

300026.name: Tailor Maid
300026.flavor: [Her curtains are red, her dresses are red, her carpets are red... Aaah... For goodness sake, master Cina... save me.]

300021.name: Guard Maid
300021.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower with "Maid" in the name gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300021.flavor: [I will do my best for Cinia's safety. "You should also ensure the safety of my furniture and pottery!"]

300020.name: New Maid
300020.flavor: [Um, senpai. How should I clean this? Wow~ this vase... looks expensive.]

300023.name: Head Maid
300023.ability: A special effect is applied in dungeons. (Bonus effect: Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.)
300023.flavor: [Um... so... why should I be in charge of the vacations and salaries of Cinia's maids?]

300022.name: Porter Maid
300022.flavor: [Master Cinia! Where are you going? I will go with you! For a maid that always stays inside, there is nothing more exciting than going out with her master!]

300029.name: Aristocrat Girl
300029.ability: Before attacking, if the defender has at least 2 DEF, the defender gets STA -3.
300029.flavor: [This one is boring, too... this book is boring, why can't you write a good story? I was an idiot for expecting anything from you. You're fired, just leave.]

300028.name: Ward Caster
300028.flavor: [This magic is as firm as a shield. Step back. I will protect you.]

300295.name: Wednesday Witch
300295.ability: Before defending, this Follower gets STA +1.
300295.flavor: [It's the day when the power of water is abundant. Spells are most successful on this day.]

300689.name: 붙잡힌 망령
300689.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK -1. // Before defending, this card gets STA -1. // At the start of the turn, this card gets SIZE +1.
300689.flavor: [Let me go! Don't you know who I am?] [Your origin is looking for you. Let's go.]

300292.name: Seeker Melissa
300292.ability: Before attacking, the first Follower in your Deck with "Seeker" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. // Before defending, the first card in your Hand with "Seeker" in the name is sent to the bottom of your Deck, and this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2.
300292.flavor: [Amethystar! You need to be careful while you work. You don't want to damage any artifacts.]

300293.name: Seeker Amethystar
300293.ability: Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1, then this skill is removed. // Before defending, this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1, then this skill is removed. // At the start of the turn, this Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2, then this skill is removed.
300293.flavor: [I know. By the way, Melissa, what's the point of that thing you're wearing on your head?]

300501.name: Year 1 Bungurly
300501.ability: Before attacking, if the defender's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to this Follower's ATK, a card called "Thank You" is created at the top of the enemy Deck.

300290.name: Crux Knight Renya
300290.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1.
300290.flavor: [Why on earth did they agree to accept the Myo clan as new recruits?]

300291.name: Blue Cross June
300291.ability: Before attacking, if your Hand contains 2 or less cards, this Follower gets ATK -4. If your Hand contains 4 or more cards, this skill is removed.
300291.flavor: [I sell flowers on the street. It's my job to root out the truth from the rumors.]

110118.name: Treanna
110118.ability: At the start of the turn, all enemy Followers lose their skills.

110119.name: Panica.
110119.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, a random enemy Follower's ATK/STA are halved (rounding up).
110119.flavor: [Is this the result of the chaos phenomenon in the picturesque world? -DTD]

110116.name: Luthica Preventer
110116.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2 if it has at least 1 DEF. Otherwise, it gets DEF +1/STA +2.
110116.flavor: [I was betrayed...] [They weren't connected to the original world. These girls were just mirrored and fragmented existences. -DTD]

110117.name: Iri Flina
110117.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA -5 if it has at least 10 STA. Otherwise, it gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -2.
110117.flavor: [Vernika... Come back.] [I wasn't able to confirm any special link. I decided to begin destroying everything. -DTD]

110114.name: Sita Vilosa
110114.ability: At the start of the turn, enemy Followers in Slots 2, 3, and 4 get STA -2, and a random enemy Follower gets STA -2.
110114.flavor: [I will protect you, Vernika. Don't leave my side, Vernika.] [She spoke, but there was no response. It was a phenomenon of the closed picturesque world. -DTD]

110115.name: Cinia Pacifica
110115.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -2/STA -2 if it has 0 or less DEF. Otherwise, it gets DEF -1/STA -2.
110115.flavor: [I hate it. I can't trust anyone.] [Defense mechanisms were installed to elimnate trespassers. She couldn't speak, but she saw me and attacked. -DTD]

110112.name: Rui Flett
110112.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower is deactivated and gets ATK +3/STA +3.
110112.flavor: [If I could only have that feeling of losing so much time after closing my eyes for a moment, I would cheer.]

110113.name: Night Teacher Rui
110113.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower is moved to the next empty Slot on the enemy Field and gets ATK/STA decreased by its new Slot number.
110113.flavor: [Unlike teaching during the day, this work doesn't require me to care about other people. The principal knows me well.]

110110.name: Anyte Einoth
110110.ability: At the start of the turn, two random allied Followers get SIZE +1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +2.
110110.flavor: [After eating, cleaning up is also part of cooking! Clean up before leaving!]

110111.name: Teacher Riano
110111.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets STA +4, then a random allied Follower gets STA +4.
110111.flavor: [To live properly, you should always be prepared to handle anything that might happen to your bodies. As they say, it's better safe than sorry <3]

110028.name: Succubus Cantabile
110028.ability: At the start of the turn, two random enemy Followers get DEF -1.
110028.flavor: [Like a song, I will give you joy in your dreams. You don't need to pay me for anything. I already get a lot from your dreams.]

110029.name: Nytitch X
110029.ability: At the start of the turn, your Character gets LIFE +1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
110029.flavor: [Everyone receives the same amount of time. The night is fair. Won't you spend some time with me? It's lonely to play by myself.]

300528.name: Crux Knight Lukif
300528.ability: Before defending, this Follower's STA is set equal to the attacker's ATK.
300528.flavor: [Carry a sword. Lame magic doesn't belong in a fight for your life.]

300529.name: Aletheian G-NUSA
300529.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's STA is greater than or equal to its original STA value, the attacker gains the following skill: "Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1."
300529.flavor: [Miss Helena and the God of Truth speak the same words. They have my complete trust.]

300402.name: Delinquent Witch Cadet
300402.ability: Before attacking, if there is a Spell on the enemy Field, this Follower gets ATK +5, then this skill is removed.

110022.name: Wind Gambler
110022.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Character's LIFE is odd, you get LIFE -1. If it is even, you get LIFE +2.
110022.flavor: [This is a simple game. You just need to guess if the dice lands on odd or even. Easy, right?]

110023.name: Wind Girl
110023.ability: At the start of the turn, your Character gets LIFE +1.
110023.flavor: [You have to eat and grow up properly!]

110020.name: Mirror Luthica
110020.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Crux Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
110020.flavor: [It's just like the reflection off a mirror, but something is different. It speaks in the same voice, but it gives off the ill air of someone mimicking someone else. -Esprit's memo...]

110021.name: Mirror Iri
110021.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Field SIZE is greater than the enemy Field SIZE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
110021.flavor: [It's just like the reflection off a mirror, but something is different. It speaks in the same voice, but it gives off the ill air of someone mimicking someone else. -Esprit's memo...]

110026.name: N. Witch Magy Shen
110026.ability: At the start of the turn, two random allied Darklore Followers get ATK +1/STA +1.
110026.flavor: [I really don't know. No matter how much I try to read our destiny, I can't see it. This is unsettling. What will happen tomorrow...]

110027.name: Night Witch Seriot
110027.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave.
110027.flavor: [I'm the fastest on the highway of the night. Even the magical Hairpin Course can't block my drift.]

110024.name: Night Witch Nytitch
110024.ability: At the start of the turn, your Character gets LIFE -1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -2.
110024.flavor: [Everyone receives the same amount of time. The night is fair. Won't you spend some time with me? It's lonely to play by myself.]

110025.name: Night Witch Laetitia
110025.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Spell in the enemy Hand gets SIZE +2.
110025.flavor: [I don't understand this book no matter how much I read it. I don't know if I'm stupid or if this book is stupid.]

300339.name: Council Press Lyrica
300339.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's ATK is less than or equal to the number of Vita Followers in your Grave, the attacker is sent to the Grave.
300339.flavor: [She is a first year who has taken up publicity responsibilities for the student council. With her golden hair, emerald eyes, and a slightly misaligned tooth, she has a lot of fans like an idol. The students came to the classroom to see her today, too.]

300338.name: Lib. Explorer Kamit
300338.ability: Before defending, this card gets STA +1 for every card with "Library Club" in the name in the bottom four cards of your Deck and ATK +1 for every two cards.
300338.flavor: [There's almost an infinite amount of books in the underground library. I will finish this map before I graduate.]

300406.name: Seeker Ina
300406.ability: Before defending, this Follower gets DEF +1. // At the start of the turn, this Follower gets DEF=2.
300406.flavor: [We seekers have become strong in battle due to artifacts. I wonder if it's okay to be so dependent on them... It scares me.]

100184.name: Hero Luthica
100184.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA -2. If there are fewer allied cards than enemy cards, a random enemy Follower gets STA -2. If there are at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, a random enemy Follower gets STA -2.
100184.flavor: [This outfit is embarrassing. Why did you make it so tight, Clarice?] [It's how the style works! You should be thankful. Where would Luthica be without Luthica's Pal, Clarice Altheim?]

100185.name: Hero Iri
100185.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -2. If there are fewer allied cards than enemy cards, that Follower gets an additional ATK -1. If there are at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, that Follower gets an additional STA -1.
100185.flavor: [I am the dark! I am the knight! I am Iri! Now tell me. Where is Vernika!? WHERE IS SHE?!]

100186.name: Hot Springs Asmis
100186.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 2 and your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, your Character gets LIFE +1. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 3 and your Shuffles=0, you get Shuffles=1.
100186.flavor: [My body feels rejuvenated. I could stay here a little longer.]

100187.name: Hot Springs Linus
100187.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 2 and your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, your Character gets LIFE +1. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 3 and your Shuffles=0, you get Shuffles=1.
100187.flavor: [This is nice. It wouldn't be so bad to come here every now and then.]

100180.name: Child Helena
100180.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Deck gets STA increased by (10-ones digit of the Turn Number) divided by 2 (rounding down) and gets ATK increased by 1 plus the tens digit of the Turn Number.
100180.flavor: [Hey, everyone. Today's weather is good. Wanna play?]

100181.name: Chief Celesti
100181.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA -2 and is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
100181.flavor: [Even though I'm the chief, the higher ups aren't taking me seriously. Kidnapping? What a joke.]

100182.name: Hero Sita
100182.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2. If there are fewer allied cards than enemy cards, that Follower gets an additional ATK +1. If your Hand has at least as many cards as the enemy Hand, that Follower gets an additional STA +1.
100182.flavor: [This is my gift. My curse. Who am I? I'm hungry.]

100183.name: Hero Cinia
100183.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets DEF -1/STA -2. If there are fewer allied cards than enemy cards, the first Follower in the enemy Hand gets DEF -1. If there are at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, that Follower gets STA -2 (to a minimum of 1).
100183.flavor: [A full suit of talentium can easily protect weak flesh. This is the latest in arcanotechnology. You would never be able to build this in a cave with a box of scraps.]

100188.name: Hot Springs Rose
100188.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 2 and your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, your Character gets LIFE +1. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 3 and your Shuffles=0, you get Shuffles=1.
100188.flavor: [Come try it out. It feels good. Come on.]

100189.name: Hot Springs Helena
100189.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 2 and your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, your Character gets LIFE +1. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 3 and your Shuffles=0, you get Shuffles=1.

100148.name: Morning Cinia
100148.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. Another power is added in dungeons. (Bonus effect: The same Follower gets an additional ATK +0~2/STA +0~2)
100148.flavor: [I sense a strange gaze as I wake up in the morning. A very powerful gaze. As my consciousness fades, I mutter to myself, "Who... who's staring at me?"]

210029.name: Aletheian Brick
210029.flavor: [A brick inscribed with the symbol of the Aletheian. It's well known that when the underground church was built, each brick was created and placed one by one. As it turns out, though, these particular bricks were made to order by the alliance's brick making industry. -Esprit's memo] [Location: Catacombs]

210028.name: Pendant
210028.flavor: [A necklace. I've seen Rio wearing one before. However, it really annoys me that she usually only shows the string, and you can't see the ornament. I feel like she's doing it on purpose. -Esprit's memo]

210023.name: Panda Doll
210023.flavor: [A panda doll. This animal can't be seen anywhere in the alliance. This doll is patterned after the pet of the Pacifica household. The Pacificas receive royalties for every sale of this doll. -Esprit's memo]

210022.name: Dagger
210022.flavor: [A dagger made of Talentium. Research on Talentium has been accelerating. Academics are now beginning to research methods to utilize the energy within Talentium. -Esprit's memo]

210021.name: Talentium Pearl
210021.flavor: [There are many ways to refine Talentium, and there are many appearances that the refined Talentium ends up taking. One manufacturer refines Talentium into a marble shape. Ultimately, though, they all end up as cards. The consumers' tastes are important, after all. -Esprit's memo]

210020.name: Spiral Fragment
210020.flavor: [One of the abnormalities of the picturesque world. I don't know the reason for each world's existence, but this ore scattered here and there is evidence that this world is unusual. This world's abnormality takes the shape of a spiral ore. -DKD's report] [Location: Dream Island, Picturesque World]

210027.name: Lipstick
210027.flavor: [This is the most troublesome tool for Rio when she goes out. She tries to get the color just right, and she fusses a lot over putting it on. -Esprit's memo]

210026.name: Perfume
210026.flavor: [Because people wanted a distinct smell from their bodies, perfume was born. I don't really understand why they would. I don't recall ever seeing Rio put perfume on herself, but for some reason, I could sense a soft scent from her. How mysterious. -Esprit's memo]

210025.name: Gloves
210025.flavor: [What do you suppose they were used for first? To prevent your hands from getting dirty, or for helping with work? I still don't understand the minds of those who want to wear extravagant and flashy things. -Esprit's memo]

210024.name: Playing Cards
210024.flavor: [A 52-card set. A variety of games can be played with it. Countless tears and laughter have arisen from these paper cards. Even though I'm also human, I'm always amused at how interesting humans are. -Esprit's memo]

300238.name: Council Dispatch Layna
300238.ability: Before defending, this card gets ATK +1/STA +2.
300238.flavor: [The upcoming event is at our school, so it is very important. Don't make any mistakes in the preparation.]

300239.name: Linia's Maid Seron
300239.ability: Before defending, this Follower gets STA increased by 1 plus the number of cards in your Hand.
300239.flavor: [I'm now working here, too... I think? It's still a bit... awkward? Yeah. Hehe...]

300332.name: Council Gart & Sita
300332.ability: Before attacking, a random allied Vita Follower other this one gets ATK +3~5/STA +3~5 (randomly). If this happens, your Character gets LIFE -1. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300332.flavor: [Ack! You bastards! Are you gonna do things without my permission? ... Alright, you asked for it!] [Coo coo coo coo!] [Hurry...] [P, please wait a little bit Sita! Ah! I burned it!]

300230.name: GS Agent
300230.ability: Before defending, the first card in your Deck with "GS" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field, then this skill is removed.
300230.flavor: [For the glory of the great GS! I've completed my duties! What's my next assignment? Am I going to the Crux nation?]

100149.name: Morning Luthica
100149.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. Another power is added in dungeons. (Bonus effect: The same Follower gets an additional ATK +0~2/STA +0~2)
100149.flavor: [I had a nightmare. It's the beginning of the day. I don't remember how I got here. The leftover distress still pains me.]

300232.name: Crescent Elder Chenin
300232.ability: Before defending, if you have a Darklore Character, the first card with "Crescent" in the name and the first Darklore card without "Crescent" in the name are sent from your Hand to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random enemy card on the Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck, then this skill is removed.
300232.flavor: [Misfortune finally fell upon the head. So what? What do the other elders think? Dirty blood serves as a shield against the misfortune that Crux brings, right?]

300233.name: Dark Master Vernika
300233.ability: Before defending, the attacker gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of different SIZES of Darklore cards in your Hand. Your Character gets LIFE increased by half the decreased amount (rounding up). This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300233.flavor: [Now~ Kneel before me. Look up at me. That's right. I am different from the loser who only idled around. I think I'll enjoy the night a little more.]

300234.name: Vampire Hunter Iri
300234.ability: Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK/STA increased by 2 plus the difference between this Follower's SIZE and the defender's SIZE. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300234.flavor: [Vernika. I will release you from the frivolous night. I can kill you with this sword of 15 magic eyes.]

300235.name: L. Rio
300235.ability: Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK +2. // Before defending, this Follower gets STA +2. // At the start of the turn, this Follower gets DEF +1.
300235.flavor: [Give a meaningful vote to the girl of your choice! Unfortunately, I was not able to become a candidate.]

300236.name: Game Starter
300236.flavor: [The first step. Don't forget your heart at this moment~]

300237.name: Summer Santa Ninian
300237.ability: Before defending, if this Follower is deactivated, it becomes reactivated. If this happens, this skill is removed until the start of the next turn. // Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1.
300237.flavor: [I don't care about the season. I do this because people's hopes are at their peaks during the summer. So, what do you wish for?]

200509.name: 포장이 멋진 선물상자
200509.flavor: [A gift box with pretty packaging. It must contain something special. Just looking at it makes me excited.]

200508.name: 방해받는 음모
200508.ability: If you have a Darklore Character, your Character's LIFE is halved (rounding up) and gets LIFE +5. If this happens, the following effects are applied depending on this card's SIZE. 2 or less: The first allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by twice the LIFE decrease. This card gets SIZE +2 and is sent to the top of your Deck. 3 or more: The first Follower in your Grave is sent to the top of your Deck.
200508.flavor: [The GS is evil! I won't forgive you.] [It is evil, indeed.]

200505.name: 성역의 유산
200505.ability: Up to 8 cards in both Graves are removed from the game. The following effects are applied depending on the number of removed cards. 1 or more: All allied Followers get ATK +3/STA +3. 8 or more: All cards in your Hand get SIZE -1. 16: Your Character gets LIFE +3.
200505.flavor: [As expected, this thing you've brought is an ancient artifact, Odien... How wonderful. With this, Crux can fight for another 10 years!]

200504.name: 계획발동
200504.ability: A random Spell in the enemy Grave with the highest SIZE is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and deactivated.
200504.flavor: [At last, the Witch Queen has begun to act.]

200507.name: 헬레나의 연락원
200507.ability: A random allied Follower gets ATK decreased by (30 - your Character's LIFE). That Follower gets STA increased by its ATK reduction (by a maximum of 9).
200507.flavor: [I finally found a clue. Schindler... What are you planning?]

200506.name: 마검회수
200506.ability: Enemy cards with the same SIZE as this card are sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
200506.flavor: [You were carrying such an interesting thing? Would it be alright to give this to her?]

200501.name: 메이드 아르바이트
200501.ability: The first allied Follower's ATK/DEF/STA are changed to their original values if they are higher than their original values. The first Follower in your Hand gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the respective changes in each stat.
200501.flavor: [Sita, look at this ad. The Pacifica house is looking for maids, and the hourly pay is the same as my allowance!] [Luxurious room and board are provided...]

200500.name: 해방
200500.ability: Enemy Followers with a SIZE of at least 3 get SIZE -1. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the total SIZE reduction.

200503.name: 2권의 행방
200503.ability: The first Spell in your Deck with the same SIZE as this card is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field.
200503.flavor: [You will stay here and look for this book. This book.]

200502.name: 함정
200502.ability: The first Academy Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field, then all cards in both Hands are sent to the bottom of the owners' Decks. That Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of sent Followers and gets SIZE decreased by the number of sent Spells (to a minimum of 1).
200502.flavor: [Huhu, as expected, you're foolishly following the clue that I gave you without knowing that you've already been captured.]

200181.name: Lady's Wrath
200181.ability: The last Academy card in your Hand is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -4/STA -4.
200181.flavor: [For the love of... Hey! Why is it like this!!]

200180.name: Black Magic Preparation
200180.ability: All Spells in your Hand get SIZE -1 (to a minimum of 1).
200180.flavor: [The influence of witches is gradually spreading underground. The day when they spring upon the continent under the witch queen's name is not far.]

200183.name: Servant of Clarice
200183.ability: The first card in your Deck is sent to the Grave, and the second card is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random enemy card is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
200183.flavor: [It's been a while. Master Clarice. I have prepared the ingredients you requested. How is the next experiment progressing?]

200182.name: Shoot
200182.ability: The last card in your Hand is removed from the game. If this happens, a copy of the first card in the enemy Hand is created in the first empty Slot in your Hand.
200182.flavor: [The lady spiked the ball into the opponent's court. A hit! She scored a point.]

200185.name: Push Forward
200185.ability: Two random enemy Followers get ATK -4/STA -4. If this card's SIZE is 1, it is removed from the game. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE=1 and is deactivated.
200185.flavor: [I will find Linia and ask her myself!]

200184.name: Lady's Attendant
200184.ability: Two random allied Academy Followers get ATK increased by the number of cards in your Hand and get STA increased by 1 plus the number of cards in the enemy Hand.
200184.flavor: [Keeping the wrinkles out of the skirt, making sure the lace doesn't flutter. Calmly maintaining the lady's appearance is the basic job of the attendant.]

200187.name: Miscalculation
200187.ability: If your Hand contains three or fewer cards, Followers are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until there are four cards in your Hand.
200187.flavor: [Why on earth does this mistake keep repeating? What will we do if the predecessor's mistakes keep getting passed down?]

200186.name: Supply Request
200186.ability: An allied Follower with the highest SIZE gets SIZE decreased by the difference between its SIZE and the SIZE of the first card in your Hand.
200186.flavor: [I have to do it later. Today's work put off until tomorrow. If you put off work every other day, it grows like a snowball, and you won't have time to sleep at night.]

200189.name: Vacation
200189.ability: The first allied Crux Follower with the highest STA gets STA halved (rounding up) and gets DEF increased by half of the STA reduction (rounding up).
200189.flavor: [I think wherever Pintail goes is a good choice! This place is great!]

200188.name: Passcode
200188.ability: If there are at least three cards in your Field with the same SIZE, Followers in your Field with that SIZE get ATK +3/STA +3.
200188.flavor: [Oh, come in. If you tell me the number, I'll send you the correct way.]

300308.name: Youngest Maid
300308.ability: Before defending, this Follower gets STA increased by the number of enemy Followers on the Field.
300308.flavor: [This time, I'll be working with senpais! Nice to meet you!]

300309.name: L Cinia
300309.ability: At the start of the turn, this Follower gets STA changed to equal your Character's LIFE (to a maximum of 15), then this skill is removed.
300309.flavor: [A homunculus requested by Linia. Clarice put her heart and soul into making it. Rumor has it that it's worth almost as much as the capture of the artificial vampire god.]

200211.name: Crux Conference
200211.ability: Two random enemy Followers get ATK -1/STA -3.
200211.flavor: [Even within, the opinions on how to deal with the land of vampires varied greatly. However, among those present, the will of the knights was the greatest.]

200210.name: Royle Academy
200210.ability: The first allied Follower that belongs to your Character's faction gets ATK/DEF/STA doubled. That card gets the following skill: " At the start of the turn, this card gets ATK/DEF/STA changed to equal their original values, and then this skill is removed."
200210.flavor: [The private Royle Academy, the garden of ladies.]

200213.name: Commissioned Research
200213.ability: All Spells on the enemy Field with a SIZE equal or less than the SIZE of the first Crux Follower on your Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.

200212.name: Enemy Within
200212.ability: Allied Crux Followers with skills have their skills removed. Those Followers get ATK/STA increased by the number of removed skills.
200212.flavor: [The most important thing is always on the inside. There is darkness on the bottom of a lamp.]

200215.name: Relieve Post
200215.ability: Two random allied Followers get ATK +4/STA +4. If this card has a SIZE of 1, it is removed from the game. This card gets SIZE=1 and is deactivated.
200215.flavor: [Jaina Preventer. To the leader of the Crux Knights. A new leader will be arriving as a replacement. Within are the proper documents to ensure that change is smooth.]

200214.name: Supply Transfer
200214.ability: The first allied Follower that belongs to your Character's faction gets ATK/STA increased by 2 plus the total SIZE of other allied Followers.
200214.flavor: [Senpai, this is too heavy.] [I have a burden outside of these things...] [What?] [Tch...]

200217.name: Heart Barrier
200217.ability: The first allied Follower that does not belong to the first allied Follower's faction is deactivated and gets STA +6.
200217.flavor: [The two have a very strong love for each other. It's a kind of barrier magic. It appears between two people with bottomless love, called a "Heart Barrier". I will destroy that illusion of yours! -Esprit's memo...]

200216.name: Stakeout
200216.ability: The enemy Follower that has a Slot number equal to this card's Slot number gets DEF =0/STA -2.
200216.flavor: [Isn't this really interesting?] [What a weird name, isn't it? 9th Star?] [We don't know much about the things at the outskirts of the alliance.]

200219.name: Crux in Flames
200219.ability: If there are no allied Followers, a new copy of the first enemy Follower with the highest total ATK/DEF/STA is created in the first empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE/ATK/DEF/STA changed to equal those of the original Follower. The new Follower gets this skill: "At the start of the turn, this card is sent to the Grave."
200219.flavor: [No witnesses will be left behind. Everything will burn down.]

200218.name: Flare
200218.ability: A random allied Darklore Follower gets DEF +1/STA +4.
200218.flavor: [The agent fired a flare into the air. A red flare signified the successful elimination of Crux, but the failure to find the desired object. The place the GS leader spoke of was not within Crux territory.]

200439.name: Land and Sea
200439.ability: Your Character gets LIFE +4. The opponent gets Shuffles -1. The following effects are applied depending on your Character's LIFE. 31 or more: 2 random cards in the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave. 12~27: A random enemy Follower is sent to the Grave. 5~8: Two random enemy cards are sent to the Grave.
200439.flavor: [Crevasse's purpose is to improve the lives of the creatures of the sea by transforming the land into the ocean.]

200438.name: Dark Sword Menelgart
200438.ability: All Followers in your Hand/Field have their ATK and STA swapped. If you have a Darklore Character, all Followers in your Hand/Field with 10 or less ATK get STA +4, and all Followers in your Hand/Field with 10 or less STA get ATK +3.
200438.flavor: [In order to maintain the strength of our sisterhood, the forbidden ritual to obtain this magic sword was completed. The eye on the sword looks around as if it were alive.]

200431.name: Down with the Queen
200431.ability: Two random enemy Followers get ATK/STA increased by the difference between 3 and this card's SIZE. If this card's SIZE is 1, it is removed from the game. This card gets SIZE -2, is sent to the enemy Field, and is deactivated. (Note: This card isn't considered to have "Witch" in the name for the purposes of other cards' skills because it uses a different word in Korean.)
200431.flavor: [I have no choice but to stand in your way.] [So, you are the witches who oppose me... What can you do?]

200430.name: Witchification Plans
200430.ability: Up to 3 cards in the enemy Grave that belong to a different faction than the enemy Character are removed from the game. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of removed cards.
200430.flavor: [Linus confirmed with her own eyes what Linia's plans were.] [I can't leave this alone...]

200433.name: Opposition
200433.ability: Two random allied Crux Followers get DEF=0. Those Followers get ATK increased by the average of their SIZES (rounding up).
200433.flavor: [Now, hand it over quietly.] [That's impossible.] [I'm fine with that, too.]

200432.name: Dress Up Extreme
200432.ability: The following effects are applied depending on the sum of the original SIZE of the cards on your Field except this one. 5 or less: A random enemy Spell is sent to the Grave. 6~9: Two random enemy Followers get ATK -3/STA -3. 10 or more: All previous effects are applied, and a random enemy card is sent to the Grave. If you have an Academy Character, then this card's SIZE is included.
200432.flavor: [I wish upon the stars, and the glimmering of my stars will form a fierce tempest! Fated to become a witch... No, I decide my own destiny!]

200435.name: Trace of Kana
200435.ability: A random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2 and gains the following skill: "Before attacking, this skill is changed to the defender's first skill, then the defender's first skill is removed." If you have a Crux Character, this skill is applied a second time.
200435.flavor: [This is what we've been looking for. We have to bring this back to research it properly.]

200434.name: Witch Hunt
200434.ability: If you have a Crux Character, a random enemy Follower gets SIZE +1. If that Follower's SIZE is at least 4, it gains the following skill: "Before defending, this Follower gets STA -1."
200434.flavor: [When this artifact, which can analyze the target's magical composition, is completed, the true witch hunt will begin.]

200437.name: Trance
200437.ability: The first allied Follower with the lowest STA is removed from the game. A random Follower in your Grave is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field. This card is removed from the game.
200437.flavor: [This body is suitable. I'm not used to it, so I can't move as freely, but I like it better than Rio's body. Aletheian, they said... heh heh.]

200436.name: Apostle's Scheme
200436.ability: Two random enemy Followers get ATK -1~3. This card gets SIZE +1 and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. If this card's SIZE is at least 2, it is sent to the Grave instead.
200436.flavor: [The one who can do this job is you, A-GA. Only you. We must find that thing for the sake of our sisterhood.]

110159.name: Sleep Club Pres.
110159.ability: At the start of the turn, the first card in your Hand and the enemy Hand are switched. (HINT: Change.)

300010.name: Basketball Player
300010.flavor: [Friendship! Effort! Victory! Sparkle with growth, everyone! We'll try hard today!]

300011.name: Kouhai
300011.flavor: [Vernika senpai, are you going? Can you bring me with you? I want to see those monsters with my own eyes!]

300012.name: 2S Assistant Asmis
300012.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1.
300012.flavor: [Talk to us whenever you want. Boys and girls, young and old, the SS detective agency will ask no questions. We will solve everything! Hehe, how is it? Interested?]

300013.name: Rainy Girl
300013.flavor: [This morning, I thought that it would definitely rain today. Bringing an umbrella was the right choice. Whenever I think it will rain, it always does.]

300014.name: Prefect Layna
300014.ability: Before defending, this card gets STA increased by 1 plus the number of cards in your Hand.
300014.flavor: [Hey! Don't mess up your skirt! Use your common sense and behave properly!]

300015.name: Lib. Lucca
300015.flavor: [Vernika senpai! Don't just read books every day! Help the Library Club sort the books, too!! How much work are you going to make for your cute underclassmen?]

300016.name: Lib. Serie
300016.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK increased by the number of cards in your Hand with "Library Club" in the name.
300016.flavor: [That Vernika, hasn't she been hanging out with the Cook Club too much lately? She needs to be careful...]

300017.name: Lib. Lindt
300017.flavor: [People who haven't returned their books need to be warned. Hm? What's this book?]

300018.name: Lib. Vernika
300018.ability: Before defending, this card gets STA +2.
300018.flavor: [The world of books is really infinite. Do you read books, Sita?]

300019.name: Gardener Maid
300019.flavor: [Master Cinia, the head maid asked me to tell you that lunch is ready... Yes? Precious pet #2 is missing? Yes, I am in charge of the garden, but... I'm Rose's maid, so I don't really know about it. I will look for it.]

110277.name: 학생회 셀린
110277.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Deck with "Student Council" in the name gets ATK +1/STA +2 and is moved to the top of your Deck.
110277.flavor: [It's better to drink the tea without the tea leaves left in. Isn't that right?]

110276.name: 요리연구부 아이리
110276.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 1, all Followers in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +1. The enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
110276.flavor: [The whipped cream is done, so now... Hm?]

110279.name: 프렛
110279.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of Crux Followers in your Hand with "Knight" in the name.
110279.flavor: [Sergeant, you're not supposed to throw the flag.]

110278.name: 학생회 방문자 이스프릿
110278.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. A random enemy Follower has its skills removed. If this happens, that Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
110278.flavor: [I came to visit because I was worried about Iri. I'm relieved that there weren't any problems.]

300577.name: 선배 뮤지시터
300577.ability: Before attacking, a random Follower in your Deck gets +2 SIZE. If that card's SIZE is at least 10, that card gets its SIZE set equal to this card's SIZE, gets ATK +3/STA +3, and is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field.
300577.flavor: [Does it still feel weird? Don't worry. Nobody can do everything at the beginning. I'll teach you one step at a time.]

300576.name: 수영장의 카넬
300576.ability: Before attacking, if this card's STA is less than or equal to its original value, this card is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field, gets deactivated, and gets its STA changed to its original value.
300576.flavor: [Do you have a problem with this tube? What are you staring at?]

300575.name: 조련사 아이리
300575.ability: Before attacking, the last Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field and deactivated. This card gets ATK/STA increased by the number of deactivated allied cards. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn. // Before defending, this card gets STA +2.
300575.flavor: [This whip is nice. It would be good to use. Should I buy one?]

300574.name: 무녀 헬레나
300574.ability: Before defending, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. If this card is in Slot 2, this effect is applied a second time.
300574.flavor: [I love how simple humans are. That fool has also come. Shall I try moving a little, now?]

300573.name: 크레센트 코넌드럼
300573.ability: Before defending, this card is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field (40% chance).
300573.flavor: [Yahoo! I got my hands on the latest model of witch brooms. This speed! This feeling! It's the best~]

300572.name: 교국의 루티카
300572.ability: Before attacking, if this card is in Slot 1, 3, or 5, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2. // Before defending, if this card is in Slot 2, 4, or 5, the attacker gets ATK -2/STA -2. // At the start of the turn, this card is moved to a random empty Slot on your Field.
300572.flavor: [As expected, the air of Crux is refreshing.]

300571.name: 기사단원 핀테일
300571.ability: Before defending, a random allied card other than this one is sent to the bottom of your Deck, then the attacker and a random enemy Follower other than the attacker get ATK/STA decreased by half the sent card's SIZE (rounding up).
300571.flavor: [I wonder how long you can hide.]

300570.name: 신성연구회 오디엔
300570.ability: Before attacking, a random card in your Grave with "Seeker" in the name is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
300570.flavor: [Naturally, the pursuit of mysteries is lonely.]

300147.name: Chef Maid
300147.flavor: [Be careful! That is the food for the ladies. You must always do your best as an employee!]

110109.name: Hannah Pathfinder
110109.ability: At the begnining of the turn, the enemy card in Slot 2 is sent to the Grave.
110109.flavor: [I never look back, so please watch my back.]

110108.name: Lady Philia
110108.ability: At the start of the turn, the following effect is applied twice: "A random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by its DEF."
110108.flavor: [I heard from Seven. You're supposed to be amazing? We'll see about that!]

110105.name: Cook Club Advisor
110105.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets SIZE +1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +2.
110105.flavor: [The most important thing when cooking is your heart. Don't forget that.]

110104.name: Geography Teacher
110104.ability: At the start of the turn, the enemy card in Slot 3 is sent to the Grave.
110104.flavor: [I take the road less traveled! It's my stage!]

110107.name: Night Teacher
110107.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower is moved to the next empty Slot on the enemy Field and gets STA decreased by its new Slot number. (If it is in Slot 5, it is moved to Slot 1.)
110107.flavor: [She volunteered because she wanted something to do during her sleepless nights. The night is long.]

110106.name: Health Teacher
110106.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets STA +4.
110106.flavor: [You have to protect your health~ So concentrate and listen in my class.]

110101.name: Embracing Shaman
110101.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gains gets ATK +2/DEF +2/STA +2.
110101.flavor: [This is the world where humans and non-humans live together. That kind of division is unnecessary here. What are you looking for?]

110100.name: Child Sigma
110100.ability: At the start of the turn, the first card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. A random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by half of the sent card's SIZE (by a maximum of 4, rounding down).
110100.flavor: [Hm? Alcohol? Ew! Humans drink that? It's weird.]

110103.name: Angry Lady
110103.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by its DEF.

110102.name: Sleep Club Advisor
110102.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower is deactivated and gets ATK +1/STA +1.
110102.flavor: [I end up waking up every day and I have to stay alive by breathing and I'm used to always waking up by myself and breathing to live and I don't remember anymore.]

300656.name: 발견자 오르테
300656.ability: Before attacking, this card's ATK is set equal to the defender's ATK. // Before attacking, this card gets ATK -1.
300656.flavor: [If the altar and key are prepared, the door to this world will be opened. And through a sacrifice, this world can be closed again? But what happens to the sacrifice?]

300657.name: 도망자 암리타
300657.ability: Before attacking, nothing happens. // Before defending, nothing happens.
300657.flavor: [I left my Talentium there... but I can only hope that it gets to the right hands.]

300654.name: GS 아홉번째 별
300654.ability: Before attacking, the following effects are applied depending on the type of the first card in your Deck, then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn. Follower: This card gets ATK +2/STA +2. Spell: The first enemy Spell is sent to the Grave.
300654.flavor: [Iri has now been acquired. The only remaining danger is the Anti-Witch Queen.]

300655.name: 마법소녀 레이나
300655.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK increased by the number of allied Followers other than this one. // Before defending, this card gets STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand. // At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower is destroyed. If this happens, this card's ATK/DEF/STA are changed to their original values if they are higher than their original values.
300655.flavor: [Trance Magical! In the name of justice, Magical Girl Layna will not forgive you!]

300652.name: GS특공대
300652.ability: Before defending, a card called "GS Fighter" is created in your Grave. This skill is removed.
300652.flavor: [Charge in. Attack. That is 3rd Star's plan.]

300653.name: GS 여덟번째 별
300653.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets DEF decreased by half the number of cards in your Grave with "GS" in the name (rounding up, by a maximum of 3).
300653.flavor: [I have work for the GS for a while for their sake. But what is their aim?]

300650.name: 안티위치퀸 로제
300650.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets DEF=1 and this card gets ATK=6.
300650.flavor: [The battle against Linia starts now. Follow me, everyone!]

300651.name: 신성연구회 루티카
300651.ability: Before attacking, this card's ATK is set equal to 2 plus its STA. // Before defending, this card's STA is set equal to 3 plus its ATK.
300651.flavor: [Welcome back, Luthica. I heard from Rose. Did you find the answer you were looking for at "that place"?] [Thank you, Sigmund. I haven't been able to find my answer, yet. However, I did manage to confirm one thing. Crux is currently in peril.]

300658.name: 탐정 리누스와 아스미스
300658.ability: Before attacking, a card called "New Student Orientation" is created in the first empty Slot of your Field. // Before defending, the first card in your Grave called "New Student Orientation" is removed from the game. If this happens, this card gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300658.flavor: [You're a self-proclaimed detective, too?] [I'm a real detective, aren't I?] [Well anyway, you were a lot more helpful than that four-eyes.] [Don't compare me to other people!]

300659.name: 메이드 테일러
300659.ability: Before defending, the attacker gets its skills removed. If this happens, this skill is removed.

100281.name: PH Isfeldt
100281.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 1, all Neutral Followers in your Deck get STA +2. If the Turn Number is 2, all Neutral Followers in your Deck get ATK +1. If the Turn Number is odd, the bottom Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the Turn Number is even, you get Shuffles =1.
100281.flavor: [Understand? "Cacao" means "food for the gods". This place is our utopia.]

100280.name: PH Helena
100280.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 1, all Darklore Followers in your Deck get STA +2. If the Turn Number is 2, all Darklore Followers in your Deck get ATK +1. If the Turn Number is odd, the bottom Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the Turn Number is even, you get Shuffles =1.
100280.flavor: [I don't know if I have the right to wear these clothes. Please accept this as atonement for my sins.]

110039.name: Shadow Cannelle
110039.ability: At the start of the turn, cards in your Field with the lowest SIZE get ATK/STA increased by the difference between the lowest SIZE in your Field and the highest SIZE in the enemy Field.
110039.flavor: [Sister Sage, what do you do for fun? I think your preferences must be the same as a little girl since you have short hair and glasses~] [.. It looks like I'll have to do more than just stop you.]

110038.name: Shadow Nold
110038.ability: At the start of the turn, a random card in your Field gets SIZE -1 (to a minimum of 1).
110038.flavor: [We secretly showed that lady this mirror, but we never thought she'd get so depressed~] [This is a mirror that shows the past? Tch... This is a pointless trick.]

300539.name: Cook Club Devourer
300539.ability: Before defending, the first card in your Hand with "Cook Club" in the name is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, this card gets ATK +1/STA +2.
300539.flavor: [An outside sponsor of the Cook Club. This young lady from a wealthy family loves the snacks that the Cook Club makes.]

300538.name: Lib. Snowty
300538.ability: Before defending, the attacker gets its skills removed. If this happens, this skill is removed.
300538.flavor: [The Library Club members all went to the underground library. It feels lonely here when we don't get many visitors.]

300522.name: Council Kingmakers
300522.ability: Before attacking, this Follower's ATK is set equal to the defender's DEF. // Before attacking, the defender gets STA decreased by 3 plus half the ATK of the first Vita Follower in your Hand (rounding up). // Before defending, this card gets STA +1.
300522.flavor: [Tierria and Amy are the core of the student council's management. Although Celine's solid approval ratings are in part due to her charisma, it would be impossible without the outstanding business skills of these two.]

110031.name: Magy Shen X
110031.ability: At the start of the turn, two random allied Darklore Followers get ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
110031.flavor: [I really don't know. No matter how much I try to read our destiny, I can't see it. This is unsettling. What will happen tomorrow...]

110030.name: Laetitia Ful X
110030.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the enemy Field and deactivated.
110030.flavor: [I don't understand this book no matter how much I read it. I don't know if I'm stupid or if this book is stupid.]

110033.name: R. Cantabile
110033.ability: At the start of the turn, two random enemy Followers get DEF -2.
110033.flavor: [Like a song, I will give you joy in your dreams. You don't need to pay me for anything. I already get a lot from your dreams.]

110032.name: Seriot X
110032.ability: At the start of the turn, all Spells in the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave.
110032.flavor: [I'm the fastest on the highway of the night. Even the magical Hairpin Course can't block my drift.]

110035.name: Trickster Rion
110035.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Spell in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. A Follower called "Scardel Rion Flina" is placed in the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE -2.
110035.flavor: [How is it? Isn't it interesting? I wanted to show Shion something fun, but unfortunately, I don't have enough materials. Ah, of course! You! Won't you be our plaything?]

110034.name: Trickster Sion
110034.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Spell in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. A Follower called "Scardel Shion Flina" is placed in the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE -2.
110034.flavor: [It's not unreasonable that Rion likes you. I'm interested in people like you, too. Do you want to serve me tonight? Don't you think the chance to serve me is enough of a reward in itself?]

110037.name: Mirror Rose
110037.ability: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by half of the difference between its SIZE and DEF (rounding up).
110037.flavor: [I don't have any plan to play with you kids. Why don't you accept my proposal? Stop this now. Rio is already suffering.] [Rio? Who's that? Ah~ the lady with the huge chest?]

110036.name: Mirror Vernika
110036.ability: At the start of the turn, the first enemy Follower with the highest DEF gets DEF =0.
110036.flavor: [Who is it? The brats that played this horrible joke?] [Oh my~ how scary. This is the amusement park that we built ourselves. It's fun for us if you're already like this~]

100193.name: Dress Rose
100193.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Deck gets STA increased by its DEF and gets ATK increased by half its DEF (rounding up). If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
100193.flavor: [It's been a long time since I've worn something like this. I wonder if it looks okay?]

100192.name: 교복의 리안나
100192.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. The following effects are applied depending on that Follower's Slot number. 1~3: A random Follower in the enemy Hand gets STA -2 (to a minimum of 1). 3~5: The affected Follower gets an additional ATK +1/STA +1.
100192.flavor: [I tried fitting in with the atmosphere by wearing a school uniform. How is it?] [That's a violation.] [Huh?]

100191.name: Tigress Felpix
100191.ability: At the start of the turn, a Follower called "Game Starter" is created in the first empty Slot of the enemy Field and gets ATK=4/DEF=0/STA=4. If the enemy Field contains a card with the name "Game Starter", a random Follower in your Hand gets ATK +1/STA +1.
100191.flavor: [Don't you know who I am? What? You don't? How senseless...]

100190.name: Training Sita
100190.ability: At the start of the turn, the following effect is applied 3 times: "A random enemy Follower gets STA -1."
100190.flavor: [I like going for a light jog at the beginning of each day. No, maybe I like eating more...]

100197.name: GS 간부 몽쉘
100197.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, a card called "GS Fighter" is created at the top of your Grave. The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK/STA increased by the number of Darklore Followers in the top 3 cards of your Grave.
100197.flavor: [Miss Mon Cher! It's an order from above.] [Silence. Don't you know it's taboo to say an executive's name?] [P... Pardon me. 5th Star.]

100196.name: 미스 로일 시니아
100196.ability: At the start of the turn, if your Field contains an Academy Follower and the enemy Hand has at least 2 empty Slots, a Spell called "Thank You" is created in the first empty Slot of the enemy Hand. If there are no empty Slots, a Spell with the name "Thank You" is created in the first empty Slot of the enemy Field.
100196.flavor: [It wasn't particularly moving to say that it was a natural fact. It was difficult to not laugh out of courtesy.]

100195.name: 퀸 페아 브레이
100195.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is 1, all Spells in your Deck get SIZE -1 (to a minimum of 1).
100195.flavor: [My song has the power to bring everyone together. Everyone, listen to my song!]

100194.name: Dress Helena
100194.ability: At the start of the turn, the first Follower in the enemy Deck gets ATK decreased by the number of allied Followers (by a maximum of 3). A random allied Follower gets ATK increased by the total ATK decrease. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
100194.flavor: [This is different from my usual clothes. It feels soft, so I like it.]

100199.name: Baker Linus
100199.ability: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, the last Follower in your Grave is sent to the first empty Slot of your Field and gets ATK +2/STA +2. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. The first Follower in your Hand is sent to the Grave.
100199.flavor: [Hm, this looks pretty. Should I taste it?]

100198.name: Mahjong Asmis
100198.ability: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. If the first card in your Hand and the sent Follower have the same SIZE, that Follower gets ATK +2/STA +3. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
100198.flavor: [I've already seen through you!] [... What are the chances of that?]

300227.name: Trick Witch
300227.flavor: [It's just some simple entertainment using cards. I don't know any other tricks.]

300226.name: Crux Nemesis Luthica
300226.ability: Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of Followers in your Hand. The first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck.
300226.flavor: [The air of Crux has a bad feeling to it. I will just destroy that nation.]

300225.name: Sommelier Sigma
300225.ability: Before defending, if you have a Crux Character, a random Follower in your Hand or Field gets ATK +1/STA +1, then a random Follower in your Hand or Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300225.flavor: [The variety is Schiller. The producer is Cotes du Rhone. The spicy scent and the aged taste makes this quite a good wine. Would you like to try some?]

300224.name: Knight Lukif
300224.ability: Before defending, if you have a Crux Character, the first card with "Knight" in the name and the first Crux card without "Knight" in the name are sent from your Hand to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random enemy card on the Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck, then this skill is removed.
300224.flavor: [Rookie? Hey rookie! Do you remember what I said before? This battle is all because of us. We're being punished for it right now.]

300223.name: Seeker Odien
300223.ability: Before attacking, the first card in your Deck with "Seeker" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand, then this card gets STA increased by the sent card's SIZE. If this happens, this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300223.flavor: [I'm here to explore the ruins, so it's always dangerous. I can't skip my training.]

300222.name: Blue Cross Jainier
300222.ability: Before defending, if your Hand contains 2 or less cards, cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until your Hand has 4 cards. If your Hand contains 4 or more cards, this skill is removed.
300222.flavor: [These gloves are really inconvenient... If I take them off, I won't be a Blue Cross anymore?]

300221.name: Knight Prea
300221.flavor: [It's my duty to sound the horn in the morning. Hurry up and get dressed!!]

300220.name: Blue Cross Ferris
300220.ability: Before defending, if this card and your Character belong to the same faction, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1, then this skill is removed.
300220.flavor: [We are always researching ways to put the denizens of the night to rest.]

300229.name: Hellfire Witch
300229.flavor: [Really? I can burn and barbeque everything to my heart's content? Hehehe~ I love you. I've always wanted to do this!]

300228.name: Crescent Aligote
300228.ability: Before defending, if this card belongs to the same faction as your Character, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1, then this skill is removed.
300228.flavor: [The moonlight looks really special from inside the water. Do you want to come in, too? Hey~ I won't bite.]

200538.name: 천리안
200538.ability: Two random allied Followers lose all skills and gain the skill "Before defending, this card regains its original skills."
200538.flavor: [Unlike clairvoyance from above the clouds, clairvoyance from the ground is not as easy as you think.]

200539.name: 기다림의 정원
200539.ability: Spells are sent from the bottom of your Deck to your Hand until your Hand is full.

300447.name: Tennis Fiddle
300447.ability: Before defending, this Follower gets STA +1. This effect is increased in dungeons. (Bonus effect: This Follower instead gets STA +3.)
300447.flavor: [Sita~ The W2T Bakery has some new bread today. Do you want to go try some?]

200530.name: 입국거부
200530.ability: A random allied Follower is deactivated. If this happens, a random enemy Follower is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
200530.flavor: [You may not pass!] [What do you mean!] [Please refer to this attachment.]

200531.name: 하늘에서의 재앙
200531.ability: The first allied Follower gets SIZE=1/STA=1 and is sent to the first empty Slot of the enemy Field. All enemy Followers get STA decreased by that Follower's STA reduction (by a maximum of 5, or by a maximum of 8 if you have a Crux Character). Your Character gets LIFE decreased by that Follower's SIZE reduction.
200531.flavor: [The twinkle on the horizon turned out to be a flying girl.]

200532.name: 피의 전달
200532.ability: An allied Darklore Follower in Slot 3 gets DEF increased by the number of allied Followers (by a maximum of 3).
200532.flavor: [Don't you think you'll regret refusing this delicious stuff later?]

200533.name: 흡혈의 의식
200533.ability: All allied Followers except the first allied Darklore Follower with the highest SIZE are sent to the Grave. That Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the total SIZE of the sent Followers and gets DEF increased by half as much (rounding up).
200533.flavor: [... It's weird when you stare at me like that. Stop it.]

200534.name: 마성의 소녀
200534.ability: All allied non-Darklore Followers and all enemy Followers get ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2. All Followers with 0 or less DEF get ATK -2/STA -1.

200535.name: 신입부원 환영
200535.ability: All enemy Followers get STA decreased by 10 divided by (1 + the number of enemy Followers) (rounding up).

200536.name: 승천
200536.ability: The card with the lowest SIZE in your Deck is removed from the game. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the removed card's SIZE.
200536.flavor: [Shion, doesn't that place look peaceful?] [Why have we become like this?] [Well? I can remember something flat and painful hitting me.]

200537.name: 점멸
200537.ability: The first allied Follower is sent to the last empty Slot in your Field. The first 4 Followers in the enemy Deck get STA decreased by the difference between the old and new Slot numbers.
200537.flavor: [It happened in an instant. After a flash of light, the clothes was scattered all over the ground, and something was watching us from afar.]

300313.name: Witch Einherjar
300313.ability: Before attacking, if you have a Darklore Character, the defender gets DEF -1.
300313.flavor: [The dead can't betray you. I don't really want to interfere or anything, I just want to kill you.]

300312.name: Pintail and Nexia
300312.ability: Before defending, this Follower gets the following effects depending on its DEF. 1 or less: DEF=2. 2: DEF=3. 3 or more: DEF=1.
300312.flavor: [It's an honor to join you, miss shaman. Anyway, what is this food?] [Don't think about it, just try it.]

300311.name: Dual Blade Knight
300311.ability: Before attacking, this Follower is sent to the top of your Deck. // Before defending, this Follower loses all skills.
300311.flavor: [The path to strength is Talentium. It isn't about a strong weapon, though. You just need a certain heart and unstoppable power.]

300310.name: Indomitable Knight Pintail
300310.ability: Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK -1, DEF -1, or STA -1 (randomly).
300310.flavor: [I will never give up! The truth that I've been looking for is at the end of this ordeal.]

300317.name: Succubus Vivace
300317.ability: At the start of the turn, this Follower gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1.
300317.flavor: [I have carried out the contract. All that remains is to return to the past.]

300316.name: SS 18
300316.ability: Before attacking, your Character gets LIFE +1. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300316.flavor: [These are weapons smuggled from the Empire. Even though they're powerful weapons, in the Empire they're just antiques.]

300315.name: Rion and Shion
300315.ability: Before defending, this Follower gets STA -2, then a random allied Darklore Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2.
300315.flavor: [Try it. What? You can't eat the cake I'm giving you?] [U, ugh... Don't be so pushy! And quit it with these stereotypical scenarios!]

300314.name: Irin Flina
300314.ability: Before attacking, if your Hand contains fewer Spells than Followers, this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300314.flavor: [I'm not really the kind of person who will interfere with others. My sister is my sister, and I'm me.]

300319.name: Devil Lady
300319.ability: (This Follower is summoned by the Spell "Summoning Ritual.")
300319.flavor: [Heh... Don't worry, it's okay. Just give up.]

300318.name: Anj Inyghem
300318.ability: Before attacking, all allied Followers other than this one get DEF -1. If this happens, this Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the total DEF reduction. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.

200228.name: Everyday Life
200228.ability: Your Character gets LIFE decreased by half the SIZE (rounding down) of a random Follower in your Hand. All allied Followers get ATK/STA increased by the amount of lost LIFE.
200228.flavor: [Cinia's habit. She likes to lie on the sofa. But if the maids caught her like that, she'd be embarrassed.]

200229.name: Meeting
200229.ability: A random enemy Follower sharing the same faction as your Character is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and deactivated.
200229.flavor: [A "door" was crossed. Somewhere within the Pacifica estate's woods, Penika and Cinia met for the first time.]

200224.name: Ominous Sky
200224.ability: Two random Followers in your Field get DEF +1. If this happens, two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -2.
200224.flavor: [It felt as if the night sky within Vernika was becoming blacker.]

200225.name: Nightmare
200225.ability: A random allied Follower gets ATK +1. That Follower's ATK and a random enemy Follower's STA are swapped.
200225.flavor: [The butterfly effect. Trivial things can result in enormous changes. If Sita were able to stab Vernika, I wonder what kind of ending would have awaited us?]

200226.name: One Afternoon
200226.ability: All allied Followers get DEF -3. The first allied Vita Follower with the highest SIZE gets DEF increased by 1 plus half the total DEF reduction (rounding up).
200226.flavor: [Sita, eat slowly. You'll get a stomachache.] [I'm hungry...]

200227.name: Beginning of a Lady
200227.ability: Any of the first allied Academy Follower's ATK/DEF/STA that are lower than their original values are changed to their original values.
200227.flavor: [New beginnings are always exciting. I wonder what kind of exciting things await me at this academy. I'll be able to make new friends.]

200220.name: Devastation
200220.ability: The first allied Follower that belongs to your Character's faction gets ATK/DEF/STA changed to equal the highest ATK/DEF/STA values in both Fields.
200220.flavor: [Iri sank to the ground before the destroyed place. Her legs lost all strength. The gap in her heart felt cold. The loss of Vernika swept over her.]

200221.name: Ruin's End
200221.ability: All cards in your Hand get SIZE -1. All cards in the enemy Field get SIZE +1. All cards on your Field and the enemy Field except this one are sent to the bottom of the owner's Deck. All cards in your Hand and the enemy Hand are moved to the bottom of the owner's Deck. The enemy gets Shuffles -1.
200221.flavor: [This world has been interfered with, as well. That feeling is very strong. Is this the work of DTD? This kind of destruction isn't like DND, but I'm still a bit worried.]

200222.name: Talentium Ingot
200222.flavor: [Because refined Talentium ingots stiffen when heat is applied, great care must be taken when processing Talentium for magical purposes. At the highest levels of processing, even coarse Talentium can be given powerful spiritual abilities. This means you can use it to create the most powerful cards. -Esprit's memo...]

200223.name: Vernika's Nightmare
200223.ability: Your Character gets LIFE +1 and you get Shuffles +1. A random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. If your Grave contains at least 5 cards, one random card is moved from your Grave to the bottom of your Deck.
200223.flavor: [Within her dreams, the victimized Vernika discovered her own heart. She herself was the cause of her sadness. In the end, those who can't cannot, and those who can, can. -Esprit's memo...]

200404.name: Anywhere Service
200404.ability: The following effects are applied depending on who wins the coin flip. You win: "The first card in the enemy Hand is removed from the game." Opponent wins: "The first 5 cards in your Grave are removed from the game."
200404.flavor: [Whenever the customer calls, we will immediately rush there. You want some out-of-season ice cream? Of course! We will prepare it right away!]

200157.name: Blossoming Skill
200157.ability: A random allied Follower gets ATK increased the amount of LIFE by which the enemy Character exceeds your Character (by a maximum of 9).
200157.flavor: [For a moment, one thing crossed Pintail's mind. "... breathe. Everything... has its own unique vibration."]

200406.name: Limit Break
200406.ability: If you have an Academy Character, the 8th card in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field, then the following effects are applied depending on the sent card's type. Follower: "Two random enemy Followers get ATK -4/STA -4." Spell: "All enemy Spells are sent to the Grave."
200406.flavor: [Ceres! Eres! Sedna!! Ready? With these three blades, my power becomes a million! You can't beat me!]

200407.name: Relaxation
200407.ability: The first allied Follower and the last enemy Follower have their SIZE/ATK/DEF/STA swapped.
200407.flavor: [This place is as nice as I heard. Yes? This isn't the changing room?]

200400.name: Veltier's Dream
200400.ability: If this card's SIZE is 2 or less, it is removed from the game. If your Character has equal or less LIFE than the enemy Character, this card gets SIZE -1, switches places with a random enemy Follower, and gets deactivated.
200400.flavor: [Veltier was holding a girl in her dream.] [Who was that in my dream? My head hurts.]

200153.name: El Mundo
200153.ability: If you have an Academy Character, a random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by 8 minus this card's SIZE and gets deactivated. If this card has a SIZE of less than 3, it gets SIZE +1 and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. If this card has a SIZE of at least 3, it is removed from the game.
200153.flavor: [I don't have anything to hope for. There is nobody and nothing that I can believe in. Time will stop... Die.]

200402.name: Accompaniment
200402.ability: The first two cards in your Hand have their SIZE changed equal to this card's SIZE. If this card has a SIZE of 2 or less, it is sent to the Grave. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE=1~5 and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
200402.flavor: [The rumors about the underground library have already reached Crux? Well, I don't really know what's hidden there, but I will allow you to enter under the condition that I come with you.]

200403.name: Spirit Encounter
200403.ability: If you have a Vita Character, two random enemy Followers get ATK -1, and their skills become "At the start of the turn, this card is sent to the Grave."
200403.flavor: [With a flashlight in hand, she arrived at a place beyond the fallen books. There, she found that "thing", which had the appearance of a girl.]

200408.name: Smallification
200408.ability: If your Field contains a Follower with "Blue Cross" in the name, a random allied Follower and a random enemy Follower get STA=1.
200408.flavor: [The world looks really different from this height. How about it? Don't you want to experience it?]

200409.name: Blu E Rosso
200409.ability: If you have a Crux Character, a random Follower in the enemy Field/Hand/Deck that belongs to a different faction than the enemy Character gains the following skill: "Before defending, this card is sent to the first empty Slot of the enemy Field. This skill is changed to 'At the start of the turn, this Follower regains its original skills.'"
200409.flavor: [I will unlock the future.] [All of the members felt strange. They felt as if they had to follow Rose.]

200158.name: Degradation
200158.ability: Two random allied Followers without skills get ATK +3/STA +3.
200158.flavor: [The side effects of Talentium were seen for the first time. In Jaina's letter, she described the true appearance of Talentium. -Creuset's experiment note.]

200159.name: Pilgrimage of Proof
200159.ability: If you have a Follower on the Field, two random enemy Followers get DEF decreased by 4 minus this card's SIZE. If this card's SIZE is 1, this card is removed from the game. If this card's SIZE is not 1, it gets SIZE -1 and is deactivated.
200159.flavor: [I've found myself, said Sergeant Pintail. In order to find her own path, Pintail took some time off. Her destination was H.K for 14 nights and 15 days.]

300444.name: 유류자 소저너
300444.ability: Before defending, if the attacker is Neutral, the attacker gets ATK -3/STA -3.
300444.flavor: [What? I'm awesome? What did you eggs-pect? Pfft... Kuhuhuhahaha oh man, that's funny. What, you didn't think so? This is hilarious in my world.]

200088.name: Undercover Work
200088.ability: If there are at least six Crux cards in your Grave, a random allied Follower gets STA +6.
200088.flavor: [Did anyone notice me? Uu.. I'm nervous. Please lend me your strength today, too, Jaina.]

200089.name: Conversion
200089.ability: A random enemy Follower with a SIZE less than the first allied Follower's SIZE is deactivated and sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. That Follower gets this skill: "At the start of the turn, this card is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field, and then this skill is removed."
200089.flavor: [Did something lead you to come here? Hero of Vita, I guarantee that the answer you seek is within Crux.]

300009.name: Latecomer
300009.flavor: [Late students always look the same. Of course, you might think it's only your imagination. In particular, holding a piece of bread in their mouths while running to school.]

300008.name: Cook Club Linfield
300008.flavor: [What's wrong with just baking sweets? Isn't it fine if others enjoy our food?]

300007.name: Cook Club Sylphie
300007.ability: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1.
300007.flavor: [This isn't a bakery!!! You have to cook something else properly!!!]

200081.name: Bargaining Table
200081.ability: Two random allied Followers get STA increased by their SIZE.
200081.flavor: [Cinia, you shouldn't be so strict. Can't you hear our demands first? If we don't work, you'll be inconvenienced as well.] [A strike? Maids? I don't believe it.]

300005.name: Cook Club Dir. Jamie
300005.ability: A special effect is applied in dungeons. (Bonus effect: Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.)
300005.flavor: [Sita, won't you try cooking today? We are the Cook Club after all. It's important to put the effort and joy into cooking things for others to eat.]

300004.name: Cook Club Svia
300004.flavor: [Sita is the heroine who saved Bakery Town.]

300003.name: New Cook Club Student
300003.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower with "Cook Club" in the name gets ATK +1/STA +1.
300003.flavor: [Hello~. Hm? Why does it smell like baking cookies... isn't this the Cook Club?]

300002.name: Cook Club Advisor
300002.flavor: [You only make bread... I'd like to eat something other than sweets sometimes.]

300001.name: Cook Club Student
300001.flavor: [Hehe this apron is pretty! I've dreamt of cooking like this since I was young.]

200087.name: Power Control
200087.ability: If there are allied Crux Followers with "Seeker" in the name and allied Crux Followers without "Seeker" in the name, two random allied Crux Followers get ATK +3/STA +3.
200087.flavor: [The final artifact that the leader holds. It possesses power beyond all others. The ability to control this power is the leader's greatest strength.

300442.name: 크레센트 코넌드럼
