300442.ability: Before attacking, if this Follower belongs to your Character's faction, this Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the difference between this Follower's DEF and the defender's DEF (by a maximum of 9). // Another effect is added in dungeons. (Bonus effect: Before defending, this Follower gets STA +2.)
300442.flavor: [Correct!] [I did it! From now on, call me the logic queen!]

300588.name: 신성연구회원 카노
300588.ability: Before defending, if this card's total DEF+STA is less than or equal to the attacker's ATK, the first Follower in your hand gets ATK +3/STA +3.
300588.flavor: [Here is the thing you asked for. What's it for, anyway?]

300589.name: 침묵의 기사단원
300589.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets its skills removed. This card gets SIZE +1. If this card's SIZE is at least 5, it is sent to the Grave.
300589.flavor: [After the incident at the underground library, there was a knight that hadn't been there before. She didn't speak to anyone except Veltier. Oddly enough, nobody questioned her existence, and thus she silently blended in.]

300582.name: 뮤지시터의 팬 레이나
300582.ability: Before attacking, the defender gets STA -1. // Before defending, the attacker gets STA -1.
300582.flavor: [And that spirit is what's so charming about Muzisitter!] [I don't know!]

300583.name: 도서부사서 보조 진
300583.ability: At the start of the turn, two random allied Followers with "Library Club" in the name get SIZE -1.
300583.flavor: [Senpai is so cruel to give me this much work. I don't think I'm ready to give my life to this...]

300821.name: RH Isfeldt
300821.ability: At the start of the turn, this card gets ATK +4/STA +4. // Before this card is attacked, if its STA is less than its original value, it gets STA +3. If its STA is greater than its original value, this card gets ATK +2 and is reactivated.
300821.flavor: [Meow~ How's that? Actually, it's really dangerous to give cats chocolate, so you have to be very careful. Of course, I'll always welcome it.]

300820.name: MH Isfeldt
300820.ability: At the start of the turn, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2. // Before this card is attacked, if its STA is less than its original value, it gets STA +2. If its STA is greater than its original value, this card gets ATK +1 and is reactivated.
300820.flavor: [On refreshing mornings like these, morning tea and sweet chocolate go perfectly together... How about it? Will you have an elegant tea time with me?]

110138.name: Sion Flina
110138.ability: At the start of the turn, if the enemy Field contains a card with "Rion" in the name, your Character gets LIFE -7. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: She hates Rion.)
110138.flavor: [I've come because I was summoned, tada~! The two of us who make up one detective group have made our appearance! This case... It smells hard-boiled, doesn't it?] [Location: Muspelheim 6F]

110139.name: Rion Flina
110139.ability: At the start of the turn, all enemy Followers without "Shion" in the name get ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2. If the enemy Field contains a card with "Shion" in the name, your Character gets LIFE -7. The first two cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: She hates Shion.)
110139.flavor: [What do you need? This city is so crowded that it makes me dizzy.] [Location: Muspelheim 7F]

110130.name: Kana.DTD
110130.ability: At the start of the turn, all cards on the enemy Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
110130.flavor: [I still haven't determined what kind of influence this world has, so I'm postponing my operations for now.]

110131.name: Mop Maid
110131.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers with a neighboring Follower get ATK +2.
110131.flavor: [Did you wait long? I prepared a refreshing drink.]

110132.name: Embracing Shaman
110132.ability: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gains gets ATK +2/DEF +2/STA +2.
110132.flavor: [It feels like the warm sunlight embraces everything.]

110133.name: Rio.
110133.ability: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers get ATK +3/STA +3. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: You should take the initiative before the enemy's Followers become powerful.)
110133.flavor: [Ereshkigal knows everything. You should seek her out.] [Location: Muspelheim 1F]

110134.name: Nanai.
110134.ability: At the start of the turn, all Spells in the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave. All Followers on the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of sent cards. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: The use of Spells is risky. Be careful.)
110134.flavor: [I desire to understand the rules of the world. They can be found near the origins of the world. The place where everything started. Isn't it exciting?] [Location: Muspelheim 2F]

110135.name: Seven.
110135.ability: At the start of the turn, all enemy Followers get STA=1 and get ATK increased by their STA reduction. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: The enemy will help you in an unhelpful way. You need to keep your Sta up.)
110135.flavor: [It's fine if you win. If you win. I don't care what Nanai is or what she is looking for. She is devoted to it.] [Location: Muspelheim 3F]

110136.name: New Knight
110136.ability: At the start of the turn, all enemy Followers get DEF -2. All Followers in your Hand/Field get DEF +2. The first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. (HINT: You should maintain your own Def while making use of the enemy's Def.)
110136.flavor: [It's time for me to use the sword that my master left to me. I've known from the beginning that there's no turning back.] [Location: Muspelheim 4F]

110137.name: Origin Disciple
110137.ability: At the start of the turn, your Character gets LIFE +8. (HINT: The enemy has a lot of LIFE. Look for another way to win. Certain cards will give you an advantage.)
110137.flavor: [The beginning and now are forever eternal. Welcome to Muspelheim!] [Location: Muspelheim 5F]

300645.name: 과거와 미래의 관찰자
300645.ability: At the start of the turn, this skill is changed to "Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK -2/STA -2." // Before attacking, this Follower gets ATK +3/STA +3.
300645.flavor: [Where would I have to go to find that thing?] [An annoying idiot came... well whatever, try looking for that Rose girl. She has your answer.]

300644.name: 포위당한 아스미스
300644.ability: Before attacking, the enemy gets Shuffles -1. This skill is removed.
300644.flavor: [You were free to do what you wanted when you grabbed her, but it won't be like that this time.] [Damn, wasn't that information restricted to the student council president?]

300647.name: 추격자 리누스 팔코
300647.ability: Before attacking, if there are any allied Followers with 3 or less STA, those Followers get STA +3.
300647.flavor: [Asmis is in trouble! If I don't help her soon...]

300646.name: 시약의 마녀 컬티스트
300646.ability: Before attacking, if this card's ATK/DEF/STA values contain the number 3 at least 3 times, the defender is destroyed.
300646.flavor: [Hehehe... the world will be changed! In order to change the world, you have to change the ingredients of love potions, too!]

300641.name: 밤의 성수 시그마
300641.ability: Before defending, this card gets STA increased by the amount that the attacker's original STA value exceeds its current STA value. This card gets ATK increased by half the STA increase (rounding down). If this happens, this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300641.flavor: [Did you come to handle the alcohol? Well, let's see how this wine tastes.]

300640.name: GS 일곱 번째 별
300640.ability: Before defending, if the attacker's ATK is less than this card's SIZE, the attacker gets ATK decreased by this card's ATK.
300640.flavor: [8 o' clock on the night where people are the most defenseless... Walking this path isn't too bad.]

300643.name: 요리연구부 린필드
300643.ability: At the start of the turn, this card gtes ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1.
300643.flavor: [Oh? Why's the door open? Is someone in there?]

300642.name: 게임의 지배자
300642.ability: Before attacking, a random Follower from Season 1 is created in the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=1. This skill is removed. // Before attacking, a random Follower from Season 1 is created in the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE=1. This skill is removed.
300642.flavor: [I've already tried all of the games... I'm tired of this! What do I do now...]

300649.name: 조언자 소마
300649.ability: Before attacking, the defender loses all skills until the start of the next turn, then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
300649.flavor: [I guess it's still too early for you to wear the clothes of the Seekers.] [I agree.]

300648.name: 시공간의 마녀 시니아
300648.ability: Before attacking, all enemy Followers get STA decreased by this card's SIZE divided by the number of enemy Followers (rounding down).
300648.flavor: [I will remove anyone who wishes to harm my sister from this world.]

skill_text.1001: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower with "Cook Club" in the name gets ATK +1/STA +1.
skill_text.1002: Before attacking, this card gets DEF +1/STA -1 (No effect if STA=1).
skill_text.1003: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +1.
skill_text.1004: Before defending, this card gets STA increased by 1 plus the number of cards in your Hand.
skill_text.1005: Before attacking, this card gets ATK increased by the number of cards in your Hand with "Library Club" in the name.
skill_text.1006: Before defending, this card gets STA +2.
skill_text.1007: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower with "Maid" in the name gets ATK +1/STA +1.
skill_text.1008: Before attacking, the first Spell in your Hand is sent to the Grave. If this happens, this Follower gets ATK +2.
skill_text.1009: Before defending, this card and neighboring Followers get ATK +1.
skill_text.1010: Before attacking, if the defender has at least 2 DEF, the defender gets STA -3.
skill_text.1011: At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1.
skill_text.1012: Before defending, this card gets ATK +1/STA +2.
skill_text.1013: Before attacking, the defender gets STA -1.
skill_text.1014: Before attacking, the allied Follower in Slot 3 of your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
skill_text.1015: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers with "Knight" in the name other than this one get ATK +1/STA +1.
skill_text.1016: Before defending, if the attacker's SIZE is less than this Follower's SIZE, this Follower gets ATK +1/DEF +1.
skill_text.1017: Before defending, your Character gets LIFE +1.
skill_text.1018: Before defending, if the Turn Number is odd, this Follower gets STA +3.
skill_text.1019: Before attacking, if there are least two Crux cards on your Field, the defender gets ATK -1/DEF -2/STA -1.
skill_text.1020: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is even, all allied Crux Followers get ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.1021: Before attacking, all allied Followers with "Shion Flina" or "Rion Flina" in the name get ATK +1.
skill_text.1022: Before defending, all allied Followers with "Shion Flina" or "Rion Flina" in the name get STA +1.
skill_text.1023: At the start of the turn, two random enemy Followers get ATK -1/STA -1.
skill_text.1024: At the start of the turn, if you have at least 2 allied Darklore Followers, a random enemy Follower gets STA -2.
skill_text.1025: Before defending, this card's DEF is changed to the number of Darklore cards on your Field and gets STA increased by the same amount.
skill_text.1026: Before attacking, this card gets DEF=0. This card gets ATK/STA increased by the difference between this card's DEF and the defender's DEF (by a maximum of 9).
skill_text.1027: At the start of the turn, this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1, and another Follower other than this one gets ATK +1/STA +1.
skill_text.1028: At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower with "Library Club" in the name gets STA +2.
skill_text.1029: Before attacking, this card gets ATK +2, then this skill is removed.
skill_text.1030: Before defending, all allied Followers with "Student Council" in the name get STA +2, then this skill is removed.
skill_text.1031: Before defending, a card in your Hand with "Student Council" in the name is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, this card gets ATK +1/STA +2.
skill_text.1033: Before defending, this card gets DEF -1, the attacker gets ATK -2, and this card gets ATK +2. This skill is removed.
skill_text.1034: At the start of the turn, this card gets ATK -1 (to a minimum of 0). If this happens, two random allied Followers get STA +2.
skill_text.1035: Before attacking, an allied Follower with the name "Stigma Witness Felicia" is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random enemy Follower is destroyed.
skill_text.1036: Before attacking, up to two Academy cards in your Grave are removed from the game. If this happens, the defender and one other random enemy Follower get ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -2.
skill_text.1037: Before defending, all allied Followers with the name "Stigma Flinte" get ATK/STA increased by the number of allied Academy cards.
skill_text.1038: Before attacking, this card gets STA decreased by the number of cards in your Hand/Field with "Seeker" in the name (to a minimum of 1) and gets ATK increased by the STA reduction.
skill_text.1039: At the start of the turn, two random allied Followers with "Seeker" in the name get ATK +2/STA +2, then this skill is removed.
skill_text.1040: Before defending, up to two Crux cards in your grave are removed from the game. If this happens, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2, and the first Follower on your Field other than this one gets ATK +1/STA +1.
skill_text.1041: Before defending, if there is another allied Darklore Follower other than this one, this card gets STA increased by half the attacker's ATK (rounding up), then this skill is removed.
skill_text.1042: Before attacking, all allied Followers with "Witch" in the name get STA +1.
skill_text.1043: Before defending, all allied Followers with "Witch" in the name get ATK +2/STA +2, then this skill is removed.
skill_text.1044: Before attacking, the first Followers in your Grave and the enemy Grave are removed from the game, and this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1 for each card removed.
skill_text.1045: Before attacking, this card gets SIZE -1 (to a minimum of 1).
skill_text.1046: Before defending, this card gets DEF +1, then the attacker gets ATK/STA/DEF decreased by the difference between this card's SIZE and DEF (by a maximum of 5).
skill_text.1047: Before defending, all cards in both players' Graves with the same SIZE as the attacker are removed from the game. The attacker gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of cards removed.
skill_text.1048: Before attacking, if the defender's DEF is at least 1, the defender gets DEF=0 and this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
skill_text.1049: Before attacking, the defender's skills are all removed. If this happens, this skill is removed.
skill_text.1050: At the start of the turn, all allied Darklore Followers get ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.1051: At the start of the turn, this card and neighboring Academy Followers get ATK/STA increased by half this card's SIZE (rounding up).
skill_text.1052: At the start of the turn, cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until your Hand has at least 4 cards, then this Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of Crux cards in your Hand.
skill_text.1053: At the start of the turn, all allied Vita Followers get ATK/STA increased by this card's SIZE.
skill_text.1054: Before attacking, the defender loses all skills. If this happens, this Follower gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
skill_text.1055: Before defending, this Follower gets STA +1.
skill_text.1057: Before defending, the attacker loses all skills. If this happens, this Follower gets ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
skill_text.1058: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers with the name "Dress Up Maron" are sent to your Grave. The first card in your Deck with the name "Dress Up Maron" is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field. If this happens, that card gets SIZE=5 and ATK +3/STA +3, and this card is sent to your Grave.
skill_text.1059: Before attacking, all cards except this one with the name "Dress Up Maron" on your Field are sent to your Grave. The first card in your Hand with "Dress Up" in the name is sent to your Grave. If no cards are sent to the Grave, the first card in your Grave with "Dress Up" in the name is removed from the game. If any of these effects happen, the defender gets ATK -1/STA -2.
skill_text.1060: Before attacking, if your Grave contains at least 2 cards, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game, then a random card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
skill_text.1061: At the start of the turn, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave. This card gets STA +2.
skill_text.1062: Before defending, if this Follower and your Character belong to the same faction, your Character gets LIFE +5. If your Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, your Character gets an additional LIFE +3. This skill is removed.
skill_text.1063: At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is even, all allied Academy Followers get ATK +2/STA +2.
skill_text.1064: At the start of the turn, cards are sent from the bottom of the enemy Deck to the enemy Hand until the enemy Hand is full. This Follower gets STA +2.
skill_text.1065: Before defending, if this Follower and your Character belong to the same faction, up to 5 cards in your Grave are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, the attacker gets ATK decreased by half the number of sent cards (rounding up). This skill is removed.
skill_text.1066: At the start of the turn, all allied Followers with the name "Dress Up Smartyrain" are sent to your Grave. The first card in your Deck with the name "Dress Up Smartyrain" is sent to the first empty Slot on your Field. If this happens, that card gets SIZE=5 and ATK +3/STA +3, and this card is sent to your Grave.
skill_text.1067: Before attacking, all cards except this one with the name "Dress Up Smartyrain" on your Field are sent to your Grave. The first card in your Hand with "Dress Up" in the name is sent to your Grave. If no cards are sent to the Grave, the first card in your Grave with "Dress Up" in the name is removed from the game. If any of these effects happen, this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2.
skill_text.1068: At the start of the turn, the first card in the enemy Deck is sent to the Grave. This Follower gets STA +2.
skill_text.1069: Before defending, if this Follower and your Character belong to the same faction, all allied Crux Followers get ATK +3/DEF +1/STA +4, then this skill is removed.
skill_text.1070: At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave. This Follower gets STA +2.
skill_text.1071: Before defending, if this Follower and your Character belong to the same faction, the Darklore Follower in your Grave with the largest SIZE is removed from the game. An identical Follower is created in the first empty Slot of your Field and gets SIZE -1 and ATK/STA increased by this card's DEF. This skill is removed.
skill_text.1072: Before attacking, this Follower gets STA +2.
skill_text.1074: Before defending, if the attacker's SIZE is equal or less than this Follower's SIZE, the attacker is sent to the top of the enemy Deck, then this Follower gets STA +2. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
skill_text.1075: Before attacking, the defender gets SIZE +1, then this skill is removed.
skill_text.1077: Before attacking, the first allied Follower with "Student Council" in the name gets STA +3, then this skill is removed.
skill_text.1078: Before attacking, the defender is deactivated, then this skill is removed.
skill_text.1079: Before defending, this card and the attacker's ATK are swapped.
skill_text.1080: Before attacking, this card gets STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand with "Library Club" in the name. If this number is 3 or greater, this card also gets ATK +1.
skill_text.1081: Before attacking, this card gets ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of cards on your Field with "Student Council" in the name. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
skill_text.1082: Before defending, if you have a Vita Character, the first two cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, one random deactivated allied Follower is reactivated, and one random allied Follower gets SIZE -1/ATK +1/DEF +1.
skill_text.1083: Before attacking, a card in your Hand with "Maid" in the name is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, this Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2.
